quotes.quote: When you forgive, you free your soul. But when you say I’m sorry, you free two souls.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: Apologies aren’t meant to change the past, they are meant to change the future.
quotes.author: Kevin Hancock

quotes.quote: Be the hero of hearts; learn to say I’m sorry.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Saying sorry to someone is hard… but putting your pride down for someone is the hardest.
quotes.author: Cristina Orante

quotes.quote: Saying ‘I’m sorry’ is saying ‘I love you’ with a wounded heart in one hand and your smothered pride in the other.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: When you realize you’ve made a mistake, make amends immediately. It’s easier to eat crow while it’s still warm.
quotes.author: Dan Heist

quotes.quote: Apology doesn’t mean that you were wrong, or other person was right. Its mean that your relationship is valuable than your ego.
quotes.author: Ain Eineziz

quotes.quote: Sorry’ is, indeed, one of the most difficult and most powerful words in the English language, provided one can feel and say it at the same time.
quotes.author: Uday Mukerji

quotes.quote: Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The art of a sincere and heartfelt apology is one of the greatest skills you will ever learn.
quotes.author: Jeanette LeBlanc

quotes.quote: You can always say sorry but the real apology is when you hear the sadness in their voice and see the look in their eyes. And you realize that they have hurt themselves just as much.
quotes.author: Kid Cudi

quotes.quote: An apology can be a wonderful thing so long as it is infrequent and from the heart. However, beware of the person who justifies bad behavior with apologies. For them it is a means to an end, and quite often at your expense.
quotes.author: Gary Hopkins

quotes.quote: Life becomes easier when you learn to accept an apology you never got.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: A genuine apology is like an eleventh-hour rain on a dusty crop. Grossly overdue, but miraculously just in time.
quotes.author: Jacqueline A Bussie

quotes.quote: I have made terrible mistakes that have hurt the people that I cared about the most, and I am terribly sorry. I am deeply ashamed of my terrible judgment and my actions.
quotes.author: Anthony Weiner

quotes.quote: Saying sorry doesn't mean there isn't guilt & forgiving doesn't mean that the pain is gone.
quotes.author: Harriet Morgan

quotes.quote: I’m not very good at saying sorry, but I apologize.
quotes.author: Chris Kurtz

quotes.quote: Truly saying sorry is never easy to do, and when you are, you just hope it’s not too late.
quotes.author: Justin Tranter

quotes.quote: More people should apologize, and more people should accept apologies when sincerely made.
quotes.author: Greg LeMond

quotes.quote: I’m sorry.’ The two most inadequate words in the English language.
quotes.author: Beth Revis

quotes.quote: Just say 'I’m sorry.' It’s not a tongue twister. It does not need repeating multiple times. The phrase is simple and short, easy to articulate. And the last time I checked, it sounded just as good—if not better—in a whisper. So just say it; say 'I’m sorry.'
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: It is incredible how many hurts can be healed by the two words, ‘I’m sorry.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Apology is not about saying I’m sorry, but it is about the meaning you put behind the apology and admitting that you are the wrong part.
quotes.author: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.quote: The words are all gone, the time's been too long but it's not too late to say I'm sorry to a friend
quotes.author: Edwin McCain

quotes.quote: Any good apology has 3 parts: First, I’m sorry. Second, It’s my fault. Third, What can I do to make it right? Most people forget the third part.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Chocolate says "I'm sorry" so much better than words.
quotes.author: Rachel Vincent

quotes.quote: Being sorry is the highest act of selfishness, seeing value only after discarding it.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Too often they don't realize what they have until it's gone. ...they're too stubborn to say, 'Sorry, I was wrong' they hurt the ones closest to their hearts, and we let the most foolish things tear us apart
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: My family is everything. I am what I am thanks to my mother, my father, my brother, my sister... because they have given me everything. The education I have is thanks to them.
quotes.author: Ronaldinho

quotes.quote: I can't go against my nature because I am what I am. I don't try to be anyone different to who I am.
quotes.author: Brian McDermott

quotes.quote: Don't judge me, you can't handle half of what I've dealt with. There's a reason I do the things I do, there's a reason I am who I am.
quotes.author: Varsha Sharma

quotes.quote: One of the things that makes me who I am is the loyalty I have to people I hold close to my heart.
quotes.author: Simone Elkeles

quotes.quote: Because for whatever reason, even though I want to stay home all the time and be left alone, I want to tell the world who I am now.
quotes.author: Fiona Apple

quotes.quote: No, I am who I am. I'm not going to change for anybody.
quotes.author: Calista Flockhart

quotes.quote: I'm not interested in trying to work on people's perceptions. I am who I am, and if you don't take the time to learn about that, then your perception is going to be your problem.
quotes.author: Jim Brown

quotes.quote: I am who I am and I say what I think. I'm not putting a face on for the record.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: I am who I am today because of the choices I made yesterday.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Sooner or later something seems to call us onto a particular path... this is what I must do, this is what I've got to have. This is who I am.
quotes.author: James Hillman

quotes.quote: I am who I am because of the people who influenced me growing up, and many of them were gay. No one has any right to tell anyone what makes a family
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: I am who I am, born that way, and will die that way.
quotes.author: Sharon Shinn

quotes.quote: I think you have to take me for me. I am who I am.
quotes.author: Harry Styles

quotes.quote: I am who I am because of the people who I grew up with and where I'm from.
quotes.author: Tim Duncan

quotes.quote: I've realised that I am who I am and that is it. Like it or lump it. I'm not around to please anyone any more, and it's a huge relief.
quotes.author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quotes.quote: But people are going to say what they want to say. I know who I am, and I'm not perfect.
quotes.author: Lea Michele

quotes.quote: I love who I am, and I encourage other people to love and embrace who they are. But it definitely wasn't easy â€“ it took me a while.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote: This is who I am. I'm not perfect. I don't want to try to be perfect.
quotes.author: Michael Strahan

quotes.quote: This is me. Don't judge, don't hate. I am who I am, I'm who God made me too be, an angel with a few scars and broken hearts and a voice that should be heard. I'm a solider and a fighter, I fight for love and I fight for those who need an angel too.
quotes.author: Courtney Hood

quotes.quote: My feeling is that labels are for canned food... I am what I am and I know what I am.
quotes.author: Michael Stipe

quotes.quote: I've always risen to the challenge and faced adversity; it's just a part of who I am.
quotes.author: Erik Rutan

quotes.quote: Accept me for my strength. Love me for my weakness. Be there for the good and the bad. Remember, I will never be who you want me to become -- I am who I am.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: I'm proud of what I am and who I am, and I'm just going to be myself.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: I love you. I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I've ever had, and no matter what happens to us in the future, everyday we are together is the greatest day of my life. I will always be yours.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I like to live life in an understated way because that's who I am - an ordinary guy who has experienced an extraordinary journey.
quotes.author: Simon Weston

quotes.quote: You can be vegetarian and eat fish. It's your choice, just say: 'I am what I am.' There are no hardcore divisions anymore.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.quote: I'm not hiding from anyone. I am who I am, and I'm not perfect.
quotes.author: Justin Bieber

quotes.quote: Its disheartening to read the really negative stuff, but at the same time, I know who I am, and Im comfortable with myself.
quotes.author: Austin Carlile

quotes.quote: My philosophy is it's none of my business what people say of me and think of me. I am what I am, and I do what I do. I expect nothing and accept everything. And it makes life so much easier.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.quote: There is nothing to prove and nothing to protect. I am who I am and it's enough.
quotes.author: Richard Rohr

quotes.quote: It's amazing. I can do anything. And do it well. Any good thing, I can do it. That's why I am who I am, yes, because God loves me and I'm amazed at it. I'm grateful for it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I am what I am and I'm a horrible liar. I can't do it. I'm just very candid.
quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

quotes.quote: The distance between who i am and who i want to be is separated only by my actions and words.
quotes.author: Brian Solis

quotes.quote: God made me the way I am and I accept myself. I am who I am and I'm proud of myself.
quotes.author: Caster Semenya

quotes.quote: Do not ask who I am and do not ask me to remain the same: leave it to our bureaucrats and our police to see that our papers are in order. At least spare us their morality when we write.
quotes.author: Michel Foucault

quotes.quote: I am not generous about telling people who I am and what I like to do because it's my life and it only belongs to me and my friends and family.
quotes.author: Elena Anaya

quotes.quote: I am who I am, I am what I am, I do what I do and I ain't never gonna do it any different. I don't care who likes it and who don't.
quotes.author: Buck Owens

quotes.quote: Though none all these; not what I ought to be, not what I might be, not what I wish I hope to be, and not what I once was, I think I can truly say with the apostle, 'By the grace of God I am what I am,'
quotes.author: John Newton

quotes.quote: I am—yet what I am, none cares or knows; / My friends forsake me like a memory lost: / I am the self-consumer of my woes.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: I am I plus my surroundings, and if I do not preserve the latter, I do not preserve myself.
quotes.author: José Ortega y Gasset

quotes.quote: Whatever people think I am or say I am, that's what I'm not.
quotes.author: Alan Sillitoe

quotes.quote: My one regret in life is that I am not someone else.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: If I am not for myself who is for me? and being for my own self what am I? If not now when?
quotes.author: Hillel 'The Elder'

quotes.quote: I'm as clear as I can be to people as to what my views are.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.quote: When I'm trusting and being myself ...everything in my life reflects this by falling into place easily, often miraculously
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: When I do not know who I am, I serve you. When I know who I am, I am you.
quotes.author: Indian Saying

quotes.quote: We are to ourselves just what we think we are.
quotes.author: Phineas Quimby

quotes.quote: I wanted freedom to invent and reinvent myself. You have to tell the world, 'I define myself. I will not be defined.'
quotes.author: Bill T. Jones

quotes.quote: I had everything I'd hoped for, but I wasn't being myself. So I decided to be honest about who I was. It was strange. The people who loved me for being funny suddenly didn't like me for being...me.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: I will not change for anyone other than myself. I will not settle for something just for the sake of getting acknowledged. I will respect my being before I respect someone else's. Today I pledge that I will only change for my own being: Myself.
quotes.author: Mitali Bajaj

quotes.quote: Is it fitting to consider what is impermanent, painful, and subject to change as, 'This is mine, this am I, this is myself?
quotes.author: Pali Tripitaka

quotes.quote: I am me, / I am a better version of what I was, / I am a newer version of who I am, / I am boss to no one but myself, / I am the fire in my soul, / I am the heart in my body, / I am me, / Who are you to say I'm not?
quotes.author: Evan Burke

quotes.quote: I am what I am / I am my own special creation / So come take a look / Give me the hook or the ovation / It's my world / That I want to have a little pride in / My world / And it's not a place I have to hide in / Life's not worth a damn / Till you can say / I am what I am.
quotes.author: Mark Owen

quotes.quote: I am what I am / I don't want praise I don't want pity / I bang my own drum / Some think it's noise I think it's pretty.
quotes.author: Mark Owen

quotes.quote: I am not what I ought to be, I am not what I want to be, I am not what I hope to be in another world, but still, I am not what I once used to be, and by the grace of God I am what I am.
quotes.author: John Newton

quotes.quote: Because at the end of the day, I am what you made me. And you are, what I could never change.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: See me for who I am, and then you'll see the real me.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: I am all that hath been, and is, and shall be, and my veil no mortal has hitherto raised.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: I know that I am what I am. But I am not sure what I am.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: I'm not going to change; I'm very stubborn in this way. I am what I am.
quotes.author: Ann Wojcicki

quotes.quote: Why should I care what other people think of me? I am who I am. And who I wanna be.
quotes.author: Avril Lavigne

quotes.quote: I am what I am: an individual, unique and different, with a lineal history of ancestral promptings and urgings, a history of dreams, desires, and of special experiences, all of which I am the sum total.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: I am what I am because early in life I decided that I would please at least myself in all things.
quotes.author: Edmond Rostand

quotes.quote: During much of my life, I was anxious to be what someone else wanted me to be. Now I have given up that struggle. I am what I am.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Jane Coatsworth

quotes.quote: My principles and core beliefs haven't changed in many years. You know, I don't change what I think with the wind just in order to perhaps attract more people. I am what I am, believe what I believe, and I say so.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: I am what I am and that's all that I am and if I'm supposed to be somebody else, why do I look like me?
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I was at a point where I was ready to say I am what I am because of what I am and if you like me I'm grateful, and if you don't, what am I going to do about it?
quotes.author: Ann Bancroft

quotes.quote: Children will not remember you for the material things you provided but for the feeling that you cherished them.
quotes.author: Richard L. Evans

quotes.quote: My feeling of responsibility for the safety and well-being of my children is so strong, that should an asteroid threaten to wipe out all life on earth, I would still hold myself responsible for their fate.
quotes.author: Boghos L. Artinian

quotes.quote: In raising my children, I have lost my mind but found my soul.
quotes.author: Lisa T. Shepherd

quotes.quote: I love my children beyond all reason. They're my joy, even when they're wild with kid energy.
quotes.author: Christopher Meloni

quotes.quote: A mother's love for her child is like nothing else in the world.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: You don't know what unconditional love is. You may say you do, but if you don't have a child, you don't know what that is. But when you experience it, it is the most fulfilling ever.
quotes.author: Regina King

quotes.quote: Making the decision to have a child – it is momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: Having children is my greatest achievement. It was my saviour. It switched my focus from the outside to the inside. My childen are gifts, they remind me of what's important.
quotes.author: Elle Macpherson

quotes.quote: Accept the children the way we accept trees with gratitude, because they are a blessing, but do not have expectations or desires. You don't expect trees to change, you love them as they are.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: The beauty that surrounds me is absolutely breathtaking, it's the faces of my children.
quotes.author: Anabela Loureiro

quotes.quote: What it's like to be a parent: It's one of the hardest things you'll ever do but in exchange it teaches you the meaning of unconditional love.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Everything I thought I'd hate about having children the crying, the screaming, nothing fazes me. I love it all, and it's relaxed me.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: Freedom has never been free. I love my children and I love my wife with all my heart. And I would die, die gladly, if that would make a better life for them.
quotes.author: Medgar Evers

quotes.quote: My children are delightful people whom I would love even if they weren't my children.
quotes.author: Tony Morrison

quotes.quote: Your top job as a new parent is to love your baby like crazy. After showering her with affection, your next two important jobs are to feed her and to calm her when she cries.
quotes.author: Harvey Karp

quotes.quote: Before I had my child, I thought I knew all the boundaries of myself, that I understood the limits of my heart. It's extraordinary to have all those limits thrown out, to realize your love is inexhaustible.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.quote: Children need love, especially when they do not deserve it.
quotes.author: Harold Hulbert

quotes.quote: I've never loved anybody the way I love my children.
quotes.author: Katey Sagal

quotes.quote: I love my children unconditionally.
quotes.author: Gary Kemp

quotes.quote: I love all my children, but some of them I don't like.
quotes.author: Lillian Gordy Carter

quotes.quote: If a good mother is one who loves her child more than anyone else in the world, I am not a good mother. I am in fact a bad mother. I love my husband more than I love my children.
quotes.author: Ayelet Waldman

quotes.quote: Parenting should always come from a place of unconditional loving.
quotes.author: Fiona Dimas-Herd

quotes.quote: I love my children. That will never change. I have prayed to them for forgiveness and hope that they will forgive me. I never meant to hurt them.
quotes.author: Susan Smith

quotes.quote: Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: If there must be trouble, let it be in my day, that my child may have peace.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: I'll love you forever, / I'll like you for always, / As long as I'm living / my baby you'll be
quotes.author: Robert N. Munsch

quotes.quote: Oh! as I gaze on thy sinless bloom, / and thy radiant face that laughs at gloom, / I pray God keep the thus undefiled; / I pray Heaven bless my beautiful child.
quotes.author: W.A.H. Sigourney

quotes.quote: When you look into your mother’s eyes, you know that is the purest love you can find on this earth.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Love is the chain whereby to bind a child to its parents.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Parents must get across the idea that 'I love you always, but sometimes I do not love your behavior.'
quotes.author: Amy Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: There really are places in the heart you don't even know exist until you love a child.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: You have to love your children unselfishly. That is hard. But it is the only way.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Parents of young children should realize that few people, and maybe no one, will find their children as enchanting as they do.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.quote: No language can express the power, and beauty, and heroism, and majesty of a mother's love. It shrinks not where man cowers, and grows stronger where man faints, and over wastes of worldly fortunes sends the radiance of its quenchless fidelity like a star.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbell Chapin

quotes.quote: Mother's love is peace. It need not be acquired, it need not be deserved.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: A mother's love is patient and forgiving when all others are forsaking, it never fails or falters, even though the heart is breaking.
quotes.author: Helen Rice

quotes.quote: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The depth of the love of parents for their children cannot be measured. It is like no other relationship. It exceeds concern for life itself. The love of a parent for a child is continuous and transcends heartbreak and disappointment.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: Love is giving your kids your undivided attention and time.
quotes.author: Kevin Heath

quotes.quote: It's a funny thing about mothers and fathers. Even when their own child is the most disgusting little blister you could ever imagine, they still think that he or she is wonderful.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: A parent's love is whole no matter how many times divided.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: A mother is a person who seeing there are only four pieces of pie for five people, promptly announces she never did care for pie.
quotes.author: Tenneva Jordan

quotes.quote: Until one becomes a mother, no one can ever tell you what it feel like to love someone so deeply and profoundly that you will rejoice when they rejoice, ache when they ache, feel what they feel, even without speaking a word.
quotes.author: Jennifer Quinn

quotes.quote: Mother love is the fuel that enables a normal human being to do the impossible.
quotes.author: Marion C. Garretty

quotes.quote: A baby is something you carry inside you for nine months, in your arms for three years, and in your heart until the day you die.
quotes.author: Mary Mason

quotes.quote: Children need at least one person in their life that thinks the sun rises and sets on them, who delights in their existence, and loves them unconditionally.
quotes.author: Pamela Leo

quotes.quote: And she loved a little boy very much, even more than she loved herself.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote: We find a delight in the beauty and happiness of children that makes the heart too big for the body.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Every parent is at some time the father of the unreturned prodigal, with nothing to do but keep his house open to hope.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.quote: A rich child often sits in a poor mother's lap.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Motherhood means holding a baby in your arms and accepting an existential truth: nothing, not one thing, not me with all my wonders and complexities, matters more than this.
quotes.author: Andrea Richesin

quotes.quote: You can never tell them [I love you] too many times, let them roll their eyes . . . Life can sometimes be, for all of us, a bully and you need to have money in the bank. . . . Every time you say 'I love you,' you're putting money in the bank. You're not always going to be there to put money in the bank so I say you got to stock up so it will last a long time.
quotes.author: Ann Curry

quotes.quote: She discovered with great delight that one does not love one's children just because they are one's children but because of the friendship formed while raising them.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: With each spring comes new life, energy and green growth. In summer comes the sun, warm, kind and enduring. Fall brings its canvas of color in careful, gentle change. Winter brews into faithful strength, beauty in pure white. And then comes you. You are all that Nature offers, a blessing, a gift. You are the fifth season.
quotes.author: Jason F. Wright

quotes.quote: I looked at this tiny perfect creature and it was as though a light switch had been turned on. A giant gush of love flooded out of me.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: No one had told her what it would be like, the way she loved her children. What a thing of the body it was, as physically rooted as sexual desire but without its edge of danger. . . . Once the children were in the house, the air became more vivid and more heated: every object in the house grew more alive.
quotes.author: Mary Gordon

quotes.quote: God sends children to enlarge our hearts / And make us unselfish / And full of kind sympathies and affections
quotes.author: Mary Howitt

quotes.quote: Before you were conceived I wanted you. / Before you were born I loved you. / Before you were an hour I would die for you. / This is the miracle of Mother's love.
quotes.author: Maureen Hawkins

quotes.quote: Why does a mother love her newborn? Because the baby is hers? Even more. Because the baby is her. Her blood, her flesh. Her sinew and spine. Her hope. Her legacy.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Attachment⁠—the invisible threads that connect us to our children⁠—woven from elements no lab could ever replicate: Love, Time, Connection, Closeness, Understanding . . . to name just a few.
quotes.author: Milli Hill

quotes.quote: As we carry our baby inside us, we know almost nothing about it that distinguishes it from anyone else's baby⁠—except that we love it unlike any other baby.
quotes.author: Roni Jay

quotes.quote: Romance fails us and so do friendships, but the relationship of parent and child, less noisy than all the others, remains indelible and indestructible, the strongest relationship on earth.
quotes.author: Theodor Reik

quotes.quote: The mother-child relationship is paradoxical and, in a sense, tragic. It requires the most intense love on the mother's side, yet this very love must help the child grow away from the mother, and to become fully independent.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: I'll show you what love is and all that you're worth / You show me how to put somebody else first / I hope you like music as much as your mom / That you'll understand that I'm there when I'm gone
quotes.author: Rachel Platten, Ido Zmishlany

quotes.quote: Godspeed, little man / Sweet dreams, little man / Oh, my love will fly to you / Each night on angels wings / Godspeed, sweet dreams
quotes.author: Radney M. Foster

quotes.quote: As you wander through this troubled world / In search of all things beautiful / You can close your eyes when you're miles away / And hear my voice like a serenade
quotes.author: Emily Robinson, Natalie Maines, Martie Maguire, Daniel Dodd Wilson

quotes.quote: How long do you wanna be loved? / Is forever enough? / 'Cause I'm never, never giving you up
quotes.author: Emily Robinson, Natalie Maines, Martie Maguire, Daniel Dodd Wilson

quotes.quote: Just know that your daddy loves you, got nuttin' but love for you / All I wanted was for you have a better life than I did / That's why I was out here on a twenty-four hour 365 grind / When you get to be my age you'll understand
quotes.author: Michael Jackson, Tupac Shakur, Johnny Jackson, Channette Higgens, Channoah Higgens

quotes.quote: I'm gonna watch you shine / Gonna watch you grow / Gonna paint a sign / So you always know / As long as one and one is two / Ooh ooh / There could never be a father / Love his daughter more than I love you
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: When your summer days come tumbling down / And you find yourself alone / Then you can come back and be with me / Just close your eyes and I'll be there / Listen to the sound / Of this old heart beating for you / Yes I'd miss you / But I never want to hold you down / You might say I'm here for you
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: And when she wraps her hand around my finger / How it puts a smile in my heart / Everything becomes a little clearer / I realize what life is all about / It's hanging on when your heart is had enough / It's giving more when you feel like giving up / I've seen the light / It's in my daughter's eyes
quotes.author: James T. Slater

quotes.quote: That's my daughter in the water / Every time she fell I caught her. / Every time she fell. / That's my daughter in the water, / I lost every time I fought her. / I lost every time. /
quotes.author: Peter Blegvad

quotes.quote: Isn't she pretty / Truly the angel's best / Boy, I'm so happy / We have been heaven blessed / I can't believe what God has done / Through us he's given life to one / But isn't she lovely made from love.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: Parental love is the only love that is truly selfless, unconditional and forgiving.
quotes.author: Dr. T.P. Chia

quotes.quote: By loving them for more than their abilities we show our children that they are much more than the sum of their accomplishments.
quotes.author: Eileen Kennedy-Moore

quotes.quote: To be a good father and mother requires that the parents defer many of their own needs and desires in favor of the needs of their children. As a consequence of this sacrifice, conscientious parents develop a nobility of character and learn to put into practice the selfless truths taught by the Savior Himself.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: I love these little people; and it is not a slight thing when they, who are so fresh from God, love us.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The rules for parents are but three... love, limit and let them be.
quotes.author: Elaine M. Ward

quotes.quote: The birth of my sons. The birth of new emotions...what a privilege. What a blessing.
quotes.author: Elle Macpherson

quotes.quote: My children are the reason I laugh, smile and want to get up every morning.
quotes.author: Gina Lee Nolin

quotes.quote: Children are the hands by which we take hold of heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Somehow destiny comes into play. These children end up with you and you end up with them. It’s something quite magical.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: The gain is not the having of children; it is the discovery of love and how to be loving.
quotes.author: Polly Berrien Berends

quotes.quote: You can only have one first born child. You may love all your children deeply and with passion, but there is something unique about the first born.
quotes.author: Raymond Feist

quotes.quote: When you have brought up kids, there are memories you store directly in your tear ducts.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: I looked on childrearing not only as a work of love and duty but as a profession that was fully interesting and challenging as any honourable profession in the world and one that demanded the best that I could bring to it.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
quotes.author: Taylor Hanson

quotes.quote: Even though many years have passed by, I still feel so loved by you. It still feels like just yesterday when we got engaged and then after a little while got married - I love you so much!
quotes.author: Ruby Walks

quotes.quote: I love you in the morning, in the middle of the day, in the hours we are together, and the hours we are away.
quotes.author: Mika

quotes.quote: I cannot stop loving you every day, you never stop spoiling me with surprises. I am very happy to be with you, every day I love you more and it seems like yesterday that we got married.
quotes.author: Hernan

quotes.quote: I'm not perfect. You're not perfect. But two people can be perfect together, perfect for each other.
quotes.author: Valerie Lee

quotes.quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
quotes.author: Roy Croft

quotes.quote: You are such a blessing in my life. The kids are so happy and you keep all of us so happy. You are the man that any woman would want in her life. Thank you so much for being what you are.
quotes.author: Gloria Tellies

quotes.quote: Like a flying bird you came into my life. Your love was the strength that let me take the plunge. I didn't think that I would ever be this way but you have changed all things for me.
quotes.author: Kimberly Johnson

quotes.quote: It's never enough to say what I feel for you, I adore you, I just want to be with you for the rest of my days, never forget that. You're the one who makes me feel in the clouds with great love.
quotes.author: Hernan

quotes.quote: As we grow older together, as we continue to change with age, there is one thing that will never change. I will always keep falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Karen Clodfelder

quotes.quote: Faithfulness flows from you, gratefulness is what I feel for you. No matter where we are in life, I know that you will always be there for me like a guiding star.
quotes.author: Kate Hamsworth

quotes.quote: A day without you is like a blunt with no weed be here with me every day let us cherrish these beutiful moments and know one thing that i love you.
quotes.author: Hasam

quotes.quote: When I look into your eyes, I see my happy future. The days spent with you have been the most beautiful days of my life and if I had to do it all over again, I would still choose you as my loving husband.
quotes.author: Leona Wilson

quotes.quote: When I say I love you, I don't say it casually. I say it to remind you that you are my everything, and the best thing that has ever happened to me in my life.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash

quotes.quote: I never loved you any more than I do, right this second. And I'll never love you any less than I do, right this second.
quotes.author: Beautiful Creatures

quotes.quote: I love you like crazy and you have got my mind hazy. I am so happy that I have a life partner like you. There is so much of peace in my heart, now that you are in my life.
quotes.author: Tory Derek

quotes.quote: You are my one, my only, my everything, my shining star, my reason for living, I love you so much thank you for loving me. Together forever.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: I remember perfectly when I first met you, it was such a special day that I keep in my mind. With your eyes you conquered my heart and in that moment I realized that I would stay by your side forever. Our relationship is sincere and will endure with the passing of the years.
quotes.author: Hernan

quotes.quote: I am glad that you work hard for us, I am glad that you provide for us. There are several things that you do and for so many reasons, I keep loving you.
quotes.author: Jennifer Ronald

quotes.quote: I want my husband to lead me and our family. But in order for him to do that I must be willing to submit to his lead. This does not mean I surrender my opinions or input or wisdom...it means I surrender my grip of control and selfish ways and trust him!
quotes.author: Jennifer Smith

quotes.quote: No matter what has happened. No matter what you've done. No matter what you will do. I will always love you. I swear it.
quotes.author: C.J. Redwine

quotes.quote: To the world, you may be one person, but to one person you are the world.
quotes.author: Bill Wilson

quotes.quote: I love my husband very much. I knew it was real true love because I felt like I could be myself around that person. Your true, true innermost authentic self, the stuff you don't let anyone else see, if you can be that way with that person, I think that that's real love.
quotes.author: Idina Menzel

quotes.quote: You may never know how important you are to me or how much I care for you, but you are and you will always be. Bear in mind that I couldnt afford to lose someone I've learned to care about so much.
quotes.author: Ella

quotes.quote: I love when we are talking on the phone and being able to tell when you're smiling, it makes me smile. And when I know your smiling because of me, it makes my whole world brighter.
quotes.author: Brianna Marie Guzik

quotes.quote: You make my whole world go round. You make my whole world stand still. You make my life worth living. You make me the person I am! I love you.
quotes.author: Azgraybebly Josland

quotes.quote: Marrying you was the best decision I made in my entire life, thank you my beloved husband for the immense love you have for me. I love you.
quotes.author: Hernan

quotes.quote: You are more precious than diamonds to me. You have not just a husband but a companion and the best person that I have found in this world. I love you beyond what words can express.
quotes.author: Jake Distill

quotes.quote: Today I promise you that I will stay with you forever. I will never cheat you. I will always hold your hand through good and bad times in our life. I will love you with all my heart and soul.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash

quotes.quote: I love you, not because of what you have but because of what I feel... I care for you, not because you need care but because I want to.. I'm always here for you, not because i want you to be with me but because I want to be with you.
quotes.author: Harry

quotes.quote: I love my husband. I believe in him, and I am proud of his accomplishments.
quotes.author: Pat Nixon

quotes.quote: In my day, husbands and bed were never spoken of in the same breath...husbands were taken seriously as the only real obstacles to sin.
quotes.author: Joan Plowright

quotes.quote: I love my husband, I love my children...but I want something more. I want a life.
quotes.author: Roseann Barr O.

quotes.quote: My husband and I are are going to buy a dog or have a child. We can't decide whether to ruin our carpet or ruin our lives.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: My husband is not romantic. For Mother's Day, he gave me a George Foreman Grill. I gave it back to him for Father's Day, in a s ort of forceful upward motion.
quotes.author: Sandi Selvi

quotes.quote: If nature had arranged that husbands and wives should have children alternatively, there would never be more than three in the family.
quotes.author: Lawrence Housman

quotes.quote: My love for my husband no longer wavered based on emotion. The word of God taught me the real meaning of true love. God showed me how to love my husband and not be a puppet to his actions.
quotes.author: Sheritha Browman

quotes.quote: My husband turns me on. I'm not making this up. All of this is true. I really love my husband.
quotes.author: Sheritha Browman

quotes.quote: You know, we've been married for 23 years...and I have learned a long time ago that the only people who count in any marriage are the two that are in it.
quotes.author: Hillary Rodham Clinton

quotes.quote: The legal theory is, that marriage makes the husband and wife one person, and that person is the husband.
quotes.author: Lucretia Mott

quotes.quote: In the true marriage relation, the independence of the husband and wife is equal, the dependence mutual, and their obligations reciprocal.
quotes.author: Lucretia Mott

quotes.quote: When a husband brings his wife flowers for no reason, there's a reason.
quotes.author: Marian Jordan

quotes.quote: My husband says I treat him like a God; every meal is a burnt offering.
quotes.author: Rhonda Hansome

quotes.quote: Help me to continually let my husband know that I love him for who he is, not who I want him to become.
quotes.author: Cindi Mcmenamin

quotes.quote: Thanks dear for choosing me over all the other girls you could have had.
quotes.author: Allen Appel

quotes.quote: Thanks dear for being my knight in shining armor. Even if the armor needs polishing every once in a while.
quotes.author: Allen Appel

quotes.quote: I love when he rubs his eye when I'm getting to him. I love when he raises his left eyebrow when he's not clear on something. I love everything about him.
quotes.author: Sheritha Browman

quotes.quote: Because I have my husband's heart. It's in my hands and not to be treated lightly or carelessly.
quotes.author: Lisa Jacobson

quotes.quote: Take pleasure in serving him. Yes, really. This might not be the in thing' right now— you know, to put yourself in a servant's role. But it's a very Christian concept and a real winning one.
quotes.author: Lisa Jacobson

quotes.quote: You are married to a person who does not meet all the conditions so that you might learn unconditional love.
quotes.author: Jennifer Smith

quotes.quote: You are married to a person who does not deserve so that you learn to lavishly pour yourself out on a person who does not respond appropriately. And thus you become like the God you worship.
quotes.author: Jennifer Smith

quotes.quote: Having a husband who communicates his deepest feelings is more important than having a husband who makes a good living.
quotes.author: 2007 Rutgers survey

quotes.quote: Thank you for being you, for sharing your love with me..for inspiring me to accept myself..for helping me see the unique beauty in imperfection…for showing me that love is something you do; something not just to be said, but also to be shown.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
quotes.author: Angelita Lim

quotes.quote: My husband and I always have fun together in everything we do. Some people call me crazy, but the reality is that I enjoy spending each second with him. He is not just my husband – he is my rock and my very best friend.
quotes.author: Joyce Giraud

quotes.quote: An easy-going husband is the one indispensable comfort of life.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.quote: My husband has quite simply been my strength and stay all these years, and I owe him a debt greater than he would ever claim.
quotes.author: Queen Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: I love you every minute of my life; you`re my love and my life. Not all people are lucky to find the sense of their life. I am happy, cause I had found it when I met you – the love of my life.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: All women should know how to take care of children. Most of them will have a husband some day.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: A good speech has a beginning, a middle and an end, the best example being, "I love you.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: If I love you, what business is it of yours?
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: We should remember that saying â€˜I love you' is only a beginning. We need to say it, we need to mean it, and most importantly we need consistently to show it. We need to both express and demonstrate love.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.quote:
â€œI understand you" is the soul behind "I Love You".
If this is missing, "I Love You" is empty.
quotes.author: Wordions

quotes.quote: Saying 'I love you' only takes seconds, but proving it takes a lifetime.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: You could put all the hearts together in the world and that still wouldn't describe how much I love you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I love you. You annoy me more than I ever thought possible. But I want to spend every irritating minute with you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Immature love says: â€˜I love you because I need you.' Mature love says â€˜I need you because I love you
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: If I tell you I love you, can I keep you forever?
quotes.author: Casper

quotes.quote: Love is not a trade, I love you because you love me; I love you because I love you.
quotes.author: Liviu Rebreanu

quotes.quote: I love you and that's the beginning and end of everything.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: Man loves money, bees love honey, flowers love dew, and I love you!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's easy to say, â€˜I love you,' to someone, but it's more meaningful to thank someone for loving you.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: Yesterday I loved you the most I could love anyone, yet today I love you even more.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I love you more than my own skin.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: I have a tongue like a rose petal, and when I say I love you, it has the fragrance of truth. My words are my garden, and I'm planting our future
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: The regret of my life is that I have not said â€˜I love you' often enough.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: I love you more than I think I should.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote:
I love you because I love you.
You are a part of me, and
I need no reasons to love you.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Say â€œI love youâ€ to those you love. The eternal silence is long enough to be silent in, and that awaits us all.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: I love you just the way you are.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: I love you more than there are fishes in the sea, and higher than the moon.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I love you like a fat kid loves cake.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there's a life after that, I'll love you then.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: It takes three seconds to say I love you. Three hours to explain it and a lifetime to prove it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love you more than any word can say â€¦ I love you more than every action I take â€¦ I'll be right here loving you till the end.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When someone says "I love you", watch their actions more than their words.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote:
I love you like the plant that does not bloom
and carries in itself, hidden, the light of those flowers.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: I love you more than I have ever found a way to say to you.
quotes.author: Ben Folds

quotes.quote: I loved you enough to let you stumble, fall, hurt, and fail.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: For you see, each day I love you more. Today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
quotes.author: Rosemonde Gerard

quotes.quote: I love you so, But why I love you, I'll never know.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.quote: If I could write a letter using the sky as my paper, the ocean for my ink, and the stars as my words, it would still not be enough to describe how much I love you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I promise to love you forever - every single day of forever.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: I Love you with the breath, the smiles and the tears of all my life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You could put all the hearts together in the world and that still wouldn't describe how much I love you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The words â€˜I Love You' kill, and resurrect millions, in less than a second.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: I have loved you all my life, it has just taken me this long to find you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I swear I couldn't love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.
quotes.author: Leo Christopher

quotes.quote: I love you the way a drowning man loves air. And it would destroy me to have you just a little.
quotes.author: Rae Carson

quotes.quote: I love you, not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
quotes.author: Roy Croft

quotes.quote: There are never enough I Love You's.
quotes.author: Lenny Bruce

quotes.quote: I loved you yesterday. I love you still. I always have and I always will.
quotes.author: Tim Walters

quotes.quote: I love you sounds best spoken in quiet acts of kindness.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: I love thee to the depth and breadth and height my soul can reach.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I love you also means I love you more than anyone loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that no one loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that I love no one else, and never have loved anyone else, and never will love anyone else.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: He's more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Brontë

quotes.quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: I want to do with you what spring does with the cherry trees.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Lovers alone wear sunlight.
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: If you press me to say why I loved him, I can say no more than because he was he, and I was I.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: You and you alone make me feel that I am alive. Other men it is said have seen angels, but I have seen thee, and thou art enough.
quotes.author: George Edward Moore

quotes.quote: I'd rather die tomorrow than live a hundred years without knowing you.
quotes.author: Captain John Smith

quotes.quote: It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The greater the love, the greater the tragedy when it's over.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: O often when we say, 'I love you,' we say it with a huge 'I' and a little 'you.'
quotes.author: Anthony Metropolitan of Sourozh

quotes.quote: If you love me as I love you, / What knife can cut our love in two?
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: No one shall part us from each other, / One if life and death are we: / All in all to one another— / I to thee and thou to me! / Thou the tree and I the flower— / Thou the idol; I the throng— / Thou the day and I the our— / Thou the singer; I the song!
quotes.author: Sir William S.Gilbert

quotes.quote: The birthday of my life Is come, my love has come to me.
quotes.author: Chrsitina Rosetti

quotes.quote: The simple lack of her is more to me than other's presence.
quotes.author: Edward Thomas

quotes.quote: I chose my wife, as she did her wedding gown, not for a fine glossy surface, but such qualities as would wear well.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: With my lost saints,— I love thee with the breath, / Smiles, tears, of all my life!— and if God choose, I shall but love thee better after death.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: The first time I saw you I knew it was true. That I'd love you forever and that's what I'll do. Believe in love at first sight.
quotes.author: Perry Ritthaler

quotes.quote: Love wants nothing from the other but wants everything for the other.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Love means this: When you suffer, I feel the pain.
quotes.author: Abbe Pierre

quotes.quote: You and I: we are one. I cannot hurt you without hurting myself.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: I had rather hear my dog bark at a crow than a man swear he loves me.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: When love is not madness, it is not love.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon

quotes.quote: Don't be so much in love that you can't tell when it's raining.
quotes.author: African (Malagasy) Saying

quotes.quote: We met, we lived, and dear we loved / Then came that fateful day / The love that felt so dear / Fades so far away / Tonight we both are all alone / And here's all that I can say / I love you still and always will / But that's the price we had to pay.
quotes.author: Hiram (Hank) King Williams

quotes.quote: And one day I found you / I fell in love / I chose you / Now I see and feel / You are my life and soul / My love and goal.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: I said 'I love you' thinking that's how I felt / Knowing deep down I was confused. / I said 'I love you' thinking that's what I was supposed to say, not knowing the real meaning of love.
quotes.author: Cecilia Chavis

quotes.quote: I swear I couldn't love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.
quotes.author: Rosemonde Gerard

quotes.quote: I love you more than I could ever promise because you take me the way I am.
quotes.author: Ingrid Michaelson

quotes.quote: I love you more than yesterday, less than tomorrow.
quotes.author: Edmond Rostand

quotes.quote: I love you more than my own skin.
quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

quotes.quote: Today I love you more than ever; tomorrow I will love you even more. I need you more than ever, I want you more than ever.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I love you more than words. And I am a big fan of words.
quotes.author: Joe Dunthorne

quotes.quote: I love you more than anything in the world combined.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: I love you more than I think I should.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: I love you more today than yesterday.
quotes.author: Spiral Starecase

quotes.quote:
For you see, each day I love you more
Today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
quotes.author: Rosemonde Gerard

quotes.quote: I love you more than I have ever found a way to say to you.
quotes.author: Ben Folds

quotes.quote: I love you more than the stars above, than the sun that rises every morning, than the moon in the night sky.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love you more than words can show, I think about you more than you could ever know, until forever this will be true, because there is no one I would ever love the way I love you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love you more than a fat kid loves cake.
quotes.author: 50 Cent

quotes.quote: I love you more than words can define, feelings can express and thoughts can imagine.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love you more than I can express, or can ever hope to express.
quotes.author: Jude Morgan

quotes.quote:
The hardest thing I've done
Is acting like I hate you,
When really I love you more
Than you will ever know.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love you more than you know, and I'm hoping you love me more than you show.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love you more than I hate everything else.
quotes.author: Rainbow Rowell

quotes.quote: I love you more than life itself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love you more than I ever thought possible.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Everyday we tell ourselves we're better off without each other, but then every morning I wake up and realize I love you more than the day before.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love you more than yesterday but nothing is compared to tomorrow.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love you more than any word can say. I love you more than every action I take. I'll be right here loving you till the end.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I love you more than anything.
quotes.author: Season Dixon

quotes.quote: I love you more than rainbows and a big pot of gold. I love you more than ice cream and all the candy I could hold.
quotes.author: Season Dixon

quotes.quote: I love you more than butterflies floating in the sky. I love you more than flowers in the month of May.
quotes.author: Season Dixon

quotes.quote: I love you more than sparklers and fireworks galore. I love you more than popsicles on a hot summer day.
quotes.author: Season Dixon

quotes.quote: I love you more than all the stars that twinkle in the night.
quotes.author: Season Dixon

quotes.quote: I love you more than raindrops falling softly from clouds so high.
quotes.author: Bailey Thompson

quotes.quote: I love you more than seashells that we find by the shore.
quotes.author: Bailey Thompson

quotes.quote: I love you more than chocolate cake and I even love you more.
quotes.author: Bailey Thompson

quotes.quote: I love you more than so many things I love.
quotes.author: Taye Diggs

quotes.quote: I love you more than the wind blowing by.
quotes.author: Stacey Gray Morast

quotes.quote: I Love you more than barbecue. You're succulent and saucy, smoky and sweet. Your aroma fills up my senses and makes my mouth water. And you're delicious with a pitcher of cold beer and a side of fries.
quotes.author: Rex Hamilton

quotes.quote: I love you more than my high school days. With you, I'm never a nerd-always one of the studs. Every night with you feels like the prom. And you'd never give me a wedgie for taking too much time in the bathroom.
quotes.author: Rex Hamilton

quotes.quote: I love you more than beef jerky. You always give me something to chew on. You're salty and satisfying. And I can count on you to give me sustenance when I'm running low.
quotes.author: Rex Hamilton

quotes.quote: I love you more than the Simpsons. You've got more brains than Lisa. You're more huggable than Maggie. And even on your worst days, you've got way better hair than Marge.
quotes.author: Rex Hamilton

quotes.quote: I love you more than heavy machinery. You're subtler than a bulldozer, more graceful than a crane. And just being with you is always an earth-moving experience.
quotes.author: Rex Hamilton

quotes.quote: I love you more than three-day weekends. Everyday with you is like a national holiday. You're more fun than a day off with pay. And there's nothing I'd rather do than sleep through the alarm with you by my side.
quotes.author: Rex Hamilton

quotes.quote: I love you more than rock n' roll. You're heavier than heavy metal, sexier than rhythm and blues. And I'll be your number-one groupie until the end of the road.
quotes.author: Rex Hamilton

quotes.quote: I love her more than tongues can tell and that is why I am giving her to you. I know you will love her more than tongues can tell, too.
quotes.author: Anna T. Zwicker

quotes.quote: I love you deeply, more than you know.
quotes.author: Janie Reinart

quotes.quote: I love you more than life itself.
quotes.author: Jennifer Murphy

quotes.quote: I love you more than the snowdrops in the park, lighting our way through the February dark.
quotes.author: Susan Musgrave

quotes.quote: I love you more than the gentle chickadees, flitting from our feeder on the crisp March breeze.
quotes.author: Susan Musgrave

quotes.quote: I love you more than the stars so high, winking and dancing in the January sky.
quotes.author: Susan Musgrave

quotes.quote: I love you taller than the tallest giraffe ever grown. I love you louder than the loudest rocket ship ever blasted. I love you longer than the longest lollipop ever lasted.
quotes.author: Laura Duksta

quotes.quote: I love you higher than the highest bird ever flew. I love you taller than the tallest tree ever grew..
quotes.author: Laura Duksta

quotes.quote: I love you longer than the longest path ever wound. I love you prettier than the prettiest flower ever found.
quotes.author: Laura Duksta

quotes.quote: I love you deeper than the deepest fish ever swam. I love you stronger than the strongest big river dam.
quotes.author: Laura Duksta

quotes.quote: I love you more than all the stars that shine at night, the sun that gives us light.
quotes.author: Kealy Connor Lonning

quotes.quote: I love you more than all the beaches full of sand, the waves that crash on land.
quotes.author: Kealy Connor Lonning

quotes.quote: I love you more than all the leaves upon the trees, the flowers and the bees.
quotes.author: Kealy Connor Lonning

quotes.quote: I love you more than all the creatures big and small, each stream and waterfall.
quotes.author: Kealy Connor Lonning

quotes.quote: I love you more than all the mountains up so high, the rainbows in the sky.
quotes.author: Kealy Connor Lonning

quotes.quote: The way i need you is a loneliness i cannot bear.
quotes.author: Carson Mccullers.

quotes.quote: Like mercy from heaven's gate, there's a freedom in your arms that carries me through. I need you.
quotes.author: LeAnn Rimes

quotes.quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: I want you to need me like the air you breath,I want you to hold me in your loving arms, I want you to need me, like i need you!
quotes.author: Lamisi Danaba

quotes.quote: Today and always, beyond tomorrow, i need you beside me, always as my friend, lover and forever soul mate.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: I need you now, I need you tomorrow, I need you every single second. Please don't leave, unless you never cared...
quotes.author: Winnie Kiri

quotes.quote: I never use the word, it's loaded. What love means to me is need.
quotes.author: John Cale

quotes.quote: I need you. Right now. Let me love you right here, please.
quotes.author: Abbi Glines

quotes.quote: You are the one I want, the one I need, the one I have.
quotes.author: Cameron Addison

quotes.quote: I need you like the blues needs the pain.
quotes.author: Janet Jackson

quotes.quote: You can't be gone. I need you here, with me. What am I going to do without you?
quotes.author: Patrick Carman

quotes.quote: I found everything i needed when i found you.
quotes.author: Eva

quotes.quote: You're everything I hope for. You're everything I need. You are so beautiful to me.
quotes.author: Joe Cocker

quotes.quote: I love you because I know you're always there, there to catch me when I fall, there to listen when i need you, there when I feel alone.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: For every day, I miss you. For every hour, i need you. For every minute, I feel you. For every second, I want you. Forever, I love you
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Sometimes you don't even know what you want until you find out you can't have it
quotes.author: Meghan O'Rourke,

quotes.quote: I need You like hurricane...to tear my walls down. I'm only yours now.
quotes.author: Jimmy Needham

quotes.quote: But if you tame me, then we shall need each other. To me, you will be unique in all the world. To you, I shall be unique in all the world.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: I'm lying. I don't just need someone like you. I need you.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: You can't always get what you want, but if you try sometimes, you might find, you get what you need.
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: I need you for a lot of things, Hardy. A lifetime's worth of things.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: I do not need to love you to prove that I love myself!!
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: I need you to love me, I don't like me, either, if that helps.
quotes.author: Doug Stanhope

quotes.quote: I don't need words, I just need you to come back.
quotes.author: Suzanne Wright

quotes.quote: I need you to be happy. I need one of us to be happy.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: I need you more than I need freedom.
quotes.author: Lora Leigh

quotes.quote: I need him like the axe needs the turkey.
quotes.author: Barbara Stanwick

quotes.quote: Your kind-of-woman needs a guy—not a fine gentleman.
quotes.author: Akim Tamiroff

quotes.quote: Oh, you'll need me. You'll need a woman. Need what a woman can give you. To do what you have to do. The sun only shines half the time.
quotes.author: Coleen Gray

quotes.quote: Will you still need me, will you still feed me, when I'm sixty-four?
quotes.author: John Lennon and Paul McCartney

quotes.quote: Difficult or easy, pleasant or bitter, you are the same you: I cannot live with you—or without you.
quotes.author: Martial

quotes.quote: Oh, we don't want to lose you but we think you ought to go / For your King and your Country both need you so.
quotes.author: Paul Alfred Rubens

quotes.quote: When someone needs us, it makes us feel important and significant, so it's also natural to assume that needing someone is a sign pu our love for them.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: We can only take responsibility for our own happiness when we don't rely on someone else to complete us.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: When we need someone to give to us in a very specific manner, it's because there are needs that we need to fill; and these needs create gaps inside us that heavily influence our definition of what love is.
quotes.author: Xandria Ooi

quotes.quote: If you depend on someone for your happiness, you are becoming a slave, you are becoming dependent, you are creating a bondage.
quotes.author: Osho Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The more you depend on forces outside yourself, the more you are dominated by them.
quotes.author: Harold Sherman

quotes.quote: Lord my sovereign God, creator of the universe have mercy on my soul for I am one of many who need you.
quotes.author: Giovanni Bruschi

quotes.quote: I need your love and strength to shape my life, teach me how to be like your son, to have the heart, the virtue, the fire of Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Giovanni Bruschi

quotes.quote: When you need someone, you will lose your independence as a human being. You are constantly reliant on another person
quotes.author: Patrick Hoeller

quotes.quote: When your not around / I feel lost and not centered / Then I find my way home / And I'm breathing again / Safe and comforted.
quotes.author: Joe

quotes.quote: To have the warm scent of your breath waking me in / the middle of the night. I need you closer. / Standing by my side. My heart longs for you. / So distant you feel to me, you're like that star, shining so far...
quotes.author: Jesus Penaranda

quotes.quote: My lovely one, be near to me tonight. / For now, I need you most, since I have gone / Through the sparse woodland in the fading light, / Where in time past we two have walked alone.
quotes.author: Edward Shanks

quotes.quote: What have you more than I, who crave you so? / Have I, not hands and feet and thoughts to tell? / All my sweet senses and fine dreams that swell / Rich with contentments that the star-winds blow? / Yet do I need you everywhere I go.
quotes.author: Zora Bernice May Cross

quotes.quote: Come close, lemme know you. / Inside me, I need you to be true. / All time me, gonna stay true, / inside you.
quotes.author: Jaago Machiek Jr

quotes.quote: Woman I need you (I need you) like never before (Like never before) / African woman you're the one I adore / I need you (I need you) like never before (Like never before) / And when you're with me I feel so safe and secure.
quotes.author: Dalton Brownie

quotes.quote: Oh baby, I need you / For the rest of my life, girl / I need you / To make everything right, girl / I love you / And I'll never deny that / I need you.
quotes.author: Kara Diogardi

quotes.quote: I need you like the flower needs the rain / You know I need you, guess I'll start it all again / You know I need you like the winter needs the spring / You know I need you, I need you.
quotes.author: Gerry Beckley

quotes.quote: Your soul sings to mine. My soul is yours, and it always will be, in any world. No matter what happens. I need you to remember that I love you.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: I need you to protect me from being lonely. Don't fight for me. Be with me. That's what I need.-Bianca to Lucas
quotes.author: Claudia Gray

quotes.quote: I need you to know that no matter what happens, it was worth it to me. Being with you, loving you. It was all worth it.
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.quote: I do not need drugs to be a genius, do not take a genius to be human, but I need your smile to be happy.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: I need you to pray for me; I need you to care for me. I need you to want me to win. I need to know where I'm heading because I know where I've been.
quotes.author: Curtis Jackson

quotes.quote: I love the time I spend with you. You make my living worthwhile. Why don't I meet you before. I wish I could start my life From the beginning with you because the time I spend with you is never enough. I need you more every day.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: I need you here with me we look for our love but we don't find it. I'm searching and searching, I really need you here with me boy, we're going Round-and Round!
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: They say our love is not true but the truth is that they're all fools, I need you, you need me that's the end of our love story.
quotes.author: Jamie

quotes.quote: When I'm away from you, I'm still with you, when my eyes are closed, I still see you, when I'm awake, I still dream of you, when I feel have everything, I still need you, and no matter what I still love you.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: My heart had been touched by him, battered by him, cradled by him as the days passed. He was cruel without meaning to be yet he was kind, and I needed him too much to let myself want him
quotes.author: Mackenzie Herbert

quotes.quote: I've already been to hell and back. This time, I want to go to paradise. I want to do whatever it is you want. Because all I want is you, by my side, from this moment until forever
quotes.author: Holly Stephens

quotes.quote: I want you to need me like the air you breathe, i want you to hold me in your loving arms, i want you to need me, like I need you!
quotes.author: Lamisi Danaba

quotes.quote: Today and always, beyond tomorrow, I need you beside me, always as my friend, lover and forever soul mate
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: I want her to melt into me, like butter on toast. I want to absorb her and walk around for the rest of my days with her encased in my skin. I want.
quotes.author: Sara Gruen

quotes.quote: You came like the night thief, bloomed in my heart like the red rose and I want you to light up my life like the morning sun
quotes.author: Saffron Lumber

quotes.quote: I don't care if I'm not your first. All I want is to be your last!
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: I want you and I hate wanting things and I especially hate admitting I want them.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: The wait is long, my dream of you does not end.
quotes.author: Nuala O'Faolain

quotes.quote: If I knew I would be so happy one day, I would have searched for you harder and found you before so that I could spend more time with you.
quotes.author: Sal Dormant

quotes.quote: I want him everywhere. I burn for him in places he hasn't even touched.
quotes.author: Amanda Bouchet

quotes.quote: Everyday I tell myself I need to get over you, But every night I find myself thinking about how much I want you back.
quotes.author: Hussein Nishah

quotes.quote: Every single day I want you to be happy and full of joy, just like you make me happy by just passing through my mind.
quotes.author: Donna White

quotes.quote: Your cute smile and your happy laughter attracted me to you, but your caring loving heart is the reason why I want to spend the rest of my life with you.
quotes.author: Lana Dudley

quotes.quote: I want him to be happy. And I want you to be happy, too. Even if you can only find that happiness without me.
quotes.author: S.J. Watson

quotes.quote: I want you to like me, but I don't care if you don't.
quotes.author: Olivia Munn

quotes.quote: I can't tell if wanting you is selfish or stupid.
quotes.author: Alex Rosa

quotes.quote: I want you to know that you are the best thing that has ever happened to my life and I will never ever allow anyone to take you from me.
quotes.author: Chelle Mish

quotes.quote: I want you to be happy...to laugh, smile and rejoice in order that others may be made happy by you.
quotes.author: Abdu'l-Bahá

quotes.quote: I want you to be everything that's you, deep at the center of your being.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I don't want you to save me I want you to stand by my side as I save myself
quotes.author: Sushil Singh

quotes.quote: I want you to know, that you deserve the best. You're beautiful.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: I wished upon a star, hoping it come true. The next day we met and I ended up with you.
quotes.author: Raghib Clitso

quotes.quote: So it's not gonna be easy. It's going to be really hard; we're gonna have to work at this everyday, but I want to do that because I want you. I want all of you, forever, everyday. You and me... everyday.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I want to be with you forever and beyond.
quotes.author: GAIL CARSON LEVINE

quotes.quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
quotes.author: Roy Croft

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Love to me is someone telling me, 'I want to be with you for the rest of my life, and if you needed me to I'd jump out of a plane for you.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: I love her and that's the beginning and end of everything.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Things must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The water shines only by the sun. And it is you who are my sun.
quotes.author: Charles De Leusse

quotes.quote: I swear I couldn’t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.
quotes.author: Leo Christopher

quotes.quote: You know it’s love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you’re not part of their happiness.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: To lose balance sometimes for love is part of living a balanced life.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
quotes.author: Angelita Lim

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you… I could walk through my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: Take my hand, take my whole life too. For I can’t help falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known and even that is an understatement.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: When Harry Met Sally

quotes.quote: I love you more than I have ever found a way to say to you.
quotes.author: Ben Folds

quotes.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: If you remember me, then I don’t care if everyone else forgets.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: He’s more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: You are, and always have been, my dream.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: You make me want to be a better man.
quotes.author: Melvin Udall

quotes.quote: I'm officially done trying. If you want me in your life, you can come find me. Until then, continue treating me like I dont exist.
quotes.author: Quinton Riley

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: I'ts over. I'm done. No more trying. I just give up, I finally see that you will never let our love be. I will never get my second chance, cause you always put someone in front of me.
quotes.author: Nicole Tran

quotes.quote: I don't want to say anything derogatory I'm done.
quotes.author: Ed Rollins

quotes.quote: I don't stop when I'm tired i stop when I'm done.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Every time I say I'm done I find myself trying again.
quotes.author: Kaye Gurrea

quotes.quote: I'm done with trying to seek other people's approval. From here on now it's just me and approving myself. I'm done.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
quotes.author: Deborah Reber

quotes.quote: I look back on my life like a good day's work it was done and i am satisfied with it.
quotes.author: Grandma Moses

quotes.quote: I'm done with those; regrets are an excuse for people who have failed.
quotes.author: Ned Vizzini

quotes.quote: I am done with the past, the future has plenty of room for change.
quotes.author: Cyrile Dayao

quotes.quote: I am done with great things and big things, great institutions and big success, and I am for those tiny invisible molecular moral forces that work from individual to individual, creeping through the crannies of the world like so many rootlets, or like the capillary oozing of water, yet which if you give them time, will rend the hardest monuments of man's pride.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: I still miss you and maybe even still like you, but I'm done chasing you.
quotes.author: Anmol Andore

quotes.quote: I just wish you knew how much I liked you. But now since you decided to leave I'm done trying. I'm done with you because the last thing I want now is to be with you.
quotes.author: Andii Sudari

quotes.quote: I'm done chasing after people if you want to walk out of my life I'll hold the door open for you.
quotes.author: Hallie

quotes.quote: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli
