quotes.quote: It's sad to know I'm done. But looking back, I've got a lot of great memories.
quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

quotes.quote: Everyone makes mistakes. But what we have to do, is learn from them, forgive the people who hurt you, apologize to the people who you hurt, forget about them, and move on.
quotes.author: Brianna Poncsak

quotes.quote: The things two people do to each other they remember. If they stay together, it's not because they forget; it's because they forgive.
quotes.author: Demi Moore in Indecent Proposal

quotes.quote: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: To err is human, to forgive divine.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Sorry doesn't mean anything unless you mean it.
quotes.author: Ashley Sexton

quotes.quote: Sometimes, an apology sets free a part of you that you didn't even realize was cagedâ€¦and forgiveness destroys the cage.
quotes.author: Sanjo Jendayi

quotes.quote: An apology given just to appease one's conscience is self-serving and better left unspoken!
quotes.author: Evinda Lepins

quotes.quote: An apology is a lovely perfume; it can transform the clumsiest moment into a gracious gift.
quotes.author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quotes.quote: An apology is a good way to have the last word.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
quotes.author: Paul Boese

quotes.quote: Apologize! That's the least you can do to try to make right something you have wronged.
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: Apologizing does not always mean that you are wrong and the other person is right. It just means that you value your relationship more than your ego.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Saying â€˜I'm sorry' is saying â€˜I love you' with a wounded heart in one hand and your smothered pride in the other.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: In this life, when you deny someone an apology, you will remember it at time you beg forgiveness.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: When you say the word 'sorry' make sure you understand that an apology has 3 parts. "I'm sorry", "It's my fault and I won't do it again" and "How can I make things better". The last part is the most important.
quotes.author: Manasa Rao

quotes.quote: It's more than saying sorry. It's meaning it. It's letting the apology change things. But anÂ apology is where it has to begin.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Sorry may have become "just another word", but with tears it means the world.
quotes.author: C.J.

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is a sign that the person who has wronged you means more to you than the wrong they have delt.
quotes.author: Ben Greenhalgh

quotes.quote: I'm sorry. The two most inadequate words in the English language.
quotes.author: Beth Revis

quotes.quote: "Sorry" can not change the past, but can change the future.
quotes.author: Sladiana Savic

quotes.quote: Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
quotes.author: Kimberly Johnson

quotes.quote: Life becomes easier when you learn to accept an apology you never got.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: There's a small window of opportunity to apologize sometimes after you've terribly wronged someone. It closes. Sometimes forever, but it never opens wide enough again for a good breeze.
quotes.author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quotes.quote: A truly humble apology works to part storm clouds, calm rough seas, and bring on the soft lights of dawn; it has the power to change a person's world.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: 'I'm sorry' won't fix what's been broken. It can't reverse time or undo the damage or change anything that happened. But a sincere, humble apology can serve to soften the sting and sometimes do a pretty good patch up job.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Sacrifice is at the heart of repentance. Without deeds, your apology is worthless.
quotes.author: Bryan Davis

quotes.quote: 'I'm sorry'Â won't fix what's been broken. Â It can't reverse time or undo the damage or change anything that happened. Â But a sincere, humble apology can serve to soften the sting and sometimes do a pretty good patch up job.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Its incredible how many wounds can be healed by the two words â€˜I'm sorry'.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the sweetest revenge.
quotes.author: Isaac Friedmann

quotes.quote: It's easier to ask forgiveness than it is to get permission.
quotes.author: Grace Hopper

quotes.quote: Let us forgive each other â€” only then will we live in peace.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: â€˜Sorry' is indeed, one of the most difficult and most powerful words in English, provided one can feel and say it at the same time. It is difficult because you sincerely need to feel the pain of the other person and rise above your ego to say it; it is powerful because you overwhelm the other with the opposite reaction of what they were expecting.
quotes.author: Uday Mukerji

quotes.quote: It takes a great deal of character strength to apologize quickly out of one's heart rather than out of pity. A person must possess himself and have a deep sense of security in fundamental principles and values in order to genuinely apologize.
quotes.author: Stephan Covey

quotes.quote: I'm sorry you're angry is NOT an apology.
quotes.author: Lisa Lutz

quotes.quote: Apologizing does not always mean you're wrong and the other person is right. It just means you value your relationship more than your ego.
quotes.author: Mark Matthews

quotes.quote: Sorry means you leave yourself open, to embrace or to ridicule or to revenge. Sorry is a question that begs forgiveness, because the metronome of a good heart won't settle until things are set right and true. Sorry doesn't take things back, but it pushes things forward. It bridges the gap. Sorry is a sacrament. It's an offering. A gift.
quotes.author: Craig Silvey

quotes.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: In this lifetime when you deny someone an apology, you will remember it at the time you beg for forgiveness.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: You can edit what you write. Why not edit what you say? If it hurts somebody, you can still offer an apology or withdraw your statements.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: An apology can be a wonderful thing so long as it is infrequent and from the heart. However, beware of the person who justifies bad behavior with apologies. For them it is a means to an end, and quite often at your expense.
quotes.author: Gary Hopkins

quotes.quote: Sorry' isn't a synonym for â€˜guilty.' It's a way to say you're listening.
quotes.author: Martina Boone

quotes.quote: If you think the most courageous and difficult thing you can do is stubbornly stand your ground, try graciously giving in.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: An apology is the super glue of life. It can repair just about anything.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.quote: When you realize you've made a mistake, make amends immediately. It's easier to eat crow while it's still warm.
quotes.author: Dan Heist

quotes.quote: When you forgive, you free your soul. But when you say I'm sorry, you free two souls.
quotes.author: Donald L. Hicks

quotes.quote: Never apologize for showing your feelings. When you do, you are apologizing for the truth.
quotes.author: Jose N. Harris

quotes.quote: Apologizing is different from begging, it doesn't change your status, go ahead and get on your knees, spill tears if you got it, for the person you offended, if at all you had a place in their hearts, you'll be totally forgiven and accepted.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Being sorry is the highest act of selfishness, seeing value only after discarding it.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Would 'sorry' have made any difference? Does it ever? It's just a word. One word against a thousand actions.
quotes.author: Sarah Ockler

quotes.quote: Ice burns, and it is hard to the warm-skinned to distinguish one sensation, fire, from the other, frost.
quotes.author: A.S. Byatt

quotes.quote: You are ice and fire the touch of you burns my hands like snow.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: Thou art all ice. Thy kindness freezes.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We all get the same amount of ice. The rich get it in the summer. The poor get it in the winter.
quotes.author: Bat Masterson

quotes.quote: If you're skating on thin ice, you might as well dance.
quotes.author: Anita Shreve

quotes.quote: Like ice beneath the sun's rays, to such poverty did he fall his fortune melted to water.
quotes.author: Ihara Saikaku

quotes.quote: They say blood is thicker than water, but I say ice, can be more solid than blood, when times get cold.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: He who cannot put his thoughts on ice should not enter into the heat of dispute.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There's nothing pretty about ice. Ice grows nothing. But we've got this in our minds that we've got to make everything cold.
quotes.author: Don Young

quotes.quote: If ice can burn, then love and hate can mate.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: The thinner the ice, the more anxious everyone is to see whether it will bear.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: You've got ice in your veins, but you're smart enough to keep it from freezing your heart.
quotes.author: Tijan

quotes.quote: Ice and iron cannot be welded.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Ice melts when heated, eyes melt when cheated.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Fire to my ice. Ice to my fever.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: Without the ice, the earth will fall.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: When you're on the ice, you have very little time, you see very little, and everything happens really quick.
quotes.author: Steve Yzerman

quotes.quote: The shrill cry of the newborn...like the sound of the blade of a skate on ice.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: The way of life is like a path between two forbidding roads, one of fire and one of ice. The slightest bend in either direction is fatal.
quotes.author: Judah

quotes.quote: Felt as if she were on the edge of a frozen pond., forced to go forward and not knowing how thick the ice was.
quotes.author: Donald Mackenzie

quotes.quote: Like a piece of ice on a hot stove, the poem must ride on its own melting.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: In skating over thin ice, our safety is in our speed.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: How few are aware that in winter, when the earth is covered with snow and ice...the sunset is double. The winter is coming when I shall walk the sky.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: It was so cold that ice was forming on my spitter.
quotes.author: Dick Farrel

quotes.quote: We train through the winter in deep snow and ice. Our slogan 'Pain is good, more pain is even better.'
quotes.author: Matt Carpenter

quotes.quote: A diamond is the only kind of ice that keeps a girl warm.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: You've got so much ice on your hands I could skate on them.
quotes.author: John Curry

quotes.quote: She tells enough white lies to ice a wedding cake.
quotes.author: Margot Asquith

quotes.quote: When the short day is brightest, / with frost and fire, / The brief sun flames the ice, / on pond and ditches, / In windless cold that is the heart's heat.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: While November numbly collapses, this beech tree, heavy as death on the lawn, braces for throat-cutting ice, bandaging snow.
quotes.author: Edwin Honig

quotes.quote: The ice-bound floods that still with rigour freeze / The snow clothed valley and the naked tree / These sympathising scenes my heart can please / Distress is theirs— and they resemble me.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: You are ice and fire. The touch of you burns my hands like snow.
quotes.author: Amy Lowell

quotes.quote: Ice is time solidified.
quotes.author: Gretel Ehrlich

quotes.quote: I hold with those who favor fire. / But if it had to perish twice, / I think I know enough of hate / To know that for destruction ice is also great.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Life is only a flicker of melted ice.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Justice has to be cold. Deal with it; it's just ice.
quotes.author: Natalya Vorobyova

quotes.quote: A storm is brewing / It's raining ice / But the robins are singing / Their April song.
quotes.author: Sabine Shah

quotes.quote: Ice has a social life. Its changeability shapes the culture, language and stories of those who live near it.
quotes.author: Robert Macfarlane

quotes.quote: Doing stand-up is like running across a frozen pond with the ice breaking behind you. I love it because it's dangerous.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Fighter pilots have ice in their veins. They don't have emotions. They think, anticipate. They know that fear and other concerns cloud your mind from what's going on and what you should be involved in.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: It's a strange world of language in which skating on thin ice can get you into hot water.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: I must freeze my heart to the one person who insists on setting it ablaze.
quotes.author: Victoria Aveyard

quotes.quote: Ice can kill as dead as fire.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: You are walking on thin ice - the ice of what remains of the trust between us - carrying the weight of immeasurable guilt.
quotes.author: Prashant Chopra

quotes.quote: Fear melts like ice when we allow love's divine light to shine upon our ignorance.
quotes.author: Soul Dancer

quotes.quote: Summer would not be summer without Ice-cream. Ice-cream is the favorite currency of love.
quotes.author: Puck

quotes.quote: Age does not diminish the extreme disappointment of having a scoop of ice cream fall from the cone.
quotes.author: Jim Fiebig

quotes.quote: I go running when I have to. When the ice cream truck is doing sixty.
quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

quotes.quote: Ice cream is the perfect buffer, because you can do things in a somewhat lighthearted way. Plus, people have an emotional response to ice cream; it's more than just food. So I think when you combine caring, and eating wonderful food, it's a very powerful combination.
quotes.author: Jerry Greenfield

quotes.quote: Without ice cream, there would be darkness and chaos.
quotes.author: Don Kardong

quotes.quote: Ice cream is exquisite. What a pity it isn't illegal.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Life is like an ice-cream cone, you have to lick it one day at a time.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: I doubt whether the world holds for anyone a more soul-stirring surprise than the first adventure with ice cream.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.quote: Ice cream — the great melter of all resolve.
quotes.author: Dr. Idel Dreimer

quotes.quote: I love dessert. All kinds. But there's something about ice cream that makes me happy. I am drawn to its simplicity. I am perplexed by the endless supply of constantly growing flavor options. And I am always in the mood for sprinkles and a sugar cone.
quotes.author: Rachel Nichols

quotes.quote: Not to like ice cream is to show oneself uninterested in food.
quotes.author: Joseph Epstein

quotes.quote: Forget art. Put your trust in ice cream.
quotes.author: Charles Baxter

quotes.quote: I think the serving size of ice cream is when you hear the spoon hit the bottom of the container.
quotes.author: Brian Regan

quotes.quote: Like magic, she felt him getting nearer, felt it like a pull in the pit of her stomach. It felt like hunger but deeper, heavier. Like the best kind of expectation. Ice cream expectation. Chocolate expectation.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: A day without ice cream was a day wasted.
quotes.author: Iain Pears

quotes.quote: Now just the thought of eating ice cream puts pounds on me.
quotes.author: David Nail

quotes.quote: Everyone knows that ice cream is worth the trouble of being cold. Like all things virtuous, you have to suffer to gain the reward.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: You can describe me as a Ice cream! I'm cold.. But, you know.. Ice cream is very sweet.
quotes.author: Hanako Ishii

quotes.quote: Ice cream is happiness condensed.
quotes.author: Jessie Lane Adams

quotes.quote: Always serve too much hot fudge sauce on hot fudge sundaes. It makes people overjoyed, and puts them in your debt.
quotes.author: Judith Olney

quotes.quote: Hot fudge is the fairy prince, a knight in chocolate armor — the happily ever after of ice cream.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: It is a grave error to assume that ice cream consumption requires hot weather.
quotes.author: Anne Fadiman

quotes.quote: If you like ice cream, why stop at one scoop? Have two, have three. Too much is never enough.
quotes.author: Morris Lapidus

quotes.quote: Oh, everyone likes ice cream, yes indeed they do. Everyone likes ice cream, I do do you? Search the whole world over, travel near and far. But everyone likes ice cream no matter who they are.
quotes.author: Bert & Ernie Sing-Along

quotes.quote: Gelato. Italian ice cream. The greatest thing that will ever happen to you.
quotes.author: Jenna Evans Welch

quotes.quote: I ain't no veggie, like my flesh to the bone, alive and licking on your ice cream cone.
quotes.author: Alice Cooper

quotes.quote: I'd rather be at home and eat ice cream than go out and get wasted.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: It's fun. When people come in to buy ice cream, they're happy. It's a treat.
quotes.author: Mike Manfredi

quotes.quote: It is like a temptation to eat ice cream instead of something that is better for you.
quotes.author: Pete Sorensen

quotes.quote: You can pour melted ice cream on regular ice cream. It's like a sauce!
quotes.author: Chris Pratt

quotes.quote: Ice cream cravings are not to be taken lightly.
quotes.author: Betsy Canas Garmon

quotes.quote: You did not sell nor wanted to buy me Ice cream. You gave me my most favourite flavour.
quotes.author: Petra Hermans

quotes.quote: So yes, I do want to try and keep things going if I can. I have a few things brewing... And if it doesn't happen, I did buy an ice cream van a while ago. So I always have that to fall back on.
quotes.author: Rupert Grint

quotes.quote: To see a hungry kid eating a bowl of rice like it's ice cream -- there's a satisfaction in that, that words can't express.
quotes.author: Ronnie Hepperly

quotes.quote: I can't run for as many ice cream breaks as I used to when I watched for pure enjoyment.
quotes.author: Constance White

quotes.quote: I guess ice cream is one of those things that are beyond imagination.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: The only emperor is the emperor of ice cream.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Everything was chocolate ice cream and kisses and wind.
quotes.author: Francesca Lia Block

quotes.quote: I always say whoever can figure out how to make ice cream healthy will be a gazillionaire.
quotes.author: Justin Deeley

quotes.quote: My love for ice cream emerged at an early age - and has never left!
quotes.author: Ginger Rogers

quotes.quote: Spoon the sauce over the ice cream. It will harden. This is what you have been working for.
quotes.author: Nicholson Baker

quotes.quote: Eating ice cream and not exercising is great. The downside is your health isn't so good.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: Until you got ice cream spilled on you, you're not doing field work.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: They can crumble as easily as ice cream in this heat.
quotes.author: Sammy Nelson

quotes.quote: Scoops of mint ice cream with chips of chocolate cows.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: This is not ice cream. These are powerful products.
quotes.author: Billy Tauzin

quotes.quote: My advice to you is not to inquire why or whither, but just enjoy your ice cream while it's on your plate. That's my philosophy.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: Ice cream goes with springtime.
quotes.author: Susan Hill

quotes.quote: Ice cream is my comfort food.
quotes.author: Jessie Ware

quotes.quote: Easy as an ice cream sundae. Slipping outta your hand into the dirt. Easy as an ice cream sundae. Every dancer gets a little hurt.
quotes.author: Joshua Jenkinson

quotes.quote: We're all ice cream castles in the summertime. Ice cream castles in the summer.
quotes.author: Morris Day

quotes.quote: First love is like vanilla ice cream. There may come many eclectic flavors, but there shall be only one classic.
quotes.author: Akshar

quotes.quote: Don't let your ice cream melt while you're counting somebody else's sprinkles.
quotes.author: Akilah Hughes

quotes.quote: My head says go to the gym, my heart says eat more ice cream.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is always room for ice cream.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Life is like an ice cream enjoy it before it melts.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can't buy happiness. But you can buy ice cream and that is pretty much the same thing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is no sincerer love than the love of ice cream.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Tomorrow we can eat brocolli, but today is for ice cream.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Icre cream solves everything.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the ice cream you don't scoop.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Ice cream never asks silly questions. Ice cream understands.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Not to like ice cream is to show oneself uninterested in food.
quotes.author: Joseph Epstein

quotes.quote: Ice cream brings people together.
quotes.author: Doug Ducey

quotes.quote: If you were ice cream, you would be my favorite flavor.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You are the sprinkles to my ice cream.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Happiness is a tub of ice cream.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My brain said salad but my stomach autocorrect it to ice cream.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only running I do is to chase the ice cream truck.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you are a complete perfectionist, then the truth is that this ice skating business will drive you a little crazy!
quotes.author: Dorothy Hamill

quotes.quote: Skating is one of those sports you unfortunately see people get stuck in.
quotes.author: Ashley Wagner

quotes.quote: Skating was the vessel into which I could pour my heart and soul.
quotes.author: Peggy Fleming

quotes.quote: One step, two steps, three steps; like winds of time experience joy of centuries, when movements become revelations of the dance of destinies.
quotes.author: Shah Asad Rizvi

quotes.quote: Society is like a large piece of frozen water; and skating well is the great art of social life.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: A man learns to skate by staggering about and making a fool of himself. Indeed he progresses in all things by resolutely making a fool of himself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I wouldn't be face-washing anyone in real life. I'd be skating to the bench real fast to get away.
quotes.author: Patrick Kane

quotes.quote: Skating can make you feel athletic, graceful, beautiful.
quotes.author: Gracie Gold

quotes.quote: We don't get any marks for effort like in ice-skating.
quotes.author: Kevin Keegan

quotes.quote: It's a strange world of language in which skating on thin ice can get you into hot water.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: People don't understand sarcasm, like, they take everything too seriously. People need to lighten up and go ice skating.
quotes.author: Daniel Johns

quotes.quote: Icy pillars of serenity, spun from airy mist, entered my quiet vision in echoes of worlds unknown.
quotes.author: Gina Marinello-Sweeney

quotes.quote: I asked my old man if I could go ice-skating on the lake. He told me, wait til it gets warmer.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: I won't quit skating until I am physically unable.
quotes.author: Tony Hawk

quotes.quote: Hearts shall dance once again; when canvas of ice is painted with the brush of skates.
quotes.author: Shah Asad Rizvi

quotes.quote: In skating over thin ice our safety is in our speed.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Skating is tough to pick up when you are a grown up.
quotes.author: D. B. Sweeney

quotes.quote: To me, skating should look effortless even when you're doing the hardest of elements.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.quote: I like to skate on the other side of the ice.
quotes.author: Stephen Wright

quotes.quote: If you're skating on thin ice, you might as well dance!
quotes.author: Laurie Strongin

quotes.quote: Ice skating is very difficult. It takes a lot of discipline and a lot of hard work. It's fun, but you are there on the ice every morning freezing and trying to do these moves and these tricks.
quotes.author: Michelle Trachtenberg

quotes.quote: If you don't know a lot about figure skating, it's easy to fall in love with ice dancing because it's so romantic and so theatrical.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hamill

quotes.quote: In skating there's always another jump or another spin variation or another thing to learn, and that's what I liked about it.
quotes.author: Gracie Gold

quotes.quote: Figure skating is not a hobby. Its my work, which I want to do, and do well.
quotes.author: Adelina Sotnikova

quotes.quote: Figure skating is theatrical. It's artistic. It's elegant. It's extremely athletic. And there's a very specific audience for that.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.quote: I think you learn how to fall well when you're figure skating. Your reflexes are very acute.
quotes.author: Jud Tylor

quotes.quote: It's just skating, and you're going to have a couple of mistakes. Even in practice, you're not hitting 100%.
quotes.author: Gracie Gold

quotes.quote: For relaxation, I like to figure skate. Being on the ice and spinning and jumping, I feel very close to nature. In particular, I feel very close to Newton’s law of motion. On the ice, you can experience Newton’s laws of motion in their purest, most elegant form.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.quote: If you’re skating on thin ice, you might as well dance.
quotes.author: Anita Shreve

quotes.quote: A figure skater is not just a figure skater who does great jumps. He is an artist on ice.
quotes.author: Alexei Yagudin

quotes.quote: I love how my sport reaches out to people with the music and story lines, the glory of standing up for three or four minutes of tough, arduous, gravity-defying skating and all the stuff that goes with it.
quotes.author: Kurt Browning

quotes.quote: It almost alarms me how free I feel on the ice. I don't think about the hospital or the groceries or the kids--I'm just in touch with myself. It's exciting when your whole body is moving in synchronous motion.
quotes.author: Tenley Albright

quotes.quote: I'm an ice skater. I'm all about the glitter.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.quote: I skate where the puck is going to be not where it was.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Without strength and courage it's really hard to perform at the highest levels of international figure skating, because you're alone on the ice and you only have seven minutes over two nights to prove yourself. And if you make any mistakes, you're dead.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.quote: If I can't defrost this refrigerator pretty soon, I can rent it to Peggy Fleming to rehearse in.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: In skating I can use all languages, for all the people.
quotes.author: Yuzuru Hanyu

quotes.quote: The problem with winter sports is that-follow me closely here-they generally take place in winter.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: I can't go ice skating. I have unnaturally brittle ankles.
quotes.author: Amy Farrah Fowler

quotes.quote: I remember John told me, "When you're skating on thin ice, skate fast."
quotes.author: James Belushi

quotes.quote: Christmas lights up the city / Rooftops covered in snow / Lovers sharing a sleigh ride cuddle close / And their eyes seem to glow / Window shopping on Main Street / Bundled up head to toe / Children ice skating 'round the Christmas tree / I see smiles young and old.
quotes.author: Gary Baker; Frank Joseph Myers; Anthony Little

quotes.quote: I've been holding onto the tightropes / Skating on thin ice, skating on thin ice / I've been hanging over the lava / Check in once or twice, please check in once or twice.
quotes.author: Samk

quotes.quote: This ship has sailed / Our long morning walks / Our shadows stretched out in front of us / The new born sun burning away at our backs / The words were formed and spoken in relief / Just happy that the moments had been filled / So let me do the pretending / We will get better over time / Just like skating on broken ice with you I'm treading lightly / I'm watching my step / This ship has sailed and we're pushing away / Always a song in your head / Always unfailing, always lovely / But you never bother to sing / It's like skating on broken ice with you.
quotes.author: Scott Windsor

quotes.quote: This is a sport where you talk about sequins, earrings, and plunging necklines—and you are talking about men.
quotes.author: Christine Brennan

quotes.quote: There is no more sagacious animal than the Icelandic horse. He is stopped by neither snow, nor storm, nor impassable roads, nor rocks, glaciers, or anything. He is courageous, sober, and surefooted. He never makes a false step, never shies. If there is a river or fjord to cross (and we shall meet with many) you will see him plunge in at once, just as if he were amphibious, and gain the opposite bank.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.quote: The problem with driving around Iceland is that you’re basically confronted by a new soul-enriching, breath-taking, life-affirming natural sight every five goddamn minutes. It’s totally exhausting
quotes.author: Stephen Markley

quotes.quote: I have had to deal with the elfin naïve nonsense stamp all my life and I have never seen an elf and I don’t think I’m naïve.
quotes.author: Björk

quotes.quote: People are always asking me about eskimos, but there are no eskimos in Iceland
quotes.author: Björk

quotes.quote: When you live in Iceland, so very far away from everything else, you have no concept that anything you do will be heard outside of Reykjavik. I still don't know how we managed it.
quotes.author: Jon Thor Birgisson

quotes.quote: In Iceland, you can see the contours of the mountains wherever you go, and the swell of the hills, and always beyond that the horizon. And there's this strange thing: you're never sort of hidden; you always feel exposed in that landscape. But it makes it very beautiful as well.
quotes.author: Hannah Kent

quotes.quote: In Reykjavik, Iceland, where I was born, you are in the middle of nature surrounded by mountains and ocean. But you are still in a capital in Europe. So I have never understood why I have to choose between nature or urban.
quotes.author: Björk

quotes.quote: There is a glacier in Iceland, Solheimar, which has retreated a great deal, and every time I go back there and see what's not there any more, it does something to the heart. It makes you realise it's possible for a gigantic natural element to just disappear.
quotes.author: James Balog

quotes.quote: Few people take an interest in Iceland, but in those few the interest is passionate.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Iceland sets a world-record. The United Nations asked people from all over the world a series of questions. Iceland stuck out on one thing. When we were asked what do we believe, 90% said, 'ourselves'. I think I'm in that group. If I get into trouble, there's no God or Allah to sort me out. I have to do it myself.
quotes.author: Björk

quotes.quote: Did you know there's probably more golf played in Iceland than most places in the world? They play 24 hours a day in the summertime and the northern part is warmer than the southern part.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Throughout the history of Iceland, men have been lost at sea; every family in Iceland is connected to that kind of story.
quotes.author: Baltasar Kormakur

quotes.quote: A bad rower blames his oars.
quotes.author: Icelandic Proverb

quotes.quote: Blind is a man without a book.
quotes.author: Icelandic Proverb

quotes.quote: I’ve walked a lot in the mountains in Iceland. And as you come to a new valley, as you come to a new landscape, you have a certain view. If you stand still, the landscape doesn’t necessarily tell you how big it is. It doesn’t really tell you what you’re looking at. The moment you start to move the mountain starts to move.
quotes.author: Olafur Eliasson

quotes.quote: The thing about Iceland is that we are trapped there anyway, all of us. We have been trapped there for thousands of years.
quotes.author: Baltasar Kormakur

quotes.quote: There’s no one on the island telling them they’re not good enough, so they just go ahead and sing and paint and write.
quotes.author: Eric Weiner

quotes.quote: When I’m in a place like Iceland, I allow myself to take a little more time to divert off onto other paths creatively for a while and see what comes to me.
quotes.author: Damien Rice

quotes.quote: I still don’t know why, exactly, but I do think people can have a spiritual connection to landscape, and I certainly did in Iceland.
quotes.author: Hannah Kent

quotes.quote: Three things, according to poets, are considered bliss in Iceland: hot rye cakes, plump girls, and cold buttermilk.
quotes.author: Halldor Laxness

quotes.quote: Iceland, I’m in love with that country, the people are incredible.
quotes.author: Kit Harington

quotes.quote: If you get lost in an Icelanding forest, simply stand up and you will find your way.
quotes.author: Icelandic Proverb

quotes.quote: Iceland is beautiful. Sometimes it’s hard to imagine living anywhere else.
quotes.author: Baltasar Kormakur

quotes.quote: Iceland is a modern nation. It is not crowded. And, the people enjoy a high standard of living.
quotes.author: Kristin Van Cleaf

quotes.quote: Iceland is fascinating; really an amazing place to visit, and great for a film to go there.
quotes.author: Russell Crowe

quotes.quote: When I prepare, I am not messing around. I find the right places, the right people, and the right environment. Iceland is one of those places.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: I have a deep and ongoing love of Iceland particular the landscape and when writing Burial Rites, I was constantly trying to see whether I could distill its extraordinary and ineffable qualities into a kind of poetry.
quotes.author: Hannah Kent

quotes.quote: You cannot speak Icelandic without moving your lips, I'm telling you. Think about it: there's no Icelandic ventriloquists, ever!
quotes.author: Jeff Dunham

quotes.quote: I thought Iceland was covered with ice. Greenland is covered with ice, and Iceland is very nice!
quotes.author: Steven Brill

quotes.quote: It's kind of a safe haven for us, Iceland. We are left on our own here.
quotes.author: Dean DeBlois

quotes.quote: It says here that Iceland is green and Greenland is icy. The Vikings switched the names to screw with people.
quotes.author: James L. Brooks

quotes.quote: And be humbled in Iceland / And the spawn of the volcano / Is thick and impatient / Like the people around it.
quotes.author: Craig Scanlon

quotes.quote: Goat's head in the deli case / Oh sweet angel-angel-bearded face / Paper mache parade on at night / That's what you do with no sunlight / In the tropical tropical / Tropical ice-land
quotes.author: Eleanor Friedberger

quotes.quote: Rising red heart / Dawn over Iceland / Memories have been on me like a stone / Two hearts under the sun / Smoke told stories / We are never coming down
quotes.author: State of Sea

quotes.quote: Infinity gives me chills / So could the waters of Iceland
quotes.author: Joan C Baez

quotes.quote: In Iceland, where the mountain stood with pride / They set off with their guide / To reach the mountain side
quotes.author: Brian J Culberstson

quotes.quote: Frozen fire, in this Iceland sleeps desire, / Frozen fire, a blue flame beneath the wire / I'm frozen
quotes.author: Peter Peavy- Wagner

quotes.quote: From the mountain and burn / The path of our time / Hail people of Iceland / Journey of a land anew
quotes.author: Mastodon

quotes.quote: Bury me in the North Atlantic. / A fog there from Iceland will be a murmur in gray over me and a long deep wind sob always.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: From the night-bird's lay through the starry time, / In the groves of the soft Hesperian clime, / To the swan's wild note by the Iceland lakes, / When the dark fir-branch into verdure breaks.
quotes.author: Felicia Dorothea Hemans

quotes.quote: Iceland is more than pretty views and primeval landscapes. It is a land where horses grow long hair on their backs and where the liquorice aisle is the longest one in the shops.
quotes.author: Andrew Evans

quotes.quote: Iceland is not just a sightseeing destination but a place where we come to feel things we've never felt before - what it's like to be the only person on earth or how it feels to be outnumbered a million to one.
quotes.author: Andrew Evans

quotes.quote: As my journey progressed across Iceland, words began to fail me so that all I could do was circle a fjord and write 'Wow.'
quotes.author: Andrew Evans

quotes.quote: Iceland has such amazing landscapes. It's also why Iceland is considered an art of Scandinavia in only a cultural sense.
quotes.author: Andrew Evans

quotes.quote: The shaped of Iceland has been compared to everything from a human heart to a cow to a dragon.
quotes.author: Andrew Evans

quotes.quote: Until the very recently, Iceland was known for its extraordinary landscapes--made up of volcanoes, glaciers, lava fields and deep fjords--and the rich heritage left by descendants of the Vikings through the sagas.
quotes.author: Daniel Chartier

quotes.quote: Iceland has valuable resources in abundance, ranging from fish to clean energy and, as such, they can be leveraged for the good of the nation.
quotes.author: Daniel Chartier

quotes.quote: There is something invigorating about Iceland at this moment--like being with people waking from a dream. It's exciting and instructive.
quotes.author: A.A. Gil

quotes.quote: Due to its small consumer base and dependency on imports, Iceland is an expensive country to visit, even compared to the rest of Europe and Scandinavia.
quotes.author: David Leffman

quotes.quote: Icelanders love exploring their country and travel all over if for work and play, and - in summer - almost every settlement has somewhere to stay in the shape of a hotel, guesthouse, hostel or campsite.
quotes.author: David Leffman

quotes.quote: You'll find plenty of farms in Iceland, some with histories going back to sage times.
quotes.author: David Leffman

quotes.quote: Camping is a great way to experience Iceland, especially during the light summer nights, when it's bright enough in your tent at midnight to feel like it's time to get up.
quotes.author: David Leffman

quotes.quote: You probably won't be coming to Iceland to swim, but in fact this is a major social activity year-round with Icelanders, and it's a great way to meet people or just see them unwinding - it seems mandatory for businessmen to have a dip on their way to work.
quotes.author: David Leffman

quotes.quote: Iceland is an island of fire and ice.
quotes.author: Jonathan Wilcox

quotes.quote: Iceland's current standards of living and learning are a testament to its success in recognizing the island's potential.
quotes.author: Jonathan Wilcox

quotes.quote: Iceland is full of hot springs and rivers, which often flow down spectacular waterfalls on their way to the sea.
quotes.author: Jonathan Wilcox

quotes.quote: The harsh terrain and sparse population have left Iceland a country of breathtaking unspoiled natural beauty.
quotes.author: Jonathan Wilcox

quotes.quote: In Iceland people wrote in their own language -- and about themselves.
quotes.author: Jane Simmonds

quotes.quote: Iceland today has all the trappings of an industrialized nation, with a sophisticated, consumer-orientation society, comprehensive welfare system and one of the highest standards of living in the world.
quotes.author: Jane Simmonds

quotes.quote: Icelanders may take their work seriously but they are equally single-minded about their play.
quotes.author: Jane Simmonds

quotes.quote: Sudden changes in the weather occur frequently in Iceland and a variety of weather fronts can quickly follow one after another.
quotes.author: Gabriele Handl

quotes.quote: Iceland is a nature lover's paradise.
quotes.author: Gabriele Handl

quotes.quote: With more than six species regularly seen, Iceland is fast becoming acknowledged as a world-class whale and dolphin watching destination.
quotes.author: Cathy Harlow

quotes.quote: Islanders are passionate about the arts. Every other street corner is bedecked with sculpture.
quotes.author: Cathy Harlow

quotes.quote: Iceland is a country of remarkable beauty and starkly contrasting landscapes.
quotes.author: Roger K. Sandness

quotes.quote: By almost any measure, Iceland is one of the world's most unique lands.
quotes.author: Roger K. Sandness

quotes.quote: Islanders have defied the laws of isolation. In fact, they have developed a way of life that in many respects is one of the finest in the world.
quotes.author: Roger K. Sandness

quotes.quote: Yes, in countless ways, Iceland is a fascinating, mysterious, contradictory land.
quotes.author: Roger K. Sandness

quotes.quote: Iceland is home to and has been shaped by the primary forces that have molded the entire Earth: volcanic eruptions, earthquakes, and erosion.
quotes.author: Roger K. Sandness

quotes.quote: Iceland, one of the most exciting countries in the world.
quotes.author: Don Young

quotes.quote: To this day, Iceland has no military forces, such as army, navy, or air force.
quotes.author: Don Young

quotes.quote: Iceland is indeed a wilderness, the stamp seems to assert, but it is our wilderness.
quotes.author: Karen Oslund

quotes.quote: Icelandic nature is extreme, unpredictable, and even wild, but people live within this wilderness, and their character has been formed by the struggle with this nature.
quotes.author: Karen Oslund

quotes.quote: In Iceland no single elite or foreign power controlled and manipulated representations of the environment entirely.
quotes.author: Karen Oslund

quotes.quote: If it's a good idea, go ahead and do it. It is much easier to apologise than it is to get permission.
quotes.author: Grace Hopper

quotes.quote: The good old days, when each idea had an owner, are gone forever.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: If an idea is indeed sensible, it will eventually become just part of the accepted wisdom.
quotes.author: Nigel Farage

quotes.quote: If religion has given birth to all that is essential in society, it is because the idea of society is the soul of religion.
quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

quotes.quote: When an idea exclusively occupies the mind, it is transformed into an actual physical or mental state.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: All achievements, all earned riches, have their beginning in an idea.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Our duty is to encourage every one in his struggle to live up to his own highest idea, and strive at the same time to make the ideal as near as possible to the Truth.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: If an idea isn't exciting, you shouldn't do it.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: The idea of music is to liberate the listener and lead him to a frame where he feels he is elevated.
quotes.author: A. R. Rahman

quotes.quote: Life is not an easy matter... You cannot live through it without falling into frustration and cynicism unless you have before you a great idea which raises you above personal misery, above weakness, above all kinds of perfidy and baseness.
quotes.author: Leon Trotsky

quotes.quote: To express the same idea in still another way, I think that human knowledge is essentially active.
quotes.author: Jean Piaget

quotes.quote: It is wise to persuade people to do things and make them think it was their own idea.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: It's really important to share the idea that being different might feel like a problem at the time, but ultimately diversity is a strength
quotes.author: Carson Kressley

quotes.quote: A thought is an idea in transit.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: To have a great idea, have a lot of them.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: An idea, like a ghost, must be spoken to a little before it will explain itself.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: It's not a bad idea to occasionally spend a little time thinking about things you take for granted. Plain everyday things.
quotes.author: Evan Davis

quotes.quote: The idea that you would affect evolution is a very profound thing.
quotes.author: Jennifer Doudna

quotes.quote: Ideas can be life-changing. Sometimes all you need to open the door is just one more good idea.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Everything begins with an idea.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: A good idea will keep you awake during the morning, but a great idea will keep you awake during the night.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: An idea is a point of departure and no more. As soon as you elaborate it, it becomes transformed by thought.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The best way to have a good idea is to have a lot of ideas.
quotes.author: Linus Pauling

quotes.quote: My idea of a good night has always been having a lovely meal and a proper conversation.
quotes.author: Kirsty Gallacher

quotes.quote: Any idea, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Brand is not a product, that's for sure; it's not one item. It's an idea, it's a theory, it's a meaning, it's how you carry yourself. It's aspirational, it's inspirational.
quotes.author: Kevin Plank

quotes.quote: The original idea of the web was that it should be a collaborative space where you can communicate through sharing information.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: A man may die, nations may rise and fall, but an idea lives on.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The idea that global warming is the most important problem facing the world is total nonsense and is doing a lot of harm.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: Social media has given us this idea that we should all have a posse of friends when in reality, if we have one or two really good friends, we are lucky.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: You never suffer from a money problem, you always suffer from an idea problem.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: That idea of peace and love toward humanity shouldn't be nationalistic or denominational. It should be a chief concern for all mankind.
quotes.author: Mos Def

quotes.quote: The only way you survive is you continuously transform into something else. It's this idea of continuous transformation that makes you an innovation company.
quotes.author: Ginni Rometty

quotes.quote: My idea of absolute happiness is to be in bed on a rainy day, with my blankie, my cat, and my dog.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: The value of an idea lies in the using of it.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Each of us has a vision of good and of evil. We have to encourage people to move towards what they think is good... Everyone has his own idea of good and evil and must choose to follow the good and fight evil as he conceives them. That would be enough to make the world a better place.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: The idea of redemption is always good news, even if it means sacrifice or some difficult times.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.quote: A powerful idea communicates some of its strength to him who challenges it.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Transparency is not the same as looking straight through a building: it's not just a physical idea, it's also an intellectual one.
quotes.author: Helmut Jahn

quotes.quote: An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The desire to fly is an idea handed down to us by our ancestors who... looked enviously on the birds soaring freely through space... on the infinite highway of the air.
quotes.author: Wilbur Wright

quotes.quote: All the forces in the world are not so powerful as an idea whose time has come.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: An idea isn't responsible for the people who believe in it.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Creativity is contagious. Pass it on.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Imagination is the highest form of research.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I know quite certainly that I myself have no special talent; curiosity, obsession, and dogged endurance, combined with self-criticism, have brought me to my ideas
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The genius of democracies is seen not only in the great number of new words introduced but even more in the new ideas they express.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: It is the form the idea takes in the imagination rather than the form as it exists outside.
quotes.author: Arthur Dove

quotes.quote: Ideas are great arrows, but there has to be a bow.
quotes.author: BILL MOYERS

quotes.quote: Keep your mind open to change all the time. Welcome it. Court it. It is only by examining and reexamining your opinions and ideas that you can progress.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: These days, the problem isn't how to innovate it's how to get society to adopt the good ideas that already exist.
quotes.author: Douglas Engelbart

quotes.quote: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: It is better to have enough ideas for some of them to be wrong than to be always right by having no ideas at all.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how new an idea is: what matters is how new it becomes.
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: Ideas are the root of creation.
quotes.author: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.quote: If you want to have clean ideas, change them as often as your shirts.
quotes.author: Francis Picabia

quotes.quote: Ideas are refined and multiplied in the commerce of minds. In their splendor, images affect a very simple communion of souls.
quotes.author: Gaston Bachelard

quotes.quote: The air is full of ideas. They are knocking you in the head all the time. You only have to know what you want, then forget it, and go about your business. Suddenly, the idea will come through. It was there all the time.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The ability to convert ideas to things is the secret of outward success.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.
quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

quotes.quote: Do something. If it doesn't work, do something else. No idea is too crazy.
quotes.author: Jim Hightower

quotes.quote: If you share a good idea long enough, it will eventually fall on good people.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The difficulty lies, not in the new ideas, but in escaping from the old ones.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: You can have brilliant ideas, but if you can't get them across, your ideas won't get you anywhere.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: The way to get good ideas is to get lots of ideas and throw the bad ones away.
quotes.author: Linus Pauling

quotes.quote: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: A mediocre idea that generates enthusiasm will go further than a great idea that inspires no one.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: No matter how brilliantly an idea is stated, we will not really be moved unless we have already half thought of it ourselves.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: You can have many great ideas in your head, but what makes the difference is the action. Without action upon an idea, there will be no manifestation, no results and no reward.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: First comes thought then organization of that thought, into ideas and plans then transformation of those plans into reality. The beginning, as you will observe, is in your imagination.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The mind, once stretched by a new idea, never returns to its original dimensions.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A business is simply an idea to make other people's lives better.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: A fresh mind keeps the body fresh. Take in the ideas of the day, drain off those of yesterday. As to the morrow, time enough to consider it when it becomes today.
quotes.author: Robert Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: To solve a problem or to reach a goal, you don't need to know all the answers in advance. But you must have a clear idea of the problem or the goal you want to reach.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Ideals are the worlds masters.
quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quotes.quote: Our ideals are our better selves.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Life without an ideal is spiritual death.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: You cannot seek for the ideal outside the realm of reality.
quotes.author: Leon Blum

quotes.quote: Our ideals, like pictures, are made from lights and shadows.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Love is an ideal thing, marriage a real thing; a confusion of the real with the ideal never goes unpunished.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The ideal itself is but truth clothed in the forms of art.
quotes.author: Octave Feuillet

quotes.quote: In our ideals we unwittingly reveal our vices.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: Fix upon your ideal of what you wish to make of yourself.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: The ideal is not believing in, but believing from.
quotes.author: Eric Butterworth

quotes.quote: You need contradictions to make an ideal.
quotes.author: Alex Shakar

quotes.quote: The ideal man takes joy in doing favors for others.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The ideal beauty is a fugitive which is never found.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Ideals do exist, the rest is just temporary interruption.
quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

quotes.quote: The ideal of character always runs beyond the attainment.
quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

quotes.quote: Normality is a fine ideal for those who have no imagination.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Happiness is ideal, it is the work of the imagination.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: An ideal culture is one that makes a place for every human gift.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: An ideal wife is any woman who has an ideal husband.
quotes.author: Booth Tarkington

quotes.quote: Grow into your ideals so that life cannot rob you of them.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The ideal life is in our blood and never will be still.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Live for an ideal and leave no place in the mind for anything else.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: The attainment of an ideal is often the beginning of a disillusion.
quotes.author: Stanley Baldwin

quotes.quote: He who attains his ideal, precisely thereby surpasses it.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Ideal relationship is based on giving.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: Make your ideal your new real.
quotes.author: Derek Padula

quotes.quote: Find the ideal in something not ideal.
quotes.author: Robert Denning

quotes.quote: The ideal of calm exists in a sitting cat.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: The ideal companion in bed is a good book.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: The ideal course of life is not always easy.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Any parent knows how to be the ideal parent.
quotes.author: Emma Donoghue

quotes.quote: A man's ideal woman is the one he couldn't get.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: The ideal is to feel at home anywhere, everywhere.
quotes.author: Geoff Dyer

quotes.quote: The ideal of beauty is simplicity and tranquility.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The ideal way to win a championship is step by step.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: The ideal structure for a family is one that remains so.
quotes.author: Jacquelyn Mitchard

quotes.quote: The ideal has many names, and beauty is but one of them.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Truly great companies are built on ideals, not just deals.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: My ideal of manliness is to be incapable of doing anything
quotes.author: Robert Pattinson

quotes.quote: The ideal friendship is to feel as one while remaining two.
quotes.author: Sophie Swetchine

quotes.quote: For many, immaturity is an ideal, not a defect.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The most ideal approach to advance is the way of opportunity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: To have ideals is not the same as to have impracticable ideals.
quotes.author: Susan Stebbing

quotes.quote: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Every novel is an ideal plane inserted into the realm of reality.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: The ideal man is his own best friend and takes delight in privacy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The ideal editor will hold you to the best of yourself in the piece.
quotes.author: Alexander Chee

quotes.quote: In an ideal world, pressure should come from below and from the top.
quotes.author: Frank Gehry

quotes.quote: The ideal day never comes. Today is ideal for him who makes it so.
quotes.author: Horatio Dresser

quotes.quote: Brotherhood is an ideal better understood by example than precept!
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: Idealism increases in direct proportion to one's distance from the problem.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: It is not materialism that is the chief curse of the world, as pastors teach, butÂ idealism. Men get into trouble by taking their visions and hallucinations too seriously.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: MixÂ idealismÂ with realism and add hard work. This will often bring much more than you could ever hope for.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Idealism, alas, does not protect one from ignorance, dogmatism, and foolishness.
quotes.author: Sidney Hook

quotes.quote: Idealism springs from deep feelings, but feelings are nothing without the formulated idea that keeps them whole.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: The attainment of an ideal is often the beginning of a disillusion.
quotes.author: Stanley Baldwin

quotes.quote: Idealism, that gaudy coloring matter of passion, fades when it is brought beneath the trenchant white light of knowledge. Ideals, like mountains, are best at a distance.
quotes.author: Ellen Glasgow

quotes.quote: A vague uncritical idealism always lends itself to ridicule and too much of it might be a danger to mankind, leading it round in a futile wild-goose chase for imaginary ideals.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: Materialism is a circumference without a centre.Â IdealismÂ is a centre without a circumference.
quotes.author: Augustus Hare

quotes.quote: Idealism is only naive when it lacks action, determination, and imagination.
quotes.author: Colin Wright

quotes.quote: IdealismÂ without realism is impotent. Realism withoutÂ idealismÂ is immoral.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Idealism is fine, but as it approaches reality, the costs become prohibitive.
quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quotes.quote: It is very important that you express yourÂ idealismÂ actively, to what ever extent you can, for this increases your sense of worth and power...
quotes.author: Seth

quotes.quote: IdealismÂ is the highest form of reason.
quotes.author: John Charles Polanyi

quotes.quote: Idealism loses to pragmatism when it comes to winning elections.
quotes.author: Danny Strong

quotes.quote: It is not often that idealism of student days finds adequate opportunity for expression in the later life of manhood.
quotes.author: C. V. Raman

quotes.quote: If you didn't have some sense ofÂ idealism, then what is there to sustain you?
quotes.author: James Carville

quotes.quote: You can use yourÂ idealismÂ to further your aims, if you realize that nothing is Nirvana, nothing is perfect.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: Idealism detached from action is just a dream. But idealism allied with pragmatism, with rolling up your sleeves and making the world bend a bit, is very exciting. It's very real. It's very strong.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: What we need most, is not so much to realize the ideal as to idealize the real.
quotes.author: Francis Herbert Hedge

quotes.quote: Any idealism is a proper subject for art.
quotes.author: Lafcadio Hearn

quotes.quote: There is a spark ofÂ idealismÂ within every individual which can be fanned into flame and bring forth extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: IdealismÂ has devolved into madness.
quotes.author: Ralph Peters

quotes.quote: If a young person has any idealism at all, it's strongest about the time he finishes college.
quotes.author: Sargent Shriver

quotes.quote: Much that passes asÂ idealismÂ is disguised hatred or disguised love of power.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: AllÂ idealismÂ is falsehood in the face of necessity.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Words without actions are the assassins of idealism.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: The naturalÂ idealismÂ of youth is anÂ idealism, alas, for which we do not always provide as many outlets as we should.
quotes.author: Sargent Shriver

quotes.quote: Idealism and realism meet in the actual.
quotes.author: Mary Parker Follett

quotes.quote: Idealism, unrealisticÂ idealism, is always contrasted with the reality of the people, of the man in the street. The details of daily life are always more convincing than the political fantasies of the earlier generations.
quotes.author: Orhan Pamuk

quotes.quote: It is through theÂ idealismÂ of youth that man catches sight of truth, and in thatÂ idealismÂ he possesses a wealth which he must never exchange for anything else.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: There is no force so democratic as the force of an ideal.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: IdealismÂ is an ideal which is based on the idea of someone of the perfect world or the perfect life. An idealist fails to understand the limitation of his idea and believes that the real world can be converted into the world of his idea.
quotes.author: Awdhesh Singh

quotes.quote: Idealism is the noble toga that political gentlemen drape over their will to power.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: It is the style of idealism to console itself for the loss of something old with the ability to gape at something new.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: The enemy ofÂ idealismÂ is zealotry.
quotes.author: Neil Kinnock

quotes.quote: IdealismÂ is the death of the body and the imagination. All but freedom, utter freedom, is death
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: When one paints an ideal, one does not need to limit one's imagination.
quotes.author: Ellen Key

quotes.quote: Sometimes idealism and all that make believe makes the world a better place.
quotes.author: Sung Kang

quotes.quote: Idealism is the despot of thought, just as politics is the despot of will.
quotes.author: Mikhail Bakunin

quotes.quote: IdealismÂ leads to realism if it is strictly thought out.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: Idealism is like a castle in the air if it is not based on a solid foundation of social and political realism.
quotes.author: Claude Mckay

quotes.quote: Idealism is what precedes experience. Cynicism is what follows.Â
quotes.author: David T Wolf

quotes.quote: In the revolt against idealism, the ambiguities of the word experience have been perceived, with the result that realists have more and more avoided the word.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: For we, too, have our ideals, even if we differ from those who have tried to establish a monopoly of idealism.
quotes.author: Henry Cabot Lodge, Jr.

quotes.quote: Idealistic reformers are dangerous because theirÂ idealismÂ has no roots in love, but is simply a hysterical and unbalanced rage for order amidst their own chaos.
quotes.author: William Irwin Thompson

quotes.quote: The purestÂ idealismÂ is unconsciously equivalent to the deepest knowledge.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: We all have idealism. We think we're healthy and then, all of a sudden, one day, you have cancer. The truth has a mind of its own.Â
quotes.author: Oliver Stone

quotes.quote: We must rekindle the fire of idealism in our society.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: IdealismÂ is frequently another word for self-righteousness, a disease that can only be corrected by a profound understanding power in its complete sense.
quotes.author: George Friedman

quotes.quote: An idealist is one who, on noticing that roses smell better than a cabbage, concludes that it will also make better soup.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: AmongÂ idealists and visionaries, there is no shortage of good intent, but there's often a shortage of discipline.
quotes.author: Scott Belsky

quotes.quote: Cynics regarded everybody as equally corrupt...Â IdealistsÂ regarded everybody as equally corrupt, except themselves.
quotes.author: Robert Anton Wilson

quotes.quote: Idealists are not the good friends of the truths; they create their own truth.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you are not anÂ idealistÂ by the time you are twenty you have no heart, but if you are still anÂ idealistÂ by the time you are thirty, you don't have a head.
quotes.author: Randolph Bourne

quotes.quote: If you are anÂ idealist, it does not matter what you do or what goes on around you because it isn't real anyway.
quotes.author: Robert Penn Warren

quotes.quote: To say that a man is anÂ idealistÂ is merely to say that he is a man.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: A realist is an idealist who has gone through the fire and been purified. A skeptic is an idealist who has gone through the fire and been burned.
quotes.author: Warren W. Wiersbe

quotes.quote: Any idealist who tries to join the Peace Corps must realize he is not going to change the world overnight.
quotes.author: Sargent Shriver

quotes.quote: Idealists are either blind or clowns; because they think it is possible to have a beautiful world with asshole creatures like humans.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Only the broken-hearted idealist can become a cynic.Â
quotes.author: Mark Clifton

quotes.quote: AllÂ idealists imagine that the causes they serve are fundamentally better than any other causes in the world, and they refuse to believe that if their cause is to flourish at all it requires precisely the same foul-smelling manure that is necessary to all other human undertakings.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Too often people viewÂ idealists as naive.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Novogratz

quotes.quote: An idealist believes the short run doesn't count. A cynic believes the long run doesn't matter. A realist believes that what is done or left undone in the short run determines the long run.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: The idealist and dreamer will stubbornly go down with the ship. The serial innovator grabs the rudder and changes course.
quotes.author: Larry Osborne

quotes.quote: The trueÂ idealistÂ pursues what his heart says is right in a way that his head says will work.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: TheÂ idealistÂ regards facts as provisional.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Inside every cynical person, there is a disappointedÂ idealist.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Idealist: a cynic in the making.
quotes.author: Irving Layton

quotes.quote: I am an idealist. I don't know where I'm going but I'm on my way.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Every materialist will be anÂ idealist; but anÂ idealistÂ can never go backward to be a materialist.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: An idealist is a person who helps other people to be prosperous.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The idealist walks on tiptoe, the materialist on his heels.
quotes.author: Malcolm De Chazal

quotes.quote: The idealists will always be in society, and we will survive.
quotes.author: John Zorn

quotes.quote: Being anÂ idealistÂ is not being a simpleton; withoutÂ idealists there would be no optimism and without optimism there would be no courage to achieve advances that so-called realists would have you believe could never come to fruition.
quotes.author: Alisa Dana Steinberg

quotes.quote: You can't be idealistic in this world and not be crazy.
quotes.author: John Zorn

quotes.quote: The democraticÂ idealistÂ is prone to make light of the whole question of standards and leadership because of his unbounded faith in the plain people.
quotes.author: Irving Babbitt

quotes.quote: The idealist is incorrigible: if he is thrown out of his heaven he makes an ideal of his hell.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: AnÂ idealistÂ who couldn't cope becomes cynical.
quotes.author: Amy Ray

quotes.quote: Sooner or later, manyÂ idealists transform themselves into disheartened realists who mistakenly believe that giving up is the same thing as being realistic.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: To think great thoughts you must be heroes as well asÂ idealists.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: We come to think of anÂ idealistÂ as one who seeks to realize what is not in fact realizable. But, it is necessary to insist, to have ideals is not the same as to have impracticable ideals, however often it may be the case that our ideals are impracticable.
quotes.author: Susan Stebbing

quotes.quote: It is always easy to divide the world into idealists and power-oriented people. The idealists are presumed to be the noble people, and the power-oriented people are the ones that cause all the world's trouble.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.quote: It seems to be the fate of idealists to obtain what they have struggled for in a form which destroys their ideals.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Idealists are foolish enough to throw caution to the winds. They have advanced mankind and have enriched the world.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: The opposite of anÂ idealistÂ is too often a man without love.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: TrueÂ idealists are rare; they are the dedicated workers, who would, if need be, die at the stake.
quotes.author: Henry Williamson

quotes.quote: BeingÂ idealistic really helps you overcome some of the many obstacles put in your path.
quotes.author: Andy Hertzfeld

quotes.quote: A carpenter is known by his chips.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: A rose by any other name would smell as sweet.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A wild goose never laid a tame egg.
quotes.author: Gaelic (on authenticity)

quotes.quote: Be not water, taking the tint of all colors.
quotes.author: Syrian (on authenticity)

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Birds of a feather, flock together.
quotes.author: Robert Burton

quotes.quote: Clothes may disguise a fool, but his voice will give him away.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every man is the architect of his own fortune.
quotes.author: Appius

quotes.quote: Everyone is the age of their heart.
quotes.author: Guatemalan (on youth and age)

quotes.quote: Hay is for horses.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: If the shoe fits, wear it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Breton

quotes.quote: Never spend time with people who don't respect you.
quotes.author: Maori (on courtesy and respect)

quotes.quote: One flower makes no garland.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Tell me whom you love and I'll tell you who you are.
quotes.author: African-American (on life and living)

quotes.quote: The blocks of wood should not dictate to the carver.
quotes.author: Maori (on art and creativity)

quotes.quote: The devil looks after his own.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote: We boil at different degrees.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Who has deceived thee as oft as thyself.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: You cannot make a silk purse out of a sow's ear.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: You can't fit a square peg in a round hole.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You can't judge a horse by its harness.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Most people are other people. Their thoughts are someone else's opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me: I am a free human being with an independent will.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: We know what we are, but not what we may be.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Perhaps it's impossible to wear an identity without becoming what you pretend to be.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: We can spend our lives letting the world tell us who we are. Sane or insane. Saints or sex addicts. Heroes or victims. Letting history tell us how good or bad we are. Letting our past decide our future. Or we can decide for ourselves. And maybe it's our job to invent something better.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: In the social jungle of human existence, there is no feeling of being alive without a sense of identity.
quotes.author: Erik Erikson

quotes.quote: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.
quotes.author: B.R. Ambedkar

quotes.quote: Your life will be a blessed and balanced experience if you first honor your identity and priority.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The reward for conformity is that everybody likes you except yourself.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Don't let the noise of others? opinions drown out your own inner voice.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: So, I guess we are who we are for a lot of reasons. And maybe we'll never know most of them. But even if we don't have the power to choose where we come from, we can still choose where we go from there. We can still do things.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: You can't change who you are. No matter how you struggle, some things will never change. And maybe they shouldn't.
quotes.author: Rob Thurman

quotes.quote: People fear their hidden selves, afraid that they will burst out.
quotes.author: Gregory Benford

quotes.quote: The only true happiness lies in knowing who you are ... and making peace with it.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Who knows who you are ... A person is a novel: you don't know how it will end until the very last page. Otherwise it wouldn't be worth reading to the very end.
quotes.author: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quotes.quote: To know who you are is the greatest power of all.
quotes.author: Sherilyn Kenyon and Diana Love

quotes.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than loved for what you are not.
quotes.author: Andre Guide

quotes.quote: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
quotes.author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

quotes.quote: Before I can tell my life what I want to do with it, I must listen to my life telling me who I am.
quotes.author: Parker J. Palmer

quotes.quote: Our achievements of today are but the sum total of our thoughts of yesterday. You are today where the thoughts of yesterday have brought you and you will be tomorrow where the thoughts of today take you.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: You cannot belong to anyone else until you belong to yourself.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: An identity would seem to be arrived at by the way in which the person faces and uses his experience.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: A man's true state of power and riches is to be in himself.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Nobody can be exactly like me. Sometimes even I have trouble doing it.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: To find yourself, think for yourself.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: It is not what I call you, it's what you answer to; but if you don't know who you are, anyone can name you. If anybody can name you, you will answer to anything.
