quotes.quote: There is a boundary to men's passions when they act from feelings, but none when they are under the influence of imagination.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Imagination is the eye of the soul.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: What is now proved was once only imagined.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: To know is nothing at all. To imagine is everything.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: A man to carry on a successful business must have imagination. He must see things as in a vision, a dream of the whole thing.
quotes.author: Charles Schwab

quotes.quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put foundations under them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The mind can make / Substance, and people planets of its own, / With beings brighter than have been, and give / A breath to forms which can outlive all flesh.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: All the works of man have their origin in creative fantasy. What right have we then to depreciate imagination?
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Imagination is a good horse to carry you over the ground—not a flying carpet to set you free from probability.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: A lot of living is done in the imagination.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: Imagination and fiction make up more than three-quarters of our real life. Rare indeed is the true contact with good and evil.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: It all exists, even if it's in your mind. Who's to say that dreams and nightmares aren't as real as the here and now? Reality leaves a lot to the imagination.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: A man who has no imagination has no wings.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: If you kill imagination, that is a kind of long-term suicide.
quotes.author: Pierre Boulez

quotes.quote: Nothing we ever imagined is beyond our powers, only beyond our present self-knowledge.
quotes.author: Theodore Roszak

quotes.quote: The imagination is a persistent demon; the world would be black and white without it.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Imagination is not fantasy; what it produces is really and permanently there, and the creative mind is not the subjective or introverted mind.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: It is in the imagination that the world becomes more intelligible, and communication proceeds without the obstacles of cultural difference.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: There is no power on earth like imagination.
quotes.author: Laurens Van Der Post

quotes.quote: There are no days in life so memorable as those which vibrated to some stroke of imagination.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is the marriage of the soul with Nature that makes the intellect fruitful, that gives birth to imagination.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The great instrument of moral good is imagination.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: For God hath made you able to create worlds in your own mind which are more precious unto Him than those which he created.
quotes.author: Thomas Traherne

quotes.quote: The soul without imagination is what an observatory would be without a telescope.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Fantasies are more than substitutes for unpleasant realities, they are also dress rehearsals. All acts performed in the world begin in the imagination.
quotes.author: Barbara Grizzuti Harrison

quotes.quote: Imagination is the one weapon in the war against reality.
quotes.author: Jules de Gaultier

quotes.quote: The most imaginative people are the most credulous, for to them everything is possible.
quotes.author: Alexander Chase

quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination circles the world.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Where there is no imagination, there is no horror.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Imagination is one of the last remaining legal means you have to gain an unfair advantage over your competition.
quotes.author: Pat Fallon

quotes.quote: When the imagination sleeps, words are emptied of their meaning.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Were it not for imagination, Sir, a man would be as happy in the arms of a chambermaid as of a Duchess.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: If you have no eye, the mind takes you there.
quotes.author: Jabo Wisdom

quotes.quote: Imagine our imaginations were limited only to the limitless. Still, it wouldn't matter without a motivation to move.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: What we imagine in our minds becomes our world.
quotes.author: Masaru Emoto

quotes.quote: Live out of your imagination, not your history.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: You need imagination in order to imagine a future that doesn't exist.
quotes.author: Azar Nafisi

quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Your imagination is your preview of life's coming attractions.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: So imagine that the lovely moon is playing just for you everything makes music if you really want it to
quotes.author: Giles Andreae

quotes.quote: Imagine, and it shall be. There are no limits.
quotes.author: Evelyn Skye

quotes.quote: Imagination allows us to escape the predictable. It enables us to reply to the common wisdom that we cannot soar by saying, just watch!
quotes.author: Bill Bradley

quotes.quote: Our imagination goes ahead of us, bringing our yesterday's imagings into present realities.
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.quote: No one ever made a great discovery without the exercise of the imagination.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

quotes.quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you can imagine it, you can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Imagination was given to man to compensate for what he is not; a sense of humour to console him for what he is.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Anything you can imagine is probably true. And the worst you can imagine is probably worth money.
quotes.author: Will Christopher Baer

quotes.quote: Imagine no limitations; decide what's right and desirable before you decide what's possible.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Imagine with all your mind, believe with all your heart, achieve with all your might.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Imagination, the supreme delight of the immortal and the immature, should be limited. In order to enjoy life, we should not enjoy it too much.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Imagination is the highest kite that one can fly.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: If you don't imagine, nothing ever happens at all.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Make your life a masterpiece; imagine no limitations on what you can be, have or do.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Imagine what the world would be like if everyone was positive for one day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Imagination is the beginning of creation. You imagine what you desire, you will what you imagine and at last you create what you will.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The imagination is a palette of bright colors. You can use it to touch up memories or you can use it to paint dreams.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: As a teenager I was obsessed with music and with writing and performing songs.
quotes.author: Anthony Minghella

quotes.quote: It's harder to reach teenagers. They don't want to hear one more lecture.
quotes.author: Virginia R. Corrigan

quotes.quote: All the teenagers I know are against it; all the parents are for it. I'm going to come down on the side of the parents because they do know best.
quotes.author: Damon Thayer

quotes.quote: Teenagers today are more free to be themselves and to accept themselves.
quotes.author: John Knowles

quotes.quote: Adolescents are not monsters. They are just people trying to learn how to make it among the adults in the world, who are probably not so sure themselves.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: To an adolescent, there is nothing in the world more embarrassing than a parent.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Teenagers who are never required to vacuum are living in one.
quotes.author: Fred G. Gosman

quotes.quote: Teenagers today are more free to be themselves and to accept themselves.
quotes.author: John Knowles

quotes.quote: Adolescence: A stage between infancy and adultery.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: We are teenagers. We don't have a manual or a written guide that tells us how to fall in love. We don't even have experience of what love really is, so don't judge us. We are what we are.
quotes.author: Rosy Ford

quotes.quote: I am young, wild and free but love seems to come and drown me every once in a while. But I like it because love is what I have been searching for.
quotes.author: Mica Loyd

quotes.quote: As a teenager I was so insecure.I was the type of guy that never fitted in becausehe never dared to choose.I was convinced I had absolutely no talent at all.For nothing.And that thought took away all my ambition too.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Everything about my teenage life was almost ideal.
quotes.author: Esther Williams

quotes.quote: My teenage years were exactly what they were supposed to be. Everybody has their own path. It's laid out for you. It's just up to you to walk it.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: I don't know what better teenage life you could get than going around the world doing what you love to do.
quotes.author: Anna Kournikova

quotes.quote: Teenagers are free verse walking around on two legs.
quotes.author: Vanessa Bayer

quotes.quote: A lot of the problems teenagers go through, it's better for them to go through them on their own. If you always have a crutch, you don't learn anything.
quotes.author: Ben Savage

quotes.quote: Young people are in a condition like permanent intoxication, because youth is sweet and they are growing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: My teenage years were exactly what they were supposed to be. Everybody has their own path. It's laid out for you. It's just up to you to walk it.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: If you are not willing to look stupid, nothing great is ever going to happen to you.
quotes.author: Dr. Gregory House

quotes.quote: Don't laugh at a youth for his affectations; he is only trying on one face after another to find a face of his own.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Immaturity is the incapacity to use one's intelligence without the guidance of another.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: There's a level of immaturity to people who just can't clean up after themselves.
quotes.author: Jann Wenner

quotes.quote: For many, immaturity is an ideal, not a defect.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Comb your immaturity if you want to grow.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: Another unsettling element in modern art is that common symptom of immaturity, the dread of doing what has been done before.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Remaining childish is a tremendous state of innocence.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: A childish mind griped to unexpected changes.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: He's like a child, but without a child's capacity for joy.
quotes.author: Eva Heller

quotes.quote: Revenge is always the weak pleasure of a little and narrow mind.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: I was very immature when I was young, and for me there was no balance. Everything was just all or nothing.
quotes.author: Mickey Rourke

quotes.quote: Most people grow old, but not everybody grows up.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: If you keep playing games you're going to be playing them alone.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: As long as people believe in absurdities they will continue to commit atrocities.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Some people are like trees, they take forever to grow up.
quotes.author: Ana Sandoval

quotes.quote: ... Nine-year-old boys usually turn ten at some point. It's the nineteen-year-olds who have difficulty turning twenty.
quotes.author: John Boyne

quotes.quote: We're kind of like the smoking section in high school. We're immature, keep to ourselves.
quotes.author: Matt Stone

quotes.quote: You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Our element is unending immaturity.
quotes.author: Witold Gombrowicz

quotes.quote: Inconsistencies in men are generally testimony to their immaturity
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: What I look forward to is continued immaturity followed by death.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: There were times my immaturity kept me from being all I wanted to be.
quotes.author: Len Elmore

quotes.quote: This weekend showed our immaturity. We're not the team that we thought we were.
quotes.author: Ben Lamanna

quotes.quote: To the immature, other people are not real.
quotes.author: Harry Overstreet

quotes.quote: To resolve problems through negotiation is a very childish approach.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: Making bad decisions is a part of life. Blaming others for your bad decisions is immature.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Immature is the love of the youth, and immature his hatred of man and earth. His mind and the wings of his spirit are still tied down and heavy.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: People who have no hold over their process of thinking are likely to be ruined by liberty of thought. If thought is immature, liberty of thought becomes a method of converting men into animals.
quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

quotes.quote: Some people need to stop being immature. Seriously grow up.
quotes.author: Mahmoud El Hallab

quotes.quote: Immature is aword boring people use to describe fun people.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: Just because your pain is understandable, doesn't mean your behavior is acceptable.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: An adult can correctly tell a kid, ‘what you are I was and what I am you will be’. And unlike a child he cannot misplace priority due to purity and immaturity.
quotes.author: Vincent Okay Nwachukwu

quotes.quote: Immaturity exists in every human; however, it becomes the prisoner of the maturity force, whether it is real or pretended; it naturally escapes on many occasions.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Man’s growth is held back by his surrender to other people’s expectation that he remain the person he was when they met him.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: In short, immaturity is spoiled. And what is spoiled doesn’t ripen. It goes bad early, gets bitter and withers on the vine.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.quote: Continuously feeling superior is a characteristic of immaturity.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: The young have all the same flaws adults do. Plus one: immaturity.
quotes.author: Nelson Rodrigues

quotes.quote: Maturity comes not with age but with the acceptance of responsibility. You are only young once but immaturity can last a lifetime!
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: Immaturity means self-centeredness, inability to compromise, to rise above hurt feelings, to postpone immediate pleasures in favor of future benefits, or to do unpleasant chores when they need to be done.
quotes.author: Arnold J. Toynbee

quotes.quote: So far in the history of the world, there have never been enough mature people in the right places.
quotes.author: G. B. Chisholm

quotes.quote: The most dangerous members of our society are those grownups whose powers of influence are adult but whose motives and responses are infantile.
quotes.author: Harry Allen Overstreet

quotes.quote: The mark of the immature man is that he wants to die nobly for a cause, while the mark of the mature man is that he wants to live humbly for one.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Stekel

quotes.quote: You can only be young once. But you can always be immature.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: You are physically and socially mature. You are, of course, intellectually immature. So are we, on the staff; so is everybody. In the intellectual world the only mature people are those who are willing to admit their immaturity.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: An immature ear of corn appears first.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Politics are usually the executive expression of human immaturity.
quotes.author: Vera Brittain

quotes.quote: Imagination: the supreme delight of the immortal and the immature.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: The first sign of maturity is not reacting to others' immaturity.
quotes.author: D. Muthukrishnan

quotes.quote: Maturity does not match, with immaturity.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Longing for the ideal, while criticizing the real is evidence of immaturity.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Premature panic is the sign of an immature mind!
quotes.author: Destro

quotes.quote: Intoxication is a form of escape often sought by the mentally immature.
quotes.author: Lynn Belvedere

quotes.quote: And, the immature me / Hopes the world sees just who you are, / A facade only gets you so far / And I'm bigger than you / So I can't meet you where you are.
quotes.author: Kehlani Ashley Parrish

quotes.quote: I could be getting old, but I'm getting round / Call it immature, sure, but hear me out / 'Cause the only thing promised is the here and now / If we didn't live it up, never live it down, / And when I jump I hold on, I'm like, "oh my Lord" / If it all goes wrong then it's all my fault.
quotes.author: Illy

quotes.quote: I know how hard you try for me / But I'm immature I run away for fun / I guess I'm not ready for a good love / And I'm the bad bad one / I'm the bad bad one.
quotes.author: Meredith Brooks

quotes.quote: Like all immigrants, he seemed to have an unerring instinct for the oldest, truest words in his new language. The way he said the word, it felt free of the treacherous weight of mate.
quotes.author: Richard Flanagan

quotes.quote: Immigrant children are highly vulnerable. Their level of disadvantage and fragility has consistently grown due to factors outside their control.
quotes.author: Irwin Redlener

quotes.quote: We should embrace our immigrant roots and recognize that newcomers to our land are not part of the problem, they are part of the solution.
quotes.author: Roger Mahony

quotes.quote: The truth is, immigrants tend to be more American than people born here.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: These immigrants held out the hope of a new golden age for the old continent.
quotes.author: Michel Houellebecq

quotes.quote: Being an immigrant is not for sissies.
quotes.author: Helen Russell

quotes.quote: Every immigrant who comes here should be required within five years to learn English or leave the country.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Immigrants create an engine of economic prosperity.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.quote: One of the great pluses of being an immigrant is you get to start again in terms of your identity. You get to shed the narratives which cling to you.
quotes.author: Joseph O'Neill

quotes.quote: Every single immigrant we have, undocumented or documented, is a future American. That's just the truth of it.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: To the newcomer who has not learned its language, a large city is a chaos of details, a vast Woolworths store of differently colored, simlarly priced objects.
quotes.author: Jonathan Raban

quotes.quote: Like other important immigrant communities, the Jewish experience in the United States represents the ideal of freedom and the promise and opportunity of America.
quotes.author: Jan Schakowsky

quotes.quote: Stability and security are just illusions. But they are necessary illusions because without them there would be no way of going on.
quotes.author: Andrew Crofts

quotes.quote: Once you are an immigrant, you never forget that you are one.
quotes.author: Jorge Ramos

quotes.quote: Learning to distinguish the illegal immigrant from the legal immigrant does not solve the problem of illegal immigration.
quotes.author: Jan C. Ting

quotes.quote: We of alien looks or words must stick together.
quotes.author: C.J. Sansom

quotes.quote: Immigrant: An unenlightened person who thinks one country better than another.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Everywhere immigrants have enriched and strengthened the fabric of American life.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Our journey is not complete until we find a better way to welcome the striving, hopeful immigrants who still see America as a land of opportunity, until bright young students and engineers are enlisted in our workforce rather than expelled from our country.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Immigration is not just compatible with but is a necessary component of economic growth.
quotes.author: Dave Reichert

quotes.quote: Remember, remember always, that all of us, and you and I especially, are descended from immigrants and revolutionists.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I had always hoped that this land might become a safe and agreeable asylum to the virtuous and persecuted part of mankind, to whatever nation they might belong.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Immigration is the sincerest form of flattery.
quotes.author: Jack Paar

quotes.quote: America was indebted to immigration for her settlement and prosperity. That part of America which had encouraged them most had advanced most rapidly in population, agriculture and the arts.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: If you want to stop illegal immigration, you have to make it so that - so that the people that hire the illegal immigrants will not be in a position to hire them.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Immigration policy should be generous it should be fair; it should be flexible. With such a policy we can turn to the world, and to our own past, with clean hands and a clear conscience.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: I have only one loyalty and that's to the immigrant community.
quotes.author: Luis Gutierrez

quotes.quote: People come here penniless but not cultureless. They bring us gifts. We can synthesize the best of our traditions with the best of theirs. We can teach and learn from each other to produce a better America.
quotes.author: Mary Pipher

quotes.quote: Once I thought to write a history of the immigrants in America. Then I discovered that the immigrants were American history.
quotes.author: Oscar Handlin

quotes.quote: Immigration is one of the leading contributors to population growth.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.quote: Our attitude towards immigration reflects our faith in the American ideal. We have always believed it possible for men and women who start at the bottom to rise as far as the talent and energy allow. Neither race nor place of birth should affect their chances.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: A simple way to take measure of a country is to look at how many want in. And how many want out.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: The simple fact is that we must not-and we will not-surrender our borders to those who wish to exploit our history of compassion and justice.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Let me be clear we are still a nation of immigrants, and we honor all those immigrants who are working hard to become new citizens.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Immigration should be enforced in a proportional and humane manner.
quotes.author: Roger Mahony

quotes.quote: The most effective way to stop illegal immigration is by imposing severe consequences for employers who violate the law.
quotes.author: Karen Kenney

quotes.quote: Our immigration system is a broken system that needs to be fixed. We need reform that provides hardworking people of good character with a real path towards citizenship.
quotes.author: Joe Baca

quotes.quote: Every immigrant who comes here should be required within five years to learn English or leave the country.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The truth is, immigrants tend to be more American than people born here.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: A simple way to take measure of a country is to look at how many want in.. And how many want out.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Immigration is not just compatible with but is a necessary component of economic growth.
quotes.author: Dave Reichert

quotes.quote: The economic impact of illegal immigration on taxpayers is catastrophic.
quotes.author: Ric Keller

quotes.quote: Immigration is one of the leading contributors to population growth.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.quote: Illegal immigration can never be completely stopped, no matter how high the wall or how many patrol agents you have watching it.
quotes.author: Gail Collins

quotes.quote: Immigration laws are the only laws that are discussed in terms of how to help people who break them.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Immigration is the sincerest form of flattery.
quotes.author: Jack Paar

quotes.quote: Immigration isn't always good for the economy or jobs.
quotes.author: Geoff Mulgan

quotes.quote: Immigration is a good thing. We should make that as easy as possible.
quotes.author: Gary Johnson

quotes.quote: Whenever I write about immigration, I hear heart-wrenching stories of computer workers who are unemployed and facing severe hardship.
quotes.author: Vivek Wadhwa

quotes.quote: Immigration comes up, but the issue that is on everybody's mind is the economy.
quotes.author: Mario Diaz-Balart

quotes.quote: Immigration is a sensitive topic.
quotes.author: Mario Diaz-Balart

quotes.quote: I'm in favor of immigration but we also need rules.
quotes.author: Gary Ackerman

quotes.quote: Immigration should be enforced in a proportional and humane manner.
quotes.author: Roger Mahony

quotes.quote: We must make immigration a legal, orderly process to eliminate this issue, not further criminalize it.
quotes.author: Jose Serrano

quotes.quote: I'm not saying we need to stop immigration at all; people can come from wherever.
quotes.author: Jeb Bradley

quotes.quote: Immigration enthusiasts are so hysterical.
quotes.author: Peter Brimelow

quotes.quote: At the very end, what is going to happen is that immigration will be reduced considerably. And how can we get to that stage? By agreements on sectors.
quotes.author: Vicente Fox

quotes.quote: Immigration is a gateway basically. It's a check-off point for Latino voters.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.quote: I support legal immigration. I don't support amnesty because it is not fair to people standing in line at consulates around the world.
quotes.author: Heather Wilson

quotes.quote: While I support immigration regulated through a legal framework, I do not support rewarding those who broke the law to get here.
quotes.author: Kit Bond

quotes.quote: On immigration, there are a lot of hurdles before anything arrives at the White House.
quotes.author: Gwen Ifill

quotes.quote: I had fought against the unjust restriction of immigration.
quotes.author: Emanuel Celler

quotes.quote: If you have a solution to immigration, it is possible to come home and defend it.
quotes.author: Lamar Alexander

quotes.quote: Stopping illegal immigration would mean that wages would have to rise to a level where Americans would want the jobs currently taken by illegal aliens.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Man will find his own structured words,which will transfigure his into immortal.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Immortality is to live your life doing good things, and leaving your mark behind.
quotes.author: Brandon Lee

quotes.quote: When a noble life has prepared old age, it is not decline that it reveals, but the first days of immortality.
quotes.author: Muriel Spark

quotes.quote: If you want to live forever you are dreadfully dangerous because you're not living now.
quotes.author: Joanna Russ

quotes.quote: All men's souls are immortal, but the souls of the righteous are immortal and divine.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: You're only an immortal until someone manages to kill you. After that, you were just long lived.
quotes.author: Simon R. Green

quotes.quote: Immortality can be soon achieved by using technology. The real issue is, are humans compatible with eternity?
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: A book is the only immortality.
quotes.author: Rufus Choate

quotes.quote: Immortality doesn't fit with death, as mortal doesn't fit with eternity.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: There is nothing very remarkable about being immortal; with the exception of mankind, all creatures are immortal, for they know nothing of death. What is divine, terrible, and incomprehensible is to know oneself immortal.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: Each life makes its own immitation of immortality.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: A man's immortality can be found in his children.
quotes.author: Patricia Briggs

quotes.quote: The immortality of the soul is a matter which is of so great consequence to us and which touches us so profoundly that we must have lost all feeling to be indifferent about it.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Immortality is the negation of death. We do not usually speak about innatality about having not yet been born yet this is something we would have to regard as the other aspect of the human soul. We are just as unborn as we are immortal.
quotes.author: Rudolf Steiner

quotes.quote: A human act once set in motion flows on forever to the great account. Our deathlessness is in what we do, not in what we are.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: Immortality is a chancy thing; it cannot be promised or earned. Perhaps it cannot even be identified for what it is.
quotes.author: Gregory Maguire

quotes.quote: Immortality is the genius to move others long after you yourself have stopped moving.
quotes.author: Frank Rooney

quotes.quote: Immortality is one of the great spiritual needs of man. The churches have constituted themselves the official guardians of the need, with the result that some of them actually pretend to accord or to withhold it from the individual by their conventional sacraments.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The life given us, by nature is short but the memory of a well spent life is eternal.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Immortality is what nature possesses without effort and without anybody's assistance, and immortality is what the mortals must therefore try to achieve if they want to live up to the world into which they were born, to live up to the things which surround them and to whose company they are admitted for a short while.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: In life we will die over and over again, until the day that we can walk the earth with only our immortality left.
quotes.author: Teal Swan

quotes.quote: Perhaps nature is our best assurance of immortality.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The immortality of the soul is assented to rather than believed; believed rather than lived.
quotes.author: Orestes Augustus Brownson

quotes.quote: The doctrine of the immortality of the soul has more threat than comfort.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: A memorable heart is the easiest way to immortality.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Immortality is the condition of a dead man who doesn't believe he is dead.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: There is only one way to get ready for immortality, and that is to love this life and live it as bravely and faithfully and cheerfully as we can.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Immortality is a ridiculous illusion, an empty word, a butterfly net chasing the wind.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Tis immortality to die aspiring, As if a man were taken quick to heaven.
quotes.author: George Chapman

quotes.quote: Immortality is overrated, living for an eternity would get really old.
quotes.author: Ray William Johnson

quotes.quote: Yet some there be that by due steps aspire to lay their just hands on that golden key that opes the palace of Eternity.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Have you ever sensed that our soul is immortal and never dies?
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Immortality is a ridiculous illusion, an empty word, a butterfly net chasing the wind.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Immortality is a belief grounded upon other men's sayings, that they knew it supernaturally; or that they knew those who knew them that knew others that knew it supernaturally.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: Immortality is to live your life doing good things, and leaving your mark behind.
quotes.author: Brandon Lee

quotes.quote: Immortality without eternity is a rope with only one end.
quotes.author: Multatuli

quotes.quote: Immortality was overrated, as far as he was concerned. Hardy had enough problems as it was; living forever sounded like a death sentence for someone with his practical sensibilities.
quotes.author: David S.E. Zapanta

quotes.quote: To believe in immortality is one thing, but it is first needful to believe in life.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Immortality is the condition of a dead man who doesn't believe he is dead.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: The only thing wrong with immortality is that it tends to go on forever.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.quote: It has been said that the immortality of the soul is a grand peut-tre, but still it is a grand one. Everybody clings to it the stupidest, and dullest, and wickedest of human bipeds is still persuaded that he is immortal.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Immortality is a by-product of good work.
quotes.author: Mel Brooks

quotes.quote: Immortality is not a gift, Immortality is an achievement; And only those who strive mightily Shall possess it.
quotes.author: Edgar Lee Masters

quotes.quote: Immortality is the glorious discovery of Christianity.
quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

quotes.quote: To desire immortality for the individual is really the same as wanting to perpetuate an error forever.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Unable are the loved to die, for love is immortality.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: The immortality of the soul is a matter which is of so great consequence to us and which touches us so profoundly that we must have lost all feeling to be indifferent about it.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Immortality is the only thing which doesn't tolerate being postponed.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: That man has reached immortality who is disturbed by nothing material.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Till we attain immortality, all life will remain just an illusion!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The immortality of great art seems bound up with the inevitable loss of its original surface meaning and its rebirth in the spirit of every new age.
quotes.author: Anton Ehrenzweig

quotes.quote: Perhaps immortality is a gift of heaven rather than the result of some human effort.
quotes.author: Wang Yangming

quotes.quote: The immortality of the soul is assented to rather than believed, believed rather than lived.
quotes.author: Orestes Brownson

quotes.quote: Immortality is what nature possesses without effort and without anybody's assistance, and immortality is what the mortals must therefore try to achieve if they want to live up to the world into which they were born, to live up to the things which surround them and to whose company they are admitted for a short while.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Believe in the immortality and everlasting effects of your goodness.
quotes.author: Robert Muller

quotes.quote: The thought of immortality is as well founded as any other well authenticated postulate of the human reason.
quotes.author: John Haynes Holmes

quotes.quote: Immortality alone could teach this mortal how to die.
quotes.author: Dinah

quotes.quote: The only greatness for man is immortality.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Immortality is a chancy thing; it cannot be promised or earned. Perhaps it cannot even be identified for what it is.
quotes.author: Gregory Maguire

quotes.quote: Immortality is the best recollection one leaves.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Immortality like this is about as useful as sunscreen on a submarine.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Marx

quotes.quote: We who are immortal, we are chained to this life by a chain of gold, and we dare not sever it for fear of what lies beyond the drop.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Once in one's life, for one mortal moment, one must make a grab for immortality; if not, one has not lived.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: Only one who has achieved immortality of awareness can laugh with life and laugh with death.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Immortality no longer interests the weary old man at all.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: The essence of immorality is the tendency to make an exception of myself.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.quote: Immortality is here and now, and is not a speculative something beyond the grave. It is a lucid state of consciousness in which the sensations of the body, the varying and unrestful states of mind, and the circumstances and events of life are seen to be of a fleeting and therefore of an illusory character.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Immortality is the genius to move others long after you yourself have stopped moving.
quotes.author: Frank Rooney

quotes.quote: Immortality will come to such as are fit for it; and he who would be a great soul in the future must be a great soul now.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Immortal life is something to be earned, By slow self-conquest, comradeship with Pain, And patient seeking after higher truths.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Immortality - a fate worse than death.
quotes.author: Edgar A. Shoaff

quotes.quote: One has to pay dearly for immortality; one has to die several times while one is still alive.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To desire immortality is to desire the eternal perpetuation of a great mistake.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Of immortality, the soul, when well employed, is incurious. It is so well, that it is sure that it will be well. It asks no questions of the Supreme Power.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Nothing but truth is immortal.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Immortality is but ubiquity in time.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: One plays at being immortal and after a few weeks one doesn't even know whether or not one can hang on till the next day.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Impact is more important than method.
quotes.author: Tony Andruzzi

quotes.quote: For maximum impact, listen more and speak less.
quotes.author: Willow Bay

quotes.quote: Focus on the impact you make versus the title you have.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Without impact, innovation is just an idea with promise.
quotes.author: Judith Rodin

quotes.quote: Your impact on others is the only proof of your existence
quotes.author: Silje Akselberg Iversen

quotes.quote: I think those who have impact and influence over us are often unaware.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: You can never have an impact on society if you have not changed yourself.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: You should impact the greatest amount of people that you can in your life.
quotes.author: Gary W. Goldstein

quotes.quote: Only you can impact the world in the way that God uniquely assigned to you.
quotes.author: Rich Nathan

quotes.quote: The impact of a conscious artist is necessary, and it ripples through the world.
quotes.author: Common

quotes.quote: You never know what kind of impact you can have on someone by just saying hello.
quotes.author: Manti Te'o

quotes.quote: The biggest impact my father had on my life was teaching the importance of literacy.
quotes.author: Thomas Steinbeck

quotes.quote: It's man's impact on our world that appeals to me more than just nature running wild.
quotes.author: Tim Gunn

quotes.quote: The impact of falling in love for the first time has a special place in our arhitecture.
quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

quotes.quote: I tend to think having an impact on the world is a lot more complicated than government.
quotes.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quotes.quote: The impact of armed conflict on children is everyone's responsibility. And it must be everyone's concern.
quotes.author: Graca Machel

quotes.quote: Not only can you not plan the impact you're going to have, you often won't recognize it when you're having it.
quotes.author: Dick Costolo

quotes.quote: The heaviest impact of the work of art is in the guts. Art does not reason. It manhandles you and changes you...
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: Your impact on the world is significant whether or not you are aware of it, and even whether or not you desire it.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: In talking about the impact of ideas in one field on ideas in another field, one is always apt to make a fool of oneself.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: The impact of the holocaust on believers as well as unbelievers, on Jews as well as Christians, has not yet been evaluated. Not deeply, not enough.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Your impact on the lives of others--your family, the people at your church, your workmates--is cultivated with each decision you make, no matter how small.
quotes.author: Jim George

quotes.quote: Impact lies in the vicinity of mistakes.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the impact of a small act.
quotes.author: Tory Burch

quotes.quote: The most important impact of technology on communications security is that it draws better and better traffic into vulnerable channels.
quotes.author: Whitfield Diffie

quotes.quote: None of us ever knows what impact we have on the world around us.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Lawhead

quotes.quote: The impact of any particular writer on your own work is hard to discern.
quotes.author: Daniel Alarcon

quotes.quote: The impact of T.V. on our lives in general gets most things out of proportion.
quotes.author: Jasper Carrott

quotes.quote: The impact of music is so great that you'll leave your book and start dancing.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: If you can make a big impact on the global literacy problem, you can uplift a big portion of society.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: The negative impact of population growth on all of our planetary ecosystems is becoming appallingly evident.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: The impact on a customer of a bad buying decision is usually greater than the impact of a salesperson of a lost deal.
quotes.author: Donal Daly

quotes.quote: The impact of improving health is that the population growth goes down, and so you can educate more kids, feed more kids.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Make an impact with your connections. You don’t only connect because you want to get people who will help you. You also connect in order to get to know who you can help.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: We have an impact on nature, and nature has an impact on us.
quotes.author: Barry Sternlicht

quotes.quote: In order to impact our society, we need to first model unity in the church.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: If you want to make a positive impact, no matter how far-reaching, start at home. Treat your family members like treasures.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Can you imagine the impact on our own culture if American Christians began using their riches as if they belonged to God?
quotes.author: Richard Stearns

quotes.quote: Your positive impact on the generations to come will be directly related to the ministry you have in that little place called home.
quotes.author: Jim George

quotes.quote: The impact we have on people's lives, to me, is more important than any title anyone can carry.
quotes.author: Payal Kadakia

quotes.quote: There are a lot of ways to make a positive impact on the community without necessarily being a politician.
quotes.author: Theo Epstein

quotes.quote: Wherever an impact can be eliminated by dropping the activity that causes it, this is therefore the best-indeed the only truly good-solution.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: While having a profound impact on the development of values is surely an important job of a good parent, force-feeding opinions to them is not.
quotes.author: Kara Swisher

quotes.quote: The impact of space activities is nothing less than the galvanizing of hope and imagination for human life continuum into a future of infinite possibility.
quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

quotes.quote: To be impatient is to be hooked on the future.
quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.quote: The wise are always impatient, for he that increases knowledge increases impatience of folly.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Alas, impatience is but another form of unhappiness. It is true, it is true. I have never met a happy impatient person.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: When we get impatient because something is taking too long, we should remember that Life waits on us a thousand times more than we wait on Life.
quotes.author: Laura Teresa Marquez

quotes.quote: Impatience is the cardinal sin of youth.
quotes.author: M.T. Bass

quotes.quote: The sea does not reward those who are too anxious, too greedy, or too impatient. One should lie empty, open, choiceless as a beach - waiting for a gift from the sea.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Impatience is a hindrance. As with all things if you attempt to take shortcuts, the final destination will rarely be as good and may even be attainable.
quotes.author: Chris Bradford

quotes.quote: Impatience, resentment, jealousy and endless "want" are not creative attractors and have no value.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: We were too greedy, grasping for immortality too soon. Perhaps if we had only been patient, content to wait, we would all have forever in the end.
quotes.author: Jessica Khoury

quotes.quote: Impatience has a poor track record for perfection. Getting things right usually includes calming down!
quotes.author: Garrison Wynn

quotes.quote: Impatience has ruined many crowns; it had lured people to give up when they have just few minute to win, just few millimeters to touch the winning carpet!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Impatience turns an ague into a fever, a fever to the plague, fear into despair, anger into rage, loss into madness, and sorrow to amazement.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: Impatience may be a virtue if you have to write for today's generation.
quotes.author: Haresh Sippy

quotes.quote: We want instant lunch, instant cure, instant miracles, instant salary, instant successâ€” instant everything. This instant civilization, we have obsessed with, has made us grow a tad too impatient in virtually everything about life. And, of course, that doesn't serve us so well.
quotes.author: Boniface Sagini

quotes.quote: Waiting is one of the things that human beings cannot do well, though it is one of the essential things we must do successfully if we are to know happiness. We are impatient for the future and try to craft it with our own powers, but the future will come as it comes and will not be hurried.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: The wisest are the most annoyed at the loss of time.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Perhaps there is only one cardinal sin: impatience. Because of impatience we were driven out of Paradise, because of impatience we cannot return.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Impatience is racing at misery full speed.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Patience is the art of concealing your impatience.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: When you wear the weed of impatience in your heart instead of the flower Acceptance-with-Joy, you will always find your enemies get an advantage over you.
quotes.author: Hannah Hurnard

quotes.quote: You're trying to eat grass that isn't there. Why don't you give it a chance to grow?
quotes.author: Richard Adams

quotes.quote: Impatience is a virtue.
quotes.author: Ursula Burns

quotes.quote: Never allow impatience to prevent you for reaching your full potential.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Impatience can teach us the lessons of patience better.
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: We are impatient, anxious to see the whole picture, but God lets us see things slowly, quietly.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Our impatience of miles, when we are in a hurry; but it is still best that a mile should have seventeen hundred and sixty yards.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The impatient man is his own enemy; he slams the door on his own progress.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Impatience can be very good by helping us not put up with tyranny, but it can distort our view of what is possible and how to bring about change. We have to cultivate patience so that our perception isn't distorted.
quotes.author: Paul Ekman

quotes.quote: Impatience kills quickly.
quotes.author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quotes.quote: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: Impatience translates itself into a desire to have something immediate done about it all, and, as is generally the case with impatience, resolves itself in the easiest way that lies ready to hand.
quotes.author: Edward Sapir

quotes.quote: Impatience dries the blood sooner than age or sorrow.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: Impatience is not wanting to understand that you don't understand.
quotes.author: James Richardson

quotes.quote: Impatience never commanded success.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: Youthful impatience obscures the endless potential for joy that's standing right in front of you.
quotes.author: Greg Gutfeld

quotes.quote: Do not be impatient for impatience is of the flesh. Do not try different methods because they are useful solely in helping the flesh. We must distrust the flesh entirely.
quotes.author: Watchman Nee

quotes.quote: Impatience is a great obstacle to success; he who treats everything with brusqueness gathers nothing, or only immature fruit which will never ripen.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: He that is impatient, and cannot wait on God for a mercy, will not easily submit to Him in a denial.
quotes.author: William Gurnall

quotes.quote: The thing about waiting is that the longer you wait, the more impatient you become.
quotes.author: Ashay Abbhi

quotes.quote: Impatience is the mark of independence, not of bondage.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: Our human tendency is to be impatient with the person who cannot see the truth that is so plain to us. We must be careful that our impatience is not interpreted as condemnation or rejection.
quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.quote: Impatience can cause wise people to do foolish things.Â
quotes.author: Janette Oke

quotes.quote: An impatient person plays differently than a more patient person.
quotes.author: Vladimir Kramnik

quotes.quote: Patience is the support of weakness; impatience the ruin of strength.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Impatience is not the fastest way of getting to where your treasures are. It is the quickest way of by-passing them without even knowing. Keep calm; be patient!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: By being impatient, matters are damaged and great works cannot be done.
quotes.author: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quotes.quote: The biggest pitfall as you make your way through life is impatience. Remember that being impatient is simply a way of punishing yourself. It creates stress, dissatisfaction, and fear.
quotes.author: Susan Jeffers

quotes.quote: What good has impatience ever brought? It has only served as the mother of mistakes and the father of irritation.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Other people can't cause us to be impatient unless we let them do so. In other words, others don't make us impatient. We make ourselves impatient, through our expectations and demands, fixated attachments and stuckness.
quotes.author: Surya Das

quotes.quote: People are impatient. They want things to happen overnight, and have no idea of the circumstances and situations that can surround an individual at times.
quotes.author: Rohit Sharma

quotes.quote: Gold cannot be pure, and people cannot be perfect.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Have no fear of perfection ' you'll never reach it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dal

quotes.quote: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Imperfection clings to a person, and if they wait till they are brushed off entirely, they would spin for ever on their axis, advancing nowhere.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Nothing and no one is perfect. It just takes a good eye to find those hidden imperfections.
quotes.author: Daphne Delacroix

quotes.quote: Imperfection is beauty. Madness is genius. It is better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: As machines become more and more efficient and perfect, so it will become clear that imperfection is the greatness of man.
quotes.author: Ernst Fischer

quotes.quote: I cling to my imperfection, as the very essence of my being.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: You look at the scratch and completely miss the diamond.
quotes.author: Raphie Frank

quotes.quote: To be perfect is to develop expanding imperfection.
quotes.author: Ethylios

quotes.quote: It is better to aim at perfection and miss, than to aim at imperfection and hit it.
quotes.author: Thomas Watson

quotes.quote: There is no excellent beauty that hath not some strangeness in the proportion.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon Sr.

quotes.quote: A diamond with a flaw is worth more than a pebble without imperfections.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Sometimes we strive so hard for perfection that we forget that imperfection is happiness.
quotes.author: Karen Nave

quotes.quote: Even imperfection itself may have its ideal or perfect state.
quotes.author: Thomas de Quincey

quotes.quote: It is better to aim at perfection and miss, than to aim at imperfection and hit it
quotes.author: Thomas Watson

quotes.quote: Where imperfection ceaseth, heaven begins.
quotes.author: Bailey

quotes.quote: Men are more unwilling to have their imperfections known than their crimes.
quotes.author: Chesterfield

quotes.quote: What an absurd thing it is to pass over all the valuable parts of a man, and fix our attention on his infirmities!
quotes.author: Addison

quotes.quote: It is only imperfection that complains of what is imperfect. The more perfect we are, the more gentle and quiet we become towards the defects of others.
quotes.author: Fnelon

quotes.quote: All things are literally better, lovelier, and more beloved for the imperfections which have been divinely appointed, that the law of human life may be Effort, and the law of human judgment Mercy.
quotes.author: Ruskin

quotes.quote: The only nice thing about being imperfect is the joy it brings to others.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: I never expect to see a perfect work from an imperfect man.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: Imperfect preparation gives rise to the thousand-fold forms that express physical and mental inferiority and insecurity.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Perfectionism is a dangerous state of mind in an imperfect world
quotes.author: Robert Hillyer

quotes.quote: Once we realize that imperfect understanding is the human condition there is no shame in being wrong, only in failing to correct our mistakes.
quotes.author: George Soros

quotes.quote: If I can't be beautiful, I want to be invisible.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: A true critic ought to dwell upon excellencies rather than imperfections, to discover the concealed beauties of a writer, and communicate to the world such things as are worth their observation.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: This is the very perfection of a man, to find out his own imperfections.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: My imperfections and failures are as much a blessing from God as my successes and my talents and I lay them both at his feet.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is a kind of beauty in imperfection
quotes.author: Conrad Hall

quotes.quote: Instead of waiting for perfection, run with what you do, and fix it along the way...
quotes.author: Paul Arden

quotes.quote: In order to go on living one must try to escape the death involved in perfectionism.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Perfection is boring. If a face doesn't have mistakes, it's nothing.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.quote: We like the imperfect because it reminds us of ourselves.
quotes.author: Randy Bachman

quotes.quote: To do better is better than to be perfect.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Imperfection is in some sort essential to all that we know of life. It is the sign of life in a mortal body, that is to say, of a state of progress and change. Nothing that lives is, or can be rigidly perfect; part of it is decaying, part nascent.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The finer the nature, the more flaws it will show through the clearness of it; and it is a law of this universe that the best things shall be seldomest seen in their best form.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: No reckoning made, but sent to my account with all my imperfections on my head.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they'd make up their minds.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A beautiful thing is never perfect.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The essence of being human is that one does not seek perfection.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Perfection doesn't guarantee success. You don't have to be perfect to succeed.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Imperfection is inherited, therefore we all sin, but fighting the war of sin is the greatest war of all because we all die in the end, no matter how hard we fight.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: Imperfection is individuality.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be real. Embrace that you have weakness. Because everyone does. Embrace that your body is not perfect. Because nobody's is. Embrace that you have things you can't control. We all have a list of them.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: To banish imperfection is to destroy expression, to check exertion, to paralyze vitality.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Imperfections are not inadequacies; they are reminders that we're all in this together.
quotes.author: Bren Brown

quotes.quote: To be judged for your imperfections is to be judged for being human, mistakes are made, life goes on, don't let other people change who you are.
quotes.author: Lee Jameson

quotes.quote: Practice doesn't make perfect. Practice reduces the imperfection.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Do not lose courage in considering your own imperfections.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: In nature, nothing is perfect and everything is perfect. Trees can be contorted, bent in weird ways, and they're still beautiful.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: The day the child realizes that all adults are imperfect, he becomes an adolescent; the day he forgives them, he becomes an adult; the day he forgives himself, he becomes wise.
quotes.author: Alden Nowlan

quotes.quote: To sit in judgment of those things which you perceive to be wrong or imperfect is to be one more person who is part of judgment, evil or imperfection.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Nothing we see or hear is perfect. But right there in the imperfection is perfect reality.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: Imperfection is in some sort essential to all that we know of life.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect. It means that you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Have no fear of perfection. You'll never reach it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Perhaps it is our imperfections that make us so perfect for one another.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: I know why families were created with all their imperfections. They humanize you. They are made to make you forget yourself occasionally, so that the beautiful balance of life is not destroyed.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Imperfection is not our personal problem - it is a natural part of existing.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: No one thing does human life more need than a kind consideration of the faults of others. Every one sins; everyone needs forbearance. Our own imperfections should teach us to be merciful.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Persuade thyself that imperfection and inconvenience are the natural lot of mortals, and there will be no room for discontent, neither for despair.
quotes.author: Ieyasu Tokugawa

quotes.quote: The more perfect we are, the more gentle and quiet we become toward the defects of other people.
quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

quotes.quote: Without imperfection, you or I would not exist.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Your imperfections are what make you beautiful.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.quote: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing perfectly.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: It belongs to the imperfection of everything human that man can only attain his desire by passing through its opposite.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Persuade thyself that imperfection and inconvenience are the natural lot of mortals, and there will be no room for discontent, neither for despair.
quotes.author: Ieyasu Tokugawa

quotes.quote: It is only imperfection that complains of what is imperfect. The more perfect we are the more gentle and quiet we become toward the defects of others.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The perfect human being is uninteresting the Buddha who leaves the world, you know. It is the imperfections of life that are lovable.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: The imperfections of others never release us from the need to work on our own shortcomings.
quotes.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quotes.quote: We can never attain to perfection while we have an affection for any imperfection.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: The more perfect one becomes, the less he is inclined to speak of the imperfections of others.
quotes.author: ElRay L. Christiansen

quotes.quote: Occupy yourself in beholding and bewailing your own imperfections rather than contemplating the imperfections of others.
quotes.author: Ignatius of Loyola

quotes.quote: There is no light without shadow, and no psychic wholeness without imperfection.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: We come to love not by finding the perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: I think perfection is ugly. Somewhere in the things humans make, I want to see scars, failure, disorder, distortion.
quotes.author: Yohji Yamamoto

quotes.quote: A true critic ought to dwell rather upon excellencies than imperfections.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: To be in harmony with the wholeness of things is not to have anxiety over imperfections.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.quote: Imperfections are attractive when their owners are happy with them.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: Producing perfection from imperfection is, after all, the highest of art forms.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible. Some things are just less likely than others.
quotes.author: Jonathan Winters

quotes.quote: The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: They did not know it was impossible so they did it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The most rewarding things you do in life are often the ones that look like they cannot be done.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Every noble work is at first impossible.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Man is the only creature that strives to surpass himself, and yearns for the impossible.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Because a thing seems difficult for you, do not think it impossible for anyone to accomplish.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Everything is theoretically impossible, until it is done.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The impossible often has a kind of integrity which the merely improbable lacks.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: We are an impossibility in an impossible universe.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: There is no point in using the word impossible to describe something that has clearly happened.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: No one gets very far unless he accomplishes the impossible at least once a day.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The impossible could not have happened, therefore the impossible must be possible in spite of appearances.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: To the timid and hesitating everything is impossible because it seems so.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a man's determination.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: If nature has taught us anything it is that the impossible is probable.
quotes.author: Ilyas Kassam

quotes.quote: Virtually nothing is impossible in this world if you just put your mind to it and maintain a positive attitude.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Only if you are possible, everything will be possible.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: I work on the motto that if something's not impossible, there must be a way to do it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Winton

quotes.quote: We have more power than will; and it is often by way of excuse to ourselves that we fancy things are impossible.
quotes.author: Francois Duc de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says I'm possible!
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: There are many things that seem impossible only so long as one does not attempt them.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Women, like men, should try to do the impossible. And when they fail, their failure should be a challenge to others.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: I wouldn't say anything is impossible. I think that everything is possible as long as you put your mind to it and put the work and time into it.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.quote: Only he who can see the invisible can do the impossible.
quotes.author: Frank Gaines

quotes.quote: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Some of the world's greatest feats were accomplished by people not smart enough to know they were impossible.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: All things are possible until they are proved impossible and even the impossible may only be so, as of now.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Nothing is more imminent than the impossible. What we must always foresee is the unforeseen.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: I won't predict anything historic. But nothing is impossible.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.quote: Whoever said nothing is impossible obviously hasn't tried nailing Jell-O to a tree.
quotes.author: John Candy

quotes.quote: To achieve the impossible; it is precisely the unthinkable that must be thought.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Never tell a young person that anything cannot be done. God may have been waiting centuries for someone ignorant enough of the impossible to do that very thing.
quotes.author: G. M. Trevelyan

quotes.quote: Ordinary people believe only in the possible. Extraordinary people visualize not what is possible or probable, but rather what is impossible. And by visualizing the impossible, they begin to see it as possible.
quotes.author: Cherie Carter-Scott

quotes.quote: I know the power obedience has of making things easy which seem impossible.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Ávila

quotes.quote: Most of the things worth doing in the world had been declared impossible before they were done.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: Man is so made that when anything fires his soul, impossibilities vanish.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
quotes.author: Alexander The Great

quotes.quote: We all want to believe in impossible things, I suppose, to persuade ourselves that miracles can happen.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: The difference between possible and impossible is hard work and commitment.
quotes.author: Bob Dole

quotes.quote: But there's a world beyond what we can see and touch, and that world lives by its own laws. What may be impossible in this very ordinary world is very possible there, and sometimes the boundaries between the two worlds disappear, and then who can say what is possible and impossible?
quotes.author: David Eddings

quotes.quote: You must find the place inside yourself where nothing is impossible.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: I only want people around me who can do the impossible.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Arden

quotes.quote: To believe a thing impossible is to make it so.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: The difficult is what takes a little time the impossible is what takes a little longer.
quotes.author: Fridtjof Nansen

quotes.quote: The man of the future may, and even must, do things impossible in the past and acquire new motor variations not given by heredity.
quotes.author: G. Stanley Hall

quotes.quote: Where combination is possible, competition is impossible.
quotes.author: George Stephenson

quotes.quote: The unpopularity of economics is the result of its analysis of the effects of privileges. It is impossible to invalidate the economists demonstration that all privileges hurt the interests of the rest of the nation or at least a great part of it.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: When nothing is sure, everything is possible.
quotes.author: Margaret Drabble

quotes.quote: Impossible is just a big word thrown around by small men who find it easier to live in the world they've been given than to explore the power they have to change it.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: It's a dare. Impossible is potential. Impossible is temporary. Impossible is nothing.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The young do not know enough to be prudent, and therefore they attempt the impossible - and achieve it, generation after generation.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: It is impossible to win the race unless you venture to run, impossible to win the victory unless you dare to battle.
quotes.author: Richard DeVos

quotes.quote: It is scientific only to say what is more likely and what less likely, and not to be proving all the time the possible and impossible.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: It is difficult to say what is impossible, for the dream of yesterday is the hope of today and the reality of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Robert H. Goddard

quotes.quote: Listen to the mustn't, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn't, the impossible, the won't. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote: What we need is more people who specialize in the impossible.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: All of us failed to match our dreams of perfection. So I rate us on the base of our splendid failure to do the impossible.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: The POSITIVE THINKER sees the INVISIBLE, feels the INTANGIBLE, and achieves the IMPOSSIBLE.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Stop trying to impress other people, they're more screwed up than you think.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Life is a lot more easier when you are living it to impress your positive inner-self. Most people are quite hard to impress; so why waste your time and energy trying to impress them?
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Don't try to impress people. Always be yourself!
quotes.author: Bella Thorne

quotes.quote: Who do we set out to impress? Ourselves? Or others?
quotes.author: Anthony T Hincks

quotes.quote: We might impress people with our strengths, but we connect with people through our weaknesses.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: Why do you think the old stories tell of men who set out on great journeys to impress the gods? Because trying to impress people just isn't worth the time and effort.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Always put your best foot forward. Not to impress others, but to impress and respect yourself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Spend a little more time trying to make something of yourself and a little less time trying to impress people
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you can't impress them with your argument, impress them with your actions.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The desire to impress others is one of the worst forms of mental imprisonment.
quotes.author: Robert Ringer

quotes.quote: The more you try to impress, the more you become depressed, and the more they get tired of your coercion. It doesn't make them love you, instead, they'll see you as a little child, trying to draw a senseless picture on a piece of paper, begging people to look at it and admire it by force. You can persuade someone to look at your face, but you can't persuade them to see the beauty therein.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Impress people with your accomplishments, not your possessions.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do not impress others at the expense of your progress.
quotes.author: Gift Gugu Mona

quotes.quote: Too many people spend money they haven't earned to buy things they don't want to impress people they don't like.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Trying to impress people who hate you is just a big waste of time.
quotes.author: M Shadows

quotes.quote: We sometimes try to impress people we just met by not trying to impress them.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: One reason why birds and horses are happy is because they are not trying to impress other birds and horses.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The desire to impress is an efficient means of bringing out one's least impressive qualities.
quotes.author: Derren Brown

quotes.quote: Never try to impress a woman, because if you do, she'll expect you to keep up the standard for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: The less you try to impress, the more impressive you are.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: If you always try to be cautious and careful, you will never impress anyone.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: If the whole world was blind how many people would you impress?
quotes.author: Boonaa Mohammed

quotes.quote: Don't worry about trying to impress peopleâ€¦ Just focus on how you can add value to their lives.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: There's a time to impress someone, and then there's a time to make an impression on someone.
quotes.author: Cameron Dallas

quotes.quote: Impress people with your soul, not the things you have.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to impress somebodyâ€¦ - That's how it works!
