quotes.author: Deyth Banger

quotes.quote: The times you impress me the most are the times when you don't try.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: You are not free until you have no need to impress anybody.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Some people try very hard to impress others but in the bargain lose their own identity
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The need to impress others causes half the world's woes. Don't add to them. Be real, not impressive.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: I try to keep in my mind the simple question: Am I trying to do good or make myself good? Too many of our responsibilities get added to our plate when we are trying to please people, impress people, prove ourselves, acquire power, increase our prestige. All those motivations are about looking good more than doing good.
quotes.author: Kevin DeYoung

quotes.quote: Wait long enough and people will be surprised and impressed. When you're pissed off at someone and you're angry at them, you just haven't given them enough time. Just give them a little more time and they almost always will impress you.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Men impressed to undress. Women undress to impress.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: A dweller in a house may impress his personality upon the walls, but subtly the walls too may impress their own shape upon the ego of the man.
quotes.author: C.L. Moore

quotes.quote: Stop trying to impress others with your stuff and start trying to impress them with your life.
quotes.author: Joshua Becker

quotes.quote: Learn to express rather than impress. Expressing evokes a 'me too' attitude, while impressing evokes a 'so what' attitude.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Looking at the part helps get the chance to fill it. But if you fill the part, it matters not if you look it.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Things are not always what they seem; the first appearance deceives many; the intelligence of few perceives what has been carefully hidden in the recesses of the mind.
quotes.author: Phaedrus

quotes.quote: The time men spend trying to impress others they could spend in doing the things by which others would be impressed.
quotes.author: Frank Romer

quotes.quote: One man is more concerned with the impression he makes on the rest of mankind, another with the impression the rest of mankind makes on him.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: I say that I was impressed, because, at the age of seventeen, I was not easy to impress. I knew the answers to a great many more questions than I know now.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: To impress others we must be earnest; to amuse them, it is only necessary to be kindly and fanciful.
quotes.author: Tuckerman

quotes.quote: Not disquieted by the lack of hair or nails / The absence of grandeur and intricate details / No attempt to impress or be dressed up / Or hide behind perfume and makeup.
quotes.author: Darshan Jay Mistry

quotes.quote: Oh! thus, when sorrow wrings the heart, / A sigh may rise, a tear may start; / Pity shall soon the face impress / With all its looks of happiness.
quotes.author: John Carr Sir

quotes.quote: From the outside, / Appearances can be impressive to give... / Approval and acceptance. / Yet without maintenance.
quotes.author: Lawrence S. Pertillar

quotes.quote: Don't pretend to be what you're not, instead, pretend to be what you want to be, it is no pretense, it is a journey to self-realization.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: My father said this to me: 'Israelmore if you don't make any impact on the earth, you will die before you die. But if you impress hearts with what you do, you still live even after you are gone.
quotes.author: Isarelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Life is the first impression. You get one shot at it. Make it everlasting.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: There's no point showing off when there's no one to impress.
quotes.author: Athan Fletcher

quotes.quote: There is only one thing in the universe that you can truly shine, It's your life, shine on.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: Trying to impress other people is possibly the biggest insult you can hurl at yourself.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: I do not exist to impress the world. I exist to live my life in a way that will make me happy.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: I've reached a point in life where it's no longer necessary to try to impress. If they like me the way I am, that's good. If they don't, that's too bad.
quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

quotes.quote: All you have to do, to impress a girl is love her; because it'll make you do things that will impress her automatically.
quotes.author: Wrushank Sorte

quotes.quote: Being yourself is all it takes. If you want to impress someone don't be someone else just be yourself.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: Words have no power to impress the mind without the exquisite horror of their reality.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: A tulip doesn't strive to impress anyone. / It doesn't struggle to be different than a rose. / It doesn't have to. / It is different. / And there's room in the garden for every flower.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The desire to impress is an efficient means of bringing out one’s least impressive qualities.
quotes.author: Darren Brown

quotes.quote: To impress others we must be earnest; to amuse them, it is only necessary to be kindly and fanciful.
quotes.author: Henry Theodore Tuckerman

quotes.quote: We actually use a lot of improvisation on 'Transparent.'
quotes.author: Amy Landecker

quotes.quote: To sing a song is like whispering to a child's ear. It is an art heavily relying on improvisation.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.quote: Improvisation means coming to the situation without rigid expectations or preconceptions. The key to improvisation is motion — you keep going forward, fearful or not, living from moment to moment. That’s how life is.
quotes.author: Bobby McFerrin

quotes.quote: Improvisation is the courage to move from one note to the next.
quotes.author: Bobby McFerrin

quotes.quote: There's nothing that makes you so aware of the improvisation of human existence as a song unfinished. Or an old address book.
quotes.author: Carson McCullers

quotes.quote: Improvisation is the ability to talk to oneself.
quotes.author: Cecil Taylor

quotes.quote: The shortest feedback loop I can think of is doing improvisation in front of an audience.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Free improvisation, in addition to being a highly skilled musical craft, is open to use by almost anyone - beginners, children, and non-musicians.
quotes.author: Derek Bailey

quotes.quote: Comedy is far more difficult, as it involves improvisation and impromptu acting, and as an actor, that came as a welcome break for me.
quotes.author: Divyanka Tripathi

quotes.quote: It ain't about if he knocks a guy out. It's about how he knocks a guy out. It's the style, the improvisation.
quotes.author: Don King

quotes.quote: The apparatus has to serve our improbability and improvisation. Being good and playing the songs is not enough.
quotes.author: Flea

quotes.quote: People are tired of constant movement, improvisation, and wild scrambling when plans fail.
quotes.author: Francois Hollande

quotes.quote: I stopped being interested in improvisation, and I continue to not be that interested in it. Comedians can do it on a different level because they have a goal, but if you're improvising something that's dramatic, there's not that much to be good at.
quotes.author: Greta Gerwig

quotes.quote: When life gets you down, improvise as if crawling was part of the choreography.
quotes.author: Iveta Cherneva

quotes.quote: Sometimes it works, sometimes it fails, but that's what we face when we're dealing with improvisation.
quotes.author: Jan Garbarek

quotes.quote: Reinvent new combinations of what you already own. Improvise. Become more creative. Not because you have to, but because you want to. Evolution is the secret for the next step.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: The improvisation had to be in public, because you only get value playing to strangers.
quotes.author: Keith Johnstone

quotes.quote: Actors need bricks to play with, and in fact we rejected all the improvised fragments we had made without a plan. Improvisation without a plan is like tennis without tennis balls.
quotes.author: Lars Von Trier

quotes.quote: Improvisation can be either a last resort or an established way of evoking creativity.
quotes.author: Mary Catherine Bateson

quotes.quote: In improvisation, there are no mistakes.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: The most useful virtues, for one who walked on, were flexibility and a willingness to improvise.
quotes.author: Rachel Hartman

quotes.quote: The nature of improvisation is you don't know what's going to happen.
quotes.author: Sam Richardson

quotes.quote: The rules of improvisation apply beautifully to life. Never say no - you have to be interested to be interesting, and your job is to support your partners.
quotes.author: Scott Adsit

quotes.quote: Improvisation is doing better than the best work we could have done, it only takes a spontaneous reaction on our side to make the best use of things in hand, rather than waiting for better things to come our way.
quotes.author: ShahenshahHK

quotes.quote: Mediocrity is comfortable, it makes you join the crowd, but would you like to be remembered as part of the crowd or someone followed by the crowd? For rising above the crowd - don't be a slave to procedures, practice more & improvise.
quotes.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

quotes.quote: Just because we have nowhere to run, it isn't a dead end. Every dead situation requires us to improvise & improve, remember we learn to climb the wall only when left with no place to run.
quotes.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

quotes.quote: Improvisation is intuition in action, a way to discover the muse and learn to respond to her call.
quotes.author: Stephen Nachmanovitch

quotes.quote: In composition you have all the time you want to decide what to say in 15 seconds, in improvisation you have 15 seconds.
quotes.author: Steve Lacy

quotes.quote: Life is improvisation. All of those [improv] classes were like church to me. The training had seeped into me and changed who I am.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: You criticize, I improvise.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Improvisation is the power of spontaneous observation.
quotes.author: Wyatt Pringle

quotes.quote: There is no room for church mice in improv quilting. You have to own your ideas, your choices, and your determination.
quotes.author: Patricia Belyea

quotes.quote: Self study leads to improvisation and improvisation leads to evolution.
quotes.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

quotes.quote: Writing structure is logical. Writing method at its best is instinctive. That way you get the benefits of both styles - improvisation within calculation.
quotes.author: Stewart Stafford

quotes.quote: We feel safe in following the past successful efforts & fear the innovation or improvisation, but we don't realize that everything still & not updated is bound to be backdated and open to decay.
quotes.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

quotes.quote: Take opportunities to initiate ideas and action as often as you stand ready to offer support for them.
quotes.author: Amy Lisewski

quotes.quote: To succeed, planning alone is insufficient. One must improvise as well.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: When you don’t have honesty in love then there is no communication. Honesty is improvisation of the heart; anything less is a well thought out and rehearsed script.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Bad improvisers block action, often with a high degree of skill. Good improvisers develop action.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: That, as my cousin Nord would say, is where my improvised lie falls apart.
quotes.author: Eoin Colfer

quotes.quote: The impulse to perform a worthy action often springs from our best nature, but is afterwards tainted by the spur of selfishness or sinister interest.
quotes.author: Emile Souvestre

quotes.quote: The comic impulse is sometimes a reaction to sadness. You feel like you can make one choice or the other.
quotes.author: Harold Ramis

quotes.quote: The impulse to connect the dots - and to share what you've connected - is the urge that makes you an artist.
quotes.author: Amanda Palmer

quotes.quote: The impulse to travel is one of the hopeful symptoms of life.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Interesting things happen when the creative impulse is cultivated with curiosity, freedom and intensity.
quotes.author: Saul Bass

quotes.quote: When we are on the water, our contemplative impulses range from the intense to the nearly absent.
quotes.author: Paul Schullery

quotes.quote: Vision gives you the impulse to make the picture your own.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: We are rarely wrong when we act from impulse.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: Character is the impulse reined down into steady continuance.
quotes.author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quotes.quote: Let the first impulse pass, wait for the second.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: The impulse to tell the truth was not as great as the fear of being left off the page.
quotes.author: Jonathan Messinger

quotes.quote: The impulse of modern art is the desire to destroy beauty.
quotes.author: Barnett Newman

quotes.quote: When the creative impulse sweeps over you, grab it. You grab it and honor it and use it, because momentum is a rare gift.
quotes.author: Justina Chen Headley

quotes.quote: Your first impulse is to share good news, your second is to club someone with it.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Creativity is the evolutionary impulse in the Universe.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The impulse to pursue God originates with God, but the outworking of that impulse is our following hard after Him.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Choosing not to act on an angry impulse and to feel the pain that lies beneath it is a very courageous thing to do.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Mistrust first impulses; they are nearly always good.
quotes.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quotes.quote: The primary use of conversation is to satisfy the impulse to talk.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Giving is the vital impulse and moral center of capitalism.
quotes.author: George Gilder

quotes.quote: The impulse to worship is impossible to eradicate. Even the most prosaic have to worship something.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: The mystical impulse in men is somehow a desire to possess the universe. In women, it's a desire to be possessed.
quotes.author: Colin Wilson

quotes.quote: The maternal impulse in animals to protect their young - that kind of instinct and subsequent violence is quite beautiful. Mythic even.
quotes.author: Lidia Yuknavitch

quotes.quote: The impulse to write a novel comes from a momentary unified vision of life.
quotes.author: Angus Wilson

quotes.quote: The impulse for personal adornment is hard to stamp out.
quotes.author: Virginia Postrel

quotes.quote: Everyone has the impulse to be elite.
quotes.author: Alfre Woodard

quotes.quote: The impulse to ask questions is among the more primitive human lusts.
quotes.author: Rose Macaulay

quotes.quote: The impulse of love that leads us to the doorway of a friend is the voice of God within, and we need not be afraid to follow it.
quotes.author: Agnes Sanford

quotes.quote: Every impulse of feeling should be guided by reason; and, in my opinion, exertion should always be in proportion to what is required.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: A poet feels the impulse to create a work of art when the passive awe provoked by an event is transformed into a desire to express that awe in a rite of worship.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: One can never consent to creep when one feels an impulse to soar.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The impulse to write things down is a peculiarly compulsive one, inexplicable to those who do not share it, useful only accidentally, only secondarily, in the way that any compulsion tries to justify itself.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Every impulse we strangle will only poison us.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Impulse without reason is not enough, and reason without impulse is a poor makeshift.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Distrust all in whom the impulse to punish is powerful.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The natural impulse of men is to follow and whoever has the strongest sense of purpose will always dominate.
quotes.author: Robert Harris

quotes.quote: The impulse to take life strivingly is indestructible in the race.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: At the heart of the impulse to tell stories is a mystery so profound.
quotes.author: Dennis Covington

quotes.quote: A first impulse was never a crime.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: It is not enough to recognize what is right and true. One must control the impulse to do what is wrong and easy.
quotes.author: Andy Andrews

quotes.quote: Encourage students to stop and think about the question. Impulsiveness is the enemy of deep thinking.
quotes.author: Harvey F. Silver

quotes.quote: HastyÂ climbers have sudden falls.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Be not tooÂ hastyÂ either with praise or blame; speak always as though you were giving evidence before the judgement-seat of the Gods.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: HastyÂ work and premature decisions may lead to penalties out of all proportion to the issues immediately involved.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Don't be tooÂ hasty, don't take somebody else's opinion without testing it.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: A crowd is not merely impulsive and mobile. Like a savage, it is not prepared to admit that anything can come between its desire and the realisation of its desire.
quotes.author: Gustave Le Bon

quotes.quote: Sometimes kids just act impulsively, but it's because we have strong feelings, not because we're trying to make trouble.
quotes.author: James Howe

quotes.quote: It is hard to fight againstÂ impulsiveÂ desire; whatever it wants it will buy at the cost of the soul.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: If you act impetuously, it will be uncertain, and you'll know it. It just won't feel right. It is better to wait.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: ImpulsiveÂ actions led to trouble, and trouble could have unpleasant consequences.
quotes.author: Steig Larsson

quotes.quote: People do all sorts of things impulsively and follow those impulses into strange places.
quotes.author: John Darnielle

quotes.quote: HastyÂ resolutions are of the nature of vows, and to be equally avoided.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Impulsiveness can be charming but deliberation can have an appeal, as well.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: An adolescent is both an impulsive child and a self-starting adult.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Be not tooÂ hastyÂ to trust or to admire the teachers of morality; they discourse like angels, but they live like men.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: AÂ hastyÂ judgment is a first step to recantation.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: People do all sorts of thingsÂ impulsively and follow those impulses into strange places.
quotes.author: John Darnielle

quotes.quote: More errors arise from inhibited indecision than from impulsive behavior.
quotes.author: Morris L. Ernst

quotes.quote: Don't make aÂ hastyÂ movement. Be like a mountain. Move silently and cautiously.Â
quotes.author: Yi Sun-sin

quotes.quote: HastyÂ conclusions lead to speedy repentance.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: People are moreÂ impulsiveÂ and they get slightly lessÂ impulsiveÂ as they get older and theÂ impulsiveness interacting with the depression is particularly devastating and lethal, potentially lethal.
quotes.author: Kay Redfield Jamison

quotes.quote: There are risks and costs to action. But they are far less than the long range risks of comfortable inaction.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Throughout history, it has been the inaction of those who could have acted; the indifference of those who should have known better; the silence of the voice of justice when it mattered most; that has made it possible for evil to triumph.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.quote: Iron rusts from disuse; water loses its purity from stagnation... even so does inaction sap the vigor of the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Inaction may be safe, but it builds nothing.
quotes.author: Dave Freudenthal

quotes.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Take the word of experience, I speak the truth: inaction is safest in danger.
quotes.author: Silius Italicus

quotes.quote: There are many roads to prosperity, but one must be taken. Inaction leads nowhere.
quotes.author: Robert Zoellick

quotes.quote: The price of inaction is far greater than the cost of making a mistake.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Inaction will cause a man to sink into the slough of despond and vanish without a trace.
quotes.author: Farley Mowat

quotes.quote: All choices are fraught with peril, but inaction is the most perilous of all.
quotes.author: Frewin Jones

quotes.quote: In a critical sense, doing nothing can mean doing something. Inaction can be action and embracing this paradox can save your life.
quotes.author: Ben Sherwood

quotes.quote: Inaction in a deed of mercy becomes an action in a deadly sin.
quotes.author: Helena Petrovna Blavatsky

quotes.quote: Thoughtless risks are destructive, of course, but perhaps even more wasteful is thoughtless caution which prompts inaction and promotes failure to seize opportunity.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: Nature knows no pause in progress and development, and attaches her curse on all inaction.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Inaction, letting be, neither creating nor destroying--that is my evil. And also the knower as one without desire.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Inaction that results from indulgence is Procrastination. Inaction that results from intention is Patience.
quotes.author: Rory Vaden

quotes.quote: The only thing between you and success is your thinking. Defeatist thoughts are the mother of inaction.
quotes.author: Iimani David

quotes.quote: There’s no difference between a pessimist who says, “Oh, it’s hopeless, so don’t bother doing anything,” and an optimist who says, “Don’t bother doing anything, it’s going to turn out fine anyway.” Either way, nothing happens.
quotes.author: Yvon Chouinard

quotes.quote: One has to speak out and stand up for one's convictions. Inaction at a time of conflagration is inexcusable.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The world will not be destroyed by those who do evil, but by those who watch them without doing anything.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Action cures fear, inaction creates terror.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: To do nothing at all is the most difficult thing in the world, the most difficult and the most intellectual.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The most ominous of fallacies - the belief that things can be kept static by inaction.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: Inaction, contrary to its reputation for being a refuge, is neither safe nor comfortable.
quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

quotes.quote: One who sees inaction in action, and action in inaction, is intelligent among men.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Inaction without more is not tantamount to choice.
quotes.author: Benjamin N. Cardozo

quotes.quote: Man who stand on hill with mouth open will wait long time for roast duck to drop in.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Inaction, save as a measure of recuperation between bursts of activity, is painful and dangerous to the healthy organism - in fact, it is almost impossible. Only the dying can he really idle.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Whatever the dangers of the action we take, the dangers of inaction are far, far greater.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: Feeling inadequate is an occupational hazard of motherhood.
quotes.author: Harriet Lerner

quotes.quote: I'm sorry.' The two most inadequate words in the English language.
quotes.author: Beth Revis

quotes.quote: When inadequate men assumed huge burdens, the outcome could only serve Despite.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Donaldson

quotes.quote: We all feel inadequate very often. It's only when it gets chronic that it is disturbing to one's emotions and can get out of hand and make you pretty damn miserable.
quotes.author: Taylor Caldwell

quotes.quote: It's embarrassingly plain how inadequate language is.
quotes.author: Anthony Doerr

quotes.quote: Perfectionism doesn't make you feel perfect. It makes you feel inadequate.
quotes.author: Maria Shriver

quotes.quote: Inadequate nutrition can lead to terrible health consequences, both physical and emotional.
quotes.author: Vicki Escarra

quotes.quote: An inadequate chief executive officer's time at the top is always too long no matter how short.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: The only justification for writing a novel is that it should be wonderful. Adequate is inadequate.
quotes.author: Janet Burroway

quotes.quote: Private beneficence is totally inadequate to deal with the vast numbers of the city's disinherited.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.quote: The theory of evolution is totally inadequate to explain the origin and manifestation of the inorganic world.
quotes.author: John Ambrose Fleming

quotes.quote: You have to discover when you're inadequate to be funny and you don't know you're inadequate when you're a kid.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.quote: Yes, translation is by definition an inadequate substitute for being able to read a masterpiece in the original.
quotes.author: Terry Teachout

quotes.quote: The world as we know it is falling apart at the seams, because it's an inadequate container for the truth of who we are.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: It's strange that words are so inadequate. Yet, like the asthmatic struggling for breath, so the lover must struggle for words.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: When you look at magazines, you feel so inadequate and so small and you feel really imperfect, when you're constantly seeing these images.
quotes.author: Mia Wasikowska

quotes.quote: The argument that someone is a bad man is an inadequate argument for war and certainly an inadequate and unacceptable argument for regime change.
quotes.author: John Major

quotes.quote: Language is an inadequate form of communication. If you've picked up an instrument, it's because you don't feel you are communicating sufficiently.
quotes.author: Stephen Stills

quotes.quote: Our system is not fit for purpose. It's inadequate in terms of its scope, it's inadequate in terms of its information technology, leadership, management systems and processes.
quotes.author: John Reid

quotes.quote: Insufficient facts always invite danger.
quotes.author: Leonard Nimoy

quotes.quote: With insufficient data it is easy to go wrong.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Reason alone is insufficient to make us enthusiastic in any matter.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Individual learning is a necessary but insufficient condition for organizational learning.
quotes.author: Chris Argyris

quotes.quote: The functions of intellect are insufficient without courage, love, friendship, compassion and empathy.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Decisions are always made with insufficient information. If you really knew what was going on, the decision would make itself.
quotes.author: Jack Mcdevitt

quotes.quote: The problem of insufficient security was, until quite recently, a matter of a minority; now it is becoming very quickly a majority matter. That is a major change.
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.quote: Knowledge is one of our direct needs. But it is insufficient on its own. If knowledge was stripped from true up-bringing, it would increase man's strength, but not his morals.
quotes.author: Ameen Rihani

quotes.quote: Technical perfection is insufficient. It is an orphan without the true soul of the dancer.
quotes.author: Sylvie Guillem

quotes.quote: Complaint is often the result of an insufficient ability to live within the obvious restrictions of this god damned cage.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: We all sort of do want incentives for creative people to still exist at a certain level. You know, maybe rock stars shouldn't make as much; who knows? But you want as much creativity to take place in the future as took place in the past.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Incentives are not strategy, they are tactics. Defensive measures.
quotes.author: Carlos Ghosn

quotes.quote: When you're working in front of an audience, you have incentive to excel.
quotes.author: Dave Van Ronk

quotes.quote: The basic idea that incentives can be used to motivate behavior is a powerful one. It works for employees, and it has a clear place in parenting, as anyone who has tried to potty-train a recalcitrant toddler with sticker rewards knows.
quotes.author: Emily Oster

quotes.quote: When choosing a profession, a person will have good incentive for personal development by choosing such a profession that represents a personal challenge.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: Teamwork is not a matter of persuading yourself and your colleagues to set aside personal ambitions for the greater good. It's a matter of recognizing that your personal ambitions and the ambitions of the team are one and the same. That's the incentive.
quotes.author: Greg Brown

quotes.quote: It's not just buying the company. Sure, we picked the right companies, and we picked the right management and, most importantly, we've given them the right incentive to perform.
quotes.author: Henry Kravis

quotes.quote: Competition is not only the basis of protection to the consumer, but is the incentive to progress.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Doubt is the incentive to truth and inquiry leads the way.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: I would not be opposed to devising a new system of pensions, in which one part was based on collective provision, but which also gave incentives for people to take out an additional, personal plan.
quotes.author: Jacques Delors

quotes.quote: Frustrated love has been the incentive for many great works.
quotes.author: John N. Mitchell

quotes.quote: I believe every woman must be high maintenance because it serves as a powerful incentive for her man to succeed.
quotes.author: Lebo Grand

quotes.quote: Increased government spending can provide a temporary stimulus to demand and output but in the longer run higher levels of government spending crowd out private investment or require higher taxes that weaken growth by reducing incentives to save, invest, innovate, and work.
quotes.author: Martin Feldstein

quotes.quote: Call it what you will, incentives are what get people to work harder.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.quote: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Pleasure is the greatest incentive to evil.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Above all, though, children are linked to adults by the simple fact that they are in process of turning into them. For this they may be forgiven much. Children are bound to be inferior to adults, or there is no incentive to grow up.
quotes.author: Philip Larkin

quotes.quote: We need different perspectives here in Washington - someone who has private-sector experience, somebody who's actually created jobs, manufactures products, understands the incentives and disincentives, the intended and unintended consequences of legislation.
quotes.author: Ron Johnson

quotes.quote: If you look at history, innovation doesn't come just from giving people incentives; it comes from creating environments where their ideas can connect.
quotes.author: Steven Johnson

quotes.quote: An incentive is a bullet, a key: an often tiny object with astonishing power to change a situation.
quotes.author: Steven Levitt

quotes.quote: When there is silence, Give your voice. When there is darkness, Shine your light. When there is desperation, Offer hope.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: To be ambitious of true honor, of the true glory and perfection of our natures, is the very principle and incentive of virtue.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: The incentive to ambition is the love of power.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Without change there is no innovation, creativity, or incentive for improvement. Those who initiate change will have a better opportunity to manage the change that is inevitable.
quotes.author: William Pollard

quotes.quote: Every company, every boardroom in which I sit, has a plan, and they have objectives, goals, and a process. And to make it work, the pressure and incentive have to come from the top.
quotes.author: Vernon Jordan

quotes.quote: I always felt that I hadn't achieved what I wanted to achieve. I always felt I could get better. That's the whole incentive.
quotes.author: Virginia Wade

quotes.quote: The best design work is really done when you spend more time with people, when you have the opportunity to be of the same mindset and the same incentives as the founder of the business.
quotes.author: Yves Behar

quotes.quote: An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: We need to give each other the space to grow, to be ourselves, to exercise our diversity. We need to give each other space so that we may both give and receive such beautiful things as ideas, openness, dignity, joy, healing, and inclusion.
quotes.author: Max De Pree

quotes.quote: Diversity: the art of thinking independently together.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: I hope that teachings about inclusion and love win out over what I personally consider to be a handful of scriptures that reflect the moral expectations of the era in which they were recorded.
quotes.author: Pete Buttigieg

quotes.quote: The entire political system is contrary to everything a feminine heart stands for. It lacks inclusion. It lacks tenderness toward children. It lacks honor for relationships. It lacks reverence for the earth. It lacks love. And without those things, the feminine psyche disconnects.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: I believe in a passion for inclusion.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: Hollywood has definitely grown, in embracing the inclusion of Latinos in the world, because, for some time, we didn't exist. We were not part of any stories.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: You either believe that people respond to authority, or that they respond to kindness and inclusion. I'm obviously in the latter camp. I think that people respond better to reward than punishment.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: Intersectionality has given many advocates a way to frame their circumstances and to fight for their visibility and inclusion.
quotes.author: Kimberle Williams Crenshaw

quotes.quote: There is increasing recognition that violence against women is a major barrier to the fulfillment of human rights and a direct challenge to women's inclusion and participation in sustainable development and sustaining peace.
quotes.author: António Guterres

quotes.quote: My father literally fought his entire life to ensure the inclusion of all people because he understood that we were intertwined and connected together in humanity.
quotes.author: Bernice King

quotes.quote: It's when we care for each other - choosing inclusion and love over division and hatred - that this great country is at its greatest.
quotes.author: Tulsi Gabbard

quotes.quote: I don't think feminism is about the exclusion of men but their inclusion... we must face and address those issues, especially to include younger men and boys.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: I have an unwavering commitment to inclusion and diversity.
quotes.author: Julie Sweet

quotes.quote: We choose forward. We choose inclusion. We choose growing together. We choose American economic might and muscle, standing strong on the bedrock of the American ideal: a strong, empowered and ever-growing middle class.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: Inclusion is an illusion.
quotes.author: Georgia Pritchett

quotes.quote: Trust and love aren't always mutually inclusive, darling.
quotes.author: Jim Piddock

quotes.quote: Legal stunts. Herewith, forthwith, pertaining to but not inclusive of. This is how people control us, isn't it; make it all so mysterious, the rest of us don't understand.
quotes.author: Peter Duncan

quotes.quote: Irrespective of, however great, the work you're doing in life... Unless your inclusion doesn't solve any of their problems... They don't need you!
quotes.author: Arunabh Kumar

quotes.quote: Why do you work / In place of bearing witness to your own inclusion
quotes.author: Daniel Bejar

quotes.quote: Can't give it up, take while it's here / You did it last year, no need to do more / We eat what is left, all we deserve / Inclusion is power, a superpower
quotes.author: Clark John Mckenzie

quotes.quote: Cast out of inclusion's warm embrace / Peer in from a solitary space / The sting of rejection leaves / Its scars upon my face
quotes.author: Miracle of Sound

quotes.quote: People do anything to be involved in everything / Inclusion is a hell of a drug / Some people have everything they probably ever wanted in life / And never have enough
quotes.author: Kanye Omari West

quotes.quote: Cast out of inclusion's warm embrace / Peer in from a solitary space / The sting of rejection leaves / Its scars upon my face
quotes.author: Miracle of Sound

quotes.quote: So welcome to the world / That I lived in / Puking up bile and hate / My world has turned / To false inclusion / Sickening broken state
quotes.author: Adam Duce

quotes.quote: Illusion / Isolation / Indignation / Find inspiration / Illumination / And inclusion / The present is a distant memory / The more we connect / The less we respect / Words fall on deaf ears / My love disappears
quotes.author: Amalgam Effect

quotes.quote: Labels exclude and divide / Inclusion grown from the inside / Brainwashed minds and division lines
quotes.author: Doug Weems

quotes.quote: You watch the distribution / Of a mass confusion spread by the institution / Sell your inclusion of you and your own illusion / Instead of thinking you're the solution
quotes.author: Jay Buchanan

quotes.quote: Democratic inclusion means that all members of the given polity should have effectively equal influence over debate and decision-making with in that polity.
quotes.author: Iris Marion Young

quotes.quote: Others may object that the ideal of inclusion is itself both under and over-inclusive.
quotes.author: Iris Marion Young

quotes.quote: Accusations of exclusion and calls for exclusion are often vague, and seem to cover every form of injustice and remedy.
quotes.author: Iris Marion Young

quotes.quote: The concept of exclusion and inclusion lose meaning if they are used to label all problems of social conflict and injustice.
quotes.author: Iris Marion Young

quotes.quote: Inclusion is a n increasingly part of the government's agenda and it is committed to ensuring that all pupils are integrated as far as possible into the daily life of schools and the local community.
quotes.author: Anne Hayward

quotes.quote: It is essential that everyone who is involved ins inclusion familiarizes themselves with the latest national context, as this will form the basis for inclusion services in the future.
quotes.author: Anne Hayward

quotes.quote: The process of fostering inclusion is incremental. It requires time and unwavering commitment.
quotes.author: Jim Yong Kim

quotes.quote: Social inclusion matter for itself. But it also matters because it is the foundation for shared prosperity.
quotes.author: World Bank

quotes.quote: Inclusion involves creating, fostering, and sustaining practices and conditions that encourage and allow each of us to be full ourselves--with our differences from and similarities to those around us-- as we work together.
quotes.author: Jossey-Bass

quotes.quote: Inclusion is a key driver and basis for reaping diversity's potential benefits.
quotes.author: Jossey-Bass

quotes.quote: Attending to and practicing inclusion permits organizations and their members to proactively replace discrimination with much more positive and productive approach that can serve to release potential and result in more optimal outcomes for all.
quotes.author: Jossey-Bass

quotes.quote: Diversity as a concept has evolved over decades from affirmative action in the United States to present day inclusion strategies to ensure every individual is treated with respect and dignity.
quotes.author: Jawad Syed

quotes.quote: When you do learn these things, when you understand what inclusion is, then we can accomplish greater things together.
quotes.author: Aldis Hodge

quotes.quote: Peace requires everyone to be in the circle - wholeness, inclusion.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: You have to stick up for what you believe in. And that, to me, is the biggest thing you can do about driving inclusion.
quotes.author: Ginni Rometty

quotes.quote: Diversity and inclusion are always something industries should strive for.
quotes.author: Halima Aden

quotes.quote: Exclusion is always dangerous. Inclusion is the only safety if we are to have a peaceful world.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: We are less when we don't include everyone.
quotes.author: Stuart Milk

quotes.quote: When everyone is included, everyone wins.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: If the cause of poverty is marginalization, the cure is inclusion.
quotes.author: Richard John Neuhaus

quotes.quote: Inclusion and fairness in the workplace is not simply the right thing to do; it's the smart thing to do.
quotes.author: Alexis Herman

quotes.quote: The idea of inclusion has become kind of a stone that we've passed our hand over so many times that it doesn't mean anything.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.quote: You have a responsibility to make inclusion a daily thought, so we can get rid of the word 'inclusion.'
quotes.author: Theodore Melfi

quotes.quote: inclusion is a right not a privilege for a select few.
quotes.author: Oberti v. Board of Education

quotes.quote: Inclusion is not a matter of political correctness. It is the key to growth.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: The inclusion of consequences in the conception of what we have done is an acknowledgement that we are parts of the world, but the paradoxical character of moral luck which emerges from this acknowledgement shows that we are unable to operate with such a view, for it leaves us with no one to be.
quotes.author: Thomas Nagel

quotes.quote: Incompetence is a double-edged banana.
quotes.author: John Perry Barlow

quotes.quote: Obscurity is usually the refuge of incompetence.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Incompetence is often highly regarded in governmental circles.
quotes.author: William Wallace

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, you may be at your level of incompetence already.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Incompetence is certainty in the absence of expertise. Overconfidence is certainty in the presence of expertise.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Inconsistency, incompetence, and lies are all cut short by the ground. It will stop you if you can't stop yourself.
quotes.author: Mark Twight

quotes.quote: A certain combination of incompetence and indifference can cause almost as much suffering as the most acute malevolence.
quotes.author: Bruce Catton

quotes.quote: Arrogance, ignorance, and incompetence. Not a pretty cocktail of personality traits in the best of situations. No sirree. Not a pretty cocktail in an office-mate and not a pretty cocktail in a head of state. In fact, in a leader, it's a lethal cocktail.
quotes.author: Graydon Carter

quotes.quote: Never attribute to malevolence what is merely due to incompetence.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: One of the chief features of incompetence was an inability to see it in oneself.
quotes.author: Kim Stanley Robinson

quotes.quote: When success and incompetence meet, disaster is not far away.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Incompetence is the true crisis.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It happens; incompetence is rewarded more often than not.
quotes.author: Jeff Lindsay

quotes.quote: Sometimes incompetence is useful. It helps you keep an open mind.
quotes.author: Roberto Cavalli

quotes.quote: The problem with incompetence is its inability to recognize itself.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: The English think that incompetence is the same thing as sincerity.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Secrecy breeds incompetence because where there is failure, failure is kept secret.
quotes.author: Julian Assange

quotes.quote: Work is accomplished by those employees who have not yet reached their level of incompetence.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Authoritarianism and secrecy breed incompetence; the two feed on each other. It's a vicious cycle. Governments with authoritarian tendencies point to what is in fact their own incompetence as the rationale for giving them yet more power.
quotes.author: Josh Marshall

quotes.quote: Incompetence is a better explanation than conspiracy in most human activity.
quotes.author: Peter Bergen

quotes.quote: If there is any one proof of a man's incompetence, it is the stagnant mentality of a worker who, doing some small routine job in a vast undertaking, does not care to look beyond the lever of a machine, does not choose to know how the machine got there or what makes his job possible, and proclaims that the management of the undertaking is parasitical and unnecessary.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Always assume incompetence before looking for conspiracy.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Incompetence, in my books, is the failure of the critical faculties to interfere constructively with the natural flow.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: Man cannot live by incompetence alone.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: The price of loyalty is incompetence.
quotes.author: Jonathan Alter

quotes.quote: One moment of incompetence can be fatal.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: Laziness has become the chief characteristic of journalism, displacing incompetence.
quotes.author: Kingsley Amis

quotes.quote: The most dangerous irony is, people are angry with others because of their own incompetence.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Any constraint is part of the skeleton that you build the composition on - including your own incompetence.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: The Andrew Principle is when the incompetence of an organization exceeds the incompetence of certain individuals within that organization, thereby allowing their promotion within said organization.
quotes.author: Chris Alexander

quotes.quote: Incompetence plus incompetence equals incompetence.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Ignorance is the worst liberation. To know even a few is better than knowing nothing at all.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Fear is incomplete knowledge.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: There is always an incompleteness in a complete day.
quotes.author: Pragati Bajaji

quotes.quote: Each of us is incomplete compared to someone else - an animal's incomplete compared to a person and a person compared to God, who is complete only to be imaginary.
quotes.author: Georges Bataille

quotes.quote: A man in love is incomplete until he has married. Then he's finished.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: Some stories remain incomplete but they are beautiful.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: A golden rule: to leave an incomplete image of oneself.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: Some of the greatest moments in life come from moments that are incomplete.
quotes.author: Nikki Reed

quotes.quote: The sadness of the incomplete, the sadness that is often Life, but should never be Art.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: The well of your incompleteness runs deep, but make the effort to look away from yourself and to look toward Him.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: If you feel incomplete, you alone must fill yourself with love in all your empty shattered spaces.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: A one-eyed man is much more incomplete than a blind man, for he knows what it is that's lacking.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: If your love for another person doesn't include loving yourself then your love is incomplete.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: The knowable world is incomplete if seen from any one point of view, incoherent if seen from all points of view at once, and empty if seen from nowhere in particular.
quotes.author: Richard Shweder

quotes.quote: Nature makes nothing incomplete, and nothing in vain.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Having an inaccurate or incomplete view of ourselves is why are always depressed
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The brightest flashes in the world of thought are incomplete until they have been proved to have their counterparts in the world of fact.
quotes.author: John Tyndall

quotes.quote: To say of a picture, as is often said in its praise, that it shows great and earnest labour, is to say that it is incomplete and unfit for view.
quotes.author: James Whistler

quotes.quote: Happiness should always remain a bit incomplete. After all, dreams are boundless.
quotes.author: Anatoly Karpov

quotes.quote: True beauty could be discovered only by one who mentally complete the incomplete.
quotes.author: Kakuzō Okakura

quotes.quote: Today I begin to understand what love must be, if it exists. When we are parted, we each feel the lack of the other half of ourselves. We are incomplete like a book in two volumes of which the first has been lost. That is what I imagine love to be: incompleteness in absence.
quotes.author: Edmond de Goncourt

quotes.quote: My career is a journey for me, and any journey is incomplete without the struggle.
quotes.author: Yami Gautam

quotes.quote: We understand God by everything in ourselves that is fragmentary, incomplete, and inopportune.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: For every house is incomplete without Him, and a blessing is lacking in the spirit.
quotes.author: Christopher Smart

quotes.quote: An incomplete sketch superbly executed is power.
quotes.author: Richard Schmid

quotes.quote: Delight is incomplete until it is expressed.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Theory without practice is just as incomplete as practice without theory.
quotes.author: Assata Shakur

quotes.quote: Two incomplete people can't complete one another. Complete yourself and then let someone else complement you.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: It makes little difference how many university courses or degrees a person may own. If he cannot use words to move an idea from one point to another, his education is incomplete.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: The male is a biological accident: the Y (male) gene is an incomplete X (female) gene, that is, has an incomplete set of chromosomes. In other words, the male is an incomplete female, a walking abortion, aborted at the gene stage. To be male is to be deficient, emotionally limited; maleness is a deficiency disease and males are emotional cripples.
quotes.author: Valerie Solanas

quotes.quote: Christianity is completed Judaism, or it is nothing. Christianity is incomprehensible without Judaism, as Judaism is incomplete without Christianity.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: One's complete sentences are attempts, as often as not, to complete an incomplete self with words.
quotes.author: William H. Gass

quotes.quote: Botanists have a plant-category which they call 'Incompletae'; similarly one can say that there are incomplete and uncompleted people. These are the ones whose longings and strivings are out of proportion with what they actually do and what they achieve.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A single man is an incomplete animal. He resembles the odd half of a pair of scissors.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: There is no doubt that, as works of art, books that lack canine interest are incomplete.
quotes.author: Roy Hattersley

quotes.quote: Remember one very fundamental thing about life: Any experience that has not been lived with hang around you, will persist: "Finish me! Live me! Complete me!" There is an intrinsic quality in every experience that it tends and wants to be finished, completed. Once completed, it evaporates; incomplete, it persists, it tortures you, it haunts you, it attracts your attention. It says, "What are you going to do about me? I am still incomplete - fulfill me!"
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The single story creates stereotypes, and the problem with stereotypes is not that they are untrue, but that they are incomplete. They make one story become the only story.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.quote: The car has become an article of dress without which we feel uncertain, unclad and incomplete in the urban compound.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: We sometimes feel that a life which was so brief was in vain, and that God has mocked us by giving us the little one and then by taking it away immediately. The child had no opportunity to perform a work, nor was there any time given to develop character. Let us remember, first of all, that the little one had an eternal spirit, and that it has gone into the presence of God where there will be an eternity to perform works and develop character. A brief life is not an incomplete life.
quotes.author: J. Vernon McGee

quotes.quote: For us to transform as a society, we have to allow ourselves to be transformed as individuals. And for us to be transformed...we have to allow for the incompleteness of any of our truths and a real forgiveness for the complexity of human beings.
quotes.author: Angel Kyodo Williams

quotes.quote: The true genius shudders at incompleteness — imperfection — and usually prefers silence to saying the something which is not everything that should be said.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Our emotional life maps our incompleteness: A creature without any needs would never have reasons for fear, or grief, or hope, or anger.
quotes.author: Martha C. Nussbaum

quotes.quote: Love could be more than just feeling those butterflies in your stomach when you are around them, but also a feeling of incompleteness when you are not around them.
quotes.author: David Daniels

quotes.quote: Nothing in Nature is random. A thing appears random only through the incompleteness of our knowledge.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: When "why" are we here? is not clear to us, it will often end up in "incompleteness."
quotes.author: Prashant B. Yeole

quotes.quote: The story was left incomplete because I didn't stop writing and you didn't stop erasing.
quotes.author: Chandni Arora

quotes.quote: Never attempt to complete an incomplete person. You will be drained and exhausted. You can't run for someone who refuses to even take a few steps. Stop trying to mend broken hearts. You will end up getting dragged into their void. You can only help a free person to fly. A free soul to soar.
quotes.author: Urvashi Goja

quotes.quote: Everybody gets sad, even dads that have people to care for, and therefore, you don't have to hide your pain. Life without rainy days is incomplete.
quotes.author: Patton

quotes.quote: Faith in the wisdom of the people is exactly what makes the Constitution incomplete and crude.
quotes.author: Professor Pitkannan

quotes.quote: If you have to shout to prove your point, you're probably wrong.
quotes.author: Aleksandra Ninkovic

quotes.quote: Given any particular problem, the number of incorrect solutions is infinitely larger than the number of correct solutions; thus the probability of arriving at a correct solution is zero.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If we are honest with ourselves, we have to admit that sometimes our assumptions and preconceived notions are wrong, and therefore, our interpretation of events is incorrect. This causes us to overreact, to take things personally, or to judge people unfairly.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Thornton

quotes.quote: Wrong is wrong, no matter who says it.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is better to lose and do the right thing than to win and do the wrong thing.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: It's sometimes funny to watch some people doing something the wrong way but doing it confidently. Even more funny, they succeeded.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: If you can see the light at the end of the tunnel, you are looking the wrong way.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: If you truly believe something, and it's incorrect, that doesn't mean you don't have integrity.
quotes.author: Jim Brown

quotes.quote: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: If you board the wrong train, it is no use running along the corridor in the other direction.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: It is easier to write an incorrect program than understand a correct one.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.quote: Incorrect documentation is often worse than no documentation.
quotes.author: Bertrand Meyer

quotes.quote: Life is giving us a second chance to right our wrongs. But we can't if we don't start with the truth.
quotes.author: Zoe Haslie

quotes.quote: When no one understands, that's usually a good sign that you're wrong.
quotes.author: Victoria Schwab

quotes.quote: It's important for people to, instead of automatically assuming everything the opposite side says is incorrect, you have to at least listen and see why someone might feel a certain way.
quotes.author: Michelle Wolf

quotes.quote: You could have everything right but be in the wrong place. You think your business is no good, but really, the problem is your place is no good.
quotes.author: Fred DeLuca

quotes.quote: Making a wrong decision is understandable. Refusing to search continually for learning is not.
quotes.author: Philip Crosby

quotes.quote: It's incredible to have people show their support when your doing something you love.
quotes.author: Louis Tomlinson

quotes.quote: It is incredible, when you start believing in angels your life becomes a lot smoother.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: You are the only one who can create an incredible world around you, or destroy yourself.
quotes.author: Thalia

quotes.quote: Believe the incredible and you can do the impossible.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: Enjoyment is an incredible energizer to the human spirit.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The most incredible thing about miracles is that they happen.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: When you believe, incredible things happen. You set divine forces into motion.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Incredible things can be done simply if we are committed to making them happen.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: The unexpected and the incredible belong in this world. Only then is life whole.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: A thing may be incredible and still be true; sometimes it is incredible because it is true.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Hope is incredible to the slave of grief.
quotes.author: Petrarch

quotes.quote: The thing that is incredible is life itself.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: The nature of the mind is completely incredible.
quotes.author: Tenzin Palmo

quotes.quote: God has been incredible in creating us to be persons.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: There is incredible value in being of service to others.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berg

quotes.quote: The human brain is an incredible pattern-matching machine.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Humor can be an incredible, lacerating and effective weapon.
quotes.author: Carl Hiaasen

quotes.quote: You will not do incredible things without an incredible dream.
quotes.author: John Eliot

quotes.quote: The body can do incredible things as long as the mind supports it.
quotes.author: Liam McIntyre

quotes.quote: There is, in fact, an incredible freedom in having nothing left to lose.
quotes.author: Marya Hornbacher

quotes.quote: Love is the most incredible gift to give and to receive as a human being.
quotes.author: Ellen Page

quotes.quote: Love releases incredible energy that promotes the biochemistry of healing.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.quote: The incredible thing about the human mind is that is didn't come with an instruction book.
quotes.author: Terry Riley

quotes.quote: A thing is incredible, if ever, only after it is told—returned to the world it came out of.
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: It's incredible to realize that what we do each day has meaning in the big picture of God's plan.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: The most incredible beauty and the most satisfying way of life come from affirming your own uniqueness.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: Words have incredible power. They can make people's hearts soar, or they can make people's hearts sore.
quotes.author: Mardy Grothe

quotes.quote: Your mind is the most incredible gift! A powerful mind is the reserve for all that is physical in stamina.
quotes.author: James C. Emlund

quotes.quote: There is incredible generosity in the potentialities of Nature. We only have to discover how to utilize them.
quotes.author: E.F. Schumacher

quotes.quote: The human mind is incredible. It can do nothing without belief, yet practically anything with it.
quotes.author: Sylvia Engdahl

quotes.quote: The human body is an incredible machine, but most people only get out of that machine what their mind allows them to.
quotes.author: Rich Froning

quotes.quote: Anything that we think is incredible and beautiful and wonderful, we ascribe to something that we don't know what it is.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.quote: In terrible moments, in moments of revolution, of war or repression, of illness or death, people react with incredible strength.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Writing can be an incredible mindfulness practice.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Grief can be an incredible source of energy. For good.
quotes.author: Peter Gould

quotes.quote: Youth is incredible because you really do feel invincible.
quotes.author: Paul Stanley

quotes.quote: There is incredible power in the arts to inspire and influence.
quotes.author: Julie Taymor

quotes.quote: People do incredible things for love, particularly for unrequited love.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Desperation will allow you to do incredible things in the name of survival.
quotes.author: Colin Farrell

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have this tragedy which turns into an incredible opportunity.
quotes.author: Eli Roth

quotes.quote: Women are incredible in groups together. Terrifying. Men have nothing on them.
quotes.author: Michael Hutchence

quotes.quote: It's an incredible feeling falling in love someone who doesn't know you exist.
quotes.author: Dane Cook

quotes.quote: Feeling like you're respected among the people who do the same thing you do is incredible and necessary.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: It's incredible how nature sets females up to take care of people, and yet it is tricky for them to take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Bjork

quotes.quote: Being reminded about the incredible power of God's love, and living as He intended, is the most powerful motivation to change.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: The incredible diversity of life on this planet, most of which is microbial, can only be understood in an evolutionary framework.
quotes.author: Carl Woese

quotes.quote: Error often is to be preferred to indecision.
quotes.author: Aaron Burr

quotes.quote: Indecision becomes decision with time.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Indecision, doubt and fear. The members of this unholy trio are closely related; where one is found, the other two are close at hand.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Worry is a sustained form of fear caused by indecision.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Patience is decisive indecision.
quotes.author: James Richardson

quotes.quote: Through indecision opportunity is often lost.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Greatness is never achieved through indecision.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: Nothing is so exhausting as indecision, and nothing is so futile.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Be decisive. A wrong decision is generally less disastrous than indecision.
quotes.author: Bernhard Langer

quotes.quote: The worst of all human ailments: indecision.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Indecision is a major time waster; 80% of decisions should be made the first time they come up.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The worst decision is indecision.
quotes.author: Ryan Harwood

quotes.quote: Indecision is fatal. It is better to make a wrong decision than build up a habit of indecision. If you're wallowing in indecision, you certainty can't act - and action is the basis of success.
quotes.author: Marie Beynon Lyons Ray

quotes.quote: Always remember, indecision is decision - usually against you.
quotes.author: Venita VanCaspel

quotes.quote: He who hesitates is sometimes saved.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Indecision is a form of self-abuse - be ready to step up!
quotes.author: Suzanne Evans

quotes.quote: Indecision with the passing of time becomes decision.
quotes.author: Bill W.

quotes.quote: Indecision is the greatest thief of opportunity.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Indecision is actually the individual's decision to fail.
quotes.author: Raymond Charles Barker

quotes.quote: Things can harden meaningfully in the moment of indecision.
quotes.author: John Ashbery

quotes.quote: To be constantly changing one's plans isn't decision at all-it's indecision.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: One of the painful things about our time is that those who feel certainty are stupid, and those with any imagination and understanding are filled with doubt and indecision.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Some live in a state of passionate indecision.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: What is fear after all? It is indecision. You seek some way to resist, escape. There is none.
quotes.author: Anne Rice

quotes.quote: Opportunity never sneaks up on those who straddle the fence of indecision.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Indecision is debilitating; it feeds upon itself; it is, one might almost say, habit-forming. Not only that, but it is contagious; it transmits itself to others.
quotes.author: H. A. Hopf

quotes.quote: Indecision is the seedling of fear.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Indecision may or may not be our biggest problem.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: Indecisiveness wears a person out.
quotes.author: E.L. Konigsburg

quotes.quote: Each indecision brings its own delays and days are lost lamenting over lost days. What you can do or think you can do, begin it. For boldness has magic, power, and genius in it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Indecision and delays are the parents of failure.
quotes.author: George Canning

quotes.quote: Indecision is a virus that can run through an army and destroy its will to win or even to survive.
quotes.author: Wendell Mayes

quotes.quote: Endurance is frequently a form of indecision.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

quotes.quote: More is lost by indecision than wrong decision. Indecision is the thief of opportunity. It will steal you blind.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Beige is the color of indecision.
quotes.author: Paula Scher

quotes.quote: More errors arise from inhibited indecision than from impulsive behavior.
quotes.author: Morris L. Ernst

quotes.quote: Inaction and indecision in the present is because of fear of consequences of the future.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: Indecision is the seedling of fear
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Indecision is the key to flexibility.
quotes.author: Kathy Reichs

quotes.quote: There is no more miserable human being than one in whom nothing is habitual but indecision.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Now, the melancholy god protects thee, and the tailor make that doublet of changeable taffeta, for thy mind is a very opal.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Then, indecision brings its own delays, / And days are lost lamenting o'er lost days.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: I must have a prodigious quantity of mind; it takes me as much as a week, sometimes, to make it up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The tragedy of a man who could not make up his mind.
quotes.author: Laurence Olivier

quotes.quote: I'll give you a definite maybe.
quotes.author: Sam Goldwyn

quotes.quote: A wrong decision isn't forever; it can always be reversed. The losses from a delayed decision are forever; they can never be retrieved.
quotes.author: J.K. Galbraith

quotes.quote: The archbishop is usually to be found nailing his colours to the fence.
quotes.author: Frank Field

quotes.quote: While there is nothing inherently wrong with asking questions, the inability to decide on correct answers can make us unhappy.
quotes.author: Saint Bonaventure

quotes.quote: Indecision is fatal, so make up your mind.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Indecisive as a fellow who pulls back one leg as he moves forward with the other.
quotes.author: Arabic Proverb

quotes.quote: How long halt ye between two opinions?
quotes.author: 1 Kings 18:21

quotes.quote: Decision is a sharp knife that cuts clean and straight; indecision, a dull one that hacks and tears and leaves ragged edges behind it.
quotes.author: Gordon Graham

quotes.quote: A firm belief attracts facts. They come out in holes in the ground an' cracks in the' wall to support belief, but they run away from doubt.
quotes.author: Finley Peter Dunne

quotes.quote: When you have to make a choice and don't make it, that is in itself a choice.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: When it comes to betting on yourself...you're a chicken-livered coward if you hesitate.
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: To the timid and hesitating everything is impossible because it seems so.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: To teach how to live with uncertainty, and yet without being paralyzed by hesitation, is perhaps the chief thing that philosophy in our age can still do for those who study it.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Fear comes from uncertainty. When we are absolutely certain, whether, of our worth or worthlessness, we are almost impervious to fear. Thus, a feeling of utter unworthiness can be a source of courage.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Indecision may or may not be my problem.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Indecision may come from an instinctive hunch that there's more you need to know - which means it's time to learn everything you can about the pros and cons of each option. You can continue on this track, however, only as long as you're unearthing genuinely new information.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: All around me insisted that my doubts proved only my own ignorance and sinfulness; that they knew by experience they would soon give place to true knowledge and an advance in religion; and I felt something like indecision.
quotes.author: Maria Monk

quotes.quote: All around me insisted that my doubts proved only my own ignorance and sinfulness; that they knew by experience they would soon give place to true knowledge and an advance in religion; and I felt something like indecision.
quotes.author: Maria Monk

quotes.quote: Once I make up my mind, I'm full of indecision.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: Evil draws its power from indecision and concern for what other people think.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: A decision unmade is still a decision. It won't go away. Neither will problems or more options.
quotes.author: Emily Grabatin

quotes.quote: I feel like I am in a constant battle with myself. I am being pushed and pulled in two different directions.
quotes.author: Krystalle Bianca

quotes.quote: Man himself is so buffeted by shifts of thought and mood, not knowing from one day to the next what he truly feels, that a shifting earth is well-nigh the last straw.
quotes.author: Beryl Bainbridge

quotes.quote: Then his heart made up his mind.
quotes.author: Lindsay Mattick

quotes.quote: The other often much prefer a clear answer, even if it is No than continued indecision and waffling.
quotes.author: William Ury

quotes.quote: Dare to keep moving when it is a must and dare to keep waiting when you have to, but note, you shall always keep waiting if you keep waiting and you shall always keep moving when you keep moving!
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: Indecision and fear can cripple any chances of succeeding and lead to maelstroms of regret that fuel our most fantastic nightmares.
quotes.author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.quote: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: Be an independent thinker at all times, and ignore anyone who attempts to define you in a limiting way.
quotes.author: Sherry Argov

quotes.quote: Independence .... is loyalty to one's best self and principles, and this is often disloyalty to the general idols and fetishes.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I am lord of myself, accountable to none.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The truest test of independent judgment is being able to dislike someone who admires us, and to admire someone who dislikes us.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Independence? That's middle class blasphemy. We are all dependent on one another, every soul of us on earth.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: I'd rather die my way than live yours.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: To find yourself, think for yourself.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: If you truly want to be respected by people you love, you must prove to them that you can survive without them.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: It's easy to be independent when you've got money. But to be independent when you haven't got a thing—that's the Lord's test.
quotes.author: Mahalia Jackson

quotes.quote: Independence is essential for permanent but fatal to immediate success.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Independence is earned by a few words of cheap confidence.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The price for independence is often isolation and solitude.
quotes.author: Steve Schmidt

quotes.quote: He who defines duty for himself is his own master.
quotes.author: Dick Cheatham

quotes.quote: I stand for freedom of expression, doing what you believe in, and going after your dreams.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: There is often as much independence in not being led, as in not being driven.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Premature independence is the daughter of conceit.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: You don't need a significant other to lead a significant life.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Don't depend too much on anyone in this world, because even your own shadow leaves you when you are in darkness.
quotes.author: Ibn Taymiyyah

quotes.quote: Never depend on anyone to make you happy....You are responsible for your own happiness.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: Financial independence is the ability to live from the income of your own personal resources.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: People have only as much liberty as they have the intelligence to want and the courage to take.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Freedom is the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: A great step towards independence is a good-humored stomach, one that is willing to endure rough treatment.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Freedom means you are unobstructed in living your life as you choose. Anything less is a form of slavery.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Independence is happiness.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.quote: Independence doesn't mean you decide the way you want.
quotes.author: Stephen Breyer

quotes.quote: It's so important to have that independence. You know it yourself: Everyone needs evenings of their own.
quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

quotes.quote: Being brave enough to be alone frees you up to invite people into your life because you want them and not because you need them.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale
