quotes.quote: Of all the inhabitants of the inferno, none but Lucifer knows that hell is hell, and the secret function of purgatory is to make of heaven an effective reality.
quotes.author: Arnold Bennett

quotes.quote: The world is an inferno. It will burn until every nation has fallen, until all who oppose us are dead, until people see the true light.
quotes.author: Alexander Gordon Smith

quotes.quote: The knowledge that refuge is available, when and if needed, makes the silent inferno of the desert more easily bearable. Mountains complement desert as desert complements city, as wilderness complements and completes civilization.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Under the right circumstances, a tiny spark can grow into an inferno that can overcome an entire city. So can an idea.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: You fear no inferno when you are born amidst flames. It's another flesh wound, another lasting burn. Carry them with you.
quotes.author: Renee Ruin

quotes.quote: The inferno of the living is not something that will be; if there is one, it is what is already here, the inferno where we live every day, that we form by being together. There are two ways to escape suffering it. The first is easy for many: accept the inferno and become such a part of it that you can no longer see it. The second is risky and demands constant vigilance and apprehension: seek and learn to recognize who and what, in the midst of inferno, are not inferno, then make them endure, give them space.
quotes.author: Italo Calvino

quotes.quote: Heaven, to keep its beauty, cast them out, but even Hell itself would not receive them for fear the wicked there might glory over them.
quotes.author: Canto III

quotes.quote: One should cultivate good habits of memory, for it is capable of making existence a Paradise or an Inferno.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: It has always been this way. Death is followed by birth. To reach paradise, man must pass through inferno.
quotes.author: Bertrand Zobrist

quotes.quote: How can we extinguish a fire if we don't first cut off the fuel that ignites the inferno?
quotes.author: Arun Manilal Gandhi

quotes.quote: A time of darkness, despair, disillusion-so black only the inferno of the human mind can be-symbolic death, and numb shock-then the painful agony of slow rebirth and psychic regeneration.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Look on the bright side: if you cause an inferno, you can always put it out with a tidal wave.
quotes.author: Sarah Alderson

quotes.quote: An idea is a mental spark, a mindset is a mental inferno.
quotes.author: Danny Dover

quotes.quote: It begins with a spark that ignites into an inferno, and while a spark is harmless, an inferno almost always burns. You are the spark, Rose.
quotes.author: Caprice Rose

quotes.quote: Hell was invented to scare to death the unruly human mind and bring it to obedience.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: The darkest places in hell are reserved for those who maintain their neutrality in times of moral crisis.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Soon the inferno will cease, leaving behind ashes here. And from the ashes will rise a new world for me to see.
quotes.author: Rohit Vuppuluri

quotes.quote: We are master alchemists: We may not have discovered how to make gold out of lead, but we are able to make heaven out of hell, hell out of heaven, and purgatory out of nothing.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: Purgatory surpasses heaven and hell in poetry, because it represents a future and the others do not.
quotes.author: Francois-Rene de Chateaubriand

quotes.quote: Purgatory is hell with hope.
quotes.author: Philip José Farmer

quotes.quote: What is hell? I maintain that it is the suffering of being unable to love.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: We are each our own devil, and we make this world our hell.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Purgatory fire will be more intolerable than all the torments that can be felt or conceived in this life.
quotes.author: Venerable Bede

quotes.quote: The ecclesiastical description of Hell is that of a horrible place of fire and torment; in Dante's Inferno, and in northern climes, it was thought to be an icy cold region, a giant refrigerator.
quotes.author: Anton Szandor LaVey

quotes.quote: Apparently some people were knocked down and crushed in the stampede as they rushed to get out of the inferno.
quotes.author: Rajiv Sabharwal

quotes.quote: The fire of Purgatory is the same as the fire of Hell; the difference between them is that the fire of Purgatory is not everlasting.
quotes.author: Saint John Vianney

quotes.quote: But if someone's work is burned up, that one will suffer loss; the person will be saved, but only as through fire.
quotes.author: Corinthians 3:15

quotes.quote: Over the past several months, Amelía’s Google history had become a reference of her despair: “can’t have children, reasons for infertility in women, reasons for infertility in men, discussing infertility with husband, price of surrogate mothers, signs of depression, adoption agencies, infertility support groups…
quotes.author: Jake Vander Ark

quotes.quote: It’s not that motherhood is out of reach, it’s that it’s just out of reach. It’s not that motherhood didn’t happen, it’s that it almost did and, in fact, still could. The difference between the grief of infertility and other reasons for mourning - the loss of a spouse, for example - is in that promise of ‘just,’ in ‘almost,’ in ‘still could.
quotes.author: Alexandra Kimball

quotes.quote: For many men it is very difficult to accept and understand Infertility. They think only women can be infertile. They do not understand or want to understand that there may be a deficiency in men.
quotes.author: Ravi Ranjan Goswami

quotes.quote: Women often endure infertility, pregnancy, infant loss, miscarriages, and stillbirths in isolation, because while sadness is a socially palatable response to these often life-altering events, rage, frustration, jealousy, and guilt are not.
quotes.author: Soraya Chemaly

quotes.quote: The life an infertile person seeks comes to her not by accident and not by fate but by hard-fought choices. How to put together the portfolio of photographs. How to answer at the home study.
quotes.author: Belle Boggs

quotes.quote: It is a beautiful, well-groomed woman standing at the counter and selling jewellery to you. It is a girl running a flower stall. It is your neighbour who greets you daily in the lift. It is a woman who works with you in an office. It is your French teacher. It is an Instagram girl who moved to live by the sea. It is the girl who sat next to you in the underground. It is a woman who just walked past you on the street. It is a relative with whom you haven't been speaking for ten years. These infertile women are among us. This woman is me.”
quotes.author: Karina Savaryna

quotes.quote: Coping with infertility is a process and if you rush to move forward before you are ready it may set you backwards in the long run. Allow yourself to process everything you are feeling.
quotes.author: Greg

quotes.quote: Whatever magically potent and proliferating; or the most tautologically destructive battlefields of egregiously evaporating infertility; on the mist of this gigantically undefeated Universe,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: whenever it wanted to deliriously embrace the apocalypses of invidious infertility,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: how dare did you ever think that she was nothing else but a thorn of disdainfully crippling infertility and diabolically impotent?
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Give me perpetual infertility O! Almighty Lord; but please don't curse me ever with the preposterous prowess; of not being able to enjoy;
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: An idle flesh; is the impotently lackadaisical and menacingly incarcerating infertility's; favorite workshop.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: An idle flesh; is the impotently lackadaisical and menacingly incarcerating infertility's; favorite workshop.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Research shows that a woman who has a history of depression is twice as likely to subsequently experience infertility as a woman with no history of depression.
quotes.author: Alice Domar

quotes.quote: I was not going to put my body or spirit through any more infertility treatments. It's crazy for me to do that when there are so many children out there that need love and a home.
quotes.author: Melissa Harwell

quotes.quote: Infertility is a loss. It's the loss of a dream. It's the loss of an assumed future. And, like every loss, it will be grieved.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are thin girls with infertility issues, normal sized girls with infertility issues and overweight girls with infertility issues. Unless your doctor tells you your weight is affecting you in some way...once the doctor rules it out, that's really not it.
quotes.author: Giuliana Rancic

quotes.quote: We had been through so much, infertility and chemicals and treatments . . . and that was very emotional for my wife.
quotes.author: Jeff Atkinson

quotes.quote: They go through all of this (infertility treatments) without any guarantee that they will have a child at the end of the process. The process has taken a financial, physical and emotional toll.
quotes.author: Sandy Destrampe

quotes.quote: Oh, what a power is motherhood, possessingA potent spell. All women alikeFight fiercely for a child.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Every aspect of my being was challenged: my self-worth, my femininity, my profession, my marriage, my faith.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Getting pregnant wasn't easy, and I found that devastating. I really beat myself up for waiting so long when I'd always wanted children and family had been the basis of my happiness my whole life.
quotes.author: Emily Procter

quotes.quote: Infertility is this huge emotional roller coaster. If you want in your heart more than anything to have a baby, it's the hardest thing you will ever go through physically, emotionally, and financially.
quotes.author: Cindy Margolis

quotes.quote: One-third of all female infertility is the result of blocked fallopian tubes. If fertilization could be done in the lab and then the fertilized egg implanted in the womb, it would get around that problem. Millions of women who cannot have children would suddenly be able to.
quotes.author: James D. Watson

quotes.quote: An idle flesh; is the impotently lackadaisical and menacingly incarcerating infertility's; favorite workshop.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: but to irrefutably ensure that the passion brilliantly transformed every speck of infertility into the chapters of everlastingly Omniscient procreation; was what the Almighty Creator had created it for.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: It was a countless times better to die this very minute; than to suffer an infinite deaths of inanely meaningless infertility; an infinite times every unfurling instant of compassionately destined life,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: that clean bowled the stumps of ignominiously impeding infertility; in my criminally nonchalant life,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: How Omnipresently virile was the Seed; can truly be realized only in the treacherously forlorn and ludicrously obsolete; graveyards of infertility,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: An infinite fortnights of timelessly blessing sensuousness; An infinite carcasses of ludicrously sordid infertility; inconsolably weeping all the time.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Going through years-long infertility struggles is not for the faint of heart. It can either make or break your marital relationship. Make the determined commitment that no matter what happens, you and your husband were…and are a couple first.
quotes.author: Garth J. O. Fletcher

quotes.quote: What men call gallantry, and gods adultery, is much more common where the climate's sultry.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Every man wants a woman to appeal to his better side, his nobler instincts and his higher nature -- and another woman to help him forget them.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: You may build castles in the air, and fume, and fret, and grow thin and lean, and pale and ugly, if you please. But I tell you, no man worth having is true to his wife, or can be true to his wife, or ever was, or will be so.
quotes.author: Sir John Vanbrugh

quotes.quote: The cruelest lies are often told in silence.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: When you betray somebody else, you also betray yourself.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: The nurse of infidelity is sensuality.
quotes.author: Lord David Cecil

quotes.quote: It is necessary to the happiness of man that he be mentally faithful to himself. Infidelity does not consist in believing or in disbelieving; it consists in professing to believe what he does not believe.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: When love becomes labored we welcome an act of infidelity towards ourselves to free us from fidelity.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Wives in their husbands' absences grow subtler, and daughters sometimes run off with the butler.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: The new infidelity is between people who unwittingly form deep, passionate connections before realizing that they've crossed the line from platonic friendship into romantic love. Infidelity is any emotional or sexual intimacy that violates trust.
quotes.author: Shirley Glass

quotes.quote: It's easy to deny the seriousness of an emotional affair but it can be extremely threatening to a marriage.
quotes.author: Dr. Gail on MSNBC

quotes.quote: Why go out for hamburger when you have steak at home?
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: A woman one loves rarely suffices for all our needs, so we deceive her with another whom we do not love.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Those who are faithful know only the trivial side of love: it is the faithless who know love's tragedies.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: We always deceive ourselves twice about the people we love - first to their advantage, then to their disadvantage.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Never tell a loved one of an infidelity: you would be badly rewarded for your troubles. Although one dislikes being deceived, one likes even less to be undeceived.
quotes.author: Ninon de Lenclos

quotes.quote: You have heard it said, 'Do not commit adultery'. But I tell you that anyone who looks at a woman lustfully has already committed adultery with her in his heart.
quotes.author: Matthew 5:27, Bible

quotes.quote: Tis' my opinion that every man cheats in his own way, and he is only honest who is not discovered.
quotes.author: Susannah Centlivre

quotes.quote: Where cheating is, there's mischief there.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: When I'm not near the girl I love, I love the girl I'm near.
quotes.author: E.Y. Harburg

quotes.quote: Unfaithfulness ought to extinguish love, and we should not be jealous when there is reason to be. Only those who give no grounds f or jealousy are worthy of it.
quotes.author: Francois La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: When a man must force himself to be faithful in his love, this is hardly better than unfaithfulness.
quotes.author: Francois La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Infidelity in woman is a masculine trait
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: Physical infidelity is the signal, the notice given, that all fidelities are undermined.
quotes.author: Katherine Anne Porter

quotes.quote: People who are so dreadfully "devoted" to their wives are so apt, from mere habit, to get devoted to other people's wives as well.
quotes.author: Jane Welsh Carlyle

quotes.quote: Wise married women don't trouble themselves about infidelity in their husbands.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I don't want to sell myself short. You hurt your spouse, not so much by the infidelity, but by the negative feelings about yourself that you bring home.
quotes.author: Michael Zaslow

quotes.quote: Infidelity gives nothing in return for what it takes away. What, then, is it worth? Everything valuable as a compensating power. Not a blade of grass that withers, or the ugliest weed that is flung away to rot and die, but reproduces something.
quotes.author: Thomas Chalmers

quotes.quote: Infidelity, like death, admits of no degrees.
quotes.author: Madame Delphine Gay de Girardin

quotes.quote: Infidelity does not discriminate--it affects people of all races, all religions, and all genders and sexual orientations. It is an intensely emotional topic, and nearly every adult has been affected by it or knows someone who has.
quotes.author: Scott Haltzman

quotes.quote: Infidelity doesn't just touch people's lives, it sends shockwaves through their lives.
quotes.author: Scott Haltzman

quotes.quote: Infidelity is not about building relationship. It's about release.
quotes.author: Scott Haltzman

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is the final phase and brings closure to the affair. Forgiveness goes in both directions, and it important for couples whose marriage ends as well for those who resolve their issues and move ahead together.
quotes.author: Emily M. Brown

quotes.quote: Infidelity is a leading cause of divorce. Romantic betrayal can be so devastating that it leads to suicide, homicide, and other crimes of passion.
quotes.author: Kenneth Paul Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Infidelity exists in a context--in a couple and in a family with its own particular array of hopes and disappointments, triumphs and tragedies.
quotes.author: Kenneth Paul Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Infidelity can hit a family like a cluster bomb.
quotes.author: Kenneth Paul Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Cheating is an equal-opportunity enterprise, affecting people of all socioeconomic groups, races, religions, sexual orientations, and marital arrangements.
quotes.author: Kenneth Paul Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Cheating ends up wrecking multiple relationships and actually eroding our confidence and sense of self.
quotes.author: Kenneth Paul Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Cheaters may feel good when they cheat. They may even gain from it. But that seems beside the point. Cheating is unfair to others. And many do not know how to make it stop.
quotes.author: Bonnie Szumski

quotes.quote: Cheaters cheat for the same reason hey have always cheated. They want to do better than they deserve to. Many try to avoid responsibility for cheating.
quotes.author: Bonnie Szumski

quotes.quote: Both men and women cheat. However, men are more likely than women to cheat because it is our tendency to think we want more than we have in one woman.
quotes.author: Kevin Rasberry

quotes.quote: Cheating is the largest cause of divorce in world history, evolving over generations and remaining as relative to the time in which we live today, as it did in centuries part.
quotes.author: Maxwell Billieo

quotes.quote: This is not to say that there is no man for you, ladies, but simply to bring you to the reality that for true happiness, it's not just men who have to stop cheating on you; you also have to stop cheating yourself.
quotes.author: Maxwell Billieo

quotes.quote: Women are able ot get away with their cheating because no one suspects them. They are good mothers who are always at their kid's events. They are wives supporting their husbands. When outsiders see these women, they are happy, laughing and loving towards their family. These women are able to to get away with cheating because of this very perception.
quotes.author: Terry Azzouz MA LPC LSOTP

quotes.quote: Cheating can assist not just in living an unconventional life, but also in redeveloping your individuality and courage to end the current relationship and move one with confidence that you know what you want and have made the best decision for yourself.
quotes.author: Marleen Marylin Mour

quotes.quote: The act of cheating is something to be seriously considered and thoroughly thought over with trepidation and logic before committing.
quotes.author: Marleen Marylin Mour

quotes.quote: Men and women who have recently discovered that their partner is cheating report experiencing a whole range of emotions, including anger, fear, pain, and humiliation.
quotes.author: Caroline Jackson

quotes.quote: Cheating is an inescapable part of the human condition. Some of us are more comfortable that others acknowledging this fact, but it's still fact , plain and simple.
quotes.author: Jessica Dorfman Jones

quotes.quote: Cheating of any kind can be a moral dilemma for most people. Even so, it's much easier to rationalize small lie or lies of convenience, while the big ones can eat away at you.
quotes.author: Jessica Dorfman Jones

quotes.quote: All things being equal, the more individual free time people have the more likely they are to cheat.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: People with a dismissing style of attachment, are more likely to cheat.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: Infidelity is more common in relationships where people feel misunderstood, under appreciated and where fighting and bickering is common.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: Some people, due to their position in society, their beliefs about gender roles, and their cultural upbringing, believe that it is their right to cheat on their partners.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: Whether your goal is to save your marriage or divorce your unfaithful spouse, you need to keep a level head and develop good coping strategies.
quotes.author: C.V. Conner

quotes.quote: Cheat me once, you ought to be ashamed; cheat me twice, I ought to be ashamed.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Doubtless the pleasure is as great of being cheated, as to cheat.
quotes.author: Sarah Josepha Buell Hale

quotes.quote: Love is a game in which one always cheats.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: It was all a mistake / Now I've got yo fight to win your love back / I give this all it would take / Never meant to cheat behind your back.
quotes.author: Ola Josiah

quotes.quote: If you cheat now out of revenge, you might do things you could regret later.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: When you cheat, you first say 'No' to your existing couple and 'Yes' to a new connection.
quotes.author: Francisco Bujan

quotes.quote: Cheating is anything that you would not do in front of your mate.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: Emotional cheating can occur without physical cheating and is also harder to detect when no physical acts are taking place.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: A cheating mate who has an emotional connection with another person ordinarily leaves their partner feeling betrayed when their emotional relationship is revealed.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: Many marriages failed is due to broken vows and broken promises and when this lead to the downfall of a marriage; you may start to feel that you cannot trust others.
quotes.author: Beatrice Ivory

quotes.quote: Cheating is the ultimate form of betrayal of trust to the relationship that you are breaking the very reason why you are together.
quotes.author: Gabriel Angelo

quotes.quote: Cheating can be tricky. You can notice it from jump, or you may not see any changes at all.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: A typical man will cheat, because for some reason he thinks that he can get away with it.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: When a man is not ready to commit to you, he will most likely cheat.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: Women you know that if your significant other has cheated on you before chances are he will do it again. You cannot expect for him to avoid trying what he has gotten by with before a second time.
quotes.author: Sierra N. Smith

quotes.quote: Most people do not set out to cheat; their personal dissatisfaction gets the best of them.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: Many men succumb faster to temptation when they are married than committed women do even if they are desired.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: Most times, serial cheaters cheat with persons that are not as attractive or even in the same intellectual or social league as their life partners.
quotes.author: Chidi Asika-Enahoro

quotes.quote: A victim of infidelity can become completely overwhelmed with trying to figure out why their mate has been disloyal. Victims often become obsessed with attempting to find an answer when there could be several answers or none at all.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: Cheaters come in all ages, shapes, sizes, and colors. They are not limited to a particular race, religion, or financial status. All types of people cheat. Rich ones, poor ones, ugly ones, pretty ones. fat ones, skinny ones, tall ones.. all types of people cheat.
quotes.author: Tonja Ayers

quotes.quote: Children whose parents cheated are frequently unable to enjoy a healthy relationship because they are plagued by a profound lack of trust, an attraction to partners who cheat, or a proclivity toward infidelity themselves.
quotes.author: Ana Nogales

quotes.quote: Whatever their age, children whose parents have been unfaithful are often pressured to become the caretaker of the betrayed parent, thus adding to the son's or daughter's emotional stress.
quotes.author: Ana Nogales

quotes.quote: When an adult child's family baggage includes lies, cheating, and the breaking of promises, they may have a particularly hard time navigating the rough waters of dating and marriage.
quotes.author: Ana Nogales

quotes.quote: Millions of adults and children are grappling with the emotional crises that parental infidelity ushers in.
quotes.author: Ana Nogales

quotes.quote: Infidelity is a fact of life in both the real and virtual worlds, and it often makes the headlines when powerful people are involved.
quotes.author: Ana Nogales

quotes.quote: There is one simple act of transgressions that can rob a couple of their relationship, their happiness, their very identity: an affair. Yet this extremely common act is poorly understood.
quotes.author: Esther Perel

quotes.quote: Affairs have a lot to teach us about relationships--what we expect, what we think we want, and what we feel entitled to. They offer a unique window into our personal and cultural attitudes about love, lust, and commitment.
quotes.author: Esther Perel

quotes.quote: Infidelity happens in good marriages, in bad marriages, and even when adultery is punishable by death. It happens in open relationships where extramarital sex is carefully negotiated beforehand.
quotes.author: Esther Perel

quotes.quote: Infidelity is one of the most destructive and common crises that couples face and one of the most difficult relationship problem to treat.
quotes.author: Donald H. Baucom

quotes.quote: Restoring trust and security in a marriage after infidelity is difficult enough, but it becomes even more challenging when the requisite skills of exchanging intimate feelings and negotiating the resolution of relationship conflicts are deficient.
quotes.author: Donald H. Baucom

quotes.quote: Remember your connection with the cosmos. Remember your connection with the infinity and that remembrance will give you the freedom.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: When you have the power to love, that strength, that courage is infinite; that love is infinite. There is nothing finite about it's presence, for love. never. dies.
quotes.author: Solange nicole

quotes.quote: If you bow only to the infinite that is within you. You will stand in front of the entire world.
quotes.author: Emmanuelle Soni-Dessaigne

quotes.quote: By reaching for infinity, you reach the core of yourself.
quotes.author: Talismanist Giebra

quotes.quote: The idea of infinity cannot be expressed in words or even described, but it can be apprehended through art, which makes infinity tangible. The absolute is only attainable through faith and in the creative act.
quotes.author: Andrei Tarkovsky

quotes.quote: Infinity is the end. End without infinity is but a new beginning.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: The infinity of the universe is a great blessing for human beings, because human beings’ desire to discover is also infinite!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Sometimes we need a wise guide to peel back the ceiling of our lives to remind us that infinity never places any limits on our skies.
quotes.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quotes.quote: It's not whether your love is temporary or has infinity. It's about the feeling of infinity when you're in love
quotes.author: Talismanist Giebra

quotes.quote: Life is not about finding our limitations, it's about finding our infinity.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is contained in every single expression of life. It is present in the infinity of forms and phenomena that exist in all of creation.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Your limits are somewhere up there, waiting for you to reach beyond infinity.
quotes.author: Arnold Henry

quotes.quote: In this unbelievable universe in which we live, there are no absolutes. Even parallel lines, reaching into infinity, meet somewhere yonder.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Humanity is made up of an infinity of different individuals. Each of us travels for motives exclusively his own.
quotes.author: Ella Maillart

quotes.quote: Every idea, extended into infinity, becomes its own opposite.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: Infinity converts the possible into the inevitable.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: What does infinity mean to you? Are you not infinity and yourself?
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: The Way is deep and broad and in all directions? Infinity.
quotes.author: Leland Lewis

quotes.quote: The thirst for the infinite proves infinity.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The word or symbol infinity represents something that is seemingly ongoing, never ending, beyond calculation.
quotes.author: Stephen J Willis

quotes.quote: Gods wisdom exceeds infinity.
quotes.author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quotes.quote: All the beautiful roads are infinite because beauty gives us the feeling of infinity!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Seeing eye to an eye is a must, especially when there lies a case, or an intent, to meet; even by infinity
quotes.author: Priyavrat Thareja

quotes.quote: Certainty is absence of infinity, infinity is presence of uncertainty.
quotes.author: Nanamoli Bhikkhu

quotes.quote: The final end of Eternity, and the beginning of Infinity
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Hold infinity in the palm of your hand.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Have you ever once in your life reached out to touch infinity?
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: Yes, if you're looking for infinity, just close your eyes!
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: There can be no centre in infinity.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: At the same time, as social beings, we are moved in the relations with our fellow beings by such feelings as sympathy, pride, hate, need for power, pity, and so on.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Setting an example is not the main means of influencing another, it is the only means.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Example is not the main thing in influencing others. It is the only thing.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: I hold that a strongly marked personality can influence descendants for generations.
quotes.author: Beatrix Potter

quotes.quote: Neither a man nor a crowd nor a nation can be trusted to act humanely or to think sanely under the influence of a great fear.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The time has come for all evangelists to practice full financial disclosure. The world is watching how we walk and how we talk. We must have the highest standards of morality ethics and integrity if we are to continue to have influence.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: There is no power on earth that can neutralize the influence of a high, simple and useful life.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Be selective about your external influences. Your multi-dimensional brain is influenced by everything you see, hear, read, smell, touch, feel or say.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The serene, silent beauty of a holy life is the most powerful influence in the world, next to the might of the Spirit of God.
quotes.author: C.H. Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Poor people cannot rely on the government to come to help you in times of need. You have to get your education. Then nobody can control your destiny.
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.quote: It takes tremendous discipline to control the influence, the power you have over other people's lives.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: From the loving example of one family a whole State may become loving, and from its courtesies, courteous; while from the ambition and perverseness of the one man the whole State may be thrown into rebellious disorder. Such is the nature of influence.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Influence is no respecter of education or experience; it goes only with the one who will set aside his status - be it high and mighty or low and lowly - and put himself in the place of another.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Because everything we say and do is the length and shadow of our own souls, our influence is determined by the quality of our being.
quotes.author: Dale E. Turner

quotes.quote: The way you think, the way you behave, the way you eat, can influence your life by 30 to 50 years.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: I suggest that the only books that influence us are those for which we are ready, and which have gone a little farther down our particular path than we have yet got ourselves.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: There is a boundary to men’s passions when they act from feelings; but none when they are under the influence of imagination.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The only real influence I’ve ever had was myself.
quotes.author: Edward Hopper

quotes.quote: He who influences the thought of his times, influences all the times that follow. He has made his impress on eternity.
quotes.author: Hypatia

quotes.quote: It would be difficult to exaggerate the degree to which we are influenced by those we influence.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Example, whether it be good or bad, has a powerful influence.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: My mother told me I was dancing before I was born. She could feel my toes tapping wildly inside her for months.
quotes.author: Ginger Rogers

quotes.quote: Every life is a profession of faith, and exercises an inevitable and silent influence.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: A young painter who cannot liberate himself from the influence of past generations is digging his own grave.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: The humblest individual exerts some influence, either for good or evil, upon others.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The most hateful human misfortune is for a wise man to have no influence.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: The most powerful moral influence is example.
quotes.author: Huston Smith

quotes.quote: Influence is the prerogative of great minds.
quotes.author: J. Wesley

quotes.quote: The words that a father speaks to his children in the privacy of home are not heard by the world, but as in whispering galleries, they are clearly heard at the end and by posterity.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Get around people who have something of value to share with you. Their impact will continue to have a significant effect on your life long after they have departed.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Attitude is greatly shaped by influence and association.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: A person always doing his or her best becomes a natural leader, just by example.
quotes.author: JOe DiMaggio

quotes.quote: We are like chameleons, we take our hue and the color of our moral character, from those who are around us.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: For the bureaucrat, the world is a mere object to be manipulated by him.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: And as we let our own light shine we unconsciously give other people the permission to do the same.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Sometimes, if you want to change a man's mind, you have to change the mind of the man next to him first.
quotes.author: Megan Whalen Turner

quotes.quote: As athletes, we're used to reacting quickly. Here, it's 'come, stop, come, stop. There's a lot of downtime. That's the toughest part of the day.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Think twice before you speak, because your words and influence will plant the seed of either success or failure in the mind of another.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: A return to first principles in a republic is sometimes caused by the simple virtues of one man. His good example has such an influence that the good men strive to imitate him, and the wicked are ashamed to lead a life so contrary to his example.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The influential man is the successful man, whether he be rich or poor.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: I don’t believe in learning from other people’s pictures. I think you should learn from your own interior vision of things and discover, as I say, innocently, as though there had never been anybody.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: No star ever rose and set without influence somewhere.
quotes.author: Owen Meredith

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: God, how we get our fingers in each other's clay. That's friendship, each playing the potter to see what shapes we can make of each other.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: I mean the idea that influence is simply what results when power is successfully exercised or, more generally, that power is something one 'has', and influence is something that 'happens' when power is somehow used.
quotes.author: Ruth Zimmerling

quotes.quote: Every art, like our own, has in it's composition fluctuating as well as fixed principles. It is an attentive inquiry into their difference that will enable us to determine how far we are influenced by custom and habit, and what is fixed in the nature of things.
quotes.author: Sir Joshua Reynolds

quotes.quote: When it comes to developing character strength, inner security and unique personal and interpersonal talents and skills in a child, no institution can or ever will compare with, or effectively substitute for, the home’s potential for positive influence.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Apparently, the most difficult feat for a Cambridge male is to accept a woman not merely as feeling, not merely as thinking, but as managing a complex, vital interweaving of both.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: People exercise an unconscious selection in being influenced.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Anyone who has the power to make you believe absurdities has the power to make you commit injustices.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Movies can and do have tremendous influence in shaping young lives in the realm of entertainment towards the ideals and objectives of normal adulthood.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Ideas are the mightiest influence on earth. One great thought breathed into a man may regenerate him.
quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

quotes.quote: The influence of each human being on others in this life is a kind of immortality.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You can be much more influential if people are not aware of your influence.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are two parts to influence: First, influence is powerful; and second, influence is subtle. You wouldn't let someone push you off course, but you might let someone nudge you off course and not even realize it.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the influence you have on others.
quotes.author: Laurie Buchanan

quotes.quote: No influence is so powerful as that of the mother.
quotes.author: Sarah Josepha Hale

quotes.quote: We never know which lives we influence, or when, or why.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Nothing has a greater influence over your life than your thoughts rather they are negative or positive.
quotes.author: Tasha Hoggatt

quotes.quote: It is easier to influence strong than weak characters in life.
quotes.author: Margot Asquith

quotes.quote: Never mistake the power of influence.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Various influences - our parents, other family members, teachers, books we've read, discussions we've had, life experiences - all merge together to form our core values.
quotes.author: Maya Green

quotes.quote: You cannot antagonize and influence at the same time.
quotes.author: J. S. Knox

quotes.quote: Influence is to be measured, not by the extent of surface it covers, but by its kind.
quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

quotes.quote: The future influences the present just as much as the past.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Influence is like a savings account, the less you use it, the more you've got.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: Sometimes the most influential thing we can do is listen.
quotes.author: Bob Burg

quotes.quote: Influence is having people follow you because of what you represent.
quotes.author: Paul Larsen

quotes.quote: The secret of my influence has always been that it remained secret.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Unleash your influence not authority.
quotes.author: Joseph Wong

quotes.quote: Influence may be the highest level of human skills.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You don't have to be a "person of influence" to be influential. In fact, the most influential people in my life are probably not even aware of the things they've taught me.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: You will only have influence and power in the field of your gifts and talents.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Your influence on others is your net worth, treat it as such.
quotes.author: Peprah Boasiako

quotes.quote: You will never influence the world by trying to be like it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Having influence is not about elevating self, but about lifting others.
quotes.author: Sheri Dew

quotes.quote: Influence: What you think you have until you try to use it.
quotes.author: Joan Walsh Anglund

quotes.quote: Influence is when you are not the one talking and yet your words fill the room; when you are absent and yet your presence is felt everywhere.
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.quote: In order to have influence, you have to be influenced.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: because to influence a person is to give one's own soul.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Influence is our inner ability to lift people up to our perspective.
quotes.author: Joseph Wong

quotes.quote: You can't influence somebody when you're judging them.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The best way for us to perhaps influence others is to instead focus on ourselves by doing our best - then others will be influenced from our leadership by example.
quotes.author: Lisa Kardos

quotes.quote: Your real influence is measured by your treatment of yourself.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson

quotes.quote: Every one has a level of influence that can be harnessed for greater good.
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: There's no way to know how many people your life will influence. You don't know who is watching, listening, or learning from you.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: The purpose of influence is to "speak up for those who have no influence.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Influence is exerted by every human being from the hour of birth to that of death.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quotes.quote: You can't influence people you refuse to associate with.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Don't ask me who's influenced me. A lion is made up of all the lambs he's digested, and I've been reading all my life.
quotes.author: Giorgos Seferis

quotes.quote: You earn influence by giving value and attention to other people. BE USEFUL!
quotes.author: Laura Fitton

quotes.quote: There is no influence like the influence of habit.
quotes.author: Gilbert Parker

quotes.quote: Influence is no Government.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Children are more influenced by sermons you act than by sermons you preach.
quotes.author: David McKay

quotes.quote: So the only way on earth to influence the other fellow is to talk about what he wants and show him how to get it.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Your circle of influence dictates your path.
quotes.author: Jon Bielecki

quotes.quote: We determine how much influence we'll have, when we decide how available we'll be.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: Our level of influence is not the same with everyone.
quotes.author: John C Maxwell

quotes.quote: It is more important to influence people than to impress them.
quotes.author: Adrian Rogers

quotes.quote: An objection is not a rejection; it is simply a request for more information.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Information, usually seen as the precondition of debate, is better understood as its by-product.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: Information defines your personality, your memories, your skills.
quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

quotes.quote: Information is seldom enough to heal a wounded heart.
quotes.author: Tullian Tchividjian

quotes.quote: The information we need is not available. The information we want is not what we need. The information we have is not what we want.
quotes.author: John Peers

quotes.quote: Information is the resolution of uncertainty.
quotes.author: Claude Shannon

quotes.quote: Data is not information, information is not knowledge, knowledge is not understanding, understanding is not wisdom.
quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

quotes.quote: With so much information now online, it is exceptionally easy to simply dive in and drown.
quotes.author: Alfred Glossbrenner

quotes.quote: Information is the mortar that both builds and destroys empires.
quotes.author: Tobsha Learner

quotes.quote: Information is expanding daily. How to get it out visually is important.
quotes.author: John Maeda

quotes.quote: Information is the key to success, anywhere and everywhere. Right information matters the most. This applies to your work place too.
quotes.author: Abhishek Ratna

quotes.quote: Information is recorded in vast interconnecting networks. Each idea or image has hundreds, perhaps thousands, of associations and is connected to numerous other points in the mental network.
quotes.author: Peter Russell

quotes.quote: Information is the oxygen of the modern age. It seeps through the walls topped by barbed wire, it wafts across the electrified borders.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Information is a difference that makes a difference. Truth is information that doesn't change and self referential noise is a difference that doesn't make a difference.
quotes.author: R.A.Delmonico

quotes.quote: Information can be treated like any other quantity and be subjected to the manipulation of a machine.
quotes.author: Stan Aogartem

quotes.quote: The control of information is something the elite always does, particularly in a despotic form of government. Information, knowledge, is power. If you can control information, you can control people.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Information theory began as a bridge from mathematics to electrical engineering and from there to computing.
quotes.author: James Gleick

quotes.quote: Information is like compost; it does no good unless you spread it around
quotes.author: Eliot Coleman

quotes.quote: The notion that information is enough, that more and more information is enough, that you don't have to think, you just have to get more information - gets very dangerous.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: Information may travel at light speed, but meaning spreads at the speed of dark.
quotes.author: Richard Powers

quotes.quote: Information imposes certain criteria on how it can be stored.
quotes.author: John Maynard Smith

quotes.quote: Information and knowledge: two currencies that have never gone out of style.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: All of the information in the universe is stored in the relationships not the material and like light, the information has no mass
quotes.author: R.A.Delmonico

quotes.quote: Withholding information is the essence of tyranny. Control of the flow of information is the tool of the dictatorship.
quotes.author: Bruce Coville

quotes.quote: There is a principle which is a bar against all information, which is proof against all argument and which cannot fail to keep a man in everlasting ignorance. This principle is contempt prior to examination.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: Information's pretty thin stuff unless mixed with experience.
quotes.author: Clarence Day

quotes.quote: Information is antifragile; it feeds more on attempts to harm it than it does on efforts to promote it.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Information storage has to take place at the unconscious level.
quotes.author: Paul G. Thomas

quotes.quote: Information may inform the mind, but revelation sets a heart on fire.
quotes.author: Matt Redman

quotes.quote: New information makes new and fresh ideas possible.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Information can tell us everything. It has all the answers. But they are answers to questions we have not asked, and which doubtless don't even arise.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Everything we care about lies somewhere in the middle, where pattern and randomness interlace.
quotes.author: James Gleick

quotes.quote: Getting information off the Internet is like taking a drink from a fire hydrant.
quotes.author: Mitchell Kapor

quotes.quote: The more information that's out there, the greater the returns to just being willing to sit down and apply yourself. Information isn't what's scarce; it's the willingness to do something with it.
quotes.author: Tyler Cowen

quotes.quote: Information is not knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The information you get from social media is not a substitute for academic discipline at all.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: When information which properly belongs to the public is systematically withheld by those in power, the people soon become ignorant of their own affairs, distrustful of those who manage them, and -- eventually -- incapable of determining their own destinies.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: Information about money is more important than money itself.
quotes.author: Walter Wriston

quotes.quote: Information is a negotiator's greatest weapon.
quotes.author: Victor Kiam

quotes.quote: It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data. Insensibly one begins to twist facts to suit theories, instead of theories to suit facts.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: All information is everywhere. Information that is not here is nowhere.
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: Information is a source of learning. But unless it is organized, processed, and available to the right people in a format for decision making, it is a burden, not a benefit.
quotes.author: William Pollard

quotes.quote: Information networks straddle the world. Nothing remains concealed. But the sheer volume of information dissolves the information. We are unable to take it all in.
quotes.author: Gunther Grass

quotes.quote: Information is what you put in empty heads to keep them empty.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Information doesn't mean a thing to people without inspiration.
quotes.author: Bernie Siegel

quotes.quote: Intelligence is not the ability to store information, but to know where to find it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Private information is practically the source of every large modern fortune.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There's so much information that there is disinformation.
quotes.author: Ferran Adria

quotes.quote: Information is acquired by being told, whereas knowledge can be acquired by thinking.
quotes.author: Fritz Machlup

quotes.quote: Information wants to be free.
quotes.author: Stewart Brand

quotes.quote: In the struggle for freedom of information, technology not politics will be the ultimate decider.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: If you accumulate enough gossip, it becomes information, and enough information can reveal the truth.
quotes.author: Robert L. Genva

quotes.quote: In the information society, nobody thinks. We expected to banish paper, but we actually banished thoughts.
quotes.author: Michael Chrichton's mathematician (Jurassic Park)

quotes.quote: Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: To live effectively is to live with adequate information.
quotes.author: Norbert Weiner

quotes.quote: So much has already been written about everything that you can't find out anything about it.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: I do sometimes wonder, though, whether the surfeit of information that we have is interfering with our ability to actually digest the information. It's not just the amount of information that's important, it's the context of that information and the ability and the time to actually sit and think and digest.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The volume of information flowing between machines now far exceeds the flow of information between human beings.
quotes.author: Gore

quotes.quote: Being flooded with information doesn't mean we have the right information or that we're in touch with the right people.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: There's always been a lot of information about your activities. Every phone number you dial, every credit card charge you make. It's long since passed that a typical person doesn't leave footprints.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Despite the continuing expansion or even explosion of information, there will forever be limits beyond which the devices of science cannot lead a man.
quotes.author: June Singer

quotes.quote: Where one merely seeks information, one should inquire of the man who hates, but if one wishes to know what truly is, one better ask the one who loves.
quotes.author: Hermann Broch

quotes.quote: Now that I do know it, I shall do my best to forget it.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: You will find it a very good practice to always verify your references, sir!
quotes.author: Martin Joseph Routh

quotes.quote: What is wanted is not the will to believe, but the wish to find out, which is its exact opposite
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: I'm not dumb. I just have a command of thoroughly useless information.
quotes.author: Bill Waterson

quotes.quote: It is a very sad thing that nowadays there is so little useless information.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Men more frequently require to be reminded than informed.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: What a culture we live in, we are swimming in an ocean of information, and drowning in ignorance.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: To bankrupt a fool, give him information.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: People today are in danger of drowning in information; but, because they have been taught that information is useful, they are more willing to drown than they need be. If they could handle information, they would not have to drown at all.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: We are no longer in the dispensation of age and experience. We are in the era of knowledge and information. Information leads a true leader and a true leader leads others.
quotes.author: Isarelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The purpose of collecting so much information can only be power.
quotes.author: Nick Drake

quotes.quote: Trade isn't about goods. Trade is about information. Goods sit in the warehouse until information moves them.
quotes.author: C.J. Cherryh

quotes.quote: More information is always better than less. When people know the reason things are happening, even if it's bad news, they can adjust their expectations and react accordingly. Keeping people in the dark only serves to stir negative emotions.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: It's not the things you don't know that trip you up. It's the things you think you know, but you don't. You fail to ask a certain question because you believe you know the answer. Separating your information from your assumptions can be a very tricky business.
quotes.author: Claudia Gray

quotes.quote: Information about the package is as important as the package itself.
quotes.author: Frederick W. Smith

quotes.quote: As a general rule, the most successful man in life is the man who has the best information.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.quote: Data is not useful until it becomes information.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Some believe all that parents, tutors, and kindred believe. They take their principles by inheritance, and defend them as they would their estates, because they are born heirs to them.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Bear in mind that the wonderful things you learn in your schools are the work of many generations. All this is put in your hands as your inheritance in order that you may receive it, honor it, add to it, and one day faithfully hand it on to your children.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Wealth is a dangerous inheritance, unless the inheritor is trained to active benevolence.
quotes.author: Charles Simmons

quotes.quote: By seeing all and discounting nothing, you may adapt without hesitation to any change. The warrior who can adapt the easiest to the unexpected is the warrior who will live the longest.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: If you want happiness for a year, inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime, help someone else.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: We should be ashamed of ourselves. We inherited the best infrastructure on the globe from our grandparents... and we've taken that inheritance and squandered it.
quotes.author: Cory Booker

quotes.quote: The richest inheritance any child can have is a stable, loving, disciplined family life.
quotes.author: Daniel Patrick Moynihan

quotes.quote: I don't want to leave my kids an inheritance, I want to leave them a legacy
quotes.author: Daymond John

quotes.quote: After all, we are not French and never can be, and any attempt to be so is to deny our inheritance and to try to impose upon ourselves a character that can be nothing but a veneer upon the surface.
quotes.author: Edward Hopper

quotes.quote: I had an inheritance from my father, It was the moon and the sun. And though I roam all over the world, The spending of it’s never done.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Children are the inheritance of the Lord to us in this life and also in eternity. Eternal life is not only to have forever our descendants from this life. It is also to have eternal increase.
quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.quote: Books are the treasured wealth of the world and the fit inheritance of generations and nations.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The finest inheritance you can give to a child is to allow it to make its own way, completely on its own feet.
quotes.author: Isadora Duncan

quotes.quote: The best inheritance a father can leave his children is a good example.
quotes.author: John Walter Bratton

quotes.quote: Experiences are savings which a miser puts aside. Wisdom is an inheritance which a wastrel cannot exhaust.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: A revolutionary party is, in its essence, the party of its leader that carries out his ideology and cause, and the main thing in its building is to ensure the unitary character and inheritance of his ideology and leadership.
quotes.author: Kim Jong-un

quotes.quote: I have also seen children successfully surmounting the effects of an evil inheritance. That is due to purity being an inherent attribute of the soul.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Every human being is born an heir to an inheritance to which he can succeed only in a process of learning.
quotes.author: Michael Joseph Oakeshott

quotes.quote: A son can bear with equanimity the loss of his father, but the loss of his inheritance may drive him to despair.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: There are historic situations in which refusal to defend the inheritance of a civilization, however imperfect, against tyranny and aggression may result in consequences even worse than war.
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.quote: Grooming a successor, is it an inheritance? In a democratic party, you don't want leaders appointed that way. They have to be appointed properly by the people.
quotes.author: Robert Mugabe

quotes.quote: You may not be able to leave your children a great inheritance, but day by day you may be weaving coats for them which they will wear through all eternity.
quotes.author: Theodore L. Cuyler

quotes.quote: We should not forget that it will be just as important to our descendants to be prosperous in their time as it is to us to be prosperous in our time.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Everybody gets everything handed to them. The rich inherit it. I don't mean just inheritance of money. I mean what people take for granted among the middle and upper classes, which is nepotism, the old-boy network.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: One shouldn't be afraid of the humans. Well, I am not afraid of the humans, but of what is inhuman in them.
quotes.author: Ivo Andric

quotes.quote: You don't have to teach people how to be human. You have to teach them how to stop being inhuman.
quotes.author: Eldridge Cleaver

quotes.quote: One of the fundamental reasons why so many doctors become cynical and disillusioned is precisely because, when the abstract idealism has worn thin, they are uncertain about the value of the actual lives of the patients they are treating. This is not because they are callous or personally inhuman: it is because they live in and accept a society which is incapable of knowing what a human life is worth.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: To exult over the miseries of an unhappy creature is inhuman.
quotes.author: Hugh Blair

quotes.quote: Behavior of such cunning cruelty that only a human being could have thought of or contrived it we call 'inhuman,' revealing thus some pathetic ideal standard for our species that survives all betrayals.
quotes.author: Rose Macaulay

quotes.quote: The truth of art keeps science from becoming inhuman, and the truth of science keeps art from becoming ridiculous.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Many times we refer to people who express hate or behave in a barbaric, savage 'inhuman' way as 'animals', but on closer inspection we can clearly see that this is in fact, an insult to animals.
quotes.author: Christina Engela

quotes.quote: It is inhuman to continue a war which could easily be ended.
quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, prisons try very hard to make us inhuman and unreal by denying our image, and thus our existence, to the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Chelsea Manning

quotes.quote: I think the international community should unite to fight such inhuman phenomena as terror attacks and the murder of totally innocent people.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: It is inhuman to bless where one is cursed
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There is nothing inhuman about an intelligent machine; it is indeed an expression of those superb intellectual capabilities that only human beings, of all the creatures on our planet, now possess
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Drove them at length to the most barbarous and inhuman methods of suppressing them, by the murder of their children
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.quote: Nothing in the nature around us is evil. This needs to be repeated since one of the human ways of talking oneself into inhuman acts is to cite the supposed cruelty of nature
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: We adore perfection because we can't have it; it would disgust us if we had it. Perfect is inhuman, because human is imperfect.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: It has been demonstrated that no system, not even the most inhuman, can continue to exist without an ideology.
quotes.author: Joe Slovo

quotes.quote: Poverty makes people sub-human Excess of wealth makes people inhuman
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: More than an end to war, we want an end to the beginning of all wars - yes, an end to this brutal, inhuman and thoroughly impractical method of settling the differences between governments.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The corruption of people is to behave in an inhuman way.
quotes.author: Allan Bullock

quotes.quote: We're talking about banning a procedure, not about a woman's right to choose. It's an inhuman act. It's not necessary.
quotes.author: Brian Joyce

quotes.quote: Confronted with the impossibility of remaining faithful to one's beliefs, and the equal impossibility of becoming free of them, one can be driven to the most inhuman excesses.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: When men are inhuman, take care not to feel towards them as they do towards other humans
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
quotes.author: Conrad Hilton

quotes.quote: In a word, what characterizes the spiritist revelation is that while divine in its origin and of the initiative of the Spirits, its elaboration is fruit of man's work.
quotes.author: Allan Kardec

quotes.quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Initiative is The Start of All Good Things. Your ship will never come in if you don't send any out. Have you ever found yourself dreaming, hoping, and waiting passively for things to change or for your life to get better?
quotes.author: Susan C. Young

quotes.quote: Initiative is doing the right thing without being told.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Accept the challenges so that you may feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.author: General George S. Patton, Jr

quotes.quote: Time is neutral and does not change things. With courage and initiative, leaders change things.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Initiative is key. Anybody who wants to be somebody is going to work as hard as they can to fulfill that dream.
quotes.author: Puff Daddy

quotes.quote: Without a sense of urgency, desire loses its value.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Initiative is to success what a lighted match is to a candle.
quotes.author: Orlando Aloysius Battista

quotes.quote: Take some initiative and snap outside of passivity; consistent small actions have impact.
quotes.author: Darren Rowse

quotes.quote: Initiative is doing the right things without being told.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Initiative can neither be created nor delegated. It can only spring from the self-determining individual, who decides that the wisdom of others is not always better than his own.
quotes.author: R Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Force yourself to simplify every initiative, every product, every marketing, everything you do.
quotes.author: Keith Rabois

quotes.quote: You've got to take the initiative and play your game. In a decisive set, confidence is the difference.
quotes.author: Chris Evert

quotes.quote: For change to happen in any community, the initiative must come from the individual.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Initiative is as essential to success as a hub is essential to a wagon wheel.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Initiative is the essence of manhood. Noting comes to the man who is passive, except failure.
quotes.author: Dennis Rainey

quotes.quote: Initiative is the privilege of picking yourself.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Begin to take the initiative when you want to meet someone new. Be the one who steps forward first. Simply say hello and begin a conversation.
quotes.author: Susan C. Young

quotes.quote: One has to take initiative in life to achieve what he or she wants.
quotes.author: Donald Johanson

quotes.quote: Without initiative, leaders are simply workers in leadership positions.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Initiative without action is the same as having the mind to acknowledge a problem, but not having the heart to see it through.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Even when other people don't expect a lot out of you,you have to take the initiative.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.quote: If initiative is the ability to do the right thing, then efficiency is the ability to do the thing right.
quotes.author: Kelly Miller

quotes.quote: Never interrupt someone doing something you said couldn't be done.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: An initiative was essentially led by civil society because the policy of the government was that Africans must not be taught to graze in pastures which were reserved for the main white group.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: It is a good initiative for the dreams that would change one society to be nursed in another environment, before being transplanted to strive in its original environment for the change process to begin!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Initiating is really and truly difficult, and that's what leaders do. They see something others are ignoring and they jump on it.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Seizing the initiative can make all the difference between winning and loosing.
quotes.author: Thomas M. Davis

quotes.quote: Initiative is at the heart of manhood.
quotes.author: Dennis Rainey

quotes.quote: Initiative is doing the right thing without being told.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: All things come to him who goes after them.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A go-getter never has time to attend to other people's business because he always has more business than he can attend to.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Enterprise may not be enough to get you to the top, but it will get you off the bottom.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: All things come to him who waits that's why the smart man hustles.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Enterprise means taking advantage not of things that happen but of things that do not happen.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: You cannot build character and courage by taking a man's initiative.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: You yourself define what success is for yourself.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: The secret of success is knowing who to blame for your failure.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: You yourself define what success is for yourself.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Without risking failure, there is little chance of success.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: The four cornerstones of character on which the structure of this nation was built are: Initiative, Imagination, Individuality and Independence.
quotes.author: M.P. Singh

quotes.quote: Where self-interest is suppressed, it is replace by a burdensome system of bureaucratic control that dries up the wellspring of initiative and creativity.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul

quotes.quote: The man who has done his level best is a success, even though the world may write him down a failure.
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Success has made failures of many men.
quotes.author: Cindy Adams

quotes.quote: Flaming enthusiasm, backed up by horse sense and persistence, is the quality that most frequently makes for success.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Some aspects of success seem rather silly as death approaches.
quotes.author: Donald A. Miller

quotes.quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
quotes.author: David Frost

quotes.quote: Success is simply a matter of luck. Ask any failure.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: What is success? It is a toy balloon among children armed with pins.
quotes.author: Gene Fowler

quotes.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
quotes.author: George Smith Patton

quotes.quote: The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success.
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: Success without honor is an unseasoned dish; it will satisfy your hunger, but it won't taste good.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.quote: I couldn't wait for success. So I went ahead without it.
quotes.author: Jonathan Winters

quotes.quote: Success is hastened or delayed by one's habits.
quotes.author: I.C. Robledo

quotes.quote: Continuous learning is the minimum requirement for success.
quotes.author: I.C. Robledo

quotes.quote: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you.
quotes.author: I.C. Robledo

quotes.quote: One who is injured ought not to return the injury, for on no account can it be right to do an injustice; and it is not right to return an injury, or to do evil to any man, however much we have suffered from him.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Reject your sense of injury and the injury itself disappears.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Injury taught me I need to learn how to face challenges.
quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

quotes.quote: They do injury to the good who spares the bad.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: An injury is much sooner forgotten than an insult.
quotes.author: Philip Stanhope

quotes.quote: There is a point at which even justice does injury.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: The injury that we do to a man must be such that we need not fear his vengeance.
quotes.author: Steve Perry

quotes.quote: Restorative justice is not a replacement of retributive justice, but a complement. It seeks the rehabilitation of the wrongdoer and the repair of the victim's injury.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: If you can lessen the chance of a bad injury by being strong, you have to do it.
quotes.author: Joel Parkinson

quotes.quote: When a deep injury is done us, we never recover until we forgive.
quotes.author: Alan Paton

quotes.quote: If the other person injures you, you may forget the injury; but if you injure him you will always remember.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: I do myself a greater injury in lying than I do him of whom I tell a lie.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Moral Injury is differentiated from PTSD in that it directly relates to guilt and shame veterans experience as a result of committing actions that go against their moral codes. Therapists who study and treat moral injury have found that no amount of medication can relieve the pain of trying to live with these moral burdens.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.quote: Injury in general teaches you to appreciate every moment. I've had my share of injuries throughout my career. It's humbling. It gives you perspective. No matter how many times I've been hurt, I've learned from that injury and come back even more humble.
quotes.author: Troy Polamalu

quotes.quote: To injure an opponent is to injure yourself. To control aggression without inflicting injury is the Art of Peace.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: I could easily forgive his pride, if he had not mortified mine.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Nobody likes having salt rubbed into their wounds, even if it is the salt of the earth.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Woe to the man who offends a small child!
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: Tears sprang from her eyes and she bit her lip to stop herself from howling at the bright pain.
quotes.author: Stephen M. Irwin

quotes.quote: I decry the injustice of my wounds, only to look down and see that I am holding a smoking gun in one hand and a fistful of ammunition in the other.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Almost all accidents and injuries happen when an individual is not being present and not paying attention to what they are doing.
quotes.author: Tobe Hanson

quotes.quote: A slip of the foot may injure your body, but a slip of the tongue will injure your bond.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Injury makes one prudent,' says the proverb; insofar as it makes one prudent it also makes one bad. Fortunately, it frequently makes people stupid.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Never do an enemy a small injury.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Pain is weakness leaving the body.
quotes.author: Tom Sobal

quotes.quote: Where there is injury let me sow pardon.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: Let's hear your evidence, not your legal muscle.
quotes.author: Frank Frizelle
