quotes.quote: A person may cause evil to others not only by his actions but by his inaction, and in either case he is justly accountable to them for the injury.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: Injuries may be forgiven, but not forgotten.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: A scar is what happens when the word is made flesh.
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: No greater injury can be done to any youth than to let him feel that because he belongs to this or that race he will be advanced in life regardless of his own merits or efforts.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: The injuries we do and the injuries we suffer are seldom weighed on the same scales.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: An injury is not just a process of recovery it's a process of discovery.
quotes.author: Conor McGregor

quotes.quote: Injuries are part of the game, but sometimes we can avoid them by just practicing our techniques.
quotes.author: Troy Vincent

quotes.quote: Injuries accompanied with insults are never forgiven: all men, on these occasions, are good haters, and lay out their revenge at compound interest.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Scars are the paler pain of survival received unwillingly and displayed in the language of injury.
quotes.author: Mark Z. Danielewski

quotes.quote: Injuries are our best teachers.
quotes.author: Scott Jurek

quotes.quote: It is better to take many injuries than to give one.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: When will people understand that words can cut as sharply as any blade, and that those cuts leave scars upon our souls.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Abuse a man unjustly and you will make friends for him.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Justice consists of doing no one injury, decency in giving no one offense.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: A strong sense of injury often gives point to the expression of our feelings.
quotes.author: Caius Caecilius Secundus

quotes.quote: Everyone suffers wrongs for which there is no remedy.
quotes.author: Howe

quotes.quote: He who has injured thee was either stronger or weaker. If weaker, spare him; if stronger, spare thyself.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: To live is to hurt others, and through others, to hurt oneself. Cruel earth! How can we manage not to touch anything? To find what ultimate exile?
quotes.author: Camus

quotes.quote: There are some cases in which the sense of injury breeds -- not the will to inflict injuries and climb over them as a ladder, but -- a hatred of all injury.
quotes.author: Eliot

quotes.quote: Every murder or other injury, no matter for what cause, committed or inflicted on another is a crime against humanity.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: An injury unanswered, in time grows weary of itself and dies away in voluntary remorse. In bad dispositions, capable of no restraint but fear, it has a different effect; the silent digestion of one wrong provokes a second.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: If men wound you with injuries, meet them with patience: hasty words rankle the wound, soft language dresses it, forgiveness cures it, and oblivion takes away the scar. It is more noble by silence to avoid an injury than by argument to overcome it.
quotes.author: Francis Beaumont

quotes.quote: The injuries of life, if rightly improved, will be to us as the strokes of the statuary on his marble, forming us to a more beautiful shape, and making us fitter to adorn the heavenly temple.
quotes.author: Cotton Mather

quotes.quote: When injustice becomes law, resistance becomes duty.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Injustice never rules forever.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Gender injustice is a social impairment and therefore has to be corrected in social attitudes and behaviour.
quotes.author: Mohammad Hamid Ansari

quotes.quote: Injustice in the end produces independence.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Those who commit injustice bear the greatest burden.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: You can only watch injustice go on for so long until you're compelled to say something. To speak out against it.
quotes.author: Macklemore

quotes.quote: Injustice is censured because the censures are afraid of suffering, and not from any fear which they have of doing injustice.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: If thou suffer injustice, console thyself; the true unhappiness is in doing it.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: Nothing can make injustice just but mercy.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Injustice is relatively easy to bear; what sting is justice.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Every social injustice is not only cruel, but it is economic waste.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Injustice boils in men's hearts as does steel in its cauldron, ready to pour forth, white hot, in the fullness of time.
quotes.author: Mother Jones

quotes.quote: It seems to me that an unjust law is no law at all.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Since when do we have to agree with people to defend them from injustice?
quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

quotes.quote: If you look at any other group of people suffering injustice, women are always in the worst situation within that group.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: I think people should be angry at things that are worthy of anger. Injustice is outrageous and deserves outrage.
quotes.author: Chris Hayes

quotes.quote: Injustice can never be stood for.
quotes.author: Amber Heard

quotes.quote: The moment that justice must be paid for by the victim of injustice it becomes itself injustice.
quotes.author: Benjamin Tucker

quotes.quote: The greatest injustice in the world is to bring a child into the world, and not be able to offer it peace.
quotes.author: Nafisa Joseph

quotes.quote: He who commits injustice is ever made more wretched than he who suffers it.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Fight injustice, that our children might be blessed.
quotes.author: Rick Perlstein

quotes.quote: The glaring injustice is there for all who are not blinded by prejudice to see.
quotes.author: Bram Fischer

quotes.quote: Fighting injustice keeps you young.
quotes.author: Gloria Allred

quotes.quote: There is not a single injustice in Northern Ireland that is worth the loss of a single British soldier or a single Irish citizen either.
quotes.author: James Callaghan

quotes.quote: The injustice done to an individual is sometimes of service to the public.
quotes.author: Junius

quotes.quote: People don't always get what they deserve in this world.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: I guess the only time most people think about injustice is when it happens to them
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: If the misery of the poor be caused not by the laws of nature, but by our institutions, great is our sin.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: An unjust law is itself a species of violence. Arrest for its breach is more so.
quotes.author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: Man's inhumanity to man makes countless thousands mourn!
quotes.author: Robert Burns

quotes.quote: There is no flag large enough to cover the shame of killing innocent people.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: Washing one's hands of the conflict between the powerful and the powerless means to side with the powerful, not to be neutral.
quotes.author: Paulo Freire

quotes.quote: Undeservedly you will atone for the sins of your fathers.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: When one has been threatened with a great injustice, one accepts a smaller as a favor.
quotes.author: Jane Welsh Carlyle

quotes.quote: The highest reach of injustice is to be deemed just when you are not.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: National injustice is a sure road to national downfall.
quotes.author: William Ewart Gladstone

quotes.quote: Delay in justice is injustice.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: An unrectified case of injustice has a terrible way of lingering, restlessly, in the social atmosphere like an unfinished question.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: A personal injustice is stronger motivation than any instinct for philanthropy.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: The truth about injustice always sounds outrageous.
quotes.author: James H. Cone

quotes.quote: There is a naive belief that injustice only had to be pointed out in order to be cured.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: No one will dare maintain that it is better to do injustice than to bear it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: To do injustice is more disgraceful than to suffer it.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Injustice is a rule of the service, as you know very well; and since you have to have a good deal of undeserved abuse, you might just as well have it from your friends.
quotes.author: Patrick O'Brian

quotes.quote: The struggle against injustice is just another kind of injustice.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Injustice is a scar in the surface of the earth and death to the victim soul.
quotes.author: Anayo Ezimuor

quotes.quote: When you take a stand against injustice inflicted upon innocent people, there will be those who will hate you for it.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: Injustice alone can shake down the pillars of the skies, and restore the reign of Chaos and Night.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: Everyone suffers some injustice in life, and what better motivation than to help others not suffer in the same way.
quotes.author: Bella Thorne

quotes.quote: Fabrice, a hotel maintenance man, believes injustice is, above all, a moral battle of evil versus good, hate versus love.
quotes.author: Francois Dubet

quotes.quote: Man is hits own worst enemy, we're becoming crazier and crazier.
quotes.author: Francois Dubet

quotes.quote: Victims of racism/racialization, and workers without job security develop feelings of injustice directly related to their social situation.
quotes.author: Francois Dubet

quotes.quote: Injustice is a perception, not an objective fact. It lies in the eye of the beholder.
quotes.author: Plenum Press

quotes.quote: Injustice often blinds us to the fact that many injustices need to be carried out for justice to be balanced again.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: Keeping yourself silent when you witness injustice is to act against your own spirituality, because nothing is separated from your inner world.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: We're quick to criticize gender injustice when we see it around the world.
quotes.author: Melinda Gates

quotes.quote: The love of justice in the majority of mankind, is nothing else than the dread of suffering injustice from others.
quotes.author: William Francis Henry King

quotes.quote: A great mind is above doing an unjust act, above giving wat to grief, above descending to buffoonery, and it would be invulnerable if it did not feel the pangs of compassion.
quotes.author: William Francis Henry King

quotes.quote: To demand injustice from the just is not becoming. But to seek justice at the hands of the unjust is simple folly.
quotes.author: William Francis Henry King

quotes.quote: Independence in the end is the fruit of injustice.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Justice is the freedom of those who are equal.
quotes.author: Jacobi

quotes.quote: Injustice is the freedom of those who are unequal.
quotes.author: Jacobi

quotes.quote: The greatest of all injustices is that which goes under the name of law.
quotes.author: L'Estrange

quotes.quote: Delay of justice is injustice.
quotes.author: Lander

quotes.quote: They who accuse and blacken thee wrongfully are much the greatest sufferers by their own malice and injustice.
quotes.author: Thomas Kempis

quotes.quote: Every great example of punishment has in it some tincture of injustice, but the wrong to individuals is compensated by the promotion of public good.
quotes.author: Tac

quotes.quote: The revolutionary outbreaks of the lower classes are the consequence of the injustices of the higher class.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: We must bear what Heaven sends us, no noble heart will bear injustice.
quotes.author: Schiller

quotes.quote: The love of justice is, in the majority of mankind, nothing else than the fear of suffering injustice.
quotes.author: La Roche

quotes.quote: Knowledge without education is but armed injustice.
quotes.author: Hor

quotes.quote: Knowledge without justice ought to be called cunning rather than wisdom.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: One man's justice is another man's injustice.
quotes.author: Emerson

quotes.quote: The free man is he who is loyal to the laws of this universe; who in his heart sees and knows that injustice cannot befall him here, that except by sloth and cowardly falsity, evil is not possible here.
quotes.author: Carlyle

quotes.quote: It is the great error of reformers and philanthropists in out time to nibble at the consequences of unjust power, instead of redressing the injustice itself.
quotes.author: J.S. Mill

quotes.quote: It is sometimes claimed that justice is not a matter of reasoning at all; it is one of being appropriately sensitive and having the right nose for injustice.
quotes.author: Amartya Sen

quotes.quote: The requirements of a theory of justice include bringing reason into play in the diagnosis of justice and injustice.
quotes.author: Amartya Sen

quotes.quote: The caterpillar does all the work, but the butterfly gets all the publicity.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Man cannot be freed by the same injustice that enslaved it.
quotes.author: Pierce Brown

quotes.quote: Those who can make you believe absurdities, can make you commit atrocities.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The very ink with which history is written is merely fluid prejudice.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A drop of ink may make a million think.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: To say a poem is absolute is saying nothing, because an ink blot can be absolute. Yet you put into it what you like. So it becomes totally relative.
quotes.author: Nicholas Mosley

quotes.quote: Our live experiences, fixed in aphorisms, stiffen into cold epigrams. Our heart's blood, as we write it, turns to mere dull ink.
quotes.author: F. H. Bradley

quotes.quote: Ink, dark as night, creates words, and as they are read, they become the little beads and baubles of the mind.
quotes.author: Suzanne Valtsioti

quotes.quote: The pages are still blank, but there is a miraculous feeling of the words being there, written in invisible ink and clamoring to become visible.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: When the ink runs dry, you're most likely writing at the wrong angle.
quotes.author: Carolyn Shields

quotes.quote: We are the ink in which are written other messages that we cannot even understand.
quotes.author: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.quote: It's not always the easiest thing to be the center of so much spilled ink.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.quote: Pale ink is better than the most retentive memory.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Ink is the transcript of thought.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: The palest ink will endure beyond the memories of man
quotes.author: Tan Twan Eng

quotes.quote: The blackest of fluid is used as an agent to enlighten the world.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: Words running in my veins sprout out as ink of my pens
quotes.author: Ziya Noor

quotes.quote: You bought me a pen, when you came. You became the ink, when you left
quotes.author: Shubhi

quotes.quote: What happens in a certain place can stain your feelings for that location, just as ink can stain a white sheet.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: An ocean of ink real and virtual has been spilled critiquing the appearance of female politicians.
quotes.author: Nell Scovell

quotes.quote: How hard it is to make your thoughts look anything but imbecile fools when you paint them with ink on paper.
quotes.author: Olive Schreiner

quotes.quote: A recluse without books and ink is already in life a dead man.
quotes.author: Alfred Nobel

quotes.quote: The silence of the pen is only made louder by the sound of the ink running dry.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: The ink of the scholar is more holy than the blood of the martyr.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: What joy there is in hearing yourself think, and to make that thinking into ink.
quotes.author: John Olsen

quotes.quote: Write down, before the ink gets dry. Speak up, before the tears get dry.
quotes.author: A.AG.

quotes.quote: His diary; her handwriting. the marriage chapter is always an interesting ink.
quotes.author: Dhawal Barot

quotes.quote: The purpose of literature is to turn blood into ink.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Every guy should be the owner of a really nice pen. When you put your thoughts down, or whenever you're going to share something with someone, it means something if it bleeds out in a nice ink.
quotes.author: Rami Malek

quotes.quote: Inking is meditation in liquid form
quotes.author: J.H. Everett

quotes.quote: Never pick a fight with people who buy ink by the barrel.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Memory is more indelible than ink.
quotes.author: Anita Loos

quotes.quote: It's [beauty] a kind of radiance. People who possess a true inner beauty, their eyes are a little brighter, their skin a little more dewy. They vibrate at a different frequency.
quotes.author: Cameron Diaz

quotes.quote: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Some people, no matter how old they get, never lose their beauty - they merely move it from their faces into their hearts.
quotes.author: Martin Buxbaum

quotes.quote: The fountain of beauty is the heart and every generous thought illustrates the walls of your chamber.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: The beauty of a woman is not in the clothes she wears, the figure that she carries, or the way she combs her hair. The beauty of a woman is seen in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides. True beauty in a woman is
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Outer beauty attracts, but inner beauty captivates.
quotes.author: Kate Angell

quotes.quote: That's the thing about inner beauty: Unlike Physical beauty, which grabs the spotlight for itself, inner beauty shines on everyone, catching them, holding then in its embrace, making them more beautiful too.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Beauty...when you look into a woman's eyes and see what is in her heart.
quotes.author: Nate Dircks

quotes.quote: Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly lies to the bone. Beauty dies and fades away, but ugly holds its own! Create and cultivate Inner Beauty that never fades away but grows and matures with Time!
quotes.author: Deodatta V. Shenai-Khatkhate

quotes.quote: What's the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you're so ugly on the inside'
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: Beauty isn't about having a pretty face. It is about having a pretty mind, a pretty heart, and most importantly a beautiful soul.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We see the beauty within and cannot say no.
quotes.author: Dave Eggers

quotes.quote: As if you were on fire from within. The moon lives in the lining of your skin.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Beauty is the illumination of your soul.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Our hearts are drunk with a beauty our eyes could never see.
quotes.author: George W. Russell

quotes.quote: Outer beauty is a gift. Inner beauty is an accomplishment.
quotes.author: Randi G. Fine

quotes.quote: Do all the good you can & create a life that feels good on the inside,not one that just looks good on the outside. It is inner beauty which matters most.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kumar Sinha

quotes.quote: Inner beauty, too, needs occasionally to be told it is beautiful.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Something with inner beauty will live forever, like the scent of a rose.
quotes.author: Alex Flinn

quotes.quote: Take care of your inner, spiritual beauty. That will reflect in your face.
quotes.author: Dolores Del Rio

quotes.quote: You are not born with beauty, your beauty is created by who you are. Your inner beauty is more important than how people see you on the outside.
quotes.author: Emily Coussons

quotes.quote: Outer beauty pleases the EYE. Inner beauty captivates the HEART.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Some of us teach ourselves and our children to love the superficial outer; our looks, hair, skin, clothes rather than the greater beauty that resides within whereas it is that inner beauty that really defines you and who you truly are.
quotes.author: Rassool Jibraeel Snyman

quotes.quote: Inner beauty radiates from within, and there's nothing more beautiful than when a woman feels beautiful on the inside.
quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

quotes.quote: Above all things physical, it is more important to be beautiful on the inside - to have a big heart and an open mind and a spectacular spleen.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Your beauty should not come from outward adornment, such as elaborate hairstyles and the wearing of gold jewelry or fine clothes. Rather, it should be that of your inner self, the unfading beauty of a gentle and quiet spirit, which is of great worth in God's sight.
quotes.author: 1 Peter 3:3-4

quotes.quote: I believe inner beauty is beauty in its truest form. When we nurture ourselves, it brings an inevitable, positive transformation.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.quote: Outer beauty is inner beauty made visible.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Focus on your inner beauty. Outer beauty will draw people to you, inner beauty will keep them in your presence.
quotes.author: Robert Overstreet

quotes.quote: Whole life is a search for beauty. But, when the beauty is found inside, the search ends and a beautiful journey begins.
quotes.author: Harshit Walia

quotes.quote: Outer beauty turns the head, but inner beauty turns the heart.
quotes.author: Helen J. Russell

quotes.quote: Angels only care about what you look like on the inside. A pure heart is the vessel that contains a soul's true beauty.
quotes.author: Molly Friedenfeld

quotes.quote: Beauty shouldn't be about changing yourself to achieve an ideal or be more socially acceptable. Real beauty, the interesting, truly pleasing kind, is about honoring the beauty within you and without you. It's about knowing that someone else's definition of pretty has no hold over you.
quotes.author: Golda Poretsky

quotes.quote: Beauty is not something you buy; instead, beauty is what lies within.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Our hearts are drunk with a beauty our eyes could never see.
quotes.author: George W. Russell

quotes.quote: Beauty pleases the eyes only; Sweetness of disposition charms the soul.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: When virtue and modesty enlighten her charms, the luster of a beautiful woman is brighter than the stars of heaven, and the influence of her power it is in vain to resist.
quotes.author: Akhenaton

quotes.quote: There is no definition of beauty, but when you can see someone's spirit coming through, something unexplainable, that's beautiful to me.
quotes.author: Liv Tyler

quotes.quote: True beauty is not related to what color your hair is or what color your eyes are. True beauty is about who you are as a human being, your principles, your moral compass.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: If people were more concerned with how they looked on the inside, then on the outside, the world would be a nicer place to exist.
quotes.author: David Walsh

quotes.quote: Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul, like you.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Character develops in stream of struggle and adversity. Character is foundation of your inner beauty which reflects in your personality.
quotes.author: Anil Sinha

quotes.quote: Sometimes people are beautiful.Not in looks.Not in what they say.Just in what they are.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: Inner beauty should be the most important part of improving one's self.
quotes.author: Priscilla Presley

quotes.quote: Create a beautiful inside and you will look beautiful on the outside.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: A pure heart is superlatively rare and even more attractive.
quotes.author: J.S.B. Morse

quotes.quote: Your looks don't make you pretty, it's the person inside who makes you pretty!
quotes.author: Aaron Chan

quotes.quote: Beauty is known only by one who has known the inner beauty, one who has known the inner flower opening. Then whenever a flower is seen, it reminds you of your inner beauty.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Only one thing I expect from all of you: to be yourself, to discover your inner beauty, your purity of consciousness, your hidden splendor- and spread it to as many people as possible.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Physical beauty and ugliness is not very important. The real thing is the inner.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: When something starts flowing from within you, some grace, then the outer form is just put aside.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The outer then looks only a pale reflection of the inner. The inner becomes more real and the outer becomes just a shadow.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Don't practice for cosmetic beauty, practice for cosmic beauty. Practice for inner beauty and inner light.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: All seem a little awkward and not to have an inner beauty we usually expect from truth. But sometimes the truth is discovered first and the beauty or 'necessity' of the truth seen only later.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: When a woman invests more in her outer beauty than inner beauty, she is focusing on her brand, and not quality.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: Mozart's music is so pure and beautiful that I see it as a reflection of the inner beauty of the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mole, but true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives, the passion that she knows.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Inner beauty will bring out outer beauty if you balance your Yin and Yang and your five elements, which are wood, fire, earth, metal, and water.
quotes.author: Dr. Xiaolan Zhao

quotes.quote: The pursuit of inner beauty, health and balance is endlessly rewarding.
quotes.author: Dr. Xiaolan Zhao

quotes.quote: Find out what your inner strengths are. Once you find out what your inner strengths are, then you'll be able to find inner beauty.
quotes.author: Kisha Rivera

quotes.quote: Nothing in the whole world is so athirst for beauty as the soul, nor is there anything to which beauty clings so readily.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: Of course, if the outer appearance is as beautiful as the inner that's a bonus, for as long as it lasts.
quotes.author: Demetrakis Ioannou

quotes.quote: Inner beauty can be described as something pleasant, experienced through one's character rather by appearance.
quotes.author: Wikipedia

quotes.quote: If we can see and value the inner beauty of a person, it would be a charisma that could bring us happiness and satisfaction, not to mention the happiness we would give to others, simply because outer beauty doesn't last for life. Inner beauty does.
quotes.author: Demetrakis Ioannou

quotes.quote: Beauty endures only for as long as it can be seen, goodness beautiful today, will remain so tomorrow.
quotes.author: Sappho

quotes.quote: What is important is to have the ability to respect other people's beliefs, value their inner beauty, and treat everyone the way we wish to be treated.
quotes.author: Demetrakis Ioannou

quotes.quote: May you find God's eternal beauty in you. May you see this sacred beauty that He sees in you! And may this sacred beauty that is in you transform every part of you forever.
quotes.author: Bo Sanchez

quotes.quote: As far as the Bible goes, if you want real beauty that lasts, go for the beauty that's within. That kind doesn't fade with age or doesn't dry up with lack of moisturizer.
quotes.author: Rissa Singson-Kawpeng

quotes.quote: Don't be concerned about the outward beauty that depends on jewelry, or beautiful clothes, or hair arrangement. Be beautiful inside, in your hearts, with a lasting charm of a gentle and quiet spirit, which is so precious to God. That kind of deep beauty was seen in the saintly women of old.
quotes.author: Peter 3:3-5

quotes.quote: Treating others with gentleness is not just about their needs,; it's about yours as a woman of beauty.
quotes.author: Ginger Garrett

quotes.quote: No matter how plain a woman may be, if truth and honesty are written across her face, she will be beautiful.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: People are like stained-glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: There is nothing more beautiful than someone who goes out of their way to make life beautiful for others.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: As we all know, there is inner beauty and outer beauty. If we examine inner beauty, to me there is nothing more beautiful than inner peace, in a man or a woman.
quotes.author: Alice Greczyn

quotes.quote: Some of the most beautiful things worth having in your life come wrapped in a crown of thorns.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: All seem a little awkward and not to have an inner beauty we usually expect from truth. But sometimes the truth is discovered first and the beauty or 'necessity' of the truth seen only later.
quotes.author: Golda Poretsky

quotes.quote: Whole life is a search for beauty. But, when the beauty is found inside, the search ends and a beautiful journey begins.
quotes.author: Harshit Walia

quotes.quote: The life of inner peace, being harmonious and without stress, is the easiest type of existence.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: No one can find inner peace except by working, not in a self- centered way, but for the whole human family.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: If there's no inner peace, people can't give it to you. The husband can't give it to you. Your children can't give it to you. You have to give it to you.
quotes.author: Linda Evans

quotes.quote: Inner peace is beyond victory or defeat.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Without peace of mind, life is just a shadow of its possibilities.
quotes.author: Jean Borysenko

quotes.quote: Acquire inner peace and a multitude will find their salvation near you.
quotes.author: Catherine de Hueck Doherty

quotes.quote: For peace of mind, we need to resign as general manager of the universe.
quotes.author: Larry Eisenberg

quotes.quote: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: Seek peace. When you have peace within, real peace with others will be possible.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Real peace is not in power, money, or weapons, but in deep inner peace.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: First keep the peace within yourself, then you can also bring peace to others.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: I am able to close my eyes and generate the feeling of total peace anywhere and anytime.
quotes.author: Mary Maddox

quotes.quote: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If he is to be ultimately at peace with himself, what a man can be, he must be.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Until you make peace with who you are, you'll never be content with what you have.
quotes.author: Doris Mortman

quotes.quote: When you find peace within yourself, you become the kind of person who can live at peace with others.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: Cultivate peace of mind which does not separate one's self from one's surroundings. When that is done successfully, then everything else follows naturally.
quotes.author: Robert M. Prisig

quotes.quote: It is not easy to find happiness in ourselves, and it is not possible to find it elsewhere.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Before we can make friends with anyone else, we must first make friends with ourselves.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Let him that would move the world first move himself.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: To attain inner peace you must actually give your life, not just your possessions. When you at last give your life ? bringing into alignment your beliefs and the way you live then, and only then, can you begin to find inner peace.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: If you want peace, stop fighting. If you want peace of mind, stop fighting with your thoughts.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Never be in a hurry; do everything quietly and in a calm spirit. Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset.
quotes.author: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: Let your soul expand, let your heart reach out to others in loving and generous warmth, and great and lasting will be your joy, and all prosperity will come to you.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: When the restless activity of your mind slows down, when your thoughts stop rushing like waves on a windy day, then you will start getting glimpses of the sweet taste of inner peace.
quotes.author: Remez Sasson

quotes.quote: Mental happiness is more important than physical comfort. Physical comfort comes from the material. But material facilities cannot provide you with peace of mind.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: ...To seek out your own inner Peace is the greatest gift you could ever hope to give to this world.
quotes.author: Eric Walton

quotes.quote: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: You find peace not by rearranging the circumstances of your life, but by realizing who you are at the deepest level.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Looking for peace is like looking for a turtle with a mustache: you won't be able to find it. But when your heart is ready, peace will come looking for you.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.quote: You have to grow from the inside out. None can teach you, none can make you spiritual. There is no other teacher but your own soul.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself over and over again.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Re-examine all you have been told. Dismiss what insults your soul.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Peace of mind is attained not by ignoring problems, but by solving them.
quotes.author: Raymond Hull

quotes.quote: If half a century of living has taught me anything at all, it has taught me that nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Eternal Inner Peace has to be cultivated daily.
quotes.author: Delphine-Gay De Girardin

quotes.quote: One of the secrets of inner peace is the practice of compassion.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: If I really want inner peace in my life, then I must not busy myself with what other people do and say.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: When you've seen beyond yourself, then you may find, peace of mind is waiting there
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: Peace is not a relationship of nations. It is a condition of mind brought about by a serenity of soul? Lasting peace can come only to peaceful people.
quotes.author: Jawaharal Nehru

quotes.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Otto Rank

quotes.quote: When a man finds no peace within himself, it is useless to seek it elsewhere.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: You can never evaluate anything standing from outside; you have to evaluate yourself first.
quotes.author: Aruna Roy

quotes.quote: If you let go a little, you will have a little peace. If you let go a lot, you will have a lot of peace. If you let go completely, you will have complete peace.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.quote: When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Once you have accepted your flaws no one can use them against you.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: There are two ways of being happy: We must either diminish our wants or augment our means either may do the result is the same and it is for each man to decide for himself and to do that which happens to be easier.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The real destroyer of inner peace is fear and distrust. Fear develops frustration, frustration develops anger, anger develops violence.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: All the things that truly matter, beauty, love, creativity, joy, and inner peace arise from beyond the mind.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: We don't realize that, somewhere within us all, there does exist a supreme self who is eternally at peace.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Find ecstasy in life the mere sense of living is joy enough.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Do not blindly believe what others say. See for yourself what brings contentment, clarity and peace. That is the path for you to follow.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Inner peace can be reached only when we practice forgiveness. Forgiveness is letting go of the past and is therefore the means for correcting our misperceptions.
quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.quote: The more we control our mind, the more our inner peace increases and the happier we become
quotes.author: Geshe Kelsang Gyatso

quotes.quote: There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness.
quotes.author: Han Suyin

quotes.quote: No one can get inner peace by pouncing on it.
quotes.author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.quote: Never continue in a job you don't enjoy. If you're happy in what you're doing, you'll like yourself, you'll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you will have had more success than you could possibly have imagined
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Freedom from desire leads to inner peace.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Each one has to find his peace from within. And peace to be real must be unaffected by outside circumstances.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The first rule is to keep an untroubled spirit. The second is to look things in the face and know them for what they are.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If you're looking for inner peace from the outside world, you're not going to get that. The inner peace starts with looking at you from the inside.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: If in our daily life we can smile, if we can be peaceful and happy, not only we, but everyone will profit from it. This is the most basic kind of peace work.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: If you establish serenity and happiness inside yourself, you provide the world with a solid base of peace. If you do not give yourself peace, how can you share it with others? If you do not begin your peace work with yourself, where will you go to begin it?
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Having lots of money while not having inner peace is like dying of thirst while bathing in the ocean.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: The simplification of life is one of the steps to inner peace.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: No one can find inner peace except by working, not in a self-centered way, but for the whole human family.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: Inner #‎ peace begins the moment you choose not to allow another person or event to control your #‎ emotions
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Learn silence. With the quiet serenity of a meditative mind, listen, absorb, transcribe, and transform.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace.
quotes.author: Robert J. Sawyer

quotes.quote: Cultivate peace of mind which does not separate one's self from one's surroundings. When that is done successfully, then everything else follows naturally.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace.
quotes.author: Robert J. Sawyer

quotes.quote: If you could get rid of yourself just once, the secret of secrets would open to you. The face of the unknown, hidden beyond the universe would appear on the mirror of your perception.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: People say "I want peace." If you remove I (ego), and your want (desire), you are left with peace.
quotes.author: Sathya Sai Baba

quotes.quote: Once we have this inner peace, world peace can be achieved in the twinkling of an eye.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: There is time for everything.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: When you acquire enough inner peace and feel really positive about yourself, it's almost impossible for you to be controlled and manipulated by anybody else.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Give love and unconditional acceptance to those you encounter, and notice what happens.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Go within every day and find the inner strength so that the world will not blow your candle out
quotes.author: Katherine Dunham

quotes.quote: Nothing can dim the light which shines from within
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and, above all, confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face . . . You must do the thing you think you cannot do
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If they hadn't told me I was ugly, I never would have searched for my beauty. And if they hadn't tried to break me down, I wouldn't know that I'm unbreakable.
quotes.author: Gabourey Sidibe

quotes.quote: Life has many ways of testing a person's will, either by having nothing happen at all or by having everything happen all at once.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: With everything that has happened to you, you can either feel sorry for yourself or treat what has happened as a gift. Everything is either an opportunity to grow or an obstacle to keep you from growing. You get to choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W Dyer

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgement that something else is more important than fear.
quotes.author: Ambrose Redmoon

quotes.quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare; it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: If you have the courage to begin, you have the courage to succeed.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: You've got to follow your passion. You've got to figure out what it is you love-who you really are. And have the courage to do that. I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dream.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Far better is it to dare mighty things, to win glorious triumphs, even though checkered by failure...than to rank with those poor spirits who neither enjoy much nor suffer much, because they live in a gray twilight that knows not victory nor defeat.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: As we advance in life it becomes more and more difficult, but in fighting the difficulties the inmost strength of the heart is developed.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Everyone should carefully observe which way his heart draws him, and then choose that way with all his strength.
quotes.author: Hasidic Saying

quotes.quote: He knows not his own strength that hath not met adversity.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: Live in terms of your strong points. Magnify them. Let your weaknesses shrivel up and die from lack of nourishment.
quotes.author: William Young Elliott

quotes.quote: Life is not about waiting for the storms to pass. It's about learning how to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.quote: I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidencebut it comes from within. It is there all the time.
quotes.author: Anna Freud

quotes.quote: One can never consent to creep when one feels an impulse to soar.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Physical strength is measured by what we carry. Inner strength is measured by what we can bear
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: Spirit has fifty times the strength and staying-power of brawn and muscle
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: At times, our strengths propel us so far forward we can no longer endure our weaknesses and perish from them.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Character is higher than intellect. A great soul will be strong to live as well as think.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The strong man is the one who is able to intercept at will the communication between the senses and the mind.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: He who conquers others is strong; He who conquers himself is mighty.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Confront the dark parts of yourself, and work to banish them with illumination and forgiveness. Your willingness to wrestle with your demons will cause your angels to sing.
quotes.author: August Wilson

quotes.quote: Courage isn't having the strength to go on - it is going on when you don't have strength.
quotes.author: Napoleon

quotes.quote: There is a saying in Tibetan, Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.' No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that's our real disaster.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Today is a new beginning, a chance to turn your failures into achievements & your sorrows into so goods. No room for excuses.
quotes.author: Joel Brown

quotes.quote: The test of courage comes when we are in the minority. The test of tolerance comes when we are in the majority.
quotes.author: Ralph W. Sockman

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Life must be lived and curiosity kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There is a power in people who dream big and who try hard.
quotes.author: Harold Klemp

quotes.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: A woman is like a tea bag - you can't tell how strong she is until you put her in hot water.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: And with that inner strength that comes to a free people conscious of their duty, conscious of the righteousness of what they do, they will—with divine help and guidance— stand their ground against this latest assault upon their democracy, their sovereignty and their freedom.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The life of a nation is the fullness and the measure of its will to win.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Dwell not upon thy weariness, thy strength shall be according to the measure of thy desire.
quotes.author: Arab Saying

quotes.quote: The remedy for weakness is not brooding over weakness, but thinking of strength. Teach men the strength that is already within them...Never say 'No.' Never say 'I cannot,' for you are infinite. Even time and space are as nothing compared with your nature.
quotes.author: Vivekananda

quotes.quote: There is no such force as a force of a man determined to rise. The human soul cannot be permanently changed.
quotes.author: W.E.B. Du Bois

quotes.quote: Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Strength is a matter of the made-up mind.
quotes.author: John Henry Newman Beeecher

quotes.quote: Those who overcome others are powerful; those who overcome themselves are strong.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Look well into yourself, there is a source of strength which will always spring up if you will always look there.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: At times to think of one's outer helplessness is good, but to think always of one's inner strength is infinitely better
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you survives all hurt.
quotes.author: Max Lerner

quotes.quote: Are your beliefs anchored in a faith that can withstand emotionalism, the drug culture, social and peer pressure, and material temptations? The world is seething with demonic energy. Only supreme inner strength can resist its ceaseless hassling.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The task ahead is never greater than the strength within you.
quotes.author: Summersdale Publishers

quotes.quote: I come from a real rabbinical dynasty, and it couldn't help but have fashioned my life. It's given me so much inner peace and inner strength.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: You really have to look inside yourself and find your own inner strength, and say 'I'm proud of who I am and what I am, and I'm just going to be myself.'
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: You can't give people pride, but you can provide the kind of understanding that makes people look to their inner strengths and find their own sense of pride.
quotes.author: Lee Edson

quotes.quote: It is within the will of a man to transform his inner mist into sun.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: It is the love she has for herself that gives her the strength to combat all her fights. She is a lover of life but also a sensitive soul with great insights.
quotes.author: Althea Legister

quotes.quote: it is those who never stoop to retaliation, never demand an eye for an eye, who are truly strong. They have the toughness to be tender, even sweet, while resisting violence with all their heart.
quotes.author: Eknath Easwaran

quotes.quote: If you want to be unshakeable, you have to train your mind in patience and endurance, the most grueling training that life offers. Life shows no mercy to those who lack this inner strength.
quotes.author: Eknath Easwaran

quotes.quote: One possible reason for the under development of inner strength is that many people live superficially and do not stop long enough to genuinely understand his/herself and anchoring their values.
quotes.author: John Cong Nguyen

quotes.quote: Inner strength is limited and there are some people who are not talented, intelligent, or creative, but their inner strengths helps propel them to realize their achievements.
quotes.author: John Cong Nguyen

quotes.quote: People who are fortunate to find their inner strength find that it gives them direction, a purpose, and fulfillment in living.
quotes.author: John Cong Nguyen

quotes.quote: I have assumed that everyone has a reserve of inner strength and that it is just there, waiting to be used.
quotes.author: Sandy McGregor

quotes.quote: It is worth remembering that the time of greatest gain in terms of wisdom and inner strength is often that of greatest difficulty.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Few men during their lifetime come anywhere near exhausting the resources dwelling within them. There are deep wells of strength that are never used.
quotes.author: Richard E. Byrd

quotes.quote: The tests we face in life's journey are not to reveal our weaknesses but to help us discover our inner strengths. We can only know how strong we are when we strive and thrive beyond the challenges we face.
quotes.author: Kemi Sogunle

quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Your inner voice is the voice of divinity. To hear it, we need to be in solitude, even in crowded places.
quotes.author: A. R. Rahman

quotes.quote: Your mind knows only some things. Your inner voice, your instinct, knows everything. If you listen to what you know instinctively, it will always lead you down the right path.
quotes.author: Henry Winkler

quotes.quote: Everyone has that inner voice, the one that's a Negative Nancy. I'd say to ignore that voice and to be confident and follow your heart.
quotes.author: Katharine McPhee

quotes.quote: Everyone who wills can hear the inner voice. It is within everyone.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: That inner voice has both gentleness and clarity. So to get to authenticity, you really keep going down to the bone, to the honesty, and the inevitability of something.
quotes.author: Meredith Monk

quotes.quote: You must trust yourself more than you trust others. Pay attention to your inner voice - it will tell you if how and in what you are investing is right for you.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: We all have that inner voice that is wise, even if we don't always follow it. It's that voice I'm trying to listen to.
quotes.author: Ray LaMontagne

quotes.quote: You will never follow your own inner voice until you clear up the doubts in your mind.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: There is always one true inner voice. Trust it.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: What the inner voice says will not disappoint the hoping soul.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: When we hear our inner voice and follow it, we can walk our own path.
quotes.author: Ilchi Lee

quotes.quote: When we listen to the Inner Voice, our outer life becomes full of peace.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: When we are attuned to our inner voice, life becomes art and art becomes life.
quotes.author: Yuval Ron

quotes.quote: If your inner voice is telling you that you can't paint, by all means, hurry up and paint and silence the voice.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: When you're following your inner voice, doors tend to eventually open for you, even if they mostly slam at first.
quotes.author: Kelly Cutrone

quotes.quote: It's not harder to hear the inner voice when you're in a relationship, but it's more of a challenge to follow it.
quotes.author: Echo Bodine

quotes.quote: Be aware of your inner voice and follow it, even though most of the time it will tell you the most uncomfortable path to choose.
quotes.author: Glenn Close

quotes.quote: Every now and then that inner voice will challenge you, confront you and try to hold you back, and that's when you need to let your heart guide you. Have an awesome day, stay strong, be true and most of all be you!!!
quotes.author: Ricardo Housham

quotes.quote: The inner voice is something which cannot be described in words. But sometimes we have a positive feeling that something in us prompts us to do a certain thing. The time when I learnt to recognise this voice was, I may say, the time when I started praying regularly.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Only when your inner voice sings with love will your outer world dance with joy.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: The inner witness is a part of us that sits behind all of the drama.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Learn to hear your inner voice, be led by your heart and never stop giving back – this way you shall always walk the right path and shall never be walking alone.
quotes.author: Aleksej Metelko

quotes.quote: Intuition goes before you, showing you the way. Emotion follows behind, to let you know when you go astray. Listen to your inner voice. It is the calling of your spiritual GPS system seeking to keep you on track towards your true destiny.
quotes.author: Anthon St. Maarten

quotes.quote: Your inner voice whispers, but speaks the loudest.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Trust what your instincts are telling you, it's your souls voice pointing you in the right direction.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: Our inner wisdom is persistent, but quiet. It will always whisper, but it will never stop knocking at your door.
quotes.author: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.quote: Do not believe in me or any other teacher, rather trust in your own inner voice. This is your guide, this is your teacher. Your teacher is within not without. Know yourself, not me!
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: Listen to your own voice, your own soul. Too many people listen to the noise of the world, instead of themselves.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: If you have some idea you believe in, don't listen to the croaking chorus. Listen only to what your own inner voice tells you.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Along with a strong belief in your own inner voice, you also need laser-like focus combined with unwavering determination.
quotes.author: Larry Flynt

quotes.quote: You have to follow and honor that inner voice. I always encouraged the girls to do the same.
quotes.author: Camila Cabello

quotes.quote: Follow your heart, listen to your inner voice, stop caring about what others think.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Whatever you do, listen for your inner voice. Do not ignore it.
quotes.author: Pooja Ruprell

quotes.quote: The instinct, quiet inner voice is the voice of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: I think of the inner voice as a compass or as a wayshower to guide our path.
quotes.author: Echo Bodine

quotes.quote: Stay true to yourself and listen to your inner voice. It will lead you to your dream.
quotes.author: James Ross

quotes.quote: Listen to your inner voice. Trust your intuition. It's important to have the courage to trust yourself.
quotes.author: Dawn Ostroff

quotes.quote: Listening to the inner voice - trusting the inner voice - is one of the most important lessons of leadership.
quotes.author: Warren G. Bennis

quotes.quote: First set a strong and clear inner voice and then do all that you want to achieve and the door will be opened.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Listen with your heart, listen to your inner voice of wisdom, listen to your dreams. You know what is right for you.
quotes.author: Cheryl Hamada

quotes.quote: It is no good hearing an inner voice or getting an inner prompting if you do not immediately act on that inner prompting.
quotes.author: David Spangler

quotes.quote: Pay attention to the inner voice that tells you when something feels right. Much of your creative problem-solving occurs at an unconscious level.
quotes.author: Nita Leland

quotes.quote: If this inner and critical voice has kept you safe for many years as your inner voice of authority, you may end up not being able to hear the real voice of God.
quotes.author: Richard Rohr

quotes.quote: Following your inner guidance has a unique power all its own. Even when others can't understand it, you can feel your soul being pulled to the place it truly belongs.
quotes.author: Kianu Starr

quotes.quote: The voice of your inner narrator is just a portion of the vast collection of parts that make up your complete being.
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Your inner voice gives you the signals of Having. You already know the answer yourself.
quotes.author: Suh Yoon Lee

quotes.quote: Only the inner voice gives us freedom.
quotes.author: Sir Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: Your inner voice is the voice of truth within your heart.
quotes.author: Cheryl Hamada

quotes.quote: In the stillness the voice inside is louder, much louder, and cannot be ignored.
quotes.author: Diane Brown

quotes.quote: Listen to the inner voice that allows you to be you!
quotes.author: Elvis Stojko

quotes.quote: Innocence is the weakest defense. Innocence has a single voice that can only say over and over again, I didn't do it. Guilt has a thousand voices, all of them lies.
quotes.author: Leonard F. Peltier

quotes.quote: The knowledge that makes us cherish innocence makes innocence unattainable.
quotes.author: Irving Howe

quotes.quote: It is better that ten guilty persons escape than that one innocent suffer.
quotes.author: William Blackstone

quotes.quote: Once you start asking questions, innocence is gone.
quotes.author: Mary Astor

quotes.quote: Innocence tinctures all things with brightest hues.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: Always the innocent are the first victims. So it has been for ages past, so it is now.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Innocence eroded into nightmare. All because of very bad touch. Love, corrupted.
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: It takes a very long time to become young.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Innocence is a kind of insanity.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: When we take revenge against another, we lose some of our innocence.
quotes.author: Patrice Redd Vecchione

quotes.quote: We each begin in innocence. We all become guilty.
quotes.author: Leonard F. Peltier

quotes.quote: The most sophisticated people I know inside they are all children.
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.quote: We've let the blade of our innocence dull over time, and it's only in innocence that you find any kind of magic, any kind of courage.
quotes.author: Sean Penn

quotes.quote: The presumption of innocence only means you don't go right to jail.
quotes.author: Ann Coulter

quotes.quote: Remaining childish is a tremendous state of innocence.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: The innocence that feels no risk and is taught no caution, is more vulnerable than guilt, and oftener assailed.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Parker Willis

quotes.quote: There's nothing more contagious than the laughter of young children; it doesn't even have to matter what they're laughing about.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I'm interested in how innocence fares when it collides with hard reality.
quotes.author: Geoffrey S. Fletcher

quotes.quote: Innocence is one of the most exciting things in the world.
quotes.author: Eartha Kitt

quotes.quote: Unfortunately the innocent are always involved in any conflict. Always, everywhere, there is some voice crying from a tower.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Innocence could be considered a discrete state of mind.
quotes.author: John Shirley

quotes.quote: I have always said that innocence is much more powerful than experience.
quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quotes.quote: The sweet converse of an innocent mind.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: There is an innocence in admiration: it occurs in one who has not yet realized that they might one day be admired.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Innocence is like a dumb leper who has lost his bell, wandering the world, meaning no harm.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: The worst of us is not without innocence, although buried deeply it might be.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Innocence does not find near so much protection as guilt.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: No man knows the value of innocence and integrity but he who has lost them.
quotes.author: William Godwin

quotes.quote: For children are innocent and love justice, while most of us are wicked and naturally prefer mercy.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: There is but one resource for innocence among men or women, and that is an embargo upon all commerce of bad men.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Whoever blushes is already guilty; true innocence is ashamed of nothing.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Innocence ends when one is stripped of the delusion that one likes oneself.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: The innocence of childhood is like the innocence of a lot of animals.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: All things truly wicked start from an innocence.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: In their innocence, very young children know themselves to be light and love. If we will allow them, they can teach us to see ourselves the same way.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Innocence is like polished armor; it adorns and defends.
quotes.author: Robert South

quotes.quote: Go in thy native innocence, rely on what thou hast of virtue, summon all, for God towards thee hath done his part, do thine.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: It's innocence when it charms us, ignorance when it doesn't.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Innocence is always unsuspicious.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: No one loses their innocence. It is either taken or given away willingly.
quotes.author: Tiffany Madison

quotes.quote: An honest man is always a child.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Innocence is thought charming because it offers delightful possibilities for exploitation.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Innocence: I am only stepping on your face because it lies in my path.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Through our own recovered innocence we discern the innocence of our neighbors.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The essential self is innocent, and when it tastes its own innocence knows that it lives for ever.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: It is better to risk saving a guilty person than to condemn an innocent one.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I read the dreams upon her face. Through dimples in her cheek, and smiles which trace the subtle grace of innocence asleep.
quotes.author: Samuel Alfred Beadle

quotes.quote: Innocence bleeding, within the deep warm incision of a preternatural beginning.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: When we are children we seldom think of the future. This innocence leaves us free to enjoy ourselves as few adults can. The day we fret about the future is the day we leave our childhood behind.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: It is more important that innocence be protected than it is that guilt be punished, for guilt and crimes are so frequent in this world that they cannot all be punished.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: We are born with our heads turned back, but my mother says we have to face into the future now. You have to earn your own innocence, she says. You have to grow up and become innocent.
quotes.author: Hugo Hamilton

quotes.quote: Innocence ain't all it's cracked up to be, you know. Innocent little kids rip the wings off flies, because they don't know any better. That's innocence.
quotes.author: Joe Hill

quotes.quote: That's the beautiful thing about innocence; even monsters have a pocketful of childhood memories with which to seek comfort with.
quotes.author: Dave Matthes

quotes.quote: Innocence invites protection, yet we might be smarter to protect ourselves against it.
quotes.author: Megan Johns

quotes.quote: Innocence always calls mutely for protection when we would be so much wiser to guard ourselves against it
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: You can call it innocence, or you can call it gullibility.
quotes.author: Lionel Shriver

quotes.quote: There are many more layers to innocence than one might ever imagine, and we are ever unaware of them until each barrier is breached.
quotes.author: Paula Reed

quotes.quote: Innocence is not the prerogative of infants and puppies, and far less of mountains and fixed stars, which have no prerogatives at all. It is not lost to us; the world is a better place than that.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: What I call innocence is the spirit’s unselfconscious state at any moment of pure devotion to any object.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: Childhood innocence was a hell of a drug.
quotes.author: Lily Seabrooke

quotes.quote: Innocence, that mild form of mental deficiency, has the same aphrodisiac effect as softness of skin.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: An hour of innocence builds more trust than years of diplomacy.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Innocence is something we humans pass through and leave behind, unable to return. But animals live and die in that state, and seeing innocence violated in the form of cruelty to a mere duck can seem like the most barbaric act in the world.
quotes.author: The Friend: A Novel

quotes.quote: But innocence is only pleasurable because it is transient.
quotes.author: Iain Pears

quotes.quote:
A childlike innocence is requested by existence.
Every time, in every circumstance – a priceless purity.
quotes.author: Ilie Cioara

quotes.quote: Innocence was a luxury.
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: Innocence is a temporary, maybe even an unreal, condition. Destined to die.
quotes.author: Patricia Hampl

quotes.quote: Innocence lost is supposed to be experience gained, and therefore not a bad trade.
quotes.author: Patricia Hampl

quotes.quote: The consciousness of innocence is an excellent anchor, no doubt.
quotes.author: Albert Payson Terhune

quotes.quote: The innocent seldom find an uncomfortable pillow.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: The innocence of childhood is like the innocence of a lot of animals.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Innocence is a kind of insanity.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: The innocent and the guiltless may not ask the apologies since one has not, even the clue of it.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: It's innocence when it charms us, ignorance when it doesn't.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: The innocence of children is what makes them stand out as a shining example to the rest of mankind.
quotes.author: Kurt Chambers

quotes.quote: Innocence ain't all it's cracked up to be, you know. Innocent little kids rip the wings off flies, because they don't know any better. That's innocence
quotes.author: Joe Hill

quotes.quote: Ignorance is not innocence but sin.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Innocence always calls mutely for protection when we would be so much wiser to guard ourselves against it: innocence is like a dumb leper who has lost his bell, wandering the world, meaning no harm.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Silence in the face of evil is itself evil: God will not hold us guiltless. Not to speak is to speak. Not to act is to act.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Innocence most often is a good fortune and not a virtue.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: It is better to risk saving a guilty man than to condemn an innocent one.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Innocence, once lost, can never be regained; Darkness, once gazed upon, can never be lost.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Innocence is like polished armor; it adorns and defends.
quotes.author: Robert South

quotes.quote: Everyone is innocent unless proven otherwise.
quotes.author: Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva

quotes.quote: The essential self is innocent, and when it tastes its own innocence knows that it lives for ever.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: There is some kind of a sweet innocence in being human- in not having to be just happy or just sad- in the nature of being able to be both broken and whole, at the same time.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Innocence tinctures all things with brightest hues.
quotes.author: Edward Albert Counsel

quotes.quote: The artificial is always innocent.
quotes.author: Frank O'Hara

quotes.quote: Innocence is always unsuspicious.
quotes.author: Thomas C. Haliburton

quotes.quote: Innocence is a language only mother nature teaches.
quotes.author: Jasmina Siderovski

quotes.quote: Innocence is its own defense.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: One person's trauma is another's loss of innocence.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: We each begin in innocence. We all become guilty.
quotes.author: Leonard Peltier

quotes.quote: The innocent is the person who explains nothing.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Be happy for no reason, like a child. If you are happy for a reason, you're in trouble, because that reason can be taken from you.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The innocent and the beautiful have no enemy but time.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: A man who was completely innocent, offered himself as a sacrifice for the good of others, including his enemies, and became the ransom of the world. It was a perfect act.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Innocent people have been drawn into someone else's conflict.
quotes.author: Mark Wiley

quotes.quote: Always the innocent are the first victims, so it has been for ages past, so it is now.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: There's always a wild side to an innocent face.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Remaining childish is a tremendous state of innocence.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: Behind innocence there gathers a clotted mass of superstition, of twisted and misdirected impulse; clandestine flirtation, fads, and ragtime fill the unventilated mind.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The truly innocent are those who not only are guiltless themselves, but who think others are.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: It is better that ten guilty persons escape than one innocent suffer.
quotes.author: Sir Willam Blackstone

quotes.quote: The innocent are so few that two of them seldom meet— when they do, their victims lie strewn around.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: We have no choice but to be guilty. God is unthinkable if we are innocent.
quotes.author: Archibald MacLeish

quotes.quote: When you've known innocence, when you've seen it sleep at your side, you never quite forget it. It changes you.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: I was the perfect dupe. I believed everything anybody ever told me. I was full of the highest hopes and the most unbelievable innocence.
quotes.author: Oskar Werner

quotes.quote: The innocent have nothing to fear.
quotes.author: Lynn Weil

quotes.quote: A mind conscious of innocence laughs at the lies of rumor.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: An innocent heart suspects no guile.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.quote: Innocence plays in the backyard of ignorance.
quotes.author: Polish Proverb

quotes.quote: No protection is so sure as that of innocence.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: He is armed without who is innocent within, be this thy screen, and this thy wall of brass.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: What is a stronger breastplate than a heart untainted?
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Innocence is but a poor substitute for experience.
quotes.author: Bulwer

quotes.quote: There is no courage but in innocence; no constancy but in an honest cause.
quotes.author: Southern
