quotes.quote: What shall I say this means, that my couch seems so hard the coverlets will not stay in place, and I pass the long, long night untouched by sleep, and the weary bones of my body are filled with ache?—for I should know, I think, were I in any way assailed by love. Or can it be that love has stolen into me and cunningly works my harm with covered art? Thus it must be; the subtle darts are planted in my heart, and cruel love torments the breast where he is lord.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: True knowledge comes down to vigils in the darkness: the sum of our insomnias alone distinguishes us from the animals and from our kind. What rich or strange idea was ever the work of a sleeper?
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: The importance of insomnia is so colossal that I am tempted to define man as the animal that cannot sleep. Why call him a rational animal when other animals are equally reasonable? But there is not another animal in the entire creation that wants to sleep yet cannot.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: Sleep is forgetfulness: life’s drama, its complications and obsessions vanish completely, and every awakening is a new beginning, a new hope. Life thus maintains a pleasant discontinuity, the illusions of permanent regeneration. Insomnia, on the other hand, gives birth to a feeling of irrevocable sadness, despair, and agony. The healthy man – the animal – only dabbles in insomnia: he knows nothing of those who would give a kingdom for an hour of unconscious sleep, those as terrified by the sight of a bed as they would be of a torture rack.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: What rich or strange idea was ever the work of a sleeper? In those weird hours, out of sync with the rest of the world, his singular creativity flourished. The experience wasn't much fun, but it was real.
quotes.author: Gordon Marino

quotes.quote: Thin are the night-skirts left behind / By daybreak hours that onward creep, / And thin, alas! the shred of sleep / That wavers with the spirit's wind...
quotes.author: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

quotes.quote: I asked my psychiatrist how he cured his insomnia. He said he changed his phone number.
quotes.author: Daytona

quotes.quote: The subject of sleeplessness is once more under public discussion. The hurry and excitement of modern life is held to be responsible for much of the insomnia of which we hear; and most of the articles and letters are full of good advice to live more quietly and of platitudes concerning the harmfulness of rush and worry. The pity of it is that so many people are unable to follow this good advice and are obliged to lead a life of anxiety and high tension.
quotes.author: The BMJ

quotes.quote: Insomnia is just another word for chit chat with the demons during bedtime.
quotes.author: Daniel Saint

quotes.quote: I think the most common cause of insomnia is simple; it's loneliness.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: I'm an insomniac, my mind works the night shift.
quotes.author: Pete Wentz

quotes.quote: What keeps you awake at night? I have no clue, but I'm sure as hell that it's not love.
quotes.author: Darshan Pania

quotes.quote: You know what, the rest of you may hate your insomnia but I'm not sure I want a cure for mine. That's when I get all my best ideas... I'm alone, occasionally... with no distractions. My mind is racing with creative ideas and come 3am I feel like a genius.
quotes.author: Theo

quotes.quote: Insomnia / I can't eat, feeling the heat, can't sleep / Insomnia / It's just me and the sounds of police on the street / Insomnia / No retreat cause I never thought it'd happen to me.
quotes.author: Daniel Rankine and Paul Ridge

quotes.quote: Ever find yourself awake / In the middle of the night / You've got insomnia / Grab a glass of water / Or a cigarette for your insomnia / But I know something that's so much better yet / Just grab the bong and numb your brain with pot / Watch Cal Worthington and his dog Spot / Insomnia, yeah it's so boring / Nothing to do at three o'clock in the morning / You can get dressed, go out for a walk / For your insomnia / But that's just asking for hassles / From your neighborhood cops / You've got insomnia.
quotes.author: Matthew Kelly Sharp

quotes.quote: Sweet insomnia / You make it hard for me to sleep by myself / Sweet insomnia / You make it hard for me to know myself.
quotes.author: Christopher Joseph Gallant; Ricardo Valentine; Ajay Bhattacharyya

quotes.quote: I sleep walk on the walls / Counting stars all over town / Always up, insomnia / Zombie walk, eyes never shut.
quotes.author: Jonathan Elkaer; Mads Bo Iversen; Awinbeh Ayagiba

quotes.quote: Inspiration is one thing and you can't control it, but hard work is what keeps the ship moving. Good luck means, work hard. Keep up the good work.
quotes.author: Kevin Eubanks

quotes.quote: My daughter is my greatest inspiration.
quotes.author: Whitney Houston

quotes.quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: Inspiration comes from so many sources. Music, other fiction, the non-fiction I read, TV shows, films, news reports, people I know, stories I hear, misheard words or lyrics, dreams
quotes.author: Trudi Canavan

quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I know for sure that what we dwell on is who we become.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Inspiration and genius--one and the same.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is excitement with inspiration, motivation, and a pinch of creativity.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Don't let the fear of striking out hold you back.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: I dwell in possibility.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit.
quotes.author: Bernard Williams

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Every day we should hear at least one little song, read one good poem, see one exquisite picture, and, if possible, speak a few sensible words.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Keep your feet on the ground, but let your heart soar as high as it will. Refuse to be average or to surrender to the chill of your spiritual environment.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: A man has to learn that he cannot command things, but that he can command himself; that he cannot coerce the wills of others, but that he can mold and master his own will: and things serve him who serves Truth; people seek guidance of him who is master of himself.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Without craftsmanship, inspiration is a mere reed shaken in the wind.
quotes.author: Johannes Brahms

quotes.quote: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life - and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing I wanted to do.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: I am not afraid of tomorrow, for I have seen yesterday and I love today!
quotes.author: William Allen White

quotes.quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Nothing is worth more than this day.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Great hopes make great men.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Whatever you vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe, and enthusiastically act upon... must inevitably come to pass!
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: Ideas shape the course of history.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: I believe that if one always looked at the skies, one would end up with wings.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: The Wright brothers flew right through the smoke screen of impossibility.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: Colour is my day-long obsession, joy, and torment.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: CS Lewis

quotes.quote: Look at everything as though you were seeing it for the first or last time.
quotes.author: Betty Smith

quotes.quote: The richness I achieve comes from nature, the source of my inspiration.
quotes.author: Claude Monet

quotes.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more, and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: For I know the plans I have for you,' declares the Lord, 'Plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
quotes.author: Jeremiah 29:11

quotes.quote: You can pray for anything, and if you believe that you've received it, it will be yours,
quotes.author: Mark 11:24

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: As I continue through the corridors of life I search for the inspirational light that burns bright within each and every person on any given night.
quotes.author: John Fritz Jr.

quotes.quote: Great lies never go out; they go on.
quotes.author: Benjamin Harison

quotes.quote: The morning ripe with the promise / a fruited tree waiting to be harvested / flourishes in the garden of the mind.
quotes.author: Carolyn Brunelle

quotes.quote: Your example is far more influential and inspiring than any words of instruction, or threats, or even words of encouragement.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can do, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it. Begin it now.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We shall draw from the heart of suffering itself the means of inspiration and survival.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Inspiration is necessary for poetry as in geometry.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Pushkin

quotes.quote: Success is the good fortune that comes from aspiration, desperation, perspiration, and inspiration.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The inspiration you seek is already within you. Be silent and listen.
quotes.author: Dimz Media

quotes.quote: Inspiration / From somewhere beyond / Lights the flame of my passion / Like a magic wand / Devotion and love causes / The flames to rise higher / Suddenly awakening / My deepest desires.
quotes.author: Inspiration

quotes.quote: A tiny flake. / A single seed. / Inspiration came / and went, / but it left its mark, / and laid foundations / for me to build upon.
quotes.author: Robert Heigh

quotes.quote: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times I've been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: If we have the attitude that it’s going to be a great day it usually is.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are stacked against you, you should still do it.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: If you hear a voice within you say ‘you cannot paint,’ then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Unsuccessful people make their decisions based on their current situations. Successful people make their decisions based on where they want to be.
quotes.author: Benjamin Hardy

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine – and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand leagues begins beneath one's feet.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you.
quotes.author: Grace Coddington

quotes.quote: The best dreams happen when you're awake.
quotes.author: Cherie Gilderbloom

quotes.quote: I haven't failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: We become what we think about.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Light tomorrow with today.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
quotes.author: Jesus

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Only in the darkness can you see the stars.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched -- they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Sometimes you can't see yourself clearly until you see yourself through the eyes of others.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you can never see the shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

quotes.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When you come to a roadblock, take a detour.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: It wasn't raining when Noah built the ark.
quotes.author: Howard Ruff

quotes.quote: I will not follow where the path may lead, but I will go where there is no path, and I will leave a trail.
quotes.author: Muriel Strode

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Do it with passion, or not at all.
quotes.author: Rosa Nouchette Carey

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The grass is greener where you water it.
quotes.author: Neil Barringham

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In between goals is a thing called life, that has to be lived and enjoyed.
quotes.author: Sid Caesar

quotes.quote: Once you choose hope, anything's possible.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: You cannot save people, you can just love them.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: If it scares you, it might be a good thing to try.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: I never dream of success. I worked for it.
quotes.author: Estee Lauder

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing. That's why we recommend it daily.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: If you hear or read stories on how successful people achieve their extraordinary accomplishments, most of them always start by stating their secret; they follow their passion.
quotes.author: John Baskin

quotes.quote: So if you have a dream then just believe that you can achieve it no matter what. Even when you can't feel deep in your heart any words of encouragement, just believe in your dream and your heart will finally show you the way.
quotes.author: Shuchi Gupta

quotes.quote: We must remember that one determined person can make a significant difference and that a small group of determined people can change the course of history.
quotes.author: Sonia Johnson

quotes.quote: If you focus on the possible when you experience difficult situations, YOU CAN positively change your outlook, reduce your stress, and concentrate on achieving things that otherwise may not have been possible.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Success is the good fortune that comes from aspiration, desperation, perspiration, and inspiration.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: The past can hurt. But you can either run from it or, learn from it.
quotes.author: The Lion King

quotes.quote: Until you start believing in yourself, you ain't gonna have a life!
quotes.author: Rocky Balboa

quotes.quote: The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.
quotes.author: Mulan

quotes.quote: You can like the life you're living, you can live the life you like.
quotes.author: Chicago

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to be weak; don't be too proud to be strong. Just look into your heart, my friend.
quotes.author: Enigma

quotes.quote: Simple can be harder than complex; you have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The most persevering becomes the most talented.
quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

quotes.quote: If you perform the sacrifice of doing your duty, you do not have to do anything else. Devoted to duty, man attains perfection.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: Everyone you admire was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Jack Butcher

quotes.quote: Judge nothing, you will be happy. Forgive everything, you will be happier. Love everything, you will be happiest.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
quotes.author: E.E.Cummings

quotes.quote: Ignore those who tell you which way to go without first understanding where you are.
quotes.author: James Pierce

quotes.quote: Young people willing to push super hard to make something happen are the most powerful forces in the world.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: You must be the change you want to see in the world.
quotes.author: Thandi

quotes.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it’s business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don’t love what you’re doing and you can’t give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You’ll be an old man before you know it.
quotes.author: Al Lopez

quotes.quote: Baseball is a man maker.
quotes.author: Al Spalding

quotes.quote: The more you play baseball, the less depends on your athletic ability. It’s a mental war more than anything.
quotes.author: Alex Rodriguez

quotes.quote: In this game of baseball, you live by the sword and die by it. You hit and get hit. Remember that.
quotes.author: Alvin Dark

quotes.quote: Every player should be accorded the privilege of at least one season with the Chicago Cubs. That’s baseball as it should be played – in God’s own sunshine. And that’s really living.
quotes.author: Alvin Dark

quotes.quote: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: You can talk about teamwork on a baseball team, but I’ll tell you, it takes teamwork when you have 2,900 men stationed on the U.S.S. Alabama in the South Pacific.
quotes.author: Bob Feller

quotes.quote: Baseball hasn’t forgotten me. I go to a lot of old-timers games and I haven’t lost a thing. I sit in the bullpen and let people throw things at me. Just like old times.
quotes.author: Bob Uecker

quotes.quote: Baseball is a game of inches.
quotes.author: Branch Rickey

quotes.quote: You could be a kid for as long as you want when you play baseball.
quotes.author: Cal Ripken

quotes.quote: I love baseball. The game allowed me the influence to impact kids in a positive way. This gives me a chance to talk to some social issues.
quotes.author: Cal Ripken

quotes.quote: I think about baseball when I wake up in the morning. I think about it all day and I dream about it at night. The only time I don’t think about it is when I’m playing it.
quotes.author: Carl Yastrzemski

quotes.quote: There are three things you can do in a baseball game. You can win, or you can lose, or it can rain.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: No baseball pitcher would be worth a darn without a catcher who could handle the hot fastball.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: Being with a woman all night never hurt no professional baseball player. It’s staying up all night looking for a woman that does him in.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: Baseball is a team game but, at the same time, it’s a very lonely game: unlike in soccer or basketball, where players roam around, in baseball everyone has their little plot of the field to tend. When the action comes to you, the spotlight is on you but no one can help you.
quotes.author: Chad Harbach

quotes.quote: No matter what I talk about, I always get back to baseball.
quotes.author: Connie Mack

quotes.quote: A baseball game is simply a nervous breakdown divided into nine innings.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: Close don’t count in baseball. Close only counts in horseshoes and hand grenades.
quotes.author: Frank Robinson

quotes.quote: They say some of my stars drink whiskey. But I have found that the ones who drink milkshakes don’t win many ball games.
quotes.author: Fred McMane

quotes.quote: One of the great things about baseball is there’s a crisis every day.
quotes.author: Gabe Paul

quotes.quote: The pitcher has got only a ball. I’ve got a bat. So the percentage of weapons is in my favor and I let the fellow with the ball do the fretting.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: I like to see the difference between good and evil as kind of like the foul line at a baseball game. It’s very thin, it’s made of something very flimsy like lime, and if you cross it, it really starts to blur where fair becomes foul and foul becomes fair. And that's where I like to play.
quotes.author: Harlan Coben

quotes.quote: Playing baseball for pay – home run. Teaching kids to play the game – priceless.
quotes.author: Jack Perconte

quotes.quote: The way I figured it, I was even with baseball and baseball with me. The game had done much for me, and I had done much for it.
quotes.author: Jackie Robinson

quotes.quote: When baseball is no longer fun, it’s no longer a game.
quotes.author: JOe DiMaggio

quotes.quote: A person always doing his or her best becomes a natural leader, just by example.
quotes.author: JOe DiMaggio

quotes.quote: Baseball is a team sport played by individuals for themselves.
quotes.author: Joe Torre

quotes.quote: Baseball is more than a game. It’s like life played out on a field.
quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

quotes.quote: Baseball is like church. Many attend few understand.
quotes.author: Leo Durocher

quotes.quote: There is no room in baseball for discrimination. It is our national pastime and a game for all.
quotes.author: Lou Gehrig

quotes.quote: Never say never in this game because crazy stuff can happen.
quotes.author: Mark Buehrle

quotes.quote: This is a great thing that’s happening in baseball. We don’t know if it'll ever happen again.
quotes.author: Mark McGwire

quotes.quote: The story of the curveball is the story of the game itself. Some would say, of life itself.
quotes.author: Martin Quigley

quotes.quote: Well, baseball was my whole life. Nothing’s ever been as fun as baseball.
quotes.author: Mickey Mantle

quotes.quote: No game in the world is as tidy and dramatically neat as baseball, with cause and effect, crime and punishment, motive and result, so cleanly defined.
quotes.author: Paul Gallico

quotes.quote: Playing baseball for a living is like having a license to steal.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: Tom Seaver's so good that blind people come to the park just to hear him pitch.
quotes.author: Reggie Jackson

quotes.quote: If my uniform doesn’t get dirty, I haven’t done anything in the baseball game.
quotes.author: Rickey Henderson

quotes.quote: People ask me what I do in winter when there’s no baseball. I’ll tell you what I do. I stare out the window and wait for spring.
quotes.author: Rogers Hornsby

quotes.quote: You gotta be a man to play baseball for a living, but you gotta have a lot of little boy in you.
quotes.author: Roy Campanella

quotes.quote: If you have a bad day in baseball, and start thinking about it, you will have 10 more.
quotes.author: Sammy Sosa

quotes.quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: Baseball gives every American boy a chance to excel, not just to be as good as someone else but to be better than someone else. This is the nature of man and the name of the game.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: There has always been a saying in baseball that you can’t make a hitter, but I think you can improve a hitter. More than you can improve a fielder. More mistakes are made hitting than in any other part of the game.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: If I was being paid thirty-thousand dollars a year, the very least I could do was hit .400.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: The good rising fastball is the best pitch in baseball.
quotes.author: Tom Seaver

quotes.quote: In baseball, my theory is to strive for consistency, not to worry about the numbers. If you dwell on statistics you get shortsighted, if you aim for consistency, the numbers will be there at the end.
quotes.author: Tom Seaver

quotes.quote: In baseball and in business, there are three types of baseball players: Those who make it happen, those who watch it happen and those who wonder what happens.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: Baseball is like driving, it’s the one who gets home safely that counts.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: Remember these two things: play hard and have fun.
quotes.author: Tony Gwynn

quotes.quote: I have observed that baseball is not unlike war, and when you get right down to it, we batters are the heavy artillery.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.quote: I see great things in baseball. It’s our game – the American game.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: It isn’t hard to be good from time to time in sports. What is tough, is being good every day.
quotes.author: Willie Mays

quotes.quote: In order to excel, you must be completely dedicated to your chosen sport. You must also be prepared to work hard and willing to accept constructive criticism. Without 100 percent dedication, you won’t be able to do this.
quotes.author: Willie Mays

quotes.quote: To me, baseball has always been a reflection of life. Like life, it adjusts. It survives everything.
quotes.author: Willie Stargell

quotes.quote: Baseball is 90 percent mental and the other half is physical.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Little League baseball is a very good thing because it keeps the parents off the streets.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Love is the most important thing in the world, but baseball is pretty good, too.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: He hits my changeup. He hits my curveball. He hits my slider. I've run out of pitches to throw him. I just try to pick the spots where he's going to hit his homeruns.
quotes.author: Brian Bohanonn

quotes.quote: Never allow the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: My job is to give my team a chance to win.
quotes.author: Nolan Ryan

quotes.quote: Good pitching will beat good hitting any time, and vice versa.
quotes.author: Bob Veale

quotes.quote: A catcher must want to catch. He must make up his mind that it isn't the terrible job it is painted, and that he isn't going to say every day, 'Why, oh why with so many other positions in baseball did I take up this one.
quotes.author: Bill Dickey

quotes.quote: Just take the ball and throw it where you want to. Throw strikes. Home plate don't move.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: The key to winning baseball games is pitching, fundamentals, and three run homers.
quotes.author: Earl Weaver

quotes.quote: When they knock you down, you not only have to get up, but you have to make it clear that you won't be knocked down a second time.
quotes.author: Carl Yastrzemski

quotes.quote: Baseball goals are attained not by strength but by perseverance.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Baseball can be slow in many ways. The action starts with when the pitcher delivers the ball. But the action really starts when the crack of the bat happens.
quotes.author: Cal Ripken, Jr.

quotes.quote: How you respond to the challenge in the second half will determine what you become after the game, whether you are a winner or a loser.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: When I played ball, I didn't play for fun. It's no pink tea, and mollycoddles had better stay out. It's a contest and everything that implies, a struggle for supremacy, a survival of the fittest.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.quote: I do what I've trained my whole life to do. I watch the ball. I keep my eye on the ball. I never stop watching. I watch it as it sails past me and lands in the catcher's mitt, a perfect and glorious strike three.
quotes.author: Barry Lyga

quotes.quote: The pitcher has to find out if the hitter is timid. And if the hitter is timid, he has to remind the hitter he's timid.
quotes.author: Don Drysdale

quotes.quote: Baseball is a lot like life. It's a day to day existence, full of ups and downs. You make the most of your opportunities in baseball as you do in life.
quotes.author: Ernie Harwell

quotes.quote: Building a baseball team is like building a house. You look for the best architects, the best builders - and then you let them do their jobs.
quotes.author: Pat Gillick

quotes.quote: There may be people that have more talent than you, but there is no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.
quotes.author: Derek Jeter

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Set your baseball goals high and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: My motto was always to keep swinging. Whether I was in a slump or feeling badly or having trouble off the field, the only thing to do was keep swinging.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: Baseball is like a poker game. Nobody wants to quit when he's losing; nobody wants you to quit when you're ahead.
quotes.author: Jackie Robinson

quotes.quote: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.
quotes.author: Bob Feller

quotes.quote: Defense usually doesn't make many headlines, but it goes a long way towards winning baseball games. There are a number of ways to make an impact during the course of a game, and playing solid, sound defense is one of them.
quotes.author: Derek Jeter

quotes.quote: Positive expectations are important for your baseball success because you tend to get what you expect.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Fundamentals are the most valuable tools a player can possess. Bunt the ball into the ground. Hit the cutoff man. Take the extra base. Learn the fundamentals.
quotes.author: Dick Williams

quotes.quote: Believe in your baseball dreams and you're halfway to reaching your baseball goals.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: If you have the right mental attitude, nothing can stop you from achieving your baseball goals.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: Catching a fly ball is a pleasure, but knowing what to do with it after you catch it is a business.
quotes.author: Tommy Henrich

quotes.quote: When you step into the batter's box, have nothing on your mind except baseball.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: A well-run restaurant is like a winning baseball team. It makes the most of every crew member's talent and takes advantage of every split-second opportunity to speed up service.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: Baseball is the only field of endeavour where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
quotes.author: Theodore Samuel

quotes.quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: You can't sit on a lead and run a few plays into the line and just kill the clock. You've got to throw the ball over the goddamn plate and give the other man his chance. That's why baseball is the greatest game of them all.
quotes.author: Earl Weaver

quotes.quote: Have confidence in your baseball ability, and then be tough enough to follow through until you reach your baseball goals.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: You can't second guess baseball. You can't second guess yourself.
quotes.author: Mariano Rivera

quotes.quote: Man may penetrate the outer reaches of the universe, he may solve the very secret of eternity itself, but for me the ultimate human experience is to witness the flawless execution of the hit-and-run.
quotes.author: Branch Rickey

quotes.quote: Be on time. Bust your butt. Play smart. And have some laugh while you're at It.
quotes.author: Whitey Herzog

quotes.quote: One of the beautiful things about baseball is that every once in a while you come into a situation where you want to, and where you have to, reach down and prove something.
quotes.author: Nolan Ryan

quotes.quote: Always play a game with somebody, never against them. Always win a game, never beat an opponent.
quotes.author: Andrew Bailey

quotes.quote: You can't be afraid to make errors! You can't be afraid to be naked before the crowd, because no one can ever master the game of baseball, or conquer it. You can only challenge it.
quotes.author: Lou Brock

quotes.quote: The formula for success is simple: practice and concentration then more practice and more concentration.
quotes.author: Babe Didrikson Zaharias

quotes.quote: The one thing I always said to myself was that when baseball started to feel more like a job, it would be time to move forward.
quotes.author: Derek Jeter

quotes.quote: It's pitching, hitting and defense that wins. Any two can win. All three make you unbeatable.
quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

quotes.quote: The key step for an infielder is the first one, but before the ball is hit.
quotes.author: Earl Weaver

quotes.quote: Baseball players with goals succeed because they know where they're going.
quotes.author: Felicity Luckey

quotes.quote: The best possible thing in baseball is winning the World Series. The second best thing is losing the World Series.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: No matter how good you are, you're going to lose one-third of your games. No matter how bad you are you're going to win one-third of your games. It's the other third that makes the difference.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: In the 8th inning you can't hear the roar of the 9th, all you can do to hold yourself together, and trust.
quotes.author: Jim Abbott

quotes.quote: You can practice shooting eight hours a day, but if your technique is wrong, then all you become is very good at shooting the wrong way. Get the fundamentals down and the level of everything you do will rise.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: As you keep shooting the ball, you become a better basketball player.
quotes.author: Raekwon

quotes.quote: Basketball is like photography, if you don't focus, all you have is the negative.
quotes.author: Dan Frisby

quotes.quote: Basketball is a game with winners and losers, but if you play this game with your heart, you're always a winner.
quotes.author: C.M.

quotes.quote: The only important shot you take is the next one. Because no matter how hard you try, that is the only one you can still have an effect on.
quotes.author: Jason Bumblis

quotes.quote: Push yourself again and again. Don't give an inch until the final buzzer sounds.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: Basketball also helps you learn to move your feet by playing defense and guarding guys, and that all carries over to playing football with staying square and having good footwork.
quotes.author: Calvin Pryor

quotes.quote: We overload in our workouts so that the game slows down in real life. It helps you become a smarter basketball player.
quotes.author: Stephen Curry

quotes.quote: You don't play against opponents, you play against the game of basketball.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: I don't know what I'm going to do tomorrow. I just know for sure I'm going to keep playing basketball.
quotes.author: Kevin Durant

quotes.quote: Me shooting 40% at the foul line is just God's way to say nobody's perfect.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.quote: All the successful teams I've ever seen have three characteristics: They play unselfish, they play together, and they play hard.
quotes.author: Larry Brown

quotes.quote: Play off your great player... great teams have a go-to player and they play off of him.
quotes.author: Don Meyer

quotes.quote: Go up to the free throw line knowing your going to make it, not knowing you won't miss.
quotes.author: Hilary Ashmead

quotes.quote: It's important for the young players to practice other ball games as well, basketball or table tennis. On the tennis court, you can improve your eye through a kind of overexertion.
quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

quotes.quote: I never looked at the consequences of missing a big shot... when you think about the consequences you always think of a negative result.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: The hardest thing for a basketball player to do is dribble two really hard dribbles. You are flying, and then pull up and shoot a ball from 15, 17 feet. It's the hardest thing in the game.
quotes.author: John Calipari

quotes.quote: You always have to give 100%,because if you don't someone, somewhere will give 100% and they will beat you when you meet.
quotes.author: Ed Macauley

quotes.quote: When you miss a shot, never think of what you did wrong. Take the next shot thinking of what you must do right.
quotes.author: Tony Alfonso

quotes.quote: I'll do whatever it takes to win games, whether it's sitting on a bench waving a towel, handing a cup of water to a teammate, or hitting the game-winning shot.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.quote: The idea is not to block every shot. The idea is to make your opponent believe that you might block every shot.
quotes.author: Bill Russell

quotes.quote: You never make any of the shots you never take. 87% of the ones you do take, you'll miss too. I make 110% of my shots.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: I just love the game of basketball so much. The game! I don't need the 18,000 people screaming and all the peripheral things. To me, the most enjoyable part is the practice and preparation.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Basketball has taught me that no matter how unlikely something is, if you set a goal, and follow after that goal with all your heart, anything is possible.
quotes.author: Ashley Graham

quotes.quote: The basketball skills I have, I've got because I work hard. When you work hard, I think you don't have to be afraid of anything.
quotes.author: Peja Stojakovic

quotes.quote: Basketball really is a metaphor for life - the intangible skills I have learned on the court, have helped shape the person I am today.
quotes.author: Ashley Graham

quotes.quote: Basketball is like war in that offensive weapons are developed first, and it always takes a while for the defense to catch up.
quotes.author: Red Auerbach

quotes.quote: Playoff basketball ... you've got to treat every possession like it's your last.
quotes.author: Paul Pierce

quotes.quote: Good teams become great ones when the members trust each other enough to surrender the Me for the We.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: The Bible will always be full of things you cannot understand, as long as you will not live according to those you can understand.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: All other Books are of little importance in comparison with the Holy Scriptures
quotes.author: Alexander Cruden

quotes.quote: Reading the Bible will help you get to know the word, but it's when you put it down and live your life that you get to know the author.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The Word of God is a Person. When you read it, do you see words or do you see Him?
quotes.author: Jacquelyn K. Heasley

quotes.quote: The Bible was written in tears, and to tears it yields its best treasures.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: It is not at all incredible, that a book which has been so long in the possession of mankind should contain many truths as yet undiscovered.
quotes.author: Bishop Butler

quotes.quote: The Christian's Bible is a drug store. Its contents remain the same, but the medical practice changes.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A thorough knowledge of the Bible is worth more than a college education.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The Bible is the greatest example of the whole being greater that its parts.
quotes.author: Michael Phillips

quotes.quote: In all my perplexities and distresses, the Bible has never failed to give me light and strength.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: It is impossible to enslave mentally or socially a Bible-reading people. The principles of the Bible are the groundwork of human freedom.
quotes.author: Horace Greeley

quotes.quote: What we really need, after all, is not to defend the Bible but to understand it.
quotes.author: Millar Burrows

quotes.quote: Where one man reads the Bible, a hundred read you and me.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: The word of God hidden in the heart is a stubborn voice to suppress.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The highest earthly enjoyments are but a shadow of the joy I find in reading God's word
quotes.author: Lady Jane Grey

quotes.quote: If you believe what you like in the Gospel, and reject what you don't like, it is not the Gospel you believe, but yourself.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.quote: The Bible is meant to be down-to-earth. It was written for real people facing real issues.
quotes.author: Judah Smith

quotes.quote: The whole hope of human progress is suspended on the ever growing influence of the Bible.
quotes.author: W.H. Seward

quotes.quote: The Bible is...as necessary to spiritual life as breath is to natural life. There is nothing more essential to our lives than the Word of God.
quotes.author: Jack Hayford

quotes.quote: The secret of my success? It is simple. It is found in the Bible.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: Both read the Bible day and night, but thou read black where I read white.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Within the covers of the Bible are the answers for all the problems men face.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: I know the Bible is inspired because it inspires me.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: I believe the Bible is the best gift God has ever given to man. All the good from The Savior of the world is communicated to us through this Book.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The Bible is the greatest of all books; to study it is the noblest of all pursuits; to understand it, the highest of all goals.
quotes.author: Charles C. Ryrie

quotes.quote: The Bible is the cornerstone of liberty...students' perusal of the sacred volume will make us better citizens, better fathers, and better husbands.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: England has two books; the Bible and Shakespeare. England made Shakespeare, but the Bible made England.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Fresh light shall yet break out from God's word
quotes.author: John Robinson

quotes.quote: The Bible is a revelation of the mind and will of God to men. Therein we may learn, what God is.
quotes.author: Jupiter Hammon

quotes.quote: No one ever graduates from BIBLE study until he meets the Author face to face
quotes.author: Everett T. Harris

quotes.quote: The inspiration of the Bible depends upon the ignorance of the gentleman who reads it.
quotes.author: Robert Ingersoll

quotes.quote: It is impossible to rightly govern the world without God and the Bible.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The Bible has noble poetry in it... and some good morals and a wealth of obscenity, and upwards of a thousand lies.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I believe that the existence of the Bible is the greatest benefit to the human race. Any attempt to belittle it, I believe, is a crime against humanity.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: The word morality, if we met it in the Bible, would surprise us as much as the word telephone or motor car.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The Bible is the book of my life. It's the book I live with, the book I live by, the book I want to die by.
quotes.author: N. T. Wright

quotes.quote: We do not read the Bible the way it is; we read it the way we are.
quotes.author: Evelyn Uyemura

quotes.quote:
The Bible is the Book of faith, and a Book of doctrine, and a Book of morals, and a Book of religion, of special revelation from God; but
it is also a Book which teaches man its responsibility, his own dignity, and his equality with his fellow man
quotes.author: Noah Webster

quotes.quote: The Bible is no mere book, but a Living Creature, with a power that conquers all that oppose it.
quotes.author: Napoleon

quotes.quote: The Bible is still loved by millions, read by millions, and studied by millions.
quotes.author: Bernard Ramm

quotes.quote: The Bible may be the truth, but it is not the whole truth and nothing but the truth.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: If you look at the Bible as a whole, it's redemptive and beautiful, and it's God's love story to mankind.
quotes.author: Tom Shadyac

quotes.quote: The Bible is only as good and decent as the person reading it.
quotes.author: Dan Savage

quotes.quote: Down through the years, I turned to the Bible and found in it all that I needed
quotes.author: Ruth Bell Graham

quotes.quote: I am busily engaged in the study of the Bible. I believe it is God's word because it finds me where I am.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Bible reading is an education in itself.
quotes.author: Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: The Bible tells me that every life is holy; the Bible tells me that every life is loved; the Bible tells me that every life is called to be all that it can be.
quotes.author: John Shelby Spong

quotes.quote: There are more sure marks of authenticity in the Bible than in any profane history. I have a fundamental belief in the Bible as the Word of God, written by men who were inspired. I study the Bible daily.
quotes.author: Sir Isaac Newton

quotes.quote: The bible when taken metaphorically, provides us the truth about god; but when taken literally, the bible provides as the truth about man.
quotes.author: Joey Lawsin

quotes.quote: Breaking up is like knocking over a Coke machine. You can't do it in one push. You gotta rock it back and forth a few times, and then it goes over.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Relationships are like broken glass. Sometimes it's better to leave them broken than hurt yourself trying to put the pieces back together.
quotes.author: Alex Haditaghi

quotes.quote: One day they'll realize they lost a diamond while playing with worthless stones.
quotes.author: Turcois Ominek

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to erase the messages, delete the numbers, and move on. You don't have to forget who that person was to you, but you do have to accept that they aren't that person anymore.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Remember that sometimes, not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Turning a breakup into a break-over We want women to know that as bad as it can be, it can also be an opportunity to reinvent yourself.
quotes.author: Greg Behrendt

quotes.quote: Walk away from it until you're stronger, All your problems will be there when you get back, but you'll be better able to cope.
quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
quotes.author: Deborah Reber

quotes.quote: Some think that holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it's letting go.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: Sometimes people put up walls, not to keep others out, but to see who cares enough to break them down.
quotes.author: Banana Yoshimoto

quotes.quote: Once you had put the pieces back together, even though you may look intact, you were never quite the same as you'd been before the fall.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Whatever it takes to break your heart and wake you up is grace.
quotes.author: Mark Matousek

quotes.quote: Letting go has never been easy, but holding on can be as difficult. Yet strength is measured not by holding on, but by letting go.
quotes.author: Lenny Santos

quotes.quote: Breakups can be sad, but sometimes tears are the price we pay for a freedom we need.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Don't cry when the sun is gone because the tears won't let you see the stars.
quotes.author: Violeta Para

quotes.quote: No matter how hard your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief.
quotes.author: Faraaz Kazi

quotes.quote: To be with a man who hasn't tried every line, who hasn't broken up with a woman every which way you can break up with them, is kind of nice.
quotes.author: Uma Thurman

quotes.quote: When we are in love, we are convinced nobody else will do. But as time goes, others do do, and often do do, much much better.
quotes.author: Coco J. Ginger

quotes.quote: Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Have you ever been hurt and the place tries to heal a bit, and you just pull the scar off of it over and over again.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: Nothing erases unpleasant thoughts more effectively than conscious concentration on pleasant ones.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.quote: Living apart is hardly possible if people have children together. It can also be more expensive to maintain two homes. But then, it's expensive to break up when you live in one property.
quotes.author: Deborah Moggach

quotes.quote: We have to do with the past only as we can make it useful to the present and the future.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: Just because a relationship ends, it doesn't mean it's not worth having.
quotes.author: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.quote: Breaking up is a natural evolution when you try to figure out what you want in life. If you're with an individual who isn't moving in the same direction and at the same rate that you are, it ain't going to work.
quotes.author: Usher

quotes.quote: Don't feel sad over someone who gave up on you, feel sorry for them because they gave up on someone who would have never given up on them.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake & help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Shaking the past, making my break, taking control, that's what it takes.
quotes.author: Kenny Loggins

quotes.quote: Breakups have a way of shaking us awake and helping us see what we really want vs. what we are willing to settle for.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: At least 80 percent of the success of the football team is determined by the fight and spirit that they put into their play.
quotes.author: George Halas

quotes.quote: The first and foremost requisite of a good football player is that he must have a burning desire to play the game. There is absolutely no substitute for this.
quotes.author: Frank Leahy

quotes.quote: In football you can make it if you've got the 'I'm-going-to-get-up-off-the-ground-and-kick-your-ass' attitude.
quotes.author: Burt Reynolds

quotes.quote: In football, you're taught to react by being aggressive, taught to react with violence. If you can't separate that on the field and off the field, you're going to be in a lot of trouble in your life.
quotes.author: Troy Polamalu

quotes.quote: Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Griffin

quotes.quote: In life, as in a football game, the principle to follow is: Hit the line hard.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In the football match, everything is complicated by the presence of the other team.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Football is the only sport where you put people together, it doesn't matter if you are rich, or poor, or black, or white. It is one nation. This is the beauty of football.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.quote: I always think about what I missed,and I think that was my driving force never be satisfied with what I've done.
quotes.author: Thierry Henry

quotes.quote: It was fun, having speed and being able to jump. Especially playing football. I played wide receiver and defensive back.
quotes.author: Jacoby Ellsbury

quotes.quote: Football is a very short-term proposition. Football really prepares you for nothing. The only thing I got out of football was the ability to work hard, and that's it.
quotes.author: Gale Sayers

quotes.quote: A football team is like a company. All of the people working in a company are not supposed to love each other, but they are supposed to be professional.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Petit

quotes.quote: Football is all about winning things as a team but it's also important to pick up individual awards along the way.
quotes.author: Steven Gerrard

quotes.quote: In football as in watchmaking, talent and elegance mean nothing without rigour and precision.
quotes.author: Lionel Messi

quotes.quote: Football is about having the best offensive play possible. I always like to play offensive football, and nobody will convince me otherwise.
quotes.author: Johan Cruijff

quotes.quote: Football is like life it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Setting a goal is not the main thing. It is deciding how you will go about achieving it and staying with that plan.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: If any thing goes bad, I did it. If anything goes semi-good, we did it. If anything goes really good, then you did it. That's all it takes to get people to win football games for you.
quotes.author: Paul Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: We believed it was not our formations that made us good, but rather how we played.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: Football is a team sport and not an individual sport. We win as a team, and every individual is better if we are part of the team.
quotes.author: Fernando Torres

quotes.quote: A good football team plays offense and defense. You have to be aggressive and disrupt.
quotes.author: Vince Flynn

quotes.quote: You have to perform at a consistently higher level than others. That's the mark of a true professional.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.quote: Football is a contact sport and there's a lot that goes into it. But I have committed myself for a long time to doing it, and because I love doing it so much I want to make that commitment.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.quote: Football is an honest game. It's true to life. It's a game about sharing. Football is a team game. So is life.
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.quote: Football is a vocation and an opportunity for ministry. But it's not a life.
quotes.author: Tony Dungy

quotes.quote: The only place you can win a football game is on the field, the only place you can lose it is in your hearts.
quotes.author: Darrell Royal

quotes.quote: A lot of football success is in the mind. You must believe you are the best and then make sure that you are.
quotes.author: Bill Shankly

quotes.quote: At the base of it was the urge, if you wanted to play football, to knock someone down, that was what the sport was all about, the will to win closely linked with contact.
quotes.author: George Plimpton

quotes.quote: Golf is the closest game to the game we call life. You get bad breaks from good shots; you get good breaks from bad shots - but you have to play the ball where it lies.
quotes.author: Bobby Jones

quotes.quote: Golf... is the infallible test. The man who can go into a patch of rough alone, with the knowledge that only God is watching him, and play his ball where it lies, is the man who will serve you faithfully and well.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: A man who can putt is a match for anyone.
quotes.author: Willie Park

quotes.quote: Golf is like fishing and hunting. What counts is the companionship and fellowship of friends, not what you catch or shoot.
quotes.author: George Archer

quotes.quote: Reverse every natural instinct and do the opposite of what you are inclined to do, and you will probably come very close to having a perfect golf swing.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: The object of golf is not just to win. It is to play like a gentleman, and win.
quotes.author: Phil Mickelson

quotes.quote: Golf, like measles, should be caught young.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Golf is a matter of confidence. If you think you cannot do it, there is no chance you will.
quotes.author: Henry Cotton

quotes.quote: Golf is a day spent in a round of strenuous idleness.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote:
I have always had a drive that pushed me to try for perfection,
and golf is a game in which perfection stays just out of reach.
quotes.author: Betsy Rawls

quotes.quote: Golf teaches us that we all have handicaps... and that hardly anybody knows what they really are.
quotes.author: Rabbi Gellman & Monsignor Hartman

quotes.quote: A bad attitude is worse than a bad swing.
quotes.author: Payne Stewart

quotes.quote: Golf is a game of ego, but it is also a game of integrity, the most important thing is you do what is right when no one is looking.
quotes.author: Tom Watson

quotes.quote: Find a good teacher that will keep the game fun. Work hard and don't be afraid to have success or disappointment. That is what golf is all about.
quotes.author: Paula Creamer

quotes.quote: Golf is a science, the study of a lifetime, in which you can exhaust yourself but never your subject.
quotes.author: David Forgan

quotes.quote: Golf is a game that's played on a five-inch course - the distance between your ears.
quotes.author: Bobby Jones

quotes.quote: Golf is like solitaire. When you cheat, you only cheat yourself.
quotes.author: Tony Lema

quotes.quote: One of the most fascinating things about golf is how it reflects the cycle of life. No matter what you shoot â€“ the next day you have to go back to the first tee and begin all over again and make yourself into something.
quotes.author: Peter Jacobsen

quotes.quote: Do your best, one shot at a time and then move on. Remember that golf is just a game.
quotes.author: Nancy Lopez

quotes.quote: Golf has an ambivalent relationship with the environment. On one hand, it's a great preserver of open spaces. Golf doesn't pave the world - it helps to green the world. But the downside is, it uses a lot of fertilizer, pesticides and water.
quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

quotes.quote: A golfer has to train his swing on the practice tee, then trust it on the course.
quotes.author: Dr. Bob Rotella

quotes.quote: Achievements on the golf course are not what matters, decency and honesty are what matter.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.quote: The game has such a hold on golfers because they compete not only against an opponent, but also against the course, against par, and most surely- against themselves.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Don't play too much golf. Two rounds a day are plenty.
quotes.author: Harry Vardon

quotes.quote: Success in golf depends less on strength of body, more on strength of mind and character.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: A perfectly straight shot with a big club is a fluke.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Golf is a compromise between what your ego wants you to do, what experience tells you to do, and what your nerves let you do.
quotes.author: Bruce Crampton

quotes.quote: Golf gives you an insight into human nature, your own as well as your opponent's.
quotes.author: Grantland Rice

quotes.quote: Golf is fundamentally about being honest. I see people hit eight shots and tell me they shot five. I never say a word. It is a reminder to me of what is at stake.
quotes.author: Martin Sheen

quotes.quote: Golf is a game of endless failure and frustration.
quotes.author: Mike Greenberg

quotes.quote: The most important shot in golf is the next one.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: Golf is not, on the whole, a game for realists. By its exactitudes of measurements it invites the attention of perfectionists.
quotes.author: Heywood Hale Broun

quotes.quote: Golf is 90% mental. Once you know how to hold the club, swing it, it's all in the mind.
quotes.author: Dan Jenkins

quotes.quote: Golf is game of respect and sportsmanship; we have to respect its traditions and its rules.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Confidence is king in golf.
quotes.author: Jason Dufner

quotes.quote: Golf is all about patience - one tournament is four days long, 18 holes a day.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.quote: They say golf is like life, but don't believe them. Golf is more complicated than that.
quotes.author: Gardner Dickinson

quotes.quote: Golf is a great example to me. Golf is a metaphor of life. I mean, every shot. You have this beautiful hole, this beautiful opportunity to get a good score.
quotes.author: Nick Saban

quotes.quote: Golf is about how well you accept, respond to, and score with your misses much more so than it is a game of your perfect shots.
quotes.author: Dr. Bob Rotella

quotes.quote: Golf at its measured pace permits an electric excess of mental activity.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Golf is a spiritual game. It's like Zen. You have to let your mind take over.
quotes.author: Amy Alcott

quotes.quote: Confidence in golf means being able to concentrate on the problem at hand with no outside interference.
quotes.author: Tom Watson

quotes.quote: A round of golf is the ideal antidote to stress.
quotes.author: Bruce Forsyth

quotes.quote: But in the end it's still a game of golf, and if at the end of the day you can't shake hands with your opponents and still be friends, then you've missed the point.
quotes.author: Payne Stewart

quotes.quote: You must remind yourself at all times that the golf ball is nothing. It's an object. It's something to be swatted and sometimes lost and not even looked for.
quotes.author: Dan Jenkins

quotes.quote: Golf is a search for perfection, for balance. It's about meditation and concentration. You have to use hand and brain.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: Golf is deceptively simple and endlessly complicated; it satisfies the soul and frustrates the intellect. It is at the same time rewarding and maddening - and it is without a doubt the greatest game mankind has ever invented.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: A kid grows up a lot faster on the golf course. Golf teaches you how to behave.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: There is no king of golf. Never has been, never will be. Golf is the most democratic game on Earth... It punishes and exalts us all with splendid equal opportunity.
quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

quotes.quote: Golf is not just exercise; it is an adventure, a romance. A Shakespeare play in which disaster and comedy are intertwined. You have to live with the consequences of each action.
quotes.author: Harold Segall

quotes.quote: Inspirational golf require patience and courage, persistence and honesty, focus and self-belief.
quotes.author: Richard Allen

quotes.quote: Inspirational golf present similar challenges and involve the weighing up of risk and the making of hard decisions.
quotes.author: Richard Allen

quotes.quote: Inspirational golf requires learning to deal with triumph and disaster.
quotes.author: Richard Allen

quotes.quote: Inspirational golf reaches us about ego and resilience.
quotes.author: Richard Allen

quotes.quote: Inspirational golf implores us to meet challenges and put disappointments into perspective.
quotes.author: Richard Allen

quotes.quote: You can be conservative, aggressive or smart. In golf and in life you need to get smarter as time passes by.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Inspirational golf would expect future golf champions to hail from.
quotes.author: Richard Allen

quotes.quote: Golf Is a game of confidence, encourages golfers, no matter what their level, to reach new heights in their games and their lives.
quotes.author: Bob Rotella

quotes.quote: Whether you're a world-class player or a weekend enthusiast, improving your golf game begins with your mind.
quotes.author: Marlin M. Mackenzie

quotes.quote: Perfectionism, though, is the compulsion that things must be just so; it generates a pressure to perform beyond anyone's capability, let alone your own.
quotes.author: Marlin M. Mackenzie

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a perfect golf shot. Perfect performance in golf, as in any sport, is a paradox.
quotes.author: Marlin M. Mackenzie

quotes.quote: Perfection becomes a myth. It is replaced by the knowledge that making errors and correcting them is what makes a good golf shot, including a hole-in-one.
quotes.author: Marlin M. Mackenzie

quotes.quote: Trust your muscles and hit the ball to the hole.
quotes.author: Jim Sheard

quotes.quote: The grip is the all-important fundamental of the golf stroke because it is your contact with the club.
quotes.author: Jim Sheard

quotes.quote: It is through the hands that you must transmit your power and control your shot.
quotes.author: Jim Sheard

quotes.quote: Golf is a game in which you yell fore, shoot six, and write down five.
quotes.author: Andre Huu

quotes.quote: Perfection is unattainable. This is the beautiful challenge of golf and life.
quotes.author: Andre Huu

quotes.quote: Golf is a puzzle without an answer, I've played the game for forty years, and I still haven't the slightest idea how to play it.
quotes.author: Andre Huu

quotes.quote: You may not appreciate the presence of good health, but you will definitely regret the absence of good health, because health is happiness.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Health is the greatest possession. Contentment is the greatest treasure. Confidence is the greatest friend. Non-being is the greatest joy.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year.
quotes.author: Franklin Pierce Adams

quotes.quote: Health is actually the foundational tool to help us live the life.
quotes.author: Hill Harper

quotes.quote: People who laugh actually live longer than those who don't laugh. Few persons realize that health actually varies according to the amount of laughter.
quotes.author: James Joseph Walsh

quotes.quote: Your health is what you make of it. Everything you do and think either adds to the vitality, energy and spirit you possess or takes away from it.
quotes.author: Ann Wigmore

quotes.quote: Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind and spirit. When one is free from physical disabilities and mental distractions, the gates of the soul open.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: The foundation of success in life is good health: that is the substratum fortune; it is also the basis of happiness. A person cannot accumulate a fortune very well when he is sick.
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.quote: Health is a large word. It embraces not the body only, but the mind and spirit as well; and not today's pain or pleasure alone, but the whole being and outlook of a man.
quotes.author: James H. West

quotes.quote: Put the right pitching mechanics together with good health, and there's nothing surprising about lasting a long time.
quotes.author: Nolan Ryan

quotes.quote: Healthy foods should not be underestimated. Your body needs good food to focus.
quotes.author: R. C. Connor

quotes.quote: Health is like munny, we never have a true idea of its value until we lose it.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quotes.quote: The ingredients of health and long life, are great temperance, open air, easy labor, and little care.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: It is good health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: What health is to the body, even that is honesty to the soul. Develop your spirit that it may gain strength to control the body and follow the natural laws of nutrition and hygiene.
quotes.author: Kemetic Wisdom

quotes.quote: The health of the people is really the foundation upon which all their happiness and all their powers as a state depend.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Take a few minutes each and every day to ensure that your mind is nourished properly and positively. After all, a healthy mind leads to a happier view of life and with a happier view of life it is much easier to counter the negative impact other issues will have on us.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Poor health is not caused by something you don't have it's caused by disturbing something that you already have. Healthy is not something that you need to get, it's something you have already if you don't disturb it.
quotes.author: Dean Ornish

quotes.quote: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, nor to worry about the future, but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly.
quotes.author: Bukkyo Dendo Kyokai

quotes.quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: You can't do it for someone else. No matter how much they motivate or inspire you, you have to do it for yourself. Your health is YOUR responsibility.
quotes.author: Toni Sorenson

quotes.quote: Health is not an objective condition which can be understood by the methods of natural science alone. It is rather a condition related to the mental attitude by which the individual has to value what is essential for his life.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.quote: Sleep is the most important repair mechanism our body has, and getting enough of it will ensure you're feeling fit and energized the next day.
quotes.author: Jason Smith
