quotes.quote: My motivation is not to try to inspire, but rather to do things that inspire me and hopefully that will spread to others.
quotes.author: Amy Purdy

quotes.quote: Don't be scared to fly high, 'cause it will inspire others.
quotes.author: Kerli

quotes.quote: You have to inspire others, solve problems, which means you have to leave your own problems at home.
quotes.author: Anthony E. Zuiker

quotes.quote: Inspiring others to find their voices. None of us is born to hate. We're taught to. That's why we need heroes, to remind us that we are all meant to fight for truth and justice. To take a stand against fear and hate.
quotes.author: Alfred Gough

quotes.quote: And I do try to inspire others to be everything they are capable of being. If this is sedition, then I am guilty.
quotes.author: Christian Williams

quotes.quote: That is why we all need heroes, to set a higher standard that others can aspire to.
quotes.author: Christian Williams

quotes.quote: It's not about being better, you know, or anything-anything like that. You know, it's about being inspired. And I'm inspired by everybody. I'm inspired by all kinds of people. You know, it's art to me. You know, and with art- it's just showing something that you've never seen before.
quotes.author: John Ridley

quotes.quote: Inspiration, perhaps. How do we inspire ourselves to greatness when nothing less will do? How do we inspire everyone around us? I sometimes think it is by using the work of others.
quotes.author: Anthony Peckham

quotes.quote: We need inspiration Francois. Because in order to build our nation we must exceed our own expectations.
quotes.author: Anthony Peckham

quotes.quote: The eagle, soaring, clear-eyed, competitive, prepared to strike, but not a vulture. Noble, visionary, majestic, that people can believe in and be inspired by, that creates such a lift that it soars.
quotes.author: Joel Bakan

quotes.quote: Never fear it, you'll see it through. / Hearts can inspire other hearts with their fire. / For the strong obey when a strong man shows them the way.
quotes.author: Oscar Hammersteir

quotes.quote: But will inspire others by his good example / You are being watched by the nation / And you should realize / That you, will satisfy it if you do good
quotes.author: Wasalu Muhammad Jaco

quotes.quote: Beautiful are the feet, of those who carry this gospel / Oh if you only knew, the things that they go through / Yet they still care / They inspire others to live / Beautiful they have beautiful feet
quotes.author: Donald L Lawrence

quotes.quote: You used to inspire others with your way of thinking and speech / People came from afar just to hear us teach
quotes.author: Outlandish

quotes.quote: You inspire me to be better / You challenge me for the better
quotes.author: Robert G Waller

quotes.quote: Steaming neon's in the rain / Diamonds down the memory drain / But you inspire me, fuel and fire me
quotes.author: Marc Almond

quotes.quote: I wrote these words: to inspire a change / (To inspire a change) / Yeah, anyone who's livin' life can relate to what I write cuz it's time for a change / Look / I'm tired of hiding the pain; I'm tryna smile again
quotes.author: Alexander Star

quotes.quote: Never let go of your plan, execute / So when you shoot, inspire everyone on the land / Never lose knowledge of yourself / For it may become risk to your health
quotes.author: Clifford Smith

quotes.quote: His words left behind / to inspire and remind / —of those things that we still have to learn
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Everything written to inspire / makes the old new again / In ways that only / the heart can feel / —and the spirit know
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: In sounds that may prevail; / Sounds that gentle thoughts inspire: / Though so exalted she / And I so lowly be / Tell her, such different notes make all thy harmony.
quotes.author: Abraham Cowley

quotes.quote: Though great teachers certainly do inspire, teaching is love twined with labor, and teachers themselves need inspiration.
quotes.author: Noah Benshea

quotes.quote: By reaching out to others with the power and ability you've been given, you never know who you're helping and whose life you are creating and leaving an impact on as you encourage, motivate and inspire them, too.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: Always AIM-Aspire, Inspire, and Motivate-in life for your goals and dreams as you follow your own visions and dreams to create a change.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: Once we aspire to become who we want to be, then we inspire ourselves as we begin to realize the strengths we have which in turn inspires us to push ourselves to exceed our own limitations and to continue to rise above and go beyond.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: Inspire someone with your story and/or through acts of kindness.
quotes.author: Lillé McGhee Queen

quotes.quote: People who aspire to something need inspiration. So, aspire to inspire them and inspire yourself to aspire also.
quotes.author: Nasreen Variyawa

quotes.quote: Encouraging others, through words or actions helps to inspire and encourage you in return. You are helping others exactly the same time you are helping yourself.
quotes.author: Nasreen Variyawa

quotes.quote: Somehow, inspiring and encouraging others is quite invigorating. Positive acceptance and action that others take through your encouragement somehow renews your own resolve to continue on your journey.
quotes.author: Nasreen Variyawa

quotes.quote: To lead others, you need to motivate them; to motivate people, you need first to motivate yourself.
quotes.author: Max Landsberg

quotes.quote: The visionary who cannot inspire is not a leader.
quotes.author: Max Landsberg

quotes.quote: If you can't get motivated about your current role, then change to a role which does excite you, and where your excitement will motivate others.
quotes.author: Max Landsberg

quotes.quote: When we seek to expand our influence and inspire others to find their voice, we move into the world of relationships.
quotes.author: RoseAnne O'Brien Vojtek

quotes.quote: For school leaders to effectively motivate, lead, and inspire others, they must get to know themselves first by using their intrapersonal intelligence and skills by structuring time daily for reflection and self-evaluation.
quotes.author: RoseAnne O'Brien Vojtek

quotes.quote: Good leaders need the ability to inspire and to nurture an inspiring workplace.
quotes.author: Allison Holzer

quotes.quote: Leadership can happen--and is called for--from wherever they stand in the organization. They inspire others to inspire others, and in doing so, they help to build a culture of inspiration.
quotes.author: Allison Holzer

quotes.quote: Inspiration, to me, is caring and being able to...trigger or support others in caring, all to a degree beyond what we had ever imagined possible.
quotes.author: Dennis Driver

quotes.quote: What we have learned in sorrows helps inspire others.
quotes.author: Chalmers

quotes.quote: Inspiration is given to inspire. We give what we receive.
quotes.author: David O. Mears

quotes.quote: We may need inspiration ourselves one hour, and be called upon to give inspiration to others the next.
quotes.author: David O. Mears

quotes.quote: The ability to inspire others does not necessarily require great physical strength or health.
quotes.author: David O. Mears

quotes.quote: Good deeds inspire remembrance in return.
quotes.author: David O. Mears

quotes.quote: Continue in such a work of inspiration for others, the world would take on a new appearance within less than twelve months.
quotes.author: David O. Mears

quotes.quote: Leading is doing. To lead, I must move forward.
quotes.author: Andy Andrews

quotes.quote: Being inspirational is not same as having a charisma. Inspiring leaders understand that, in reality, they do not actually inspire others. Rather, they create an environment in which others can find their own inspiration.
quotes.author: Jonathan Perks MBE

quotes.quote: Inspiring leadership is not soft and fluffy. It encompasses an honest an courageous approach to dealing with people.
quotes.author: Jonathan Perks MBE

quotes.quote: I believe that we all have the power to inspire others and shape the world around us.
quotes.author: John Christensen

quotes.quote: The way you see and think and act can inspire those around you in ways you may never know if you don't step out in action and begin sharing your mindset.
quotes.author: John Christensen

quotes.quote: To empower others to share the messages that are within them in a way that meaningfully inspires , influences and impacts others.
quotes.author: Derek Roberts

quotes.quote: We learn to inspire others by being inspired by others. Developing this ability requires that you pay attention to what moves other people and what other people want.
quotes.author: James E. Lukaszewski

quotes.quote: The word 'inspire' means to breathe into, to touch the spirit--the spirit being our life force, our breath.
quotes.author: Ric Stuecker

quotes.quote: We inspire as role models, in what we say and do and what they observe us doing.
quotes.author: Ric Stuecker

quotes.quote: Inspiring leadership rests on integrity, responsibility, compassion, and peace.
quotes.author: Ric Stuecker

quotes.quote: You can inspire people by consistently setting an example worthy of emulation.
quotes.author: David L. Goetsch

quotes.quote: You inspire people by being the type of person they would like to be.
quotes.author: David L. Goetsch

quotes.quote: The goals that we are striving for, the missions that we have in life, should challenge us to be more than we ever hoped to be. However, they should also inspire others to dream bigger.
quotes.author: Mike Mason

quotes.quote: The creative instincts, the love force must be nourished with every beat of our hearts until they overbalance the destructive instincts.
quotes.author: Gladys Taber

quotes.quote: There are few instincts more natural than the body in full motion as it races across a field or through the trees.
quotes.author: Neal Bascomb

quotes.quote: Trust your instincts, and make judgements on what your heart tells you. The heart will not betray you.
quotes.author: David Gemmell

quotes.quote: You can find the way by yourself naturally, you just need a guide to tell you to be careful, to not do this to impress people, just follow your instincts.
quotes.author: Sebastien Foucan

quotes.quote: Trust your instincts: they tend to see you right. By listening to them, at least you can sleep at night.
quotes.author: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quotes.quote: Trust your instincts. Intuition doesn't lie.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Follow your instincts and live with the consequences.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Always listen to your inner voice, your instincts.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: It's good to go with your gut instincts in life. You just should. Even if it doesn't work out, something good will come out of it.
quotes.author: Karen Gillan

quotes.quote: Trust what your instincts are telling you, it's your souls voice pointing you in the right direction.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: Just listen to your instincts. Don't talk to someone or start a relationship out of pity.
quotes.author: Chris Bosh

quotes.quote: Once you have confidence in your instincts, you must never allow other people's refusal to believe, or their data to refute, what you instinctively know is true.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts. And never hope more than you work.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Follow your instincts. That's where true wisdom manifests itself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Purity does not mean crushing the instincts but having the instincts as servants and not the master of the spirit.
quotes.author: Eric Liddell

quotes.quote: Listening to your instincts, while being the easiest, can also be the hardest thing to do.
quotes.author: Tena Desae

quotes.quote: Survival instincts are one of those things that never die.
quotes.author: Kiersten White

quotes.quote: The truth of your instincts is the root of your foundation.
quotes.author: Sanford Meisner

quotes.quote: You've got to trust your instincts, your judgment and trust the storytelling that came before and the quality of the acting with the emotion.
quotes.author: Jean-Marc Vallee

quotes.quote: Follow your instincts - you never know if your ideas will work out unless you try them.
quotes.author: Lulu Guinness

quotes.quote: Work hard, be patient, and be a sponge while learning your business. Learn how to take criticism. Follow your gut instincts and don't compromise.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: Be willing to trust your instincts, especially if you cannot find answers elsewhere.
quotes.author: Biran Koslow

quotes.quote: Follow your heart, your instincts. People might try to dissuade you from your passion, but no one can live your life but you.
quotes.author: Olympia Dukakis

quotes.quote: Go with your gut instincts even if it is contrarian to what the experts suggest.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Listen to your instincts and ignore everything else.
quotes.author: Judith Mcnaught

quotes.quote: Learn to nurture and trust your instincts as well as your conscious reasoning. Often, one's instincts will offer the better judgment.
quotes.author: Ken Danby

quotes.quote: Follow your instincts and do not let other people's opinion of you become your opinion of yourself.
quotes.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.quote: We all have good instincts unless they're beaten out of us or shamed out of us in childhood.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Feeling fear is a good sign that your survival instincts are intact. You need to appreciate the dangers to stay safe.
quotes.author: Zoe Bell

quotes.quote: Good instincts usually tell you what to do long before your head has figured it out.
quotes.author: Michael Burke

quotes.quote: There is nothing wrong with having competitive instincts. They are survival instincts.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: Learn to trust your instincts. Only something dead goes with the tide. Only something living can go against it.
quotes.author: Tony Parsons

quotes.quote: Sometimes you just have to trust your instincts; it may be all you have to trust.
quotes.author: Jocelyn Murray

quotes.quote: Trust your instincts, and take control.
quotes.author: John Houston

quotes.quote: Act before you think â€“ your instincts are more honest than your thoughts.
quotes.author: Sanford Meisner

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you're going fast, your instincts can be very useful.
quotes.author: Andrea Arnold

quotes.quote: Instincts and intuition should never be ignored.
quotes.author: Brenda Priddy

quotes.quote: You know your gut instincts are spot on about a person when you can also detect a water source in the soil beneath them.
quotes.author: Dane Cook

quotes.quote: Follow your instincts, and handle all with respect and diplomacy.
quotes.author: Rachael Yamagata

quotes.quote: Trust your instincts. If you have no instincts, trust your impulses.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: What ever the motive for the insult, it is always best to overlook it; for folly doesn't deserve resentment, and malice is punished by neglect.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A graceful taunt is worth a thousand insults.
quotes.author: Louis Nizer

quotes.quote: It is very clear that one way to challenge insults is to submit to them.
quotes.author: Aime Martin

quotes.quote: An insult directed at the wicked is not to be censured; on the contrary, the honest man, if he has sense, can only applaud.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: Don't argue. Never deign to deny. Meet insults with laughter.
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: You don't take insults. You leave them with the insulter.
quotes.author: Milton H. Erickson

quotes.quote: If you take the the insults of your fellow human beings personally, you will be offended for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: These kind of hair-breadth missings of happiness look like the insults of fortune.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: If you speak insults you will hear them also.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: An insult is either sustained or destroyed, not by the disposition of those who insult, but by the disposition of those who bear it.
quotes.author: Saint John Chrysostom

quotes.quote: To insult a friend implies that you respect his masculinity enough to know he can take it without acting like a crybaby. The swapping of insults, like the fighting between brothers, becomes the seal of the male bonding.
quotes.author: Frank Pittman

quotes.quote: The way to procure insults is to submit to them. A man meets with no more respect than he exacts.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Never insult a writer. You may find yourself immortalized in ways you may not appreciate.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Insults are engendered from vulgar minds, like toadstools from a dunghill.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: A man who insults the modesty of a woman, as good as tells her that he has seen something in her conduct that warranted his presumption.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless, and knowledge without integrity is dangerous and dreadful.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody's going to know whether you did it or not.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Integrity is telling myself the truth. And honesty is telling the truth to other people.
quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

quotes.quote: A person is not given integrity. It results from the relentless pursuit of honesty at all times.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing more completely baffles one who is full of tricks and duplicity than straight forward and simple integrity in another.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb

quotes.quote: Integrity is not something that you should have to think about...nor consider doing...but something in the heart that is already done.
quotes.author: Doug Firebaugh

quotes.quote: If you tell the truth you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You have the right to remain silent, but you can never repeat, never lie or shade the truth.
quotes.author: Robert L. Woodrum

quotes.quote: You are already of consequence in the world if you are known as a man of strict integrity.
quotes.author: Grenville Klesier

quotes.quote: Keep true, never be ashamed of doing right, decide on what you think is right and stick to it.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Men acquire a particular quality by constantly acting in a particular way.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: He is not wise to me who is wise in words only, but he who is wise in deeds.
quotes.author: St. Gregory

quotes.quote: Power is actualized only when word and deed have not parted company.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: We should often feel ashamed of our best actions if the world could see all the motives which produced them.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The true perfection of man lies not in what man has, but in what man is.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Integrity is so perishable in the summer months of success.
quotes.author: Vanessa Redgrave

quotes.quote: Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Perhaps the surest test of an individual's integrity is his refusal to do or say anything that would damage his self-respect.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Your reputation and integrity are everything. Follow through on what you say you're going to do. Your credibility can only be built over time, and it is built from the history of your words and actions.
quotes.author: Maria Razumich-Zec

quotes.quote: Character is what you are in the dark.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: To know what is right and not do it is the worst cowardice.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: To thine own self be true, and it must follow, as the night the day, thou canst not then be false to any man.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The integrity of men is to be measured by their conduct, not by their professions.
quotes.author: Junius

quotes.quote: Once you get rid of integrity the rest is a piece of cake.
quotes.author: Larry Hagman

quotes.quote: Character is doing the right thing when nobody's looking. There are too many people who think that the only thing that's right is to get by; and the only thing that's wrong is to get caught.
quotes.author: J.C. Watts Jr.

quotes.quote: In silence man can most readily preserve his integrity.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Integrity is not a 90 percent thing, not a 95 percent thing; either you have it or you don't.
quotes.author: Peter Scotese

quotes.quote: Integrity is the essence of everything successful.
quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: The slow man with integrity will ultimately catch the swift one who has none.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you believe in unlimited quality and act in all your business dealings with total integrity, the rest will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Frank Perdue

quotes.quote: A life lived with integrity even if it lacks the trappings of fame and fortune is a shining star in whose light others may follow in the years to come.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Integrity is not a conditional word. It doesn't blow in the wind or change with the weather. It is your inner image of yourself, and if you look in there and see a man who won't cheat, then you know he never will.
quotes.author: John D. MacDonald

quotes.quote: Integrity is the first step to true greatness.
quotes.author: Charles Simmons

quotes.quote: In great matters men show themselves as they wish to be seen; in small matters, as they are.
quotes.author: Gamaliel Bradford

quotes.quote: There is always room for those who can be relied upon to deliver the goods when they say they will.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: There is no better test of a man's integrity than his behavior when he is wrong.
quotes.author: Marvin Williams

quotes.quote: People who fight fire with fire end up with only the ashes of their own integrity.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: There can be no happiness if the things we believe in are different from the things we do.
quotes.author: Freya Stark

quotes.quote: Courage combined with integrity is the foundation of character.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: That you may retain your self-respect, it is better to displease the people by doing what you know is right, than to temporarily please them by doing what you know is wrong.
quotes.author: William Boetcker

quotes.quote: It takes less time to do a thing right than to explain why you did it wrong.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Like integrity, love of life was not a subject to be studied, it was a contagion to be caught. And you had to catch it from someone who had it.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Truthfulness is the main element of character.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Integrity is what we do, what we say, and what we say we do.
quotes.author: Don Galer

quotes.quote: If you don't have integrity, you have nothing. You can't buy it.
quotes.author: Henry Kravis

quotes.quote: A man should be upright, not be kept upright.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Integrity has no need of rules.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The only correct actions are those that demand no explanation and no apology.
quotes.author: Red Auerbach

quotes.quote: Never "for the sake of peace and quiet" deny your own experience or convictions.
quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

quotes.quote: Listen with curiosity. Speak with honesty. Act with integrity. The greatest problem with communication is we don’t listen to understand. We listen to reply. When we listen with curiosity, we don’t listen with the intent to reply. We listen for what’s behind the words.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Living with integrity means: Not settling for less than what you know you deserve in your relationships. Asking for what you want and need from others. Speaking your truth, even though it might create conflict or tension. Behaving in ways that are in harmony with your personal values. Making choices based on what you believe, and not what others believe.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: Don't assume, ask. Be kind. Tell the truth. Don't say anything you can't stand behind fully. Have integrity. Tell people how you feel.
quotes.author: Warsan Shire

quotes.quote: Integrity is doing the right thing when nobody's watching, and doing as you say you would do.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Nothing is at last sacred but the integrity of your own mind.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Integrity is the ability to stand by an idea.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Your integrity determines your destiny.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: Integrity is doing the right thing, even if nobody is watching.
quotes.author: Jim Stovall

quotes.quote: Some say if you want success surround yourself with successful people. I say if you want true and lasting success surround yourself with people of integrity.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: The person of superior integrity does not insist upon his integrity. For this reason, he has integrity. The person of inferior integrity never loses sight of his integrity. For this reason, he lacks integrity.
quotes.author: Lao-Tzu

quotes.quote: A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Bisset

quotes.quote: Only a man of integrity can possess the virtue of honesty, since only the faking of one’s consciousness can permit the faking of existence.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Who you are in public is a test of your conviction; who you are in private, integrity.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Her strength was in the integrity of her actions; she never compromised what she believed she ought to do.
quotes.author: Charles Finch

quotes.quote: Integrity is congruence between what you know, what you profess, and what you do.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: A few people of integrity can go a long way.
quotes.author: Bill Kauth

quotes.quote: A leader with integrity, one who says what they mean, keeps their word and does not lie to their people.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Integrity is the recognition of the fact that you cannot fake your consciousness, just as honesty is the recognition of the fact that you cannot fake existence.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Don’t ever stray from yourself, in order to be close to someone that doesn’t have the courtesy to remind you of your worth, or the integrity of a gentleman to walk you home.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a minor lapse of integrity
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Truth and integrity must be so rare these days that it confuses people when they hear it.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: Aesthetics of integrity. For every star in the sky someone is holding his ground.
quotes.author: Kenneth Koch

quotes.quote: Living a life of integrity is one of the greatest missions we can undertake.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: Your integrity is sacrosanct. It is who you are. Never let anyone step on your integrity - that's absolutely where you must stand solid.
quotes.author: Ret. Gen. Peter Pace

quotes.quote: A life of integrity is a life of stability.
quotes.author: Jeremy Gove

quotes.quote: it is easier to work on your integrity when no one knows you than to start working on it when you are at the top.
quotes.author: Manuel Corazzari

quotes.quote: Do not give up on your idealism and integrity.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: Don’t trade in your integrity for influence.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: Character is holding to our integrity when everyone around us is holding on to everything except their integrity and pressing us to do the same.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: True integrity holds its ground even when such a stance means that you have let go of everything else that’s sitting on that ground.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: A person's behavior reflects nothing but the mirror of an aura he/she brought up in. Never doubt their integrity because of their insecurities.
quotes.author: Surjeet Kumar

quotes.quote: From the crucible of courage, perseverance, and integrity comes triumph.
quotes.author: Brian Goedken

quotes.quote: We can test the substance of our own integrity and love when we witness what flows from our hearts when someone disagrees.
quotes.author: Traci Lea Larussa

quotes.quote: Those who are busy can’t think clearly and honestly. Those who go slow let the truth come to them and lives in integrity.
quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

quotes.quote: Your integrity, your dignity, your honor - they aren't for sale. Not ever. Not to anyone.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: You already hold the most valuable possession you will ever own, your integrity.
quotes.author: T Jay Taylor

quotes.quote: Undeniable integrity is the absolute supreme quality. Without it, no genuine accomplishment is attainable.
quotes.author: Karl Wiggins

quotes.quote: People with integrity expect to be believed. If not, they let time prove them right.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: The soul will remain faithful to its integrity forever. The spirit does not betray.
quotes.author: Prof.Salam Al Shereida

quotes.quote: Honesty creates integrity. Integrity creates inner peace.
quotes.author: PJ Ferguson

quotes.quote: Integrity is not a laughing matter but a serious issue, If a man cannot account for how a dollar committed to his hands was spent, don't expect he will be able to account for a million dollar.
quotes.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

quotes.quote: Remain calm even in the mist of mistrust and accusations. Your integrity and track records will surely speak for you.
quotes.author: Wisdom Kwashie Mensah

quotes.quote: Integrity means that if our private life was suddenly exposed, we'd have no reason to be ashamed and embarrassed.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Integrity means our outward life is consistent with our inner convictions.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Integrity is the glue that holds our way of life together.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Integrity means a person is the same on the inside as he or she claims to be on the outside.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: A man of integrity can be trusted.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Being pure in conduct also includes honesty and integrity in dealing with our fellowmen.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: When we live by the truth, we possess integrity.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Integrity means that we are trustworthy and dependable, and our character is above approach.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: I believe integrity can be restored to a society one person at a time. The choice belongs to each of us.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Integrity is what you feel.
quotes.author: Ted Danson

quotes.quote: Integrity is determined behavior.
quotes.author: Marvin Soskil

quotes.quote: The key to integrity is to determine a sense of inner directedness that does not yield to the pressures of the age, that identifies with the highest rather than the lowest, the best rather than the worst, the ideal rather than the average, the excellent rather than mediocre.
quotes.author: Marvin Soskil

quotes.quote: Integrity is a lifestyle characterized by the indwelling of God's word.
quotes.author: Marvin Soskil

quotes.quote: A person who has integrity is neither self-deceived nor self-divided.
quotes.author: Marvin Soskil

quotes.quote: The real bond of integrity is religious in character, for religion indicates the oneness of the world of humanity.
quotes.author: Marvin Soskil

quotes.quote: Having integrity in some way contributes to the wholeness or completeness of a person and leads to consistency in thought and action over time.
quotes.author: Marvin Soskil

quotes.quote: Integrity is the basis of trust.
quotes.author: Marvin Soskil

quotes.quote: Integrity in turn creates the trust that we need for ordinary social and political intercourse.
quotes.author: Marvin Soskil

quotes.quote: The concept of integrity is about needing wholeness of character.
quotes.author: Marvin Soskil

quotes.quote: He who walks with integrity walks securely.
quotes.author: Proverbs 10:9

quotes.quote: Once you loose your integrity, you can never get it back.
quotes.author: Richard Exley

quotes.quote: Integrity has no sliding scale. You either have it or you don't.
quotes.author: Rosemarie Grego

quotes.quote: Integrity was very important.
quotes.author: James Dobson

quotes.quote: Having integrity means more to us than simply the absence of deception.
quotes.author: Scott Cook

quotes.quote: When your character and reputation are the same, you are a person of integrity.
quotes.author: Harry Piland

quotes.quote: The word integrity means 'oneness'. A person's words, thoughts, and actions are one.
quotes.author: John Maxwell

quotes.quote: There are a lot of things in life over which we have no control; however integrity is one area over which each of us has 100% control.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Dole

quotes.quote: To keep one's own integrity, be merciful and uncorrupted and not wish for evil; and not be duped.
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: Integrity is wholeness, the greatest beauty is.
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: Fought like an indefatigable soldier; when the question arose of defending your persona your true integrity.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: They have strange quiet, integrity, health, soundness, to the full. They've dealt with life and been tempered by it.
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: Nothing sidelining it; not even the most obfuscated ingredient of royalty attempting to devour its altruistically brilliant and impregnably sparkling integrity.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Let the intellect alone, it has its usefulness in its proper sphere, but let it not interfere with the flowing of the life-stream.
quotes.author: D.T. Suzuki

quotes.quote: As brain functioning becomes more and more integrated, consciousness the mind becomes more and more invincible, and then any dictate of the mind is immediately followed by the body.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.quote: Intelligence solves everything but only intellect can solve anything.
quotes.author: Sabesh Bharathi

quotes.quote: The intellect is a cold thing and a merely intellectual idea will never stimulate thought in the same manner that a spiritual idea does.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: Intelligence is just one dimension of ability. Don't limit yourself to it. Open up to instinct, intuition, creativity and thus possibility.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Through shallow intellect, the mind becomes shallow, and one eats the fly, along with the sweets.
quotes.author: Guru Nanak

quotes.quote: Your intellect may be confused, but your emotions will never lie to you.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: The highest intellects, like the tops of mountains, are the first to catch and to reflect the dawn.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.quote: Our intellect is not intended to be an end in itself, but only a means to the very mind of God.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: Man's mind may be likened to a garden, which may be intelligently cultivated or allowed to run wild.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: You should be able to use your intellect and not to be dominated by your intellect.
quotes.author: Nirmala Srivastava

quotes.quote: Some people, however long their experience or strong their intellect, are temperamentally incapable of reaching firm decisions.
quotes.author: James Callaghan

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The intellect is always fooled by the heart.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Intelligence is a way of thinking, not a choice of words.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: These people being of a sharp and acute intellect, and gifted with a rich and powerful understanding, excel in whatever studies they pursue, and are more quick and cunning than the other inhabitants of a western clime.
quotes.author: Giraldus Cambrensis

quotes.quote: Intellect distinguishes between the possible and the impossible; reason distinguishes between the sensible and the senseless. Even the possible can be senseless.
quotes.author: Max Born

quotes.quote: Intellect is a part of a good faith. Intellect is the light, the heart is the direction.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: The intellect can only think about or analyze joy, but cannot feel it.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Intelligence is knowing the right answer. Wisdom is knowing when to say it.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: The pride in intellect, or rather in the supremacy of the mind, is not restricted to those engaged in intellectual pursuits but is a regular occurrence in all neurosis.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Intellect is the soul of man, the only immortal part of him.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Intellects whose desires have outstripped their understanding.
quotes.author: Friedrich August von Hayek

quotes.quote: Intellectuals are people who believe that ideas are of more importance than values. That is to say, their own ideas and other people's values.
quotes.author: Gerald Brenan

quotes.quote: The intellect of the wise is like glass; it admits the light of heaven and reflects it.
quotes.author: Augustus Hare

quotes.quote: In order to accommodate to change and to the contrast of phenomena, the intellect does not require any shocks and inner upheavals; it is only through such upheavals that the more conservative mind could accommodate to the metropolitan rhythm of events.
quotes.author: Georg Simmel

quotes.quote: The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct acting from inner necessity. The creative mind plays with the objects it loves.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The intellect is a boat which can take us to the very shores of understanding, but once there we must leave it behind in order to grasp true meaning
quotes.author: Ashavan

quotes.quote: Intellect helps us to see the best means and manner of doing the right thing, but intellect never shows us the right thing.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: The only means of strengthening one's intellect is to make up one's mind about nothing, to let the mind be a thoroughfare for all thoughts.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Our intellect holds the same position in the world of thought as our body occupies in the expanse of nature.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Intellectual curiosity and the human brain are the root of science.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: When the intellect and affections are in harmony; when intellectual consciousness is calm and deep; inspiration will not be confounded with fancy.
quotes.author: Margaret Fuller

quotes.quote: Intellect begins with the observation of nature, proceeds to memorize and classify the facts thus observed, and by logical deduction builds up that edifice of knowledge properly called science But admittedly we also know by feeling, and we can combine the two faculties, and present knowledge in the guise of art.
quotes.author: Herbert Read

quotes.quote: Intellectual despair is a subject for comedy.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The human intellect is the great truth organ; realities, as they exist, are the subjects of its study; and knowledge is the result of its acquaintance with the things which it investigates.
quotes.author: Moses Harvey

quotes.quote: The mind was designed not to defend what we want, but to discover what is ultimately true, which should shape our wants and satisfy them more deeply with God. The purpose of the mind is not to rationalize subjective preferences, but to recognize objective reality and to help the heart revel in God.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: The function of intellect is to provide a means of modifying our reactions to the circumstances of life, so that we may secure pleasure, the symptom of welfare.
quotes.author: Edward Thorndike

quotes.quote: Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: An intellectual is someone whose mind watches itself.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Experience without theory is blind, but theory without experience is mere intellectual play.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Intellectual passion drives out sensuality.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: No great intellectual thing was ever done by great effort.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Being an intellectual creates a lot of questions and no answers.
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.quote: The fact that man knows right from wrong proves his intellectual superiority to the other creatures; but the fact that he can do wrong proves his moral inferiority to any creatures that cannot.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: An intellectual says a simple thing in a hard way. An artist says a hard thing in a simple way.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: An intellectual is a man who takes more words than necessary to tell more than he knows.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The man was such an intellectual he was of almost no use.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: The job of intellectuals is to come up with ideas, and all we've been producing is footnotes.
quotes.author: Theodore H. White

quotes.quote: Intellectuals are judged not by their morals, but by the quality of their ideas, which are rarely reducible to simple verdicts of truth or falsity, if only because banalities are by definition accurate.
quotes.author: Perry Anderson

quotes.quote: What never fails inside the mind of an intellectual never works outside the confines of his head. The world’s stubborn refusal to vindicate the intellectual’s theories serves as proof of humanity’s irrationality, not his own.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Flynn

quotes.quote: There is nothing that an intellectual less likes to change than his mind, or a politician his policy.
quotes.author: Theodore Dalrymple

quotes.quote: Intellectuals are a pretty unique species all by themselves, given to advocating things out of sheer brazenness that they could not themselves stomach if they were ushered in to witness the scene.
quotes.author: Matthew Scully

quotes.quote: Intellectuals cannot find the bottom (base) of the faith. It is not possible to do both together, to remain afloat and (also) measure the ocean depth at the same time.
quotes.author: Dada Bhagwan

quotes.quote: The thing intellectuals understand least is themselves.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: A wise man's goal shouldn't be to say something profound, but to say something useful.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The intellectual is constantly betrayed by his vanity. God-like, he blandly assumes that he can express everything in words; whereas the things one loves, lives, and dies for are not, in the last analysis, completely expressible in words.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: We all agree that pessimism is a mark of superior intellect.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Curiosity is one of the most permanent and certain characteristics of a vigorous intellect.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: One of the secrets of life is to keep our intellectual curiosity acute..
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: The intellectual activity of those without power is always characterized as non-intellectual.
quotes.author: Paulo Freire

quotes.quote: Only the thinking man lives his life, the thoughtless man's life passes him by.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: To be free is of the essence of every intellectual being.
quotes.author: Jacques Maritain

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Intellectuals are not defined according to the jobs they do, but [by] the manner in which they act, the way they see themselves, and the values that they uphold.
quotes.author: Frank Furedi

quotes.quote: Intellectuals are rarely successful as leaders. They are so trapped in their ideals that they cannot venture out in the real world to win and lead.
quotes.author: Awdhesh Singh

quotes.quote: Intellectuals are people who believe that ideas are of more importance than values; that is to say, their own ideas and other people's values.
quotes.author: Gerald Brenan

quotes.quote: It's the intellectual who transforms the concept of the world into the problem of meaning.
quotes.author: Max Weber

quotes.quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Small minds are concerned with the extraordinary, great minds with the ordinary.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; Average minds discuss events; Small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The difference between intelligence and education is this: intelligence will make you a good living.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: The intelligence is proved not by ease of learning, but by understanding what we learn.
quotes.author: Joseph Whitney

quotes.quote: Intelligence is not to make no mistakes, but quickly to see how to make them good.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: Be smarter than other people, just don't tell them so.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: The greatest intelligence is precisely the one that suffers most from its own limitations.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Your intelligence is measured by those around you; if you spend your days with idiots you seal your own fate.
quotes.author: Mary M. Illigassch

quotes.quote: There is no greater evidence of superior intelligence than to be surprised at nothing.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: The sign of an intelligent people is their ability to control emotions by the application of reason.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.quote: Intelligence is really a kind of taste: taste in ideas.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Intelligence is the ability to avoid doing work, yet getting the work done.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Intelligence forbids tears.
quotes.author: Dorris Lessing

quotes.quote: The test of a first-rate intelligence is the ability to hold two opposed ideas in the mind at the same time, and still retain the ability to function.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Intelligence is the art of good guesswork.
quotes.author: H. B. Barlow

quotes.quote: Intelligence flourishes only in the ages when belief withers.
quotes.author: Emile M. Cioran

quotes.quote: The burden of intelligence: you can always imagine all those wonderful places where you can never belong.
quotes.author: Robert Reed

quotes.quote: I've always felt that a person's intelligence is directly reflected by the number of conflicting points of view he can entertain simultaneously on the same topic.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: One of the functions of intelligence is to take account of the dangers that come from trusting solely to the intelligence.
quotes.author: Lewis Mumford

quotes.quote: An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Intelligence is quickness to apprehend as distinct from ability, which is capacity to act wisely on the thing apprehended.
quotes.author: Alfred N. Whitehead

quotes.quote: Intelligence must follow faith, never precede it, and never destroy it.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: Intelligence is the faculty of making artificial objects, especially tools to make tools.
quotes.author: Henri Bergson

quotes.quote: Intelligence is quickness in seeing things as they are.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Intelligence is a moral category.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: A great deal of intelligence can be invested in ignorance when the need for illusion is deep.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: It has yet to be proven that intelligence has any survival value.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as Intelligence; one has intelligence of this or that. One must have intelligence only for what one is doing.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Undernourished, intelligence becomes like the bloated belly of a starving child: swollen, filled with nothing the body can use.
quotes.author: Andrea Dworkin

quotes.quote: Human intelligence may not be the best trick nature has to offer.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Intelligence, in diapers, is invisible. And when it matures, out the window it flies. We have to pounce on it earlier.
quotes.author: Stanislaw J. Lec

quotes.quote: The sad thing about artificial intelligence is that it lacks artifice and therefore intelligence.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: The intellect is always fooled by the heart.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Whatever debases the intelligence degrades the entire human being.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: The intellect is not a serious thing, and never has been. It is an instrument on which one plays, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Intellect annuls fate. So far as a man thinks, he is free.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A sign of intelligence is an awareness of one's own ignorance.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: A small mind is obstinate. A great mind can lead and be led.
quotes.author: Alexander Cannon

quotes.quote: Creative minds have always been known to survive any kind of bad training.
quotes.author: Anna Freud

quotes.quote: Only great minds can afford a simple style.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: Intelligence is enormously sexy.
quotes.author: Frank Langella

quotes.quote: Intelligence is nothing without delight.
quotes.author: Paul Claudel

quotes.quote: Wit is educated insolence.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Wit is a dangerous weapon, even to the possessor, if he knows not how to use it discreetly.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Wit lies in recognizing the resemblance among things which differ and the difference between things which are alike.
quotes.author: Anne Louise Germaine De Stal

quotes.quote: Human intelligence has been applied to a vast range of problems, ranging from foraging for food and water to the problems in physics and mathematics.
quotes.author: Daeyeol Lee

quotes.quote: Intelligence is not unique for humans, because all animals have certain abilities to select their actions appropriate to maximize the likelihood of their survival and reproduction in their environments.
quotes.author: Daeyeol Lee

quotes.quote: Compared to other forms of intelligence on Earth, human intelligence had produced more impressive outcomes.
quotes.author: Daeyeol Lee

quotes.quote: Our intelligence is needed to solve all kinds of problems we face in our society. Therefore, it is critical for us to be aware of potential weaknesses and biases in our intelligence.
quotes.author: Daeyeol Lee

quotes.quote: Intelligence is the ability to make good choices in many different contexts.
quotes.author: Daeyeol Lee

quotes.quote: Human intelligence is something all humans share in common: it is what traditionally marks us out from other animals.
quotes.author: Nicholas Mackintosh

quotes.quote: Intelligence is the greatest tool available for the accomplishment of a thorough development of the individual personality, the means of surpassing one's self.
quotes.author: L.A. Machado

quotes.quote: A society with more highly developed collective intelligence will give rise to a much greater number of questions, but the answers will also arise more quickly and effectively.
quotes.author: L.A. Machado

quotes.quote: Intelligence is a hereditary gift: so humanity has believed throughout time.
quotes.author: L.A. Machado

quotes.quote: The right to be intelligent is a right inherent in every man, through his condition as man.
quotes.author: L.A. Machado

quotes.quote: Intelligence is the best antidote. An intelligent world does not make war, it avoids it.
quotes.author: L.A. Machado

quotes.quote: Intelligence is a social triumph, which reveals our debt to earlier generations, other cultures, teachers, professors, parents and the TV set.
quotes.author: Phil Brown

quotes.quote: When it comes to being intelligent it is clear that there is much more than simply what we can do as an individual; how we interact with others is a crucial element of how smart we are in the real world.
quotes.author: Lucas

quotes.quote: No man is half as intelligent as he wants some woman to think he is.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The less intelligence you claim, the more intelligence people will give you credit for.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: When you hire people who are smarter than you are, you prove you are smarter than they are.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A man's intelligence is seldom questioned as long as he can keep his tongue from trying to prove it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Youth thinks intelligence a substitute for experience, and age thinks experience a substitute for intelligence.
quotes.author: Lyman Bryson

quotes.quote: The level of intelligence are 'Smart, Intelligent, Brilliant, Genius, Simple.'
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Science can be communicated, wisdom cannot.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: To know the road ahead, ask those coming back.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the spring of intelligence.
quotes.author: Gianna Bogana

quotes.quote: Being serious is usually not a sign of wisdom, as boring people think: intelligence must make people laugh.
quotes.author: Fernando Savater

quotes.quote: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together to the making of genius. Love, love, love is the soul of genius.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.quote: There are painters who transform the sun into a yellow spot, but there are others who, thanks to their art and intelligence, transform a yellow spot into the sun.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Action is the real measure of intelligence.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: A woman uses her intelligence to find reasons to support her intuition.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: We should take care not to make the intellect our god; it has, of course, powerful muscles, but no personality.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Everyone is a genius at least once a year. The real geniuses simply have their bright ideas closer together.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: An intellectual is someone whose mind watches itself.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The capacity for intelligent thought is a skill, but one that bears testament to diligence and hard work as much as to innate ability.
quotes.author: Robert Jameson

quotes.quote: The intelligent will necessarily devote a great many hours to the development of his art.
quotes.author: Robert Jameson

quotes.quote: The thing is that you don't get to be intelligent if you are arrogant. Being intelligent requires hard work.
quotes.author: Robert Jameson

quotes.quote: An exceptionally intelligent person will know from experience that they are not like most other people. They don't pretend to be good at everything, but they know what they are good at.
quotes.author: Robert Jameson

quotes.quote: Extreme law is often extreme injustice.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: Extraordinary results happen only when you give the best you have to become the best you can be at your most important work.
quotes.author: Gary W. Keller

quotes.quote: Intense feeling too often obscures the truth.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: Extreme hopes are born from extreme misery.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The most intense conflicts, if overcome, leave behind a sense of security and calm that is not easily disturbed. It is just these intense conflicts and their conflagration which are needed to produce valuable and lasting results.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Powerful indeed is the empire of habit.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Every intense desire is perhaps a desire to be different from what we are.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Out of intense complexities intense simplicities emerge.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Intense, burning desire is the motivational force that enables you to overcome any obstacle and achieve almost any goal.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Extraordinary claims demand extraordinary evidence.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: The more intense the nature of a man, the more readily will he find meditation, and the more successfully will he practice it.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Intensity is the extreme application of force and strength.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Extraordinary people survive under the most terrible circumstances and they become more extraordinary because of it.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: The pressures are intense, because the rewards for success and the penalty for failure are more and more.
quotes.author: Alan Hansen

quotes.quote: An intense feeling carries with it its own universe, magnificent or wretched as the case may be.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: An intense feeling carries with it its own universe, magnificent or wretched as the case may be.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: My feelings are too intense. I hate too bitterly, I love too exultingly, I pity too extravagantly, I hurt too painfully. We American blacks call that soul.
quotes.author: Chester Himes

quotes.quote: Everything in the West is on a grander scale, more intense, vital, dramatic.
quotes.author: Edward Weston

quotes.quote: Art is the most intense mode of individualism that the world has known.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The will to live is as intense in a plant as it is in a human.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: The pleasure children get from playing is way more intense, and lasts way longer, than the one adults get from being paid.
quotes.author: Mokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: My desire to live is as intense as ever, and though my heart is broken, hearts are made to be broken; that is why God sends sorrow into the world.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: One matter Englishmen don't think in the least funny is their happy consciousness of possessing a deep sense of humor.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Their anger dug out for itself a deep channel so that future anger might more easily follow.
quotes.author: Radclyffe Hall

quotes.quote: When the intensity of emotional conviction subsides, a man who is in the habit of reasoning will search for logical grounds in favor of the belief which he finds in himself.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Even in anger, a child is beautiful; he has total intensity. But when an adult is angry he is ugly; he is not total. And any type of intensity is beautiful.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Do things with your whole heart, with as much intensity as you are capable of. Anything done half-heartedly never brings joy to life.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: I felt these feelings long ago, ever so much more intense / so very strong they often completely blocked common sense / always scared of who I was when in their dark control / I learned to stuff them down before they took away my soul
quotes.author: Tamara Hart

quotes.quote: Even the most intense feelings cease when neglected and taken for granted.
quotes.author: Anupama Garg

quotes.quote: As an actor, those kinds of really intense, emotionally packed, dark things, always very appeal to me greatly.
quotes.author: India Eisley

quotes.quote: The act of longing for something will always be more intense than the requiting of it.
quotes.author: Gail Godwin

quotes.quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Serious and intense people, they drain you. But someone who's an idiot, like myself, they're fun. You either hate me or you love me.
quotes.author: Pauly Shore

quotes.quote: I have been a teacher myself all my life. I have an intense passion to share with people. Our only salvation is in knowledge, in learning.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Every age yearns for a more beautiful world. The deeper the desperation and the depression about the confusing present, the more intense that yearning.
quotes.author: Johan Huizinga

quotes.quote: Becoming a solo singer is like going from an eau de toilette to a perfume. It's much more intense.
quotes.author: Geri Halliwell

quotes.quote: Pure, intense emotions. It's not about design. It's about feelings.
quotes.author: Alber Elbaz

quotes.quote: Follow your most intense obsessions mercilessly.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: ...there is an intense delight in abandoning faulty states of mind and in cultivating helpful ones in meditation.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: I grow more intense as I age.
quotes.author: Florida Scott-Maxwell

quotes.quote: The act of longing for something will always be more intense than the requiting of it.
quotes.author: Gail Godwin

quotes.quote: We judge ourselves by our intentions. And others by their actions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Sometimes people do what they think is for the best, and their intentions are misinterpreted.
quotes.author: Theresa Breslin

quotes.quote: Our intention creates our reality.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: It is intent which establishes one's consequential outcomes.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: A purpose, an intention, a design, strikes everywhere even the careless, the most stupid thinker.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Every action or perceived inaction shapes credibility.
quotes.author: Mindy Hall

quotes.quote: Hell is paved with good intentions, not with bad ones. All men mean well.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Although actions may speak louder than words, it is our intentions that reveal our soul.
quotes.author: Hal Elrod

quotes.quote: The intention that man should be happy is not in the plan of Creation.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: We know there is intention and purpose in the universe, because there is intention and purpose in us.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A gift consists not in what is done or given, but in the intention of the giver or doer.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Among the many arguments to be made against cultural revolutions is that they are monotonous in spirit and monomaniacal in intention.
quotes.author: Howard Jacobson

quotes.quote: Powerful words come with powerful intent. Where you have passion, strength, courage, and determination you can accomplish anything!
quotes.author: K.L Toth

quotes.quote: When a crowd rushes into your house without declaring its intention, it is, by definition, an invasion.
quotes.author: Viktor Orban

quotes.quote: Choose your intention carefully and then practice holding your consciousness to it, so it becomes the guiding light in your life.
quotes.author: Roger Delano Hinkins

quotes.quote: A glint of intention initiates the process of creation.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Every action has an impact, choose wisely the impact you want to have.
quotes.author: Mindy Hall

quotes.quote: However glorious an action in itself, it ought not to pass for great if it be not the effect of wisdom and intention.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Intentionality fuels the master's journey. Every master is a master of vision.
quotes.author: George Leonard

quotes.quote: Intention is the core of all conscious life. Conscious intention colors and moves everything.
quotes.author: Hsing Yun

quotes.quote: Intention is an echo of a previous intent.
quotes.author: R. A. Delmonico

quotes.quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The effect of dominance is not always the result of an intention to dominate.
quotes.author: Deborah Tannen

quotes.quote: Each decision we make, each action we take, is born out of an intention.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: The life of every man is a diary in which he means to write one story, and writes another.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: A good intention clothes itself with power.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Honor thy error as a hidden intention.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: A man's intentions should be allowed in some respects to plead for his actions.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Only good intentions may not always translate into good results.
quotes.author: Girdhar Joshi

quotes.quote: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly, everything essential is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: When your intention is clear, so is the way.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: When your intentions are pure, so too will be your success.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: We call an intention good which is right in itself, but the action is good, not because it contains within it some good, but because it issues from a good intention.
quotes.author: Peter Abelard

quotes.quote: The intention to live as long as possible isn't one of the mind's best intentions, because quantity isn't the same as quality.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Intention is one of the most powerful forces there is. What you mean when you do a thing will always determine the outcome. The law creates the world.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: It is more Important to be of pure intention than of perfect action.
quotes.author: Ilyas Kassam

quotes.quote: The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Every journey begins with the first step of articulating the intention, and then becoming the intention.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The great things you intend to do some time must have a beginning if they are ever to be done, so begin something worthwhile today.
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: A good intention feeds no one.
quotes.author: Bobby Darnell

quotes.quote: Where we go is not determined by where we want to go.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Good intention bring success in everything you do. Intention is always supported by the universal energy because it's a vital ingredient for manifestation.
quotes.author: Hina Ahmad Hashmi

quotes.quote: All that counts in life is intention.
quotes.author: Andrea Bocelli

quotes.quote: When you say you agree to a thing in principle you mean that you have not the slightest intention of carrying it out in practice.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: It is only those that live intentionally that can accomplish and come to the significance meant for them.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: A good intention clothes itself with sudden power. When a god wishes to ride, any chip or pebble will bud and shoot out winged feet, and serve him for a horse.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Intentions compressed into words enfold magical power.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: All great acts are ruled by intention. What you mean is what you get.
quotes.author: Brenna Yovanoff

quotes.quote: People driven by intention are described as having a strong will that won't permit anything to interfere with achieving their inner desire.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: If you're one of those people with a never-give-up attitude combined with an internal picture that propels you toward fulfilling your dreams, you fit this description of someone with intention.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: Someone with intention, you are most likely a super-achiever and probably proud of your ability to recognize and take advantage of opportunities that arise.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: Activating your power of intention is a process of connecting with your natural self and letting go of total ego identification.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: Live with intention, walk to the edge, listen hard, practice wellness. Play with abandon. Laugh. Choose with no regret. Continue to learn,, Appreciate friends. Do what you love. Live as if this is all there is.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Explore what it might mean to live each day with intention--to figure out what count for us, what will make our lives richer.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Step into this world of intentional living, moment by moment. You won't ever want to leave it.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Staying connected to the core intentions of my life allows me to feel and be satisfied at the end of each day.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: The intentions you hold define your days and your life.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Prayer is a form of intention; however, there is a difference between begging for something and stating your own worth as the receiver of an answered prayer.
quotes.author: Paul Selig

quotes.quote: Every experience, and every change in your experience, reflects an intention. An intention is not only a desire. It is the use of your will.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: If you truly desire to change your relationship, that change begins with the intention to change it. How it will change depends upon the intention that you set.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Intentions shape light. They set light into motion. Each intention--anger, greed, jealousy, compassion, understanding--sets energy into motion, sets patterns of light into motion.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: The reality of each individual is created by his or her intentions and intentions of others. Your intentions create the reality that you experience.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: By choosing intentions that come from love instead of intentions that come from fear, you create joyful karma instead of painful karma.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: All of us are seeking the same thing. We share the desire to fulfill the highest, truest expression of ourselves as human beings.
quotes.author: Oprah

quotes.quote: Your spirit is the part of you that is seeking meaning and purpose. That's one way someone can relate to that. Another way to understand spirit is that it's the part of you that is drawn to hope, that will not give in to despair. The part of you that has to believe in goodness; that has to believe in something more.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: Everyone has bad days when happiness feels out of reach. And sure, you can't always control what happens, but you can control how you react to it.
quotes.author: Julia Dellitt

quotes.quote: Everyday is an opportunity to shift your mindset to a happier, more positive place.
quotes.author: Julia Dellitt

quotes.quote: Holding nothing back means holding the intention to be an open vessel, in a daily way.
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.quote: Breathe evenly, and let you breath blow the intention and regret far enough that you can see them clearly.
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.quote: Take a chance now and live life like you've always wanted. Envision yourself throwing off the fetters of fears, and calling unto the glory that is your by right of birth.
quotes.author: Tony Burroughs

quotes.quote: The intenders of the highest good understand that the exactness of our words counts.
quotes.author: Tony Burroughs

quotes.quote: But it's not their intentions that matter; it's their capabilities.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: When you say you agree to a thing in principle, you mean that you have not the slightest intention of carrying it out in practice.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: For some intentions, you may not be sure what you can do to make them happen. That's okay. Just having intention is the first, and most important step.
quotes.author: Mallika Chopra

quotes.quote: Intentions are what you want deep down inside and include: who you want to be, who you want to be around, how you want to feel and you want to be treated.
quotes.author: Mallika Chopra

quotes.quote: When we take notice of our intentions and take control of our intentions, we create a more harmonious and satisfying experience for ourselves and others.
quotes.author: Dianne Martin

quotes.quote: Each intention is based on love--or isn't. Either we live and cultivate an environment based on love--or we don't.
quotes.author: Dianne Martin

quotes.quote: And true growth is always at the spiritual level, not the material level--so the intentions are often connected to spirituality.
quotes.author: Dianne Martin

quotes.quote: Take notice of your intentions and you will bring more love and harmonious, productive environment for yourself and for those around you.
quotes.author: Dianne Martin

quotes.quote: Holding your intention clearly in your mind, step into your bath and savor the sensations of it. Really enjoy it.
quotes.author: Lune Innate

quotes.quote: Set an intention to be aware of your emotional state, and acknowledge that your feelings will come up as a means of your subconscious mind communicating with your conscious mind.
quotes.author: Lune Innate

quotes.quote: Good intentions, like good eggs, soon spoil unless they are hatched.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The hardest task of a girl's life is to prove to a man that his intentions are really serious.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A person is hard up indeed who cannot get credit even for good intentions.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A girl doesn't have to watch the speedometer to know what her boyfriend is driving at.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The path to success is not paved with good intentions, but with good intentions that are carried out.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Many people have good intentions, but just can't seem to overcome the negative thought patterns that overtake them and hold them back.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Ideas, imagination and good intentions are necessary but without action, they are nothing.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Good intentions are not enough. They've never put an onion in the soup yet.
quotes.author: Sonya Levien

quotes.quote: Good intentions never change anything. They only become a deeper and deeper rut.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: As long as your intentions are solid and about growth and progression and being productive and not being idle, then you're doing good in my book.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: A good intention is like the seed of a tree whose fruit we do not know.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Choose your intention carefully and then practice holding your consciousness to it, so it becomes the guiding light in your life.
quotes.author: John Roger

quotes.quote: Good intentions are very mortal and perishable things. Like very mellow and choice fruit, they are difficult to keep.
quotes.author: Charles Simmons

quotes.quote: Good intentions are invariably ungrammatical.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Intention involves such a small fragment of our consciousness and of our mind and of our life.
quotes.author: Jasper Johns

quotes.quote: We call an intention good which is right in itself, but the action is good, not because it contains within it some good, but because it issues from a good intention.
quotes.author: Peter Abelard

quotes.quote: Intention is the core of all conscious life. Conscious intention colors and moves everything.
quotes.author: Hsing Yun

quotes.quote: Intentions compressed into words enfold magical power.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Intention appears to be something akin to a tuning fork, causing the tuning forks of other things in the universe to resonate at the same frequency.
