quotes.author: Lynne McTaggart

quotes.quote: Every intention sets energy into motion whether you are conscious of it or not.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: A good intention clothes itself with power.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Good intentions are useless until they are expressed in appropriate action!
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Good intentions are only lies the weak tell themselves.
quotes.author: R.L. LaFevers

quotes.quote: Good intentions are not enough; commitment and sacrifice are necessary.
quotes.author: Laurence Boldt

quotes.quote: A good intention, with a bad approach, often leads to a poor result.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Good intentions are not an excuse for maladministration of this magnitude
quotes.author: Jean Chretien

quotes.quote: Good intentions are simply not enough. Our character is defined and our lives are determined not by what we want, say or think, but by what we do.
quotes.author: Michael Josephson

quotes.quote: A good intention feeds no one.
quotes.author: Bobby Darnell

quotes.quote: The power of your intentions has a greater impact on your life than your actions.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Intentions of a man reflects in his actions.
quotes.author: Sukant Ratnakar

quotes.quote: Once your intentions are real and wise, helpful and positive, keep going forward. Never ever give up!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Intentions, whether good or bad, that don't reflect the words and actions are only meant to fulfill personal goals.
quotes.author: Ashish Patel

quotes.quote: Intentions do not insulate us from the consequences of our actions.
quotes.author: Jon D Harrison

quotes.quote: Good intentions might sound nice, but it's positive actions that matter.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: Intentions are nice, but ultimately intentions don't really matter because they only exist inside you.
quotes.author: Kelly Williams Brown

quotes.quote: Good intentions are no substitute for obedience.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Intentions often melt in the face of unexpected opportunity.
quotes.author: Shirley Temple

quotes.quote: Let your intentions be good - embodied in good thoughts, cheerful words, and unselfish deeds - and the world will be to you a bright and happy place in which to work and play and serve
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: Good intentions are at least, the seed of good actions; and every one ought to sow them, and leave It to the soil and the seasons whether He or any other gather they fruit
quotes.author: William Temple, Sr.

quotes.quote: Everything that happens in the universe begins with intention.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Setting your intention is like drawing an arrow from the quiver of your heart.
quotes.author: Bruce Black

quotes.quote: Great intentions become tragic action when delivered without careful thought.
quotes.author: Michael Dooley

quotes.quote: Good intentions are the most beautiful of secrets.
quotes.author: Imam Ali

quotes.quote: A bucket list is not about content; it's all about intent.
quotes.author: Ted Leonsis

quotes.quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: All human sins seem so much worse in their consequences than in their intentions.
quotes.author: Reinhold Neibur

quotes.quote: A clear intent can fructify / And bring us birth in loft Brahma's realm / The acts of body and of speech are less— / They do not generate an alike result.
quotes.author: Shantideva

quotes.quote: If your intention is pure you can walk on the sea.
quotes.author: Swahili Saying

quotes.quote: Ideas by themselves cannot produce a change of being; your effort must go in the right direction, and one must correspond to the other.
quotes.author: P.D. Ouspensky

quotes.quote: Do not think of today's failures, but of the success that may come tomorrow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: We succeed only as we identify in life, or in war, or in anything else, a single overriding objective, and make all other considerations bend to that one objective.
quotes.author: Dwight Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Lack of willpower has caused more failure than lack of intelligence or ability.
quotes.author: Flower A. Newhouse

quotes.quote: If our motivation is only for personal gain or personal power, it narrows the scope of our achievement. Ultimately, the motivation underlying our pursuits should not be wholly personal but a desire to be of service.
quotes.author: Vilayat Khan

quotes.quote: What gives people superiority at a task is true intention.
quotes.author: Werner Erhard

quotes.quote: Intention is the active partner of attention; it is the way we convert our automatic processes into conscious ones...intentions automatically seek their fulfillment if left alone.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Intention is not just about will—or about resolutions we make on New Year's Eve with shaky hope in our hearts— but about our overall everyday vision, what we long for, what we believe is possible for us.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Each decision we make, each action we take is born out of an intention...The momentary urges that shape what we do are intentions, as are the convictions and aspirations we hold.
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: Intention is the seed we plant from which effort grows and action blossoms. If we don't plant and cultivate our intentions, they will never grow.
quotes.author: Angel Kyodo Williams

quotes.quote: Good intentions are very mortal and perishable things; like very mellow and choice fruit they are difficult to keep.
quotes.author: O.Simmons

quotes.quote: The innocence of the intention abates nothing of the mischief of the example.
quotes.author: Robert Hall

quotes.quote: Right intention is to the actions of a man what the soul is to the body or the root to the tree.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: Good intention will no more make a truth than a good mark will make a good shot
quotes.author: Spurstowe

quotes.quote: The motive behind criticism often determines its validity. Those who care criticize where necessary. Those who envy criticize the moment they think that they have found a weak spot.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It's true that some of the most terrible things in the works are done by people who think, genuinely think, that they're doing it for the best, especially if there is some god involved.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Well-meaning people are sometimes the most dangerous.
quotes.author: Angela N. Blount

quotes.quote: Don't ascribe to evil what can be attributed to well-intentioned stupidity.
quotes.author: James A. Owen

quotes.quote: A person usually has two reasons for doing a thing: one that sounds good and a real one.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter what you meant. It matters what you do. Intentions are the lies we tell ourselves. Actions are the truth.
quotes.author: Amanda Hocking

quotes.quote: Your intent will always be second to what you complete.
quotes.author: Carlos Wallace

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, if you feel like you're a good person, and your intentions are good, then that's all that matters.
quotes.author: Madison Beer

quotes.quote: The countenance is the portrait of the soul, and the eyes mark its intentions.
quotes.author: Marcus Tulius Cicero

quotes.quote: Skin as white as a snow can possess intentions as black as a coal.
quotes.author: Spriha Kant

quotes.quote: The only thing that matters is our actions, the intentions of our hearts.
quotes.author: Chris Manion

quotes.quote: You cannot separate any part from the whole: interdependence rules the cosmic order.
quotes.author: Taisen Deshimaru

quotes.quote: The further human society drifts away from nature, the less we understand interdependence.
quotes.author: Peter Senge

quotes.quote: Probably we never fully credit the interdependence of wild creatures, and their cognizance of the affairs of their own kind.
quotes.author: Mary Hunter Austin

quotes.quote: There is an interdependence between those who have and those who have not. The process of giving exalts the poor and humbles the rich. In the process, both are sanctified.
quotes.author: Marion G. Romney

quotes.quote: Interdependence is a choice only independent people can make.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: There is an intimate interdependence of intellect and morals.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: How hard it is to have the beautiful interdependence of marriage and yet be strong in oneself alone.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Perhaps the saddest part of coexistence is the concept of interdependence being necessary for any form of solidarity to be realized. Being encouraged to lean on the weak, does not sound like a long term viable solution to attaining strength.
quotes.author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quotes.quote: The spirit of interdependence will not cost us more than it's worth. On the steep slope ahead, holding hands is necessary. And it just might be that we can learn to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Paul Harvey

quotes.quote: Global interdependence today means that economic disasters in developing countries could create a backlash on developed countries.
quotes.author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quotes.quote: There is that interdependence and that strength you get from a team, that the group is greater than any individual.
quotes.author: Pete Newell

quotes.quote: Interdependent people combine their own efforts with the efforts of others to achieve their greatest success.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The fundamental law of human beings is interdependence. A person is a person through other persons.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Compassion is the keen awareness of the interdependence of all things.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Interdependence must be transformed into solidarity based upon the principle that the goods of creation are meant for all. That which human industry produces through the processing of raw materials with the contribution of work must serve equally for the good of all.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: You live in the age of interdependence. Borders don't count for much or stop much, good or bad, anymore.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Individual liberty and interdependence are both essential for life in society.
quotes.author: M. K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: Effective interdependence can only be built on a foundation of true independence.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: There is a strange interdependence between thoughtlessness and evil.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: There's an interdependence between flowers and bees. Where there are no flowers there are no bees, and where there are no bees, there are no flowers. They are really one organism. And so in the same way, everything in nature depends on everything else.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: We find as our interdependence increases that, on the whole, we do better when other people do better as well.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: Interdependence is and ought to be as much the ideal of man as self-sufficiency. Man is a social being.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: There's nothing about interdependence that would keep somebody from making art.
quotes.author: Gish Jen

quotes.quote: Interdependence is a fact, it's not an opinion.
quotes.author: Peter Coyote

quotes.quote: Interdependence is a higher value than independence.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Today the impulse towards interdependence is immeasurably greater. We are witnessing the beginnings of a new doctrine of international community.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: In fact, a fundamental interdependence exists between the personal right to liberty and the personal right to property.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.quote: Life doesn't make any sense without interdependence. We need each other, and the sooner we learn that, the better for us all.
quotes.author: Erik Erikson

quotes.quote: Interest is the spur of the people, but glory that of great souls. Invention is the talent of youth, and judgment of age.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: To wakenÂ interestÂ and kindle enthusiasm is the sure way to teach easily and successfully.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: If you always do whatÂ interestÂ you, then at least one person is pleased.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: It is hard to interest those who have everything in those who have nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Interest does not tie nations together; it sometimes separates them. But sympathy and understanding does unite them.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: TheÂ interests we share as human beings are far more powerful than the forces that drive us apart.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Develop anÂ interestÂ in life as you see it; the people, things, literature, music - the world is so rich, simply throbbing with rich treasures, beautiful souls and interesting people. Forget yourself.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: CommonÂ interestÂ may always be reckoned upon as the surest bond of sympathy.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: Let us ever remember that our interest is in concord, not in conflict; and that our real eminence rests in the victories of peace, not those of war.
quotes.author: William McKinley

quotes.quote: Your deepÂ interests should always have a dog-eared place on your nightstand.
quotes.author: Douglas Wilson

quotes.quote: People's interest is in the product, not in its authorship.
quotes.author: Jonathan Ive

quotes.quote: TheÂ interestÂ of the landlord is always opposed to theÂ interests of every other class in the community.
quotes.author: David Ricardo

quotes.quote: In the long run, the public interest depends on private virtue.
quotes.author: James Q. Wilson

quotes.quote: Our ownÂ interests are still an exquisite means for dazzling our eyes agreeably.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: The rate of interest acts as a link between income-value and capital-value.
quotes.author: Irving Fisher

quotes.quote: IntenseÂ interestÂ in any subject is indispensable if you're really going to excel in it.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Self-interestÂ leads to honing your skills, the better to trade with.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: GreatÂ interests demand great safeguards.
quotes.author: Thomas Francis Meagher

quotes.quote: Self-interest, be it enlightened, works indirectly for the public good.
quotes.author: William H. Prescott

quotes.quote: It is vain to talk of theÂ interestÂ of the community, without understanding what is theÂ interestÂ of the individual.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: InterestÂ blinds some people, and enlightens others.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The greatÂ interests of man: air and light, the joy of having a body, the voluptuousness of looking.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: InterestÂ makes all seem reason that leads to it.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: InterestÂ is the most important thing in life; happiness is temporary, butÂ interestÂ is continuous.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: We interest others by the misfortune we spread around us.
quotes.author: Emile M. Ciora

quotes.quote: Half theÂ interestÂ of a garden is the constant exercise of the imagination.
quotes.author: Alice Morse Earle

quotes.quote: When you loseÂ interestÂ in anything, you also lose the memory for it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: It is always great when people take interest in your work.
quotes.author: Margaret H. Hamilton

quotes.quote: SomeÂ interests have got a footing on the earth which we have not made sufficient allowance for.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A lowerÂ interestÂ rate doesn't make a debt go away.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: SelfishÂ interestÂ is one of the most common obstructions to the advance of truth.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: A man'sÂ interestÂ in the world is only an overflow from hisÂ interestÂ in himself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: AllÂ interestÂ in disease and death is only another expression ofÂ interestÂ in life.
quotes.author: Thomas Mann

quotes.quote: Don't beÂ interesting, beÂ interested.
quotes.author: James C. Collins

quotes.quote: EmpiricalÂ interestÂ will be in the facts so far as they are relevant to the solution of these problems.
quotes.author: Talcott Parsons

quotes.quote: The general interest of the masses might take the place of the insight of genius if it were allowed freedom of action.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Nature needs no help, just no interference.
quotes.author: B. J. Palmer

quotes.quote: More children suffer from interference than from non-interference.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Education is what you must acquire without any interference from your schooling.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It's very easy to be cynical about any kind of interference in things that are beyond our skill set.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: Insistent advice may develop into interference, and interference, someone has said, is the hind hoof of the devil.
quotes.author: Carolyn Wells

quotes.quote: The most cogent reason for restricting the interference of government is the great evil of adding unnecessarily to its power.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: Let the mechanics of desire bring your fulfilment without interference.the more you interfere, the less likely you will get what you want.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Every government interference in the economy consists of giving an unearned benefit, extorted by force, to some men at the expense of others.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Words are a human way of trying to describe things. But they're much more of interference than they are a help in the world of enlightenment.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Neither situations nor people can be altered by the interference of an outsider. If they are to be altered, that alteration must come from within.
quotes.author: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.quote: During exposure, interference takes place between the incident rays and those reflected by the mirror, with the formation of interference fringes half a wavelength distant from each other.
quotes.author: Gabriel Lippmann

quotes.quote: When you find a man who knows his job and is willing to take responsibility, keep out of his way and don't bother him with unnecessary supervision. What you may think is cooperation is nothing but interference.
quotes.author: Thomas Dreier

quotes.quote: State interference in economic life, which calls itself economic policy, has done nothing but destroy economic life. Prohibitions and regulations have by their general obstructive tendency fostered the growth of the spirit of wastefulness.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: There is a limit to the legitimate interference of collective opinion with individual independence: and to find that limit, and maintain it against encroachment, is as indispensable to a good condition of human affairs, as protection against political despotism.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: In all modern history, interference with science in the supposed interest of religion, no matter how conscientious such interference may have been, has resulted in the direst evils both to religion and to science, and invariably; and, on the other hand, all untrammelled scientific investigation, no matter how dangerous to religion some of its stages may have seemed for the time to be, has invariably resulted in the highest good both of religion and of science.
quotes.author: Andrew Dickson White

quotes.quote: Imagination is intervention, an act of defiance. It alters belief.
quotes.author: David Mura

quotes.quote: Every intervention of man in the environment around him incurs some risk as to both favorable and unfavorable consequences. Every intervention is taken in the face of partial ignorance as to what its effects will be and involves uncertainty as to the ultimate outcome.
quotes.author: Gilbert F. White

quotes.quote: Interference between universes at the quantum level means that information transfer takes place between them.
quotes.author: James P. Hogan

quotes.quote: Government interference with the economic process represents a substitution of political for consumer objectives.
quotes.author: Sheldon Richman

quotes.quote: Interference with communications of science to the public has been greater during the current administration than at any time in my career.
quotes.author: James Hansen

quotes.quote: There is a clear message from science: To avoid dangerous interference with the climate system, we need to move away from business as usual.
quotes.author: Ottmar Edenhofer

quotes.quote: Many markets work best with little or no outside interference. But others - especially those subject to big 'externalities' - need a helping hand.
quotes.author: Eric Maskin

quotes.quote: All depressions are caused by government interference and the cure is always offered to take more of the poison that caused the disaster. Depressions are not the result of a free economy.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Interference by the three classes with each others jobs, and interchange of jobs between them, therefore, does the greatest harm to our state, and we are entirely justified in calling it the worst of evils.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: If diffraction or interference phenomena were to be sought it was therefore necessary, in accordance with the basic principles of wave theory, to select for the test arrangement far smaller decisive dimensions than those employed in corresponding tests with visible light.
quotes.author: Max von Laue

quotes.quote: Unlike the interference of ordinary interest, power, or prejudice, which touches philosophy only at its outskirts and becomes at most a matter for philosophical tactics, the claim of revelation to the highest truth touches philosophy at its core and must affect its whole strategy.
quotes.author: Hans Jonas

quotes.quote: All varieties of interference with the market phenomena not only fail to achieve the ends aimed at by their authors and supporters, but bring about a state of affairs which - from the point of view of their authors and advocates valuations - is less desirable than the previous state of affairs which they were designed to alter.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: Direct interference in a person's life does not enter our scope of activity, nor, on the other, tralatitiously speaking, hand, is his destiny a chain of predeterminate links: some "future" events may be likelier than others, O.K., but all are chimeric, and every cause-and-effect sequence is always a hit-and-miss affair, even if the lunette has actually closed around your neck, and the cretinous crowd holds its breath.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: It is important to remember that government interference always means either violent action or the threat of such action. Government is in the last resort the employment of armed men, of policemen, gendarmes, soldiers, prison guards, and hangmen. The essential feature of government is the enforcement of its decrees by beating, killing, and imprisoning. Those who are asking for more government interference are asking ultimately for more compulsion and less freedom.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: Foreign interventions always end badly.
quotes.author: Stephen Kinzer

quotes.quote: What appears to be an interruption is often an intervention.
quotes.author: Rich Wilkerson Jr.

quotes.quote: Intervention only works when the people concerned seem to be keen for peace.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Intervention continues to be a prominent dimension of the post-cold war world.
quotes.author: Mike Jackson

quotes.quote: The success of an intervention depends on the interior condition of the intervenor.
quotes.author: Bill O'Brien

quotes.quote: Without intervention today, the cost of care for adults with autism will be significantly greater and the burden will no longer lie with the parents, but on our entire society.
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.quote: Without effective human intervention, epidemics and pandemics typically end only when the virus or bacteria has infected every available host and all have either died or become immune to the disease.
quotes.author: Alan Huffman

quotes.quote: Early intervention programs enrich adverse family environments. The largest effects of the early intervention programs are on noncognitive traits. Now, what do I mean by that? I mean perseverance, motivation, self-esteem, and hard work.
quotes.author: James Heckman

quotes.quote: State intervention in economic production arises only when private initiative is lacking or insufficient, or when the political interests of the State are involved. This intervention may take the form of control, assistance or direct management.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.quote: The essence of interior design will always be about people and how they live. It is about the realities of what makes for an attractive, civilized, meaningful environment, not about fashion or what's in or what's out. This is not an easy job.
quotes.author: Albert Hadley

quotes.quote: Decorating is not about making stage sets, it's not about making pretty pictures for the magazines, it's really about creating a quality of life, a beauty that nourishes the soul.
quotes.author: Albert Hadley

quotes.quote: An interior designer must be able to clarify his intent keeping ever in mind that decorating is not a look, it's a point of view.
quotes.author: Albert Hadley

quotes.quote: Understanding the person or people living in a home is a far greater need in design than focusing purely on the aesthetics. The home is designed around emotional needs.
quotes.author: Amanda Talbot

quotes.quote: She well knew the great architectural secret of decorating her constructions, and never condescended to construct a decoration.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Great buildings that move the spirit have always been rare. In every case they are unique, poetic, products of the heart.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.quote: Be faithful to your own taste, because nothing you really like is ever out of style.
quotes.author: Billy Baldwin

quotes.quote: A design isn't finished until someone is using it.
quotes.author: Brenda Laurel

quotes.quote: Details are not details; they make the product.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: Decorate your home. It gives the illusion that your life is more interesting than it really is.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Decorating is like music. Harmony is what we constantly strive for. At home, we want a peaceful atmosphere where the objects are the notes and nothing is off-key.
quotes.author: Charlotte Moss

quotes.quote: Have you ever noticed how some rooms exude a certain energy, warmth, and a harmony of spirit? If you have, then you have experienced the language of the home. A language softly spoken, and universally understood.
quotes.author: Charlotte Moss

quotes.quote: Design should never say, "Look at me!" It should always say, "Look at this!
quotes.author: David Craib

quotes.quote: I'll always put in one controversial item. It makes people talk.
quotes.author: Dorothy Draper

quotes.quote: It is just as disastrous to have the wrong accessories in your room, as it is to wear sport shoes with an evening dress.
quotes.author: Dorothy Draper

quotes.quote: Innovation is often the ability to reach into the past and bring back what is good, what is beautiful, what is useful, what is lasting.
quotes.author: Dorothy May Kinnicutt

quotes.quote: Furniture is needed for practical reasons, and because it must be there, it may as well be as pleasant as possible to look at, and in a less definable psychological way, comforting to the spirit.
quotes.author: Edward J. Wormley

quotes.quote: Always design a thing by considering it in its next larger context - a chair in a room, a room in a house, a house in an environment, an environment in a city plan.
quotes.author: Eliel Saarinen

quotes.quote: There never has been a house so bad that it couldn’t be made over into something worthwhile.
quotes.author: Elsie de Wolfe

quotes.quote: It is the personality of the mistress that the house expresses. Men are forever guests in our homes, no matter how much happiness they may find there.
quotes.author: Elsie de Wolfe

quotes.quote: Architecture should speak of its time and place, but yearn for timelessness.
quotes.author: Frank Gehry

quotes.quote: Form follows function—that has been misunderstood. Form and function should be one, joined in a spiritual union.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: The longer I live, the more beautiful life becomes. If you foolishly ignore beauty, you will soon find yourself without it. Your life will be impoverished. But if you invest in beauty, it will remain with you all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Content precedes design. Design in the absence of content is not design, it’s decoration.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Zeldman

quotes.quote: Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent.
quotes.author: Joe Sparano

quotes.quote: A room should never allow the eye to settle in one place. It should smile at you and create fantasy.
quotes.author: Juan Montoya

quotes.quote: Home is the nicest word there is.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.quote: The home should be the treasure chest of living.
quotes.author: Le Corbusier

quotes.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate form of sophistication.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: A great building must begin with the immeasurable, must go through measurable means when it is being designed, and in the end must be unmeasured.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.quote: The question of what you want to own is actually the question of how you want to live your life.
quotes.author: Marie Kondo

quotes.quote: Real comfort, visual and physical, is vital to every room.
quotes.author: Mark Hampton

quotes.quote: The life of a designer is one of fight: fight against the ugliness. Just like a doctor fights against disease. For us, the visual disease is what we have around, and what we try to do is cure it somehow with design.
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: I try to give people a different way of looking at their surroundings. That's art to me.
quotes.author: Maya Lin

quotes.quote: Your home should tell the story of who you are, and be a collection of what you love.
quotes.author: Nate Berkus

quotes.quote: As an architect, you design for the present, with an awareness of the past, for a future which is essentially unknown.
quotes.author: Norman Foster

quotes.quote: One of the great beauties of architecture is that each time, it is like life starting all over again.
quotes.author: Renzo Piano

quotes.quote: For me, design is like choosing what I'm going to wear for the day – only much more complicated and not really the same at all.
quotes.author: Robynne Raye

quotes.quote: Have no fear of perfection You’ll never reach it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Design is a funny word. Some people think design means how it looks. But of course, if you dig deeper, it's really how it works.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Design is an opportunity to continue telling the story, not just to sum everything up.
quotes.author: Tate Linden

quotes.quote: Our opportunity, as designers, is to learn how to handle the complexity, rather than shy away from it, and to realize that the big art of design is to make complicated things simple.
quotes.author: Tim Parsey

quotes.quote: Interiors speak! Rooms emphasize whether one exists or lives, and there is a great difference between the two!
quotes.author: Van Day Truex

quotes.quote: The main purpose of my work is to provoke people into using their imagination and make their surroundings more exciting.
quotes.author: Verner Panton

quotes.quote: Curiosity about life in all its aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people.
quotes.author: Leo Burnett

quotes.quote: For such an art nothing patchy or scrappy, or half-starved, should be done: There is no excuse for doing anything which is not strikingly beautiful.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: Architecture is basically a container of something. I hope they will enjoy not so much the teacup, but the tea.
quotes.author: Yoshio Taniguchi

quotes.quote: Architecture is really about well-being. I think that people want to feel good in a space... On the one hand it's about shelter, but it's also about pleasure.
quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

quotes.quote: To create an interior, the designer must develop an overall concept and stick to it.
quotes.author: Albert Hadley

quotes.quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: For a house to be successful, the objects in it must communicate with one another, respond and balance one another.
quotes.author: Andre Putman

quotes.quote: All rooms ought to look as if they were lived in, and to have so to say, a friendly welcome ready for the incomer.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: No pattern should be without some sort of meaning.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: I am going to make everything around me beautiful, that will be my life.
quotes.author: Elsie de Wolfe

quotes.quote: One should never be the oldest thing in one's house.
quotes.author: Patsy Stone

quotes.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Design is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Fashion and interior design are one and the same.
quotes.author: Iris Apfel

quotes.quote: We shape our homes and then our homes shape us.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Design is defined by light and shade, and appropriate lighting is enormously important.
quotes.author: Albert Hadley

quotes.quote: Interior design is a business of trust.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Interior decoration partly thrives on being social.
quotes.author: Nicholas Haslam

quotes.quote: Design is a plan for arranging elements in such a way as best to accomplish a particular purpose.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: The details are not the details, they make the design.
quotes.author: Charles Eames

quotes.quote: Design is coming to grips with one's real lifestyle, one's real place in the world. Rooms should not be put together for show but to nourish one's wellbeing.
quotes.author: Albert Hadley

quotes.quote: You can never judge a paint hue by the liquid color in the paint pot. You must apply it to a wall, wait for the paint to dry, then decide.
quotes.author: Dorothy Draper

quotes.quote: It is the duty of the United Nations, is to make every international border a garden, a place of art and cultural festival.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Bringing countries together above their conflicts require great minds and great hearts.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: International peace negotiations need more value creation than value claiming. The more we create value for peace and development, the easier it is going to be to claim value for nuclear weapons free world.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: In the realm of international relations, the dilemma with 'State Morality' is that the rich countries choose to be immoral to maintain their dominance, whereas the poor countries can't afford to be moral in order to just survive.
quotes.author: Mamur Mustapha

quotes.quote: It is only when all the people of all countries grow together holding hands in harmony and not pointing guns at each other in hatred, that we can really advance in the path of progress as one species.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: We could only solve our problems by cooperating with other countries. It would have been paradoxical not to cooperate. And therefore we needed to put an end to the Iron Curtain, to change the nature of international relations, to rid them of ideological confrontation, and particularly to end the arms race.
quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

quotes.quote: A lot of people think international relations is like a game of chess. But it's not a game of chess, where people sit quietly, thinking out their strategy, taking their time between moves. It's more like a game of billiards, with a bunch of balls clustered together.
quotes.author: Madeleine Albright

quotes.quote: The more dubious and uncertain an instrument violence has become in international relations, the more it has gained in reputation and appeal in domestic affairs, specifically in the matter of revolution.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Tact and diplomacy are fine in international relations, in politics, perhaps even in business; in science only one thing matters, and that is the facts.
quotes.author: Hans Eysenck

quotes.quote: In international relations, in foreign policy, a great deal has to do with historical circumstances, a great deal has to do with the sense and perception of people.
quotes.author: Salman Khurshid

quotes.quote: Such highly qualitative leadership is demanded especially in the realm of the fostering of right international relations. Here the demand is simply irresistible.
quotes.author: John Raleigh Mott

quotes.quote: Educational exchange can turn nations into people, contributing as no other form of communication can to the humanizing of international relations
quotes.author: J. William Fulbright

quotes.quote: Geography has made us neighbors. History has made us friends. Economics has made us partners, and necessity has made us allies. Those whom God has so joined together, let no man put asunder.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The world must learn to work together, or finally it will not work at all.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: It may be long before the law of love will be recognised in international affairs. The machineries of government stand between and hide the hearts of one people from those of another.
quotes.author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: The regime of globalization promotes an unfettered marketplace as the dynamic instrument organizing international relations.
quotes.author: William Greider

quotes.quote: Sport allows us to engage in dialogue and to build bridges, and it may even have the capacity to reshape international relations. The Olympic Games embody perfectly this universal mission.
quotes.author: Richard Attias

quotes.quote: According to the first image of international relations, the locus of the important causes of war is found in the nature and behavior of man. Wars result from selfishness, from misdirected aggressive impulses, from stupidity.
quotes.author: Kenneth Waltz

quotes.quote: I think it is a very natural tendency for the nations to increase their influence in the international space, as they pursue their international relations with different countries.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: We must face the fact that international relations are governed by interests and not by moral principles.
quotes.author: B.H. Liddell Hart

quotes.quote: In our international relations, we Chinese people should get rid of great-power chauvinism resolutely, thoroughly, wholly and completely.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: We want harmonious development, ... We should work together for more democratic and law-based international relations, and a harmonious environment in which countries respect one another, treat one another as equals, and different cultures can emulate and interchange with each other.
quotes.author: Li Zhaoxing

quotes.quote: To build a theory of international relations on accidents of geography and history is dangerous.
quotes.author: Kenneth Waltz

quotes.quote: According to the first image of international relations, the locus of the important causes of war is found in the nature and behavior of man. Wars result from selfishness, from misdirected aggressive impulses, from stupidity.
quotes.author: Kenneth Waltz

quotes.quote: In international relations, in foreign policy, a great deal has to do with historical circumstances, a great deal has to do with the sense and perception of people.
quotes.author: Salman Khurshid

quotes.quote: Such highly qualitative leadership is demanded especially in the realm of the fostering of right international relations. Here the demand is simply irresistible.
quotes.author: John Raleigh Mott

quotes.quote: In international relations, sometimes the best indicator of what someone is going to do is what he tells you he is going to do. And, since it is a religious obligation in Islam to warn your enemies in advance, there was reason to pay particular attention to what he had to say.
quotes.author: Michael Morell

quotes.quote: The agony of international relations is the need to try to practice politics without the basic conditions for political order.
quotes.author: Bernard Crick

quotes.quote: We are living in a different world now. You can see it everywhere in international relations: It was noteworthy that, after his visit to Washington, the Chinese president's next stop was Saudi Arabia.
quotes.author: Daniel Yergin

quotes.quote: Things are different in the international relations between states. In this respect, I am neither a friend, nor bride or groom [of the West].
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: International relationships are preordained to be clumsy gestures based on imperfect knowledge.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: The agony of international relations is the need to try to practice politics without the basic conditions for political order.
quotes.author: Bernanrd Crick

quotes.quote: The internet could be a very positive step towards education, organisation and participation in a meaningful society.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: The Internet is so big, so powerful and pointless that for some people it is a complete substitute for life.
quotes.author: Andrew Brown

quotes.quote: The internet is global and seemingly omniscient, while iPods and phones are all microscopic workings encased in plastic blobjects. Compare that to a steam engine, where you can watch the pistons move and feel the heat of its boilers. I think we miss that visceral appeal of the machine.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.quote: One of the internet's strengths is its ability to help consumers find the right needle in a digital haystack of data.
quotes.author: Jared Sandberg

quotes.quote: The internet is just a world passing notes around a classroom.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: There are no secrets on the internet.
quotes.author: Paul Babicki

quotes.quote: The internet is like alcohol in some sense. It accentuates what you would do anyway. If you want to be a loner, you can be more alone. If you want to connect, it makes it easier to connect.
quotes.author: Esther Dyson

quotes.quote: As a research tool, the internet is invaluable.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Information flow is what the internet is about. Information sharing is power. If you don't share your ideas, smart people can't do anything about them, and you'll remain anonymous and powerless.
quotes.author: Vint Cerf

quotes.quote: Oh, Wikipedia, with your tension between those who would share knowledge and those who would destroy it.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand sites begins with a single click.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The problem with this generation is that they believe in social media more than people.
quotes.author: Shihab Kazi

quotes.quote: The Internet is the most effective instrument we have for globalization.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: All I know is that the Internet will transform the world.
quotes.author: Alfred D. Chandler, Jr.

quotes.quote: I guess the internet and the power of people finding things out for themselves is great.
quotes.author: Butch Walker

quotes.quote: We are all now connected by the internet, like neurons in a giant brain.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: The Internet provides a delivery system for pathological states of mind.
quotes.author: Phillip Adams

quotes.quote: The internet changes the structure of society all the time this massiveness made of individuals.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.quote: The Internet can empower groups whose aims are in fact antithetical to democracy.
quotes.author: Evgeny Morozov

quotes.quote: The internet is a telephone system that's gotten uppity.
quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

quotes.quote: The internet was crucial for our success. It is a great thing. It is a big democracy because people can choose what they like.
quotes.author: Stjepan Hauser

quotes.quote: The internet is the most powerful magnifier of slack ever invented.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The Internet isn't free. It just has an economy that makes no sense to capitalism.
quotes.author: Brad Shapcott

quotes.quote: The Internet is the first thing that humanity has built that humanity doesn't understand, the largest experiment in anarchy that we have ever had.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

quotes.quote: The internet is a giant international network of intelligent, informed computer enthusiasts, by which I mean, people without lives. We don't care. We have each other.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: A lot of things you want to do as part of daily life can now be done over the Internet.
quotes.author: Marc Andreessen

quotes.quote: Just move to the Internet, its great here. We get to live inside where the weather is always awesome.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Like most technology, the internet has mixed effects. It's a neutral instrument.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: The internet is an Ã©lite organization; most of the population of the world has never even made a phone call.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: You can't trust the internet.
quotes.author: Nicollette Sheridan

quotes.quote: Google can bring you back 100,000 answers. A librarian can bring you back the right one.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: The internet are the ultimate enemy of unconditional commitment.
quotes.author: Hubert L. Dreyfus

quotes.quote: Only on the Internet can a person be lonely and popular at the same time.
quotes.author: Allison Burnett

quotes.quote: The only hope we have is the internet. We must strive to keep it free.
quotes.author: L Neil Smith

quotes.quote: The internet has been the most fundamental change during my lifetime and for hundreds of years.
quotes.author: Rupert Murdoch

quotes.quote: The secret of the Internet's success has been its openness to new services.
quotes.author: Edward Felten

quotes.quote: Prior to the internet, the last technology that had any real effect on the way people sat down and talked together was the table.
quotes.author: Clay Shirky

quotes.quote: The internet is like a vault with a screen door on the back. I don't need jackhammers and atom bomb to get in when I can walk through the door.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The younger generation is surrounded by the Internet, apps, and video games. But somehow, my books make them read.
quotes.author: Chetan Bhagat

quotes.quote: You know, the Internets made us more aware of what people think about us.
quotes.author: Robert Smith

quotes.quote: A few years ago, users of Internet services began to realize that when an online service is free, you're not the customer. You're the product.
quotes.author: Tim Cook

quotes.quote: The Internet of things will augment your brain.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

quotes.quote: The internet is the great highway of the modern communication, free and independent.
quotes.author: Ktya Pujals Chamma

quotes.quote: The Internet is the most important single development in the history of human communication since the invention of call waiting.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: The internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The Internet is the crime scene of the 21st Century.
quotes.author: Cyrus Vance, Jr.

quotes.quote: The nature of the internet is that you don't know who is behind the screen.
quotes.author: Louise Mensch

quotes.quote: The internet interprets censorship as damage and routes around it.
quotes.author: John Gilmour

quotes.quote: The internet is by the people, for the people.
quotes.author: Kim Dotcom

quotes.quote: Getting information off the Internet is like taking a drink from a fire hydrant.
quotes.author: Mitchell Kapor

quotes.quote: To join in the industrial revolution, you needed to open a factory; in the Internet revolution, you need to open a laptop.
quotes.author: Alexis Ohanian

quotes.quote: The internet is a great way to get on the net.
quotes.author: Bob Dole

quotes.quote: If you think that the internet has changed your life, think again. The Internet of Things is about to change it all over again!
quotes.author: Brendan O’Brien

quotes.quote: Some say the Internet is for porn but you know that in truth the Internet is for spam.
quotes.author: Charles Stross

quotes.quote: The Internet is for lonely people. People should live.
quotes.author: Charlton Heston

quotes.quote: I have an almost religious zeal, not for technology per se, but for the Internet which is for me, the nervous system of mother Earth, which I see as a living.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: The Internet, transforming society and shaping the future through chat.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: If television's a babysitter, the Internet is a drunk librarian who won't shut up.
quotes.author: Dorothy Gambrell

quotes.quote: Privacy is not an option, and it shouldn't be the price we accept for just getting on the Internet.
quotes.author: Gary Kovacs

quotes.quote: As the Internet of things advances, the very notion of a clear dividing line between reality and virtual reality becomes blurred, sometimes in creative ways.
quotes.author: Geoff Mulgan

quotes.quote: The internet has been a boon and a curse for teenagers.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Access to computers and the Internet has become a basic need for education in our society.
quotes.author: Kent Conrad

quotes.quote: It's been my policy to view the Internet not as an 'information highway, but as an electronic asylum filled with babbling loonies.
quotes.author: Mike Royko

quotes.quote: Over half of the internet is a dump for useless information.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: The internet is not for sissies.
quotes.author: Paul Vixie

quotes.quote: The internet always proving that you're not quite as special as you suspected.
quotes.author: Robin Sloan

quotes.quote: Doing research on the Web is like using a library assembled piecemeal by pack rats and vandalized nightly.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: There was a time when people felt the internet was another world, but now people realise it's a tool that we use in this world.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: People live too much of their lives on email or the Internet or text messages these days. We're losing all of our communication skills.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.quote: The problem with the Internet is that it gives you everything reliable material and crazy material. So the problem becomes, how do you discriminate?
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: It is always possible to argue against anÂ interpretation, to confrontÂ interpretations, to arbitrate between them and to seek for an agreement, even if this agreement remains beyond our reach.
quotes.author: Paul Ricoeur

quotes.quote: Our interpretations of subjects are clouded by our intellects.
quotes.author: Carl Purcell

quotes.quote: Without theÂ interpretationÂ of the universe by man to the glory of God the whole world would be meaningless.
quotes.author: Cornelius Van Til

quotes.quote: TheÂ interpretationÂ of a case is corroborated only by the successful continuation of a self-formative process , that is by the completion of self-reflection , and not in any unmistakable way by what the patient says or how he behaves.
quotes.author: Jurgen Habermas

quotes.quote: AllÂ interpretation, all psychology, all attempts to make things comprehensible, require the medium of theories, mythologies, and lies.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: TheÂ interpretationÂ of dreams is a great art.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: All things are subject to interpretation whichever interpretation prevails at a given time is a function of power and not truth.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: TheÂ interpretationÂ of facts in a certain way stimulates other scientists' thoughts.
quotes.author: Robert Barany

quotes.quote: The aim ofÂ interpretationÂ is not agreement but understanding.
quotes.author: Donald Davidson

quotes.quote: The supply ofÂ interpretations, like that of advice, greatly exceeds the need for them.
quotes.author: Harry Stack Sullivan

quotes.quote: Through interpretation, understanding; through understanding, appreciation; through appreciation, protection.
quotes.author: Freeman Tilden

quotes.quote: A common senseÂ interpretationÂ of the facts suggests that a superintellect has monkeyed with physics.
quotes.author: Fred Hoyle

quotes.quote: AllÂ interpretations of history are propaganda for one idea or another.
quotes.author: Selma Dabbagh

quotes.quote: The truestÂ interpretations are those with the best justification.
quotes.author: Bernard Ramm

quotes.quote: A falseÂ interpretationÂ of Scripture causes that the gospel of the Lord becomes the gospel of man, or, which is worse, of the devil.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: InterpretationÂ is the evidence of growth and knowledge, the latter through sorrow - that great teacher.
quotes.author: Eleanora Duse

quotes.quote: AnÂ interpretationÂ exists because of what we find between the notes.
quotes.author: Renee Fleming

quotes.quote: The best way to refine anÂ interpretationÂ is by getting out and performing.
quotes.author: Joshua Bell

quotes.quote: Never trust the translation or interpretation of something without first trusting its interpreter.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: TheÂ interpretationÂ of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The art ofÂ interpretationÂ is not to play what is written.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: InterpretationÂ is the revenge of the intellectual upon art.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: The old style ofÂ interpretationÂ was insistent, but respectful; it erected another meaning on top of the literal one. The modern style ofÂ interpretationÂ excavates, and as it excavates, destroys; it digs 'behind' the text, to find a sub-text which is the true one.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: The interpretation of our reality through patterns not our own, serves only to make us ever more unknown, ever less free, ever more solitary.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: The chief aim ofÂ interpretationÂ is not instruction, but provocation.
quotes.author: Freeman Tilden

quotes.quote: Interpretations, criticisms, diagnoses, and judgments of others are actually alienated expressions of our unmet needs.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: We doubt that any facts actually exist. We only have observations andÂ interpretations. Most of theÂ interpretationsÂ remain questionable.
quotes.author: Peter J. Carroll

quotes.quote: TheÂ interpretationÂ that makes you ardent and hopeful and active and reverent is the true one.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: It is ourÂ interpretationÂ of the past, our limiting beliefs, and our undigested pain that stop us from being able to move forward with clear direction.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: The many faces of intimacy: the Victorians could experience it through correspondence, but not through cohabitation; contemporary men and women can experience it through fornication, but not through friendship.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: Passion is the quickest to develop, and the quickest to fade. Intimacy develops more slowly, and commitment more gradually still.
quotes.author: Robert Sternberg

quotes.quote: Intimacy is being seen and known as the person you truly are.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.quote: Intimacy is what makes a marriage, not a ceremony, not a piece of paper from the state.
quotes.author: Kathleen Norris

quotes.quote: The married are those who have taken the terrible risk of intimacy and, having taken it, know life without intimacy to be impossible.
quotes.author: Carolyn Heilbrun

quotes.quote: Intimacy is the capacity to be rather weird with someone - and finding that that's ok with them.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: The value of the personal relationship to all things is that it creates intimacy and intimacy creates understanding and understanding creates love.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: The opposite of loneliness is not togetherness, it's intimacy.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: True intimacy is a human constant. People of all types find it equally hard to achieve, equally precious to hold. Age, education, social status, make little difference here; even genius does not presuppose the talent to reveal one's self completely and completely absorb one's self in another personality. Intimacy is to love what concentration is to work: a simultaneous drawing together to attention and release of energy.
quotes.author: Robert Grudin

quotes.quote: The eyes start love; intimacy perfects it.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Only intimacy with the self will bring about true healing.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: This is intimacy: the trading of stories in the dark.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Intimacy requires courage because risk is inescapable.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: There is no intimacy without vulnerability. Yet another powerful example of vulnerability as courage.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: It is not time or opportunity that is to determine intimacy;—it is disposition alone. Seven years would be insufficient to make some people acquainted with each other, and seven days are more than enough for others.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Real intimacy is a sacred experience. It never exposes its secret trust and belonging to the voyeuristic eye of a neon culture. Real intimacy is of the soul, and the soul is reserved.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Intimacy is not something that just happens between two people; it is a way of being alive. At every moment, we are choosing either to reveal ourselves or to protect ourselves, to value ourselves or to diminish ourselves, to tell the truth or to hide. To dive into life or to avoid it. Intimacy is making the choice to be connected to, rather than isolated from, our deepest truth at that moment.
quotes.author: Geneen Roth

quotes.quote: The promise of intimacy is also its risk: the more intimacy two people share, the more power they give to each other to cause hurt.
quotes.author: Karen J. Prager

quotes.quote: From the covenants of intimacy, we enjoy the treasures of real friendship, for there can be no intimacy where there is no faith.
quotes.author: Eliza Ryves

quotes.quote: Real intimacy; real love has to do with a joining of the mind, a joining of the spirit, a joining of the heart.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: At least embarrasement is not an imitation. It is intimacy for beginners.
quotes.author: Alice Fulton

quotes.quote: The story of human intimacy is one of constantly allowing ourselves to see those we love most deeply in a new, more fractured light. Look hard. Risk that.
quotes.author: Cheryl Strayed

quotes.quote: The highest form of love is the love that allows for intimacy without the annihilation of difference.
quotes.author: Parker J. Palmer

quotes.quote: One of the characteristics of love relationships that flower is a relatively high degree of mutual self-disclosure.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.
quotes.author: John Joseph Powell

quotes.quote: Intimacy seems to be one of the major highs of life, whether it's getting to know yourself in a deeper way, or your partner, or the world and the society that you live in.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: The deepest moments of intimacy occur when you're not talking.
quotes.author: Patricia Love

quotes.quote: If honesty is the key to intimacy, it means we don't have to be perfect and we don't have to pretend to be perfect.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.quote: The whole point of an intimacy is to serve each other in growth and love, hopefully in better ways than we can serve ourselves. Otherwise, why engage in intimacy if your growth and love are served more by living alone? Intimacy is about growing more than you could by yourself, through the art of mutual gifting.
quotes.author: David Deida

quotes.quote: Physical intimacy isn’t and can never be an effective substitute for emotional intimacy.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: The most important part to keeping us intimidating is being physical overall. If they know one of us is coming, they're going to brace themselves for a hard hit.
quotes.author: Asante Samuel

quotes.quote: They're intimidating the networks and levying these fines, so the networks are not sure of what they can or can't do.
quotes.author: Barry Levinson

quotes.quote: The intimidating part is not his speed. It's how different it is, how much the ball moves. It looks like it's coming at you. Then you lose it.
quotes.author: Blake Mitchell

quotes.quote: It can be intimidating, but once you're there, you realize no one is looking at you. You realize that not everyone is in great shape they're coming to the gym to get fit, too.
quotes.author: Erik Johnson

quotes.quote: The real intimidating stuff is the scene where you show up for the first day. You kind of square off, and that is where you look each other in the eye.
quotes.author: Ron Livingston

quotes.quote: Behind intimidating messages are simply people appealing to us to meet their needs.
quotes.author: Marshall B Rosenberg

quotes.quote: The whole concept of negotiating is intimidating to many people.
quotes.author: Leigh Steinberg

quotes.quote: How guilt once harbour'd in the conscious breast, Intimidates the brave, degrades the great.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: If a team intimidate you physically and you let them, they've won.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: If you let a bully intimidate you, he's going to do it again. You've got to stand up to these strong-arm tactics.
quotes.author: Charles Djou

quotes.quote: Some venues are more intimidating than others, but as professional players you enjoy the intimidating places more than the other kind.
quotes.author: Ben Morgan

quotes.quote: Creative people are often found either disagreeable or intimidating by mediocrities.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Don't be intimidated by power, wealth or station, character alone makes all the difference.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: A man who is intimate with God will never be intimidated by men.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Once you've found something you know how to do, it makes you feel you don't have to be intimidated by someone.
quotes.author: Mira Sorvino

quotes.quote: Good hitters don't become intimidated. They become infuriated.
quotes.author: Ken Singleton

quotes.quote: There is nothing to be intimidated about - it's just another long run where a few more people show up and they happen to wear numbers.
quotes.author: Wess Stafford

quotes.quote: If you've got them by the balls, their hearts and minds will follow.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The ones who hate me the most are the ones who don't scare me.
quotes.author: Rebecca Mckinsey

quotes.quote: The strongest intimidation, by the way, is the invention of a hereafter with a hell everlasting.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If you spend all your time thinking about how someone is going to one-up you, you can't put your best foot forward.
quotes.author: Miranda Kenneally

quotes.quote: Never be intimidated by what seems ominous, for big is only an accumulation of many smalls.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Straightforwardness intimidates people. They prefer the veneer, despite what they claim.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: The trouble with scary people is everyone's too scared to tell them how scary they are
quotes.author: Janey Colbourne

quotes.quote: Ocean is not supposed to be scared of the drops.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: A man of your valor deserves not another breath.
quotes.author: Craig R. Key

quotes.quote: What may intimidate a man is a woman who thinks with her mind before she feels with her heart. Nevertheless what determines the strength in the man is his ability to accept one when he sees one.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A nervous silence loosens tongues
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.quote: Somebody thinking that they can make noise intimidate me is comical.
quotes.author: Carl Froch

quotes.quote: When you see something that's so excellent it can be intimidating to walk into it no matter how many people you know.
quotes.author: Clancy Brown

quotes.quote: If you want to control someone, all you have to do is to make them feel afraid.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The only thing more intimidating than a huge international film star is your mother-in-law.
quotes.author: Benjamin Walker

quotes.quote: Directing can be very lonely and quite intimidating.
quotes.author: Asif Kapadia

quotes.quote: Don't be intimidated by what you don't know.
quotes.author: Sara Blakely

quotes.quote: A man who cannot be enticed by money or intimidated by the threat of jail or death has two of the strongest weapons that anyone has to offer.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Hate is the revenge of a coward intimidated.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Manipulation aims at control, not cooperation.
quotes.author: Dr. Paul W. Swets

quotes.quote: A man convinced against his will is of the same opinion still.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Creative people are often found either disagreeable or intimidating by mediocrities.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A nervous silence loosens tongues.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Carey

quotes.quote: If you give in to intimidation, you'll go on being intimidated.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: I know what the intimidation level of high school is. You're on a hamster wheel, running, running, running, trying so hard to fit in. It's all about how you deal with what you're given, feeling OK with being the odd man out before you're finally successful.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: The persistent winner is not discouraged by a problem - he is challenged by it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The ones who hate me the most are the ones who don't scare me.
quotes.author: Rebecca Mckinsey

quotes.quote: There is a stubbornness about me that can never bear to be frightened at the will of others. My courage always rises at every attempt to intimidate me.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: A mighty person is one who can control their emotions and make of an enemy a friend.
quotes.author: Simeon ben Zoma

quotes.quote: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: If you want to control someone, all you have to do is to make them feel afraid.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Ocean is not supposed to be scared of the drops.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Don't be intimidated by power, wealth or station, character alone makes all the difference.
quotes.author: Joe Biden

quotes.quote: To win one hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the acme of skill. To subdue the enemy without fighting is the acme of skill.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The argument from intimidation is a confession of intellectual impotence.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Men are intimidated by smart women. They make us want to kick up our game more.
quotes.author: Ian Somerhalder

quotes.quote: The stupidity of gossips is that they become frightened when they see your face, and a little word from your mouth makes them vibrate like an electrocuted criminal.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: A man who is intimate with God is not intimidated by man.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: Any woman who is sure of her own wits, is a match, at any time, for a man who is not sure of his own temper.
quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

quotes.quote: Don't be intimidated by other people's opinions. Only mediocrity is sure of itself, so take risks and do what you really want to do.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: A man of your valor deserves not another breath.
quotes.author: Craig R. Key

quotes.quote: To destroy that which seeks to destroy me, God invites me to stand against it until it stands down and then falls down.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Don't be intimidated by what you don't know. That can be your greatest strength and ensure that you do things differently from everyone else.
quotes.author: Sara Blakely

quotes.quote: One of the single most powerful things you can do to influence others is smile at them.
quotes.author: John L. Mason

quotes.quote: Better to master one mountain than a thousand foothills.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: If you let spirit define you, you have a life that even death itself cannot intimidate or extinguish.
quotes.author: Peter J. Gomes

quotes.quote: Education helps one cease being intimidated by strange situations. Once you have it in your mind, you can go anywhere.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Men like Cesare Borgia and Nopoleon used the element of speed to intimidate and control.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: All great leaders know that an aura of mystery draws attention to them and creates an intimidating presence.
quotes.author: Mao Tse-Tung

quotes.quote: By intimidating with a bold move, you establish a precedent: in every subsequent encounter, people will be on the defensive, i terror of your next strike.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: As one poker manual explains it, 'While playing his hand, the good player is seldom an actor. Instead he practices a bland behavior that minimizes readable patterns, frustrates and confuses opponents.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Through reputation alone you can intimidate and win.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Because they do not understand you, they have unnerved, and in such a state you can easily intimidate them.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: All great leaders know that an aura of mystery draws attention to them and creates an intimidating presence.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Boldness strikes fear; Fear Creates Authority.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: Many of our fears are tissue, paper thin, and a single courageous step would carry us clear through them.
quotes.author: M.P. Singh

quotes.quote: Courage is never to let your actions be influenced by your fears.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: Fear has a large shadow, but he himself is small.
quotes.author: Ruth Gendler

quotes.quote: Fear is static that prevents me from hearing myself.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Courage is a peculiar kind of fear.
quotes.author: Charles Kennedy

quotes.quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.
quotes.author: Anaiis Nin

quotes.quote: Boldness is a mask for fear, however great.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russel

quotes.quote: Perhaps the most important thing we can undertake towards the reduction of fear is to make it easier for people.
quotes.author: M.P. Singh

quotes.quote: Fear is the main source of superstition, and one of the main sources of cruelty.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russel

quotes.quote: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russel

quotes.quote: Almost always it is the fear of being ourselves that brings us to the mirror.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: The joys of parents are secret, and so are their griefs and fears.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The trouble with most people is that they think with their hopes or fears or wishes rather than with their minds.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: We promise according to our hopes, and perform according to our fears.
quotes.author: Francois Duc de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: You cannot educate a man wholly out of the superstitious fears which were implanted in his imagination, no matter how utterly his reason may reject them.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Wicked men obey form fear; good men, from love.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The jealous bring down the curse they fear upon their own heads.
quotes.author: Dorothy Dix

quotes.quote: Fear has its use but cowardice has none.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: Intolerance of your present creates your future.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: Intolerance is the besetting sin of moral fervour.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Intolerance is a form of egotism, and to condemn egotism intolerantly is to share it.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Intolerance is itself a form of violence and an obstacle to the growth of a true democratic spirit.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: It may be possible to fight intolerance, stupidity, and fanaticism seperately, but when they come together there is no hope.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Intolerance, discourtesy and harshness..... are taboo in all good society and are surely contrary to the spirit of democracy.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: We can cure the disease of intolerance. We must do it if the world is to survive. No us. No them. Just we.
quotes.author: Steve Goodier

quotes.quote: Intolerance betrays want of faith in one's cause.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Intolerance is evidence of impotence.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: Tolerance of intolerance is cowardice.
quotes.author: Ayaan Hirsi Ali

quotes.quote: Intolerance has been the curse of every age and state.
quotes.author: Samuel Davies

quotes.quote: Absolute morality leads logically to absolute intolerance.
quotes.author: Michael Shermer

quotes.quote: If the bell of intolerance tolls for one, it tolls for all.
quotes.author: Henry Seidel Canby

quotes.quote: If there's anything intolerance can't tolerate, it's ridicule!
quotes.author: Arlene Francis

quotes.quote: When you tolerate intolerance, you're not really being a liberal.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: Intolerance of ambiguity is the mark of an authoritarian personality.
quotes.author: Theodor Wiesengrund Adorno

quotes.quote: Intolerance is a species of violence and therefore against our creed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The last refuge of intolerance is in not tolerating the intolerant ...
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Intolerance is evidence of fear, and fear is the consequence of feeling powerless.
quotes.author: Dean Frazer

quotes.quote: Intolerance of dissent is a well-noted feature of the American national character.
quotes.author: J. William Fulbright

quotes.quote: The intolerance of the few, or the risk of it, carries the day against the wider humanity of the many.
quotes.author: Paul Robeson

quotes.quote: Intolerance is natural and logical, for in every dissenting opinion lies an assumption of superior wisdom.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Intolerance has always been one of the cornerstones of Christianity - the glorious heritage of the Inquisition.
quotes.author: Madalyn Murray O'Hair

quotes.quote: The final battle against intolerance is to be fought—not in the chambers of any legislature—but in the hearts of men.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Intolerance is the most socially acceptable form of egotism, for it permits us to assume superiority without personal boasting.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Intolerance respecting other people's religion is toleration itself in comparison with intolerance respecting other people's art.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Intolerance of groups is often, strangely enough, exhibited more strongly against small differences than against fundamental ones.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Where a reputation for intolerance is more feared than a reputation for vice itself, all manner of evil may be expected to flourish.
quotes.author: Theodore Dalrymple

quotes.quote: ... neither tolerance nor intolerance is grounded in science and reason, but they are themselves acts of faith grounded in social custom and the politics of expediency and power.
