quotes.author: John Money

quotes.quote: Indeed, intolerance is essential only to monotheism; an only God is by nature a jealous God who will not allow another to live. On the other hand, polytheistic gods are naturally tolerant, they live and let live.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: There is no intolerance in the world so great as the intolerance of tolerance, and no bigotry so excessive as the bigotry of the image breaker. To praise the devil is second nature. To praise God is an education.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Marbury

quotes.quote: Intolerance is the 'Do Not Touch' sign on something that cannot bear touching. We do not mind having our hair ruffled, but we will not tolerate any familiarity with the toupee which covers our baldness.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Toleration is not the opposite of intolerance, but is the counterfeit of it. Both are despotisms. The one assumes to itself the right of withholding liberty of conscience, the other of granting it
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Intolerance of mediocrity has been the main prop of my independence.
quotes.author: Elsa Maxwell

quotes.quote: Intemperance and intolerance serve no one, and hatred guarantees failure.
quotes.author: Edward Brooke

quotes.quote: It is thus tolerance that is the source of peace, and intolerance that is the source of disorder and squabbling.
quotes.author: Pierre Bayle

quotes.quote: Ideological and political intolerance, even with the best and most sincere intentions, produces results that are the direct opposite of those intended.
quotes.author: Mikhail Gorbachev

quotes.quote: The most damaging forms of intolerance are connected with religious, racial and political differences of opinion.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: The greatest problem in the world today is intolerance. Everyone is so intolerant of each other.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: Intolerance has been the curse of our country.
quotes.author: James Larkin

quotes.quote: I have seen great intolerance shown in support of tolerance.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Tolerance of intolerance enables oppression.
quotes.author: DaShanne Stokes

quotes.quote: Association with human beings lures one into self-observation.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: The most mature human insight comes from one's introspection rather than from exterior research.
quotes.author: Hugh Downs

quotes.quote: One could argue that most of the trouble in the world is caused by introspection.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: The problem with introspection is that it has no end.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: Study yourself. Find your strong points and make them stronger as well as your weak ones and strengthen them. Study yourself carefully and you will see yourself as you really are.
quotes.author: Theron Q. Dumont

quotes.quote: Mastering self-control, the act of restraining one's emotions is the true key to success.
quotes.author: Timothy Pina

quotes.quote: To know your limits is a state of self-delusion.
quotes.author: Bill Purdin

quotes.quote: It is good for society to have this introspection.
quotes.author: Jacques Verges

quotes.quote: The philosophy of the wisest person that ever existed, is mainly derived from the act of introspection.
quotes.author: William Godwin

quotes.quote: One's greatest challenge is to control oneself.
quotes.author: Kazi Shams

quotes.quote: Self-control is strength. Right thought is mastery. Calmness is power.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Introspection is a devouring monster. You have to feed it with much material, much experience, many people, many places, many loves, many creations, and then it ceases feeding on you.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Without self knowledge, without understanding the working and functions of his machine, man cannot be free, he cannot govern himself and he will always remain a slave.
quotes.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

quotes.quote: Self-observation is the first step of inner unfolding.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: A man without self-control is like a city broken into and left without walls.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We can all afford to do a little soul-searching about the choices we make and the way we live our lives, but sometimes searching one's soul doesn't provide the answers we seek.
quotes.author: Danielle de Niese

quotes.quote: Anybody desirous of success should spend some time in introspection and contemplation.
quotes.author: Sam Veda

quotes.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Mindfully practicing authenticity during our most soul-searching struggles is how we invite grace, joy and gratitude into our lives.
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: Education, introspection, self-love and excellence are the only ways to overcome the wrath of ignorance.
quotes.author: Romany Malco

quotes.quote: The most introspective of souls are often those that have been hurt the most.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Self-control is the ability to control the expression of our passions and emotions.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Without proper self-evaluation, failure is inevitable.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Made for spirituality, we wallow in introspection. Made for joy, we settle for pleasure. Made for justice, we clamor for vengeance.
quotes.author: N. T. Wright

quotes.quote: Your brain shall be your servant instead of your master. You will rule it instead of allowing it to rule you.
quotes.author: Charles Popplestone

quotes.quote: The mind may wander, but let not the senses wander with it. If the senses wander where the mind takes them, one is done for.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Introspection is always retrospection.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: The mind can weave itself warmly in the cocoon of its own thoughts, and dwell a hermit anywhere.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: In order to understand the world, one has to turn away from it on occasion.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Self reflection is a much kinder teacher than regret is.
quotes.author: Andrena Sawyer

quotes.quote: There are times when those eyes inside your brain stare back at you.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Gandhi

quotes.quote: For those of us with an inward turn of mind, which is another name for melancholy introspection, the beginning of a new year inevitably leads to thoughts about both the future and the past.
quotes.author: Michael Dirda

quotes.quote: It's a very important process of self-recognition, self-introspection, by just daily accepting our creation, accepting what is right in front of us, breathing, letting go, and coming into the heart space and knowing that that fear or the struggle is part of the illusion. Just breathe that truth, because as you breathe, it filters through and you'll find that that tightness, that intensity, the fear, the worry, will dissolve. Just allow yourself not to get stuck in that.
quotes.author: Christine McCormick Day

quotes.quote: You will recognize your own path when you come upon it, because you will suddenly have all the energy and imagination you will ever need.
quotes.author: Jerry Gillies

quotes.quote: A long stretch of road will teach you more about yourself than a hundred years of quiet introspection.
quotes.author: Michael Barbarulo

quotes.quote: What is interesting about self analysis is that it leads nowhere it is an art form in itself.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.quote: Study yourself. Find your strong points and make them stronger as well as your weak ones and strengthen them. Study yourself carefully and you will see yourself as you really are.
quotes.author: William Walker Atkinson

quotes.quote: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Look at everything as though you were seeing it for the first time or the last time. Then your time on earth will be filled with glory.
quotes.author: Betty Smith

quotes.quote: Wisdom can only come through honest introspection.
quotes.author: Nirmala Srivastava

quotes.quote: In evaluating ourselves, we tend to be long on our weaknesses and short on our strengths.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: The most introspective of hearts tends to be the most sentimental. We cling to the smallest moments from our past because we fear that emotion will never come our way again.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: We must clean the lens of our hearts to see the state of our souls. However, too often the former is too dirty to even know that the latter exists.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Self-reflection is the school of wisdom.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: People who have had little self-reflection live life in a huge reality blind-spot.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Just because you fail once doesn't mean you're gonna fail at everything.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Think you're escaping and run into yourself. Longest way round is the shortest way home.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: You will never be able to escape from your heart. So it's better to listen to what it has to say.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Self trust is the first secret of success.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The journey into self-love and self-acceptance must begin with self-examination until you take the journey of self-reflection, it is almost impossible to grow or learn in life.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: Give yourself the gift of time in coming to answers for your life. It takes time, and a lot of introspection and soul searching, to get clear about what you really want to manifest in your life.
quotes.author: David Emerald Womeldorff

quotes.quote: A long stretch of road will teach you more about yourself than a hundred years of quiet introspection
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The man whose whole activity is diverted to inner meditation becomes insensible to all his surroundings. His passions are mere appearances, being sterile. They are dissipated in futile imaginings, producing nothing external to themselves.
quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

quotes.quote: The most introspective of souls are often those that have been hurt the most.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Introverts like being introverts. We are drawn to ideas, we are passionate observers, and for us, solitude is rich and generative.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Im a shy person. I contradict my own profession, because Im an introvert in a very glamorous world.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.quote: All sorrow has its root in man's inability to sit quiet in a room by himself.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: When a quiet introvert talks, heads turn, and that's power.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: Often confused with shyness, introversion does not imply social reticence or discomfort. Rather than being averse to social engagement, introverts become overwhelmed by too much of it, which explains why the introvert is ready to leave a party after an hour and the extravert gains steam as the night goes on.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: For an introvert his environment is himself and can never be subject to startling or unforeseen change.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: For the introvert, conversation can be a very limited forum for self-expression. When a song moves you, a writer â€œgetsâ€ you, or a theory enlightens youâ€”you and its creator are connecting in a realm beyond sight or speech.
quotes.author: Laurie A. Helgoe

quotes.quote: Introverts are more effective leaders of proactive employees. When you have a creative, energetic work force, an introvert is going to draw out that energy better.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: I'm an introvert at heart... And show business - even though I've loved it so much - has always been hard for me.
quotes.author: Roy Rogers

quotes.quote: Introverts paradoxically pull away from culture and create culture.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: For introverts, to be alone with our thoughts is as restorative as sleeping, as nourishing as eating.
quotes.author: Jonathan Rauch

quotes.quote: As an introvert, you can be your own best friend or your worst enemy. The good news is we generally like our own company, a quality that extroverts often envy. We find comfort in solitude and know how to soothe ourselves.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: An introverted, bookish child, with a mass of complexes and her head full of crazy ideals and a childish faith in the beautiful prince who was searching for and would surely find her.
quotes.author: Sergei Lukyanenko

quotes.quote: Introverts think carefully before they speak. We can be excellent public speakers because we prepare carefully.
quotes.author: Sophia Dembling

quotes.quote: Introverts dislike small talk, but we are fluent in the language of ideas and dreams.
quotes.author: Michaela Chung

quotes.quote: Introverts treasure the close relationships they have stretched so much to make.
quotes.author: Adam S. McHugh

quotes.quote: Introverts often work more slowly and deliberately. They like to focus on one task at a time and can have mighty powers of concentration. They're relatively immune to the lures of wealth and fame.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: The only thing a true introvert dislikes more than talking about himself is repeating himself.
quotes.author: Jonathan Rauch

quotes.quote: Introverts process information internally, and we don't like to express our thoughts until they are fully formed.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: It was words and reading that had made me quiet, and being quiet had made me a mark.
quotes.author: Charles M. Blow

quotes.quote: Introverts are capable of acting like extroverts for the sake of work they consider important, people they love, or anything they value highly.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: What we share as introverts is the love of ideas and the desire to explore them with minimal interruption. We want and need input, but we'd rather get it through reading, research, and rich conversation than through unfiltered talk.
quotes.author: Laurie A. Helgoe

quotes.quote: Introverts are generally more sensitive to low-intensity stimuli - they are mentally alerted to inputs that extroverts may miss.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: Introverts need to trust their gut and share their ideas as powerfully as they can.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: An inability to stay quiet is one of the conspicuous failings of mankind.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Introverts often feel more freedom in worship services that feature traditional liturgy than they do in ones that feature more open, informal, unstructured styles of worship. Introverts often appreciate the depth of liturgical prayers and hymns, as well as the rich symbolism that fill traditional churches.
quotes.author: Adam S. McHugh

quotes.quote: I'm an introvert... I love being by myself, love being outdoors, love taking a long walk with my dogs and looking at the trees, flowers, the sky.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: When someone speaks to an introvert, her brain responds with a high level of activity. It is as if several lights start flashing on a control panel.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: Introverts are dependent on their own inside noise, extroverts are dependent of outside noise. The outputs are dependent on quality of those noise.
quotes.author: Amit K Ghosh

quotes.quote: She might be a little introverted, livelier of movement than of conversation, neither bashful nor forward, with a soul that seemed submerged, but in a radiant moistness. Opalescent on the surface but translucent in her depths.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Introvert conversations are like jazz. Each player gets to solo for a nice stretch before the other player comes in and does his solo.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: Introverts often assume what's inside is visible on the outside. We don't have to invent or fake the emotion; we just need to allow it to be seen!
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: The last introvert in a world of extroverts. Silence: my response to both emptiness and saturation. But silence frightens people. I had to learn how to talk. Out of politeness.
quotes.author: Ariel Gore

quotes.quote: When introverts are in conflict with each other...it may require a map in order to follow all the silences, nonverbal cues and passive-aggressive behaviors!
quotes.author: Adam S. McHugh

quotes.quote: A lot of good actors tend to be quite introverted as people.
quotes.author: Antony Sher

quotes.quote: Introverts don't get lonely if they don't socialize with a lot of people, but we do get lonely if we don't have intimate interactions on a regular basis.
quotes.author: Sophia Dembling

quotes.quote: A happy life must be to a great extent a quiet life, for it is only in an atmosphere of quiet that true joy dare live.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Whatever kind of introvert you are, some people will find you 'too much' in some ways and 'not enough' in others.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: Shyness is about the fear of social judgments - at a job interview or a party you might be excessively worried about what people think of you. Whereas an introvert might not feel any of those things at all, they simply have the preference to be in a quieter setting.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: Introverts, the world needs you and it needs the things you carry. So I wish you the best of all possible journeys and the courage to speak softly.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: Introverts are collectors of thoughts, and solitude is where the collection is curated and rearranged to make sense of the present and future.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: Writing is something you do alone. Its a profession for introverts who want to tell you a story but don't want to make eye contact while doing it.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: I think the best thing I have is the introvert's ability to listen when you're working on something as complicated as this and you have to really be aware of everyone's specialized skills.
quotes.author: Jennifer Yuh Nelson

quotes.quote: When you're an introvert like me and you've been lonely for a while, and then you find someone who understands you, you become really attached to them. It's a real release.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: When an introvert is quiet, don't assume he is depressed, snobbish or socially deficient.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: Introverts prefer to work independently, and solitude can be a catalyst to innovation.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: A shy kid might look longingly at other kids playing in the schoolyard, afraid and unsure about how to approach them, but an introvert is perfectly content on her own.
quotes.author: Laurie Helgoe

quotes.quote: I was very shy and very reserved as a child, very, very introvert.
quotes.author: Om Puri

quotes.quote: Introverts find the inner world of thinking and daydreaming more creative and interesting. They regain energy by spending time alone.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The television set is so much more introverted than even the movie, and the movie in turn, more introverted than the concert hall or the stage
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Hardly anybody ever writes about anything nice about introverts. Extroverts rule. This is rather odd when you realize that about nineteen writers out of twenty are introverts. We have been taught to be ashamed of not being 'outgoing.' But a writer's job in ingoing.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: The last thing you want to be in acting is an introvert.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Accept the things that you cannot change about yourself. For example, if you're naturally an introvert you need time alone to recharge your batteries so don't try and force yourself to socialize all the time.
quotes.author: Pyramid

quotes.quote: We are all prone to the malady of the introvert who with the manifold spectacle of the world spread out before him, turns away and gazes only upon the emptiness within.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Justice and I became friends, though we were opposites in many ways—he was extroverted, I was introverted; he was lighthearted, I was serious.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: They say that extroverts are unhappier than introverts and have to compensate for this by constantly proving to themselves how happy and contented and at ease with life they are.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: My dad is like a cactus— introverted and tough. I'm a people person, like my mom, but I got my competitiveness from my dad.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuck

quotes.quote: I was once an extrovert, but the high crime rate has forced me to seek shelter under a rock with the rest of the introverts.
quotes.author: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.quote: I prefer to be alone, / Isolation is not lonely, it's peaceful, / I have friends anyway... / The voice at night that tells me I'm weak, / The voice in the morning that tells me not to bother.
quotes.author: Rick Berry

quotes.quote: No one has done you wrong / You haven't gotten hurt. / But you have a heavy heart / Feel like an introvert.
quotes.author: Suzanne J. Soule

quotes.quote: Silence is only frightening to people who are compulsively verbalizing.
quotes.author: William S. Boroughs

quotes.quote: I think a lot, but I don’t say much.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: In order to be open to creativity, one must have the capacity for constructive use of solitude. One must overcome the fear of being alone.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.quote: Don’t underestimate me because I’m quiet. I know more than I say, think more than I speak, and observe more than you know.
quotes.author: Michaela Chung

quotes.quote: Introverts crave meaning so party chitchat feels like sandpaper to our psyche.
quotes.author: Diane Cameron

quotes.quote: Introverts are word economists in a society suffering from verbal diarrhea.
quotes.author: Michaela Chung

quotes.quote: Your solitude will be a support and a home for you, even in the midst of very unfamiliar circumstances, and from it you will find all your paths.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Introverts enjoy people-watching. Extroverts enjoy people watching.
quotes.author: Jonny Sun

quotes.quote: There is a tremendous difference between alone and lonely. You could be lonely in a group of people. I like being alone. I like eating by myself. I go home at night and just watch a movie or hang out with my dog.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: You might be an introvert if you were ready to go home before you left the house.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I don’t hate people. I just feel better when they are not around.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: I was happiest to be alone; for it was then I was most aware of what I possessed.
quotes.author: Roman Payne

quotes.quote: Trust your own instinct. Your mistakes might as well be your own, instead of someone else's.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.quote: Good instincts usually tell you what to do long before your head has figured it out.
quotes.author: Michael Burke

quotes.quote: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: Trust your hunches. They're usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Intuition is a spiritual faculty and does not explain, but simply points the way.
quotes.author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quotes.quote: All great men are gifted with intuition. They know without reasoning or analysis, what they need to know.
quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

quotes.quote: Cease trying to work everything out with your minds. It will get you nowhere. Live by intuition and inspiration and let your whole life be Revelation.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: Intuition is seeing with the soul.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: The truth about life and lie about life is not measured by others but by your intuition, which never lies.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: I feel there are two people inside me - me and my intuition. If I go against her, she'll screw me every time, and if I follow her, we get along quite nicely.
quotes.author: Kim Basinger

quotes.quote: The intellect has little to do on the road to discovery. There comes a leap in consciousness, call it intuition or what you will, and the solution comes to you and you don't know why or how.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: It is through science that we prove, but through intuition that we discover.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: Thoughts without content are empty, intuitions without concepts are blind... The understanding can intuit nothing, the senses can think nothing. Only through their union can knowledge arise.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Intuition will tell the thinking mind where to look next.
quotes.author: Dr. Jonas Salk

quotes.quote: A new idea comes suddenly and in a rather intuitive way, but intuition is nothing but the outcome of earlier intellectual experience.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Intuition is really a sudden immersion of the soul into the universal current of life.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Intuition is always right in at least two important ways; It is always in response to something. It always has your best interest at heart
quotes.author: Gavin De Becker Quotes

quotes.quote: Intuition is more than knowledge, and truth comes pure from the heart.
quotes.author: Don Bradley

quotes.quote: Listen to your inner voice... for it is a deep and powerful source of wisdom, beauty and truth, ever flowing through you... Learn to trust it, trust your intuition, and in good time, answers to all you seek to know will come, and the path will open before you.
quotes.author: Caroline Joy Adams

quotes.quote: What many refer to as intuition, then, is not the untaught or unteachable but instead is a learned understanding and respect of process, molded by experience and refined over a great deal oftime and practice.
quotes.author: Jon Kolko

quotes.quote: No matter how deep a study you make. What you really have to rely on is your own intuition and when it comes down to it, you really don't know what's going to happen until you do it.
quotes.author: Konosuke Matsushita

quotes.quote: The only real valuable thing is intuition.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: All perceiving is also thinking, all reasoning is also intuition, all observation is also invention.
quotes.author: Rudolf Arnheim

quotes.quote: Never ignore a gut feeling, but never believe that it's enough.
quotes.author: Robert Heller

quotes.quote: Intuition isn't the enemy, but the ally, of reason.
quotes.author: John Kord Lagemann

quotes.quote: Intuition becomes increasingly valuable in the new information society precisely because there is so much data.
quotes.author: John Naisbitt

quotes.quote: A hunch is creativity trying to tell you something.
quotes.author: Frank Capra

quotes.quote: All human knowledge thus begins with intuitions, proceeds thence to concepts, and ends with ideas.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma, which is living the result of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of other's opinion drown your own inner voice. Everything else is secondary.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The power of intuitive understanding will protect you from harm until the end of your days.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: When you reach the end of what you should know, you will be at the beginning of what you should sense.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Insight is not a lightbulb that goes off inside our heads. It is a flickering candle that can easily be snuffed out.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Come from the heart, the true heart, not the head. When in doubt, choose the heart. This does not mean to deny your own experiences and that which you have empirically learned through the years. It means to trust your self to integrate intuition and experience.
quotes.author: Brian L. Weiss

quotes.quote: Everything I have to say has already crossed your mind. Then possibly my answer has crossed yours.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: The truth about life and lie about life is not measured by others but by your intuition, which never lies.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: Follow your instincts. That's where true wisdom manifests itself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rational mind is a faithful servant. We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A woman's guess is much more accurate than a man's certainty.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Notice what happens when you follow your intuitive feelings. The result is usually increased energy and power, and a sense of things flowing.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Your inner knowing is your only true compass.
quotes.author: Joy Page

quotes.quote: Instinct is untaught ability.
quotes.author: Bain

quotes.quote: Instinct is intelligence incapable of self-consciousness.
quotes.author: John Sterling

quotes.quote: A leader or a man of action in a crisis almost always acts subconsciously and then thinks of the reasons for his action.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Trusting your intuition often saves us from disaster.
quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schae

quotes.quote: There are things so deep and complex that only intuition can reach itin our stage of development as human beings.
quotes.author: John Astin

quotes.quote: Trusting your intuition means tuning in as deeply as you can to the energy you feel, following that energy moment to moment, trusting that it will lead you where you want to go and bring you everything you desire.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Before you speak, it is necessary for you to listen, for God speaks in the silence of the heart.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: There is a vitality, a life-force, an energy, a quickening that is translated through you into action Keep the channel open.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: All societies, ancient or modern, primitive or sophisticated, have guided themselves by values and goals rooted in the experience of deep intuition'.
quotes.author: Willis Harman

quotes.quote: Intuition is neither the ability to engage prophesy nor a means of avoiding financial loss or painful relationships. It is actually the ability to use energy data to make decisions in the immediate moment.
quotes.author: Carolyn Myss

quotes.quote: A woman uses her intelligence to find reasons to support her intuition.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Intuition is what enables a wife who knows less than her husband, to understand more.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Feminine intuition operates more on the instant than on the instinct.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A woman's intuition may not be scientific but it's the best of all lie detectors.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: In some women, intuition is like a sixth sense; in other, a sick sense.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: An ounce of intuition is worth a pound of tuition.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The world-much as we want it to be does not accord with our intuition.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Those who ae successful at creating social epidemics do not just do what they think is right. They deliberately test their intuitions.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: What is required is sight and insight then you might add one more.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Notion without intuition is empty.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Intuition without notion is blind.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Humor is the affectionate communication of insight.
quotes.author: Leo Rosten

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with being shallow as long as you're insightful about it.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: If you resist reading what you disagree with, how will you ever acquire deeper insights into what you believe?
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Insight is better than eyesight when it comes to seeing an angel.
quotes.author: Eileen Elias Freeman

quotes.quote: Our affluent society contains those of talent and insight who are driven to prefer poverty, to choose it, rather than submit to the desolation of an empty abundance.
quotes.author: Michael Harrington

quotes.quote: Instinct says 'Avoid the unknown'. Intuition says 'There's something there worth knowing'.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: We block out the still small voice, intuition & our music by the noise of modern life.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: Curiosity is the instinct of learning. Creativity and intuition for applying what you have learnt.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: We have wild imaginations. Our intuition is our instincts. Creativity our wilderness to explore.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: Intuition happens when information leaves a lot to the imagination.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: Intellect is the functioning of the head, instinct is the functioning of your body, and intuition is the functioning of your heart.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Intellect has its use, but by some misfortune it has become the master of your whole being. That has created immense troubles in the world.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: To give meaning to your life, existence has given intuition to your heart.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Out of your intuition arises the possibility of art, of aesthetics, of love, of friendship--all kinds of creativity are intuitive.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Intellect is for the mundane life with others in the marketplace, in the world, to make you capable of functioning.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rational mind is a faithful servant. We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Intuition-we can't trust it but we can't live without it.
quotes.author: Gary Klein

quotes.quote: In order to take path, we have to reject the dilemma. We shouldn't simply follow our intuitions, as they can be unreliable and need to be monitored.
quotes.author: Gary Klein

quotes.quote: We shouldn't suppress our intuition because they are essential to our decision making and can't be replaced by analyses or procedures.
quotes.author: Gary Klein

quotes.quote: We need to strengthen our intuitions so that they become more accurate and provide us with better insights.
quotes.author: Gary Klein

quotes.quote: We shouldn't simply follow our intuitions. Our intuitions aren't always reliable. Usually they guide us in the right direction, but sometimes they are mistaken.
quotes.author: Gary Klein

quotes.quote: Intuition is an important resource that can greatly contribute to our success and fulfillment in life.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Once we know how to follow it, intuition is very accurate guiding force in all aspects of life. Without it, we are at a great disadvantage. It's a practical tool that we need in order to successfully deal with life.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: As you learn to follow your intuition, and it's validated by the results you get, you build self-trust and self-confidence.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Intuition always shows us the best route to where we need to go. Following it can save us a lost of confusion, hassle, and heartache.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: Intuition is closely connected to creativity; when we're out of touch with our intuitive sense we often find our creativity blocked.
quotes.author: Shakti Gawain

quotes.quote: The lack of imagination or invention most people display in naming pussies is almost beyond credence.
quotes.author: Carl Van Vechten

quotes.quote: Invention is arrived at by intelligent stumbling.
quotes.author: Amar Bose

quotes.quote: Telephone, n. An invention of the devil which abrogates some of the advantages of making a disagreeable person keep his distance.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Invention flags, his brain goes muddy, and black despair succeeds brown study.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: Invention is the pleasure you give yourself when other people's stuff isn't good enough.
quotes.author: Julie Newmar

quotes.quote: Inventions that are not made, like babies that are not born, are not missed.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: An invention that is quickly accepted will turn out to be a rather trivial alteration of something that has already existed.
quotes.author: Edwin H. Land

quotes.quote: Invention is by its very nature disruptive. If you want to be understood at all times, then don't do anything new.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Invention, it must be humbly admitted, does not consist in creating out of void, but out of chaos.
quotes.author: Mary Shelley

quotes.quote: We have to continually be jumping off cliffs and developing our wings on the way down.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

quotes.quote: Invention requires a long-term willingness to be misunderstood.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.
quotes.author: Douglas Engelbart

quotes.quote: Invention depends altogether upon execution or organization; as that is right or wrong so is the invention perfect or imperfect.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: An invention has to make sense in the world it finishes in, not in the world it started.
quotes.author: Tim O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Invention consists in the capacity of seizing on the capabilities of a subject, and in the power of moulding and fashioning ideas suggested to it.
quotes.author: Mary Shelley

quotes.quote: Invention isn't some impenetrable brand of magic; anyone can have a go.
quotes.author: Trevor Baylis

quotes.quote: To invent, you need a good imagination and a pile of junk.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The way good inventions are made is to familiarize yourself with those of others. The men who cultivate letters and the arts are all sons of Homer.
quotes.author: Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres

quotes.quote: Invention requires both disciplines, strict common sense and wild imagination.
quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

quotes.quote: It is naturally given to all men to esteem their own inventions best.
quotes.author: Thomas More

quotes.quote: Invention, using the term most broadly, and imitation, are the two legs, so to call them, on which the human race historically has walked.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Invention presupposes imagination but should not be confused with it.
quotes.author: Igor Stravinsky

quotes.quote: Invention is nothing more than a fine deviation from, or enlargement on a fine model.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Almost always the men who achieve these fundamental inventions of a new paradigm have been either very young or very new to the field whose paradigm they change.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Kuhn

quotes.quote: Television is an invention that permits you to be entertained in your living room by people you wouldn't have in your home.
quotes.author: David Frost

quotes.quote: The day science begins to study non-physical phenomena, it will make more progress in one decade than in all the previous centuries of its existence.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: Invention is activity of mind, as fire is air in motion; a sharpening of the spiritual sight, to discern hidden aptitudes.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Great inventions are never, and great discoveries are seldom, the work of any one mind. Every great invention is really an aggregation of minor inventions, or the final step of a progression. It is not usually a creation, but a growth, as truly so as is the growth of the trees in the forest.
quotes.author: Robert H. Thurston

quotes.quote: Inventions become perfect by slow improvement, and each step is itself an invention.
quotes.author: Joseph Jastrow

quotes.quote: Invention is almost the only literary labour which blindness cannot obstruct.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Invention is not always good. Sometimes our inventions are too powerful for us to control.
quotes.author: Gemma Malley

quotes.quote: Invention is the natural outcome of creative thinking.
quotes.author: Sark

quotes.quote: A great invention for dieters would be a refrigerator which weighs you every time you open the door.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The progressive development of man is vitally dependent on invention. It is the most important product of his creative brain.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: Original artistic invention demands that even the inventor be surprised.
quotes.author: Judith Schaechter

quotes.quote: Life is infinitely stranger than anything which the mind of man could invent. We would not dare to conceive the things which are really merely commonplaces of existence.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: The digital camera is a great invention because it allows us to reminisce. Instantly.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: An invention is a responsibility of the individual, society cannot invent, it can only applaud the invention and inventor.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Inventions are not solely the making of material things, inventions are also the mental unleashing of ideas by a genuis with a sixth sense.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Invention is the root of innovation. Innovation is the major force for change in the future.
quotes.author: Philippe Kahn

quotes.quote: Our ancestors have invented, we can at least innovate.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Invention consists in avoiding the constructing of useless contraptions and in constructing the useful combinations which are in infinite minority.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: Invention is not so much the result of labor as of judgment.
quotes.author: Wentworth Dillon

quotes.quote: Inventing is a combination of brains and materials. The more brains you use, the less material you need.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: Inventing is a skill that some people have and some people don't. But you can learn how to invent.
quotes.author: Ray Dolby

quotes.quote: The invention of the printing press was one of the most important events in human history.
quotes.author: Ha-Joon Chang

quotes.quote: Invention is 10% inspiration and 90% perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Doubt is the father of invention.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Invention is the talent of youth, as judgment is of age.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Investing isn't about beating others at their game. It's about controlling yourself at your own game.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.quote: Understanding the value of a security and whether it's trading above or below that value is the difference between investing and speculating.
quotes.author: Coreen T. Sol

quotes.quote: If investing is entertaining, if you're having fun, you're probably not making any money. Good investing is boring.
quotes.author: George Soros

quotes.quote: Sell in May, and go away; don't come back until St Leger day.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Investing in a market where people believe in efficiency is like playing bridge with someone who has been told it doesn't do any good to look at the cards.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Successful investing is anticipating the anticipations of others.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: The four most dangerous words in investing are 'This time it's different'.
quotes.author: John Templeton

quotes.quote: Investing is fun, exciting, and dangerous if you don't do any work.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: Investing and connecting are the key factors in turning any intention into reality.
quotes.author: Rhonda Britten

quotes.quote: A great investment opportunity occurs when a marvelous business encounters a one-time huge, but solvable problem.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Investing requires qualities of temperament way more than it requires qualities of intellect.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Cash combined with courage in a time of crisis is priceless.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: You've got to go into places where other investors, and especially fund managers, fear to treat, or, more to the point, invest.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: Never invest in anything that eats or needs painting.
quotes.author: Billy Rose

quotes.quote: Investors can have 90% of their wealth in a single company, if it is the right company.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Investing means putting your money on something that has a good chance of winning in the short to medium term, and an even better, if not dead-certain, chance of winning in the long term.
quotes.author: Paul Clitheroe

quotes.quote: Investing is not nearly as difficult as it looks. Successful investing involves doing a few things right and avoiding serious mistakes.
quotes.author: John C. Bogle

quotes.quote: Investing is forgoing consumption now in order to have the ability to consume more at a later date.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: In trading/ investing it's not about how much you make, but how much you don't lose.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Investing in stocks is an art, not a science, and people who've been trained to rigidly quantify everything have a big disadvantage.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: Unless you can watch your stock holding decline by 50% without becoming panic-stricken, you should not be in the stock market.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The strategy of putting all your eggs into one basket and watching that basket is less risky than you might think.
quotes.author: Joel Greenblatt

quotes.quote: To be a successful investor over the long-term, you must also pretty much enjoy the journey.
quotes.author: Joel Greenblatt

quotes.quote: Investing is laying out money today to receive more money tomorrow.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: When investing, more effort means worse results, most of the time.
quotes.author: Robert Rolih

quotes.quote: Investing is simple. It's the financial industry that works hard to make it complex!
quotes.author: Robert Rolih

quotes.quote: All intelligent investing is value investing â€“ acquiring more than you are paying for. You must value the business in order to value the stock.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Investing is about making probabilistic decisions with limited information about an unknowable future. The variables are well known, as are the possible outcomes.
quotes.author: Barry Ritholtz

quotes.quote: Investing is not as tough as being a top-notch bridge player. All it takes is the ability to see things as they really are.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Investing money is the process of committing resources in a strategic way to accomplish a specific objective.
quotes.author: Alan Gotthardt

quotes.quote: The secret to investing is to figure out the value of something and then pay a lot less.
quotes.author: Joel Greenblatt

quotes.quote: Investing is most intelligent when it is most business like.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.quote: Investing is a business where you can look very silly for a long period of time before you are proven right.
quotes.author: Bill Ackman

quotes.quote: Investing is fun and exciting, but dangerous if you don't do any work.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: Value in relation to price, not price alone, must determine your investment decisions. If you look to Mr Market as a creator of investment opportunities (where price departs from underlying value), you have the makings of a value investor. If you insist on looking to Mr Market for investment guidance however, you are probably best advised to hire someone else to manage your money.
quotes.author: Seth Klarman

quotes.quote: Once you adopt a value-investment strategy, any other investment behaviour starts to seem like gambling.
quotes.author: Seth Klarman

quotes.quote: If you invest $1,000 in a stock, all you can lose is $1,000, but you stand to gain $10,000 or even $50,000 over time if you're patient. The average person can concentrate on a few good companies, while the fund manager is forced to diversify. By owning too many stocks, you lose this advantage of concentration. It only takes a handful of big winners to make a lifetime of investing worthwhile.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: Investing is far more cumulative than chess. So long as you're sharp, you can do it for as long as you want
quotes.author: Patrick Wolff

quotes.quote: Knowing the right detail gets you a great return. Ignore them and you just crash & burn.
quotes.author: Robert Rolih

quotes.quote: Investors have very short memories.
quotes.author: Roman Abramovich

quotes.quote: Investing is for wealth preservation, not wealth creation, so first you have to make wealth.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: Investing should be more like watching paint dry or watching grass grow. If you want excitement, take $800 and go to Las Vegas.
quotes.author: Paul Samuelson

quotes.quote: In reality, no one knows what the market will do; trying to predict it is a waste of time, and investing based upon that prediction is a speculative undertaking.
quotes.author: Seth Klarman

quotes.quote: October: This is one of the peculiarly dangerous months to speculate in stocks. The others are July, January, September, April, November, May, March, June, December, August and February.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In investing, just as in baseball, to put runs on the scoreboard, one must watch the playing field, not the scoreboard.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Investing now in safe-guarding people by helping them to adapt to climate change, will help save money and lives while building resilience.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: Investing is laying out money now to get more money back in the future.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: In the long run, investing is not about markets at all. Investing is about enjoying the returns earned by businesses.
quotes.author: John C. Bogle

quotes.quote: Investing is important, but get debt-free first. That's what frees up your income so you can win.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: When it comes to investing, you are your own worst enemy.
quotes.author: Barry Ritholtz

quotes.quote: Investing in yourself is the best investment you will ever make. It will not only improve your life, it will improve the lives of all those around you.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: An investor without investment objectives is like a traveler without a destination.
quotes.author: Ralph Seger

quotes.quote: There are no bad business and investment opportunities, but there are bad entrepreneurs and investors.
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: In the short run, the market is a voting machine, but in the long run it is a weighing machine.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.quote: Never depend on single income. Make investment to create a second source.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.quote: Investing in yourself is the best thing you can do. If you've got talents, no one can take them from you.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Earn as much as you can. Save as much as you can. Invest as much as you can. Give as much as you can.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The best investment is in the tools of one's own trade.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Never stop investing. Never stop improving. Never stop doing something new.
quotes.author: Bob Parsons

quotes.quote: You should invest in a business that even a fool can run, because someday a fool will.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Whenever you make an investment in yourself, you're making an investment in your future.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The individual investor should act consistently as an investor and not as a speculator.
quotes.author: Ben Graham

quotes.quote: It's not your salary that makes you rich, it's your spending habits.
quotes.author: Charles A. Jaffe

quotes.quote: Build into each budget the cost of hiring and don't lump yourself with capital investment.
quotes.author: Ann Macbeth

quotes.quote: Successful investing is about managing risk, not avoiding it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.quote: The rich invest in time, the poor invest in money.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: When you invest you are buying a day that you don't have to work.
quotes.author: Aya Laraya

quotes.quote: The four most dangerous words in investing are: this time it's different.
quotes.author: John Templeton

quotes.quote: Those who are unwilling to invest in the future haven't earned one.
quotes.author: Harold Lewis

quotes.quote: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.quote: Investing isn't about beating others at their game. It's about controlling yourself at your own game.
quotes.author: Benjamin Graham

quotes.quote: Anyone who is not investing now is missing a tremendous opportunity.
quotes.author: Carlos Slim

quotes.quote: Put not your trust in money, but put your money in trust.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: An important key to investing is to remember that stocks are not lottery tickets.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: The best investment with the least risk and the greatest dividend is giving.
quotes.author: John Templeton

quotes.quote: If a business does well, the stock eventually follows.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The greatest investment we can ever make is to invest our life in the life of someone else.
quotes.author: Scott Lee

quotes.quote: Be picky with who you invest your time in. Wasted time is worse than wasted money.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't gamble; take all your savings and buy some good stock and hold it till it goes up, then sell it. If it don't go up, don't buy it.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Invest in yourself. Your career is the engine of your wealth.
quotes.author: Paul Clitheroe

quotes.quote: You cannot save time for future use, but you can invest it for the future!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you want your children to turn out well, invest twice as much time with them and half as much money.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: An investor without investment objectives is like a traveler without a destination.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Some of your activities should be viewed as an investment and not a sacrifice.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Investors should purchase stocks like they purchase groceries, not like they purchase perfume.
quotes.author: Ben Graham

quotes.quote: Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make, so you can give money back and have money to invest. You can't win until you do this.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: The entrance strategy is actually more important than the exit strategy.
quotes.author: Edward Lampert

quotes.quote: It's not whether you're right or wrong that's important, but how much money you make when you're right and how much you lose when you're wrong.
quotes.author: George Soros

quotes.quote: You will come to know that what appears today to be a sacrifice will prove to be the greatest investment that you will ever make.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinkley

quotes.quote: The stock market is never obvious. It is designed to fool most of the people, most of the time.
quotes.author: Jesse Livermore

quotes.quote: Bottoms in the investment world don't end with four-year lows; they end with 10- or 15-year lows.
quotes.author: Jim Rogers

quotes.quote: The secret to investing is to figure out the value of something and then pay a lot less.
quotes.author: Joel Greenblatt

quotes.quote: Don't look for the needle in the haystack. Just buy the haystack!
quotes.author: John Bogle

quotes.quote: In many ways, the stock market is like the weather in that if you don’t like the current conditions all you have to do is wait a while.
quotes.author: Low Simpson

quotes.quote: The biggest risk of all is not taking one.
quotes.author: Mellody Hobson

quotes.quote: Investing should be more like watching paint dry or watching grass grow. If you want excitement, take $800 and go to Las Vegas.
quotes.author: Paul Samuelson

quotes.quote: Although it’s easy to forget sometimes, a share is not a lottery ticket it’s part ownership of a business.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
quotes.author: Phillip Fisher

quotes.quote: In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable.
quotes.author: Robert Arnott

quotes.quote: How many millionaires do you know who have become wealthy by investing in savings accounts? I rest my case.
quotes.author: Robert G. Allen

quotes.quote: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: To be a successful business owner and investor, you have to be emotionally neutral to winning and losing Winning and losing are just part of the game.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Don’t work for money; make it work for you.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: If you want to be truly successful, invest in yourself to get the knowledge you need to find your unique factor. When you find it and focus on it and persevere your success will blossom.
quotes.author: Sydney Madwed

quotes.quote: Do not put all your eggs in one basket.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Rule #1: Never lose money; Rule #2: Don’t forget rule #1.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you are doing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: I will tell you how to become rich. Close the doors. Be fearful when others are greedy. Be greedy when others are fearful.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Wide diversification is only required when investors do not understand what they are doing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The first rule of investment is: Don't Lose. And the second rule of investment is: Don't forget the first rule.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Indifference is the invincible grant of the world.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.quote: As long as we have faith in our own cause and an unconquerable will to win, victory will not be denied us.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Character is an invincible force, which acts by presence and without means.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Youth is incredible because you really do feel invincible.
quotes.author: Paul Stanley

quotes.quote: We are as indestructible as we believe ourselves to be.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: You are bigger than your problem, stronger than your obstacles and higher than your ego.You can make a difference you are invincible.
quotes.author: Regina Malabago

quotes.quote: The soul is indestructible and its activity will continue through eternity.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: Faith is an invincible, impeccable, invisible, invigorating and intelligible trust that does not rust with time.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: You can be invincible, if you enter into no contest in which it is not in your power to conquer.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: It's the unconquerable soul of man, and not the nature of the weapon he uses, that ensures victory.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Being unconquerable lies with yourself; being conquerable lies with your enemy.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Whoever is winning at the moment will always seem to be invincible.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Nothing makes a man more invincible than to "know" that death is not the end.
quotes.author: R. A. Delmonico

quotes.quote: The indestructible is one: it is each individual human being and, at the same time, it is common to all, hence the incomparably indivisible union that exists between human beings.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: For the human soul is virtually indestructible, and its ability to rise from the ashes remains as long as the body draws breath.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.quote: Let not others define you, make yourself strong and able to define yourself. When you accept yourself with your worthiness and weakness, you are invincible.
quotes.author: Dr Anil Kr Sinha

quotes.quote: When you're indestructible, then nothing is a threat really. So nothing needs to be taken that seriously.
quotes.author: Joseph Morgan

quotes.quote: No man is invincible, and therefore no man can fully understand that which would make him invincible.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: Indomitable in retreat, invincible in advance; insufferable in victory.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: One arrow alone can be easily broken but many arrows are indestructible.
quotes.author: Genghis Khan

quotes.quote: In theory there is a possibility of perfect happiness: To believe in the indestructible element within one, and not to strive towards it.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: The V sign is the symbol of the unconquerable will of the occupied territories, and a portent of the fate awaiting the Nazi tyranny.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Only by binding together as a single force will we remain strong and unconquerable.
quotes.author: Chris Bradford

quotes.quote: Even in its darkest passages, the heart is unconquerable. It is important that the body survives, but it is more meaningful that the human spirit prevails.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: No civilization, no matter how mighty it may appear to itself, is indestructible.
quotes.author: Niall Ferguson

quotes.quote: The most vulnerable and yet most unconquerable of things is human vanity; nay, through being wounded its strength increases and can grow to giant proportions.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Value is the most invincible and impalpable of ghosts, and comes and goes unthought of, while the visible and dense matter remains as it was.
quotes.author: William Stanley Jevons

quotes.quote: We're invisible. I've never been here with someone else. It's different being invisible with someone.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Invisible things are the only realities.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: People who don't appreciate your presence, only deserve your absence
quotes.author: Alexander Auron

quotes.quote: Some things that are invisible and untouchable can nevertheless be seen and felt.
quotes.author: Michael Chabon

quotes.quote: There is nothing invisible in this universe! There is only our lack of eyesight!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is an invisible world out there, and we are living in it.
quotes.author: Bill Viola

quotes.quote: There is an invisible garment woven around us from our earliest years; it is made of the way we eat, the way we walk, the way we greet people.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Invisible threads are the strongest ties.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: If invisible people eat invisible food does invisible wind blow invisible trees?
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: The invisible are always so resolutely invisible, until you see them.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lethem

quotes.quote: Because when some people are invisible, everyone suffers.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: It is only shallow people who do not judge by appearances. The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Invisible things are the only realities; invisible things alone are the things that shall remain.
quotes.author: William Godwin

quotes.quote: What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: An invisible man can rule the world. Nobody will see him come, nobody will see him go. He can hear every secret, he can rob, rapeand kill.
quotes.author: R. C. Sherriff

quotes.quote: If you're not remarkable, you're invisible.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Everyone has an invisible sign hanging from their neck saying, Make me feel important. Never forget this message when working with people.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: All invisible from where we stand the connections come to pass, and though too strong to comprehend they affect us not the less.
quotes.author: James Taylor

quotes.quote: The visible is always a mirror of the invisible. The reality is imagined before it manifests itself.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Do the impossible, see the invisible.
quotes.author: Herbern Lebumfacil

quotes.quote: Life is invisible. The illusion is that what we perceive is in some way not a reflection of self. Life reflects the field of attention that we're in.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: To sense the invisible and to be able to create it, that is art.
quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

quotes.quote: It is enjoyable to make things visible which are invisible.
quotes.author: Eric Cantona

quotes.quote: Invisible people see invisible things.
quotes.author: Sarah E. Morin

quotes.quote: What's invisible to us is also crucial for our own well being.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Every visible and invisible creature is an appearance of God.
quotes.author: Johannes Scotus Eriugena

quotes.quote: When you're invisible, no one can see that you're different.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: If you can see the invisible, God will do the impossible.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: I make you see things that aren't really there and you believe every word.
quotes.author: Genesis Quihuis

quotes.quote: We are more closely connected to the invisible than to the visible.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.quote: There is an invisible strength within us; when it recognizes two opposing objects of desire, it grows stronger.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: When they feel invisible, it's easy for them to leave.
quotes.author: Beverly L. Kaye

quotes.quote: It's what's invisible that creates what's visible.
quotes.author: T. Harv Eker

quotes.quote: Love is invisible and comes and goes where it wants, without anyone asking about it.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: The world is filled with invisible realities. But, if people do not see or hear, then these realities do not exist.
quotes.author: William Segal

quotes.quote: The invisible is only another unexplored country, a brave new world.
quotes.author: Angela Carter

quotes.quote: I am seeking for the bridge which leans from the visible to the invisible through reality.
quotes.author: Max Beckmann

quotes.quote: Everything that is visible hides something that is invisible.
quotes.author: Rene Magritte

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Identity is this incredible invisible force that controls your whole life. It's invisible, like gravity is invisible, but it controls your whole life.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The pages are still blank, but there is a miraculous feeling of the words being there, written in invisible ink and clamoring to become visible.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: You're only as invisible as you feel, imaginary or not.
quotes.author: Michelle Cuevas

quotes.quote: Everything in the universe has a purpose. Indeed, the invisible intelligence that flows through everything in a purposeful fashion is also flowing through you.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Whatever you can imagine is waiting for you, fully created in the invisible, and the way to make it visible is to harness the force of love by imagining and feeling what you love.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: Have a vision. It is the ability to see the invisible. If you can see the invisible, you can achieve the impossible.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.quote: Ninety-nine per cent of who you are is invisible and untouchable.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is a relief to be invisible.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: I am an invisible man...I am a man of substance, of flesh and bone, fiber and liquids— and I might even be said to possess a mind. I am invisible, understand, simply because people refuse to see me.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: Air is the invisible medium by which things become visible, hence the spiritual is the power of making things visible, the medium of creative energy.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: The wise man looks for the invisible line between the is and the is not which is the way through.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: The indigenous mind...gives ample space to the invisible because the invisible holds the key to the wisdom of the universe. Eventually such awareness becomes an honoring of the shadowy and hidden parts of ourselves, those parts of ourselves that are invisible.
quotes.author: Malidoma Somé

quotes.quote: One sees clearly only with a heart. Anything essential is invisible to the eyes.
quotes.author: The Little Prince

quotes.quote: Everything hinges on our willingness to fix our eyes not on what is seen, but on what is unseen. It hinges on our being heavenly-minded.
quotes.author: Mark Buchanan

quotes.quote: Each Morn a thousand Roses brings, you say: Yes, but where leaves the Rose of Yesterday?
quotes.author: John Bartlett

quotes.quote: All of it meaning nothing, for our dark eyes fail to see / We covet, we wage war, we greedily hoard / And each day our souls growing darker / But the light takes no notice, for its vision is also blinded / It sees nothing but the grandeur of its world and the beauty of its light.
quotes.author: Brendan Hoover

quotes.quote: There are those that do not understand / or do not know, / the magnitude of suffering. / Only those that suffer this illness, know / that they are dealing with an unseen enemy within!
quotes.author: Victor Gatenby

quotes.quote: Everyone has to be somewhere / unless they're in-between / Places caught beyond now and then / —with destiny unseen.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Another day finished, now stalking the night / Keep your eyes open, use silence to hear / If it's unseen, the beast could be near.
quotes.author: The Beast Unseen

quotes.quote: What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible.
quotes.author: Marie Von Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: And now, here is my secret, a very simple secret: it is only with the heart that one can see rightly, what is essential is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: When you're poor, you are invisible. Every poor person will tell you nobody sees you. So being famous was me just wanting to be seen.
quotes.author: Viola Davis

quotes.quote: War destroys people's souls. Most people focus on physical injuries, but the invisible injuries can take a lifetime to heal and affects the lives of generations to come.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Jal

quotes.quote: Clothes make the poor invisible. America has the best-dressed poverty the world has ever known.
quotes.author: Michael Harrington

quotes.quote: Tell people there's an invisible man in the sky who created the universe, and the vast majority will believe you. Tell them the paint is wet, and they have to touch it to be sure.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: People spot a big black lens, and they worry about what they're doing, or how their hair looks. Nobody sees the person holding the camera.
quotes.author: Erica O'Rourke

quotes.quote: You see, the strangeness of my case is that now I no longer fear the invisible, I'm terrified by reality.
quotes.author: Jean Lorraine

quotes.quote: Many realities are hidden behind a wall of perception.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Strange to say, the luminous world is the invisible world; the luminous world is that which we do not see. Our eyes of flesh see only night.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: That the poor are invisible is one of the most important things about them. They are not simply neglected and forgotten as in the old rhetoric of reform; what is much worse, they are not seen.
quotes.author: Michael Harrington

quotes.quote: An invitation of a beautiful street is an invitation to walk within a dream!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Each new day is an invitation to an adventure of your own making.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: A real conversation always contains an invitation. You are inviting another person to reveal herself or himself to you, to tell you who they are or what they want.
quotes.author: David Whyte

quotes.quote: A commission is an invitation to fall in love.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: There is no greater invitation to love than loving first.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Adventure is the invitation to common people to become uncommon.
quotes.author: Warren Miller

quotes.quote: Let us accept the invitation, ever-open, from the Stillness, taste its exquisite sweetness, and heed its silent instruction.
quotes.author: Paul Brunton

quotes.quote: One should never refuse an invitation to lunch or dinner, for one never knows what one may have to eat the next day.
quotes.author: Edouard de Pomiane

quotes.quote: You hold in your hand an invitation: to remember the transforming power of forgiveness and loving kindness. To remember that no matter where you are and what you face, within your heart peace is possible.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: An invitation is extended to any true seeker who wants to find for himself the Light and Sound of God. This treasure is the birthright of Soul that leads to the Kingdom of Heaven.
quotes.author: Harold Klemp

quotes.quote: It is no harm to accept an invitation of a stranger, but better visit an occasion of people we know well.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The grace of a curve is an invitation to remain. We cannot break away from it without hoping to return.
quotes.author: Louisa Thomsen Brits

quotes.quote: The invitation only world is a manifestation of self-realization.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: The invitation to something better is not arriving from any source outside of yourself — ever.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: A quote is not a conversation, but an invitation to change your perspective.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: A story is an invitation, and a challenge, and a choice.
quotes.author: Marilyn Chandler McEntyre

quotes.quote: A memoir is an invitation into another person's privacy.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: You don't need an invitation to your own life.
quotes.author: Sarah

quotes.quote: Events need their invitation, dissolutions their start.
quotes.author: James Salter

quotes.quote: Invitation is the sincerest flattery.
quotes.author: Carolyn Wells

quotes.quote: Words are an invitation to life, a request to bring energy into form. Choose your words carefully.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson
