quotes.quote: The essence of temptation is the invitation to live independently of God.
quotes.author: Neil T Anderson

quotes.quote: Every moment is an invitation to live out of your weakness or to live out of your strength.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Everything can be used as an invitation to meditation.
quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quotes.quote: A photograph is an invitation to look - and to look at looking.
quotes.author: John Paul Caponigro

quotes.quote: IrelandÂ is where strange tales begin and happy endings are possible.
quotes.author: Charles Haughey

quotes.quote: IrelandÂ is a peculiar society in the sense that it was a nineteenth century society up to about 1970 and then it almost bypassed the twentieth century.
quotes.author: John McGahern

quotes.quote: What Ireland needs now above all else is peace.
quotes.author: Albert Reynolds

quotes.quote: The landscape in Ireland is just - I've never been in such a beautiful place with the lakes and ocean and everything.
quotes.author: Travis Fimmel

quotes.quote: IrelandÂ is a fruitful mother of genius, but a barren nurse.
quotes.author: John Boyle O'Reilly

quotes.quote: If Ireland is to become a new Ireland she must first become European.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: InÂ IrelandÂ every place you visit and every person you meet has a story. And they love to tell you their stories. Everyone is interested in everything; in a land of storytellers, you will never be bored.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.quote: Ireland. Great for the spirit - very bad for the body.
quotes.author: Hugh Dancy

quotes.quote: IrelandÂ is a land of poets and legends, of dreamers and rebels. All of these have music woven through and around them. Tunes for dancing or for weeping, for battle or for love.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: The greenness ofÂ IrelandÂ is a false greenness, after all. Not that it isn't green - the place can still make you have to pull off and swallow one of your heart pills. It's that the greenness doesn't mean what it seems. It doesn't encode a pastoral past, much less a timeless vale where wee folk trip the demesne.
quotes.author: John Jeremiah Sullivan

quotes.quote: Ireland is a great place to be odd.
quotes.author: Roisin Murphy

quotes.quote: Around the world, people look to Ireland as a country where it doesn't matter where you come from but where you want to go.
quotes.author: Leo Varadkar

quotes.quote: Why should Ireland be treated as a geographical fragment of England - Ireland is not a geographical fragment, but a nation.
quotes.author: Charles Stewart Parnell

quotes.quote: Ireland, once you live there, you're seduced by it.
quotes.author: Frank McCourt

quotes.quote: Ireland is a series of stories that have been told to us, starting with the Irish Celtic national revival. I never believed in 'Old Ireland.' It has been made all of kitsch by the diaspora, looking back and deciding what Ireland is. Yes, it is green. Yes, it is friendly. I can't think of anything else for definite.
quotes.author: Anne Enright

quotes.quote: The economy in Ireland has been rampaging ahead for the last 15 years. Barring an international, political or natural catastrophe, things can only get better for the Irish.
quotes.author: Eddie Murphy

quotes.quote: NorthernÂ IrelandÂ still suffers from its past, and it will take generations to escape sectarianism and for violence to end totally. Nonetheless, it is in a different place now than during the Troubles, and it will not go back to the old days.
quotes.author: Jonathan Powell

quotes.quote: The problem with Ireland is that it's a country full of genius, but with absolutely no talent.
quotes.author: Hugh Leonard

quotes.quote: InÂ IrelandÂ we have a very old saying, When you can see the mountains it's going to rain and when you can't see the mountains it's raining.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: IrelandÂ has made its choice for the future and it has chosen the version of Irishness it will build. I know, and I will work with head and heart to be part of it with all of you in creating that future one in which all of us can be part of and part of us too.
quotes.author: Michael D. Higgins

quotes.quote: As long asÂ IrelandÂ is unfree the only honourable attitude for Irish men, women to have is an attitude of rebellion.
quotes.author: Patrick Pearse

quotes.quote: Ireland is such a young society. The British were the ruling class up until they left about a hundred years ago, and we've been trying to work out what our class hierarchy is ever since.
quotes.author: Tana French

quotes.quote: In some parts of Ireland the sleep which knows no waking is always followed by a wake which knows no sleeping.
quotes.author: Mary Wilson Little

quotes.quote: We are bound to lose Ireland in consequence of years of cruelty, stupidity and misgovernment and I would rather lose her as a friend than as a foe.
quotes.author: William E. Gladstone

quotes.quote: Ah,Â Ireland... That damnable, delightful country, where everything that is right is the opposite of what it ought to be.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: IrelandÂ is not at all a simple place, and in many ways it is spare and sad. It has no wealth, no power, no stability, no influence, no fashion, no size. Its only real arts are song and drama and poem. But Limerick alone has two thousand ruined castles and surely that many practicing poets.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: Going back to Ireland involves at least six to seven emotional breakdowns for me per day.
quotes.author: Anjelica Huston

quotes.quote: Anyone born and bred in Northern Ireland can't be too optimistic.
quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

quotes.quote: We may have bad weather in Ireland, but the sun shines in the hearts of the people and that keeps us all warm.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: IrelandÂ is a little country which raises all the great questions.
quotes.author: Gustave de Beaumont

quotes.quote: There are two traditions in Northern Ireland. There are two main religious denominations. But there is only one true moral denomination. And it wants peace.
quotes.author: David Trimble

quotes.quote: Do you know what Ireland is? Ireland is the old sow that eats her farrow.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: I believe a united Ireland is inevitable. I have never put a date on it.
quotes.author: Martin McGuinness

quotes.quote: In the country places of Ireland, writing is held in certain awe: a writer was a dangerous man from whom they instinctively recoiled.
quotes.author: Patrick Kavanagh

quotes.quote: The cup ofÂ Ireland's misery has been overflowing for centuries and is not yet half full.
quotes.author: Boyle Roche

quotes.quote: Ireland unfree shall never be at peace.
quotes.author: Patrick Pearse

quotes.quote: Ireland sober is Ireland stiff.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: In Ireland the inevitable never happens and the unexpected constantly occurs.
quotes.author: John Pentland Mahaffy

quotes.quote: Ireland is a good place to start out as a filmmaker. If what you do is good, even at a very small scale, it will get recognized.
quotes.author: Lenny Abrahamson

quotes.quote: In Northern Ireland, helicopters are not usually used to promote poetry.
quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

quotes.quote: It's strange coming back to Northern Ireland, but it feels like a home away from home.
quotes.author: Sean Bean

quotes.quote: Geographically, Ireland is a medium-sized rural island that is slowly but steadily being consumed by sheep.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Ireland was a place for the renewal of hope and I still see it like that.
quotes.author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quotes.quote: Oh, all kinds of lunacy happens in Ireland, all kinds of lunacy.
quotes.author: Anjelica Huston

quotes.quote: What makes Ireland inclined toward the drama is that it's a great country for conversation.
quotes.author: Lady Gregory

quotes.quote: Ireland is a great country to die or be married in.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: The image of Ireland is projected as a male image in the acting world, similar to the way that the word of Ireland is male dominated.
quotes.author: Fionnula Flanagan

quotes.quote: The Irish people are clearly standing up and saying of course the lives of women in Ireland matter. It's a great victory for equality for freedom for dignity for human rights, -- and not only for women.
quotes.author: Ailbhe Smyth

quotes.quote: The Irish consider retirement the time to kick back and enjoy life to the fullest.
quotes.author: Thomas O'Leary

quotes.quote: Only Irish coffee provides in a single glass all four essential food groups: alcohol, caffeine, sugar and fat.
quotes.author: Alex Levine

quotes.quote: It is a symbol of Irish art. The cracked looking-glass of a servant.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: The Irish are people who will never have leaders, for at the great moment they always desert them. They have produced one skeleton--Parnell--never a man.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: The Irish - Be they kings, or poets, or farmers, They're a people of great worth, They keep company with the angels, And bring a bit of heaven here to earth.
quotes.author: Irish Sayings

quotes.quote: Irishness is not primarily a question of birth or blood or language; it is the condition of being involved in the Irish situation, and usually of being mauled by it.
quotes.author: Conor O'Brien

quotes.quote: The Irish are a fair people: They never speak well of one another.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Irish poets, learn your trade, sing whatever is well made, scorn the sort now growing up all out of shape from toe to top.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Irish people are educated not only about artistry but local history.
quotes.author: Fiona Shaw

quotes.quote: If it was raining soup, the Irish would go out with forks.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: The Irish fight amongst themselves because they have yet to find a more worthy opponent.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: On the Irish ladder of success there's always some one on the rung above using your head to steady himself.
quotes.author: Irish Sayings

quotes.quote: Irish people have a trick of over-statement, at which one ceases to wince as one grows older.
quotes.author: Katharine Tynan

quotes.quote: To be Irish is to know that in the end the world will break your heart.
quotes.author: Daniel Patrick Moynihan

quotes.quote: The only way to get to that next peak is to be ready for that next valley. Being raised Irish, you know to always be ready for the bad times.
quotes.author: Rory O'Malley

quotes.quote: The Irish people will only be free, when they own everything from the plough to the stars.
quotes.author: James Connolly

quotes.quote: Irish people give big hellos and very little goodbyes. Unless they're female, and then they spend five hours talking in the doorway to the person that's leaving their house.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.quote: Irish people are pragmatic. They understand that nobody is going to fix our problems but ourselves.
quotes.author: Edna Kenny

quotes.quote: The Irish do not want anyone to wish them well; they want everyone to wish their enemies ill.
quotes.author: Harold Nicolson

quotes.quote: Irish women are always carrying water on their heads, and always carrying their husbands home from pubs. Such things are the greatest posture-builders in the world.
quotes.author: Peter O'Toole

quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of people in the world, the Irish and those who wish they were.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: There is no language like the Irish for soothing and quieting.
quotes.author: John Millington Synge

quotes.quote: There's no sense to being Irish unless you know the world's going to break your heart.
quotes.author: Thoms Adcock

quotes.quote: The Irish have a sweet tooth. And that's a good thing, because it has been the inspiration for some wonderful desserts that allow us to end our meal on a happy and sweet note.
quotes.author: Jean Legrand

quotes.quote: There is an Irish way of paying compliments as though they were irresistible truths which makes what would otherwise be an impertinence delightful.
quotes.author: Katharine Tynan

quotes.quote: If you're Irish, it doesn't matter where you go - you'll find family.
quotes.author: Victoria Smurfit

quotes.quote: The Irish are the only men who know how to cry for the dirty polluted blood of all the world.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: As iron sharpens iron, so one man sharpens another.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.quote: I have legs of iron, but to tell you the truth, they're starting to rust and buckle a bit.
quotes.author: Jeannie Calment

quotes.quote: Iron rusts from disuse; water loses its purity from stagnation... even so does inaction sap the vigor of the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo DaVinci

quotes.quote: As iron is eaten away by rust, so the envious are consumed by their own passion.
quotes.author: Anthistenes

quotes.quote: When iron and carbon come together, there emerges steel! To be something stronger and better, you must mostly unite with something else and melt in something else!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Everything has its limit - iron ore cannot be educated into gold.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The good Lord made us all out of iron. Then he turns up the heat to forge some of us into steel.
quotes.author: Marie Osmond

quotes.quote: No man can feel the iron which enters another man's soul.
quotes.author: Frances Harper

quotes.quote: Man is harder than iron, stronger than stone and more fragile than a rose.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: A teacher who is attempting to teach without inspiring the pupil with a desire to learn is hammering on cold iron.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: Stupidity is an attempt to iron out all differences, and not to use or value them creatively.
quotes.author: Bill Moliison

quotes.quote: Idleness is to the human mind like rust to iron
quotes.author: Ezra Cornell

quotes.quote: Money changes all the iron rules into rubber bands.
quotes.author: Ryszard Kapuscinski

quotes.quote: Theory attracts practice as the magnet attracts iron.
quotes.author: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quotes.quote: Adolescence is about digging out the iron inside irony
quotes.author: Andy Hargreaves

quotes.quote: Irony is the gaiety of reflection and the joy of wisdom.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: If a nation values anything more than freedom, it will lose its freedom, and the irony of it is that if it is comfort or money that it values more, it will lose that too
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Irony is a clear consciousness of an eternal agility, of the infinitely abundant chaos.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: Irony is one of my favorite aspects of life.
quotes.author: Wes Studi

quotes.quote: Neither irony or sarcasm is argument.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Remember: the time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself. Life's cruelest irony.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: I'd rather be partly great than entirely useless.
quotes.author: Neal Shusterman

quotes.quote: It is sometimes easier to be happy if you don't know everything.
quotes.author: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.quote: Common sense is the most widely shared commodity in the world, for every man is convinced that he is well supplied with it.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Irony is Fate's most common figure of speech.
quotes.author: Trevanian

quotes.quote: Humor is everywhere in that there's irony in just about anything a human does.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: The greatest way to live with honor in this world is to be what we pretend to be.

quotes.quote: The supreme irony of life is that hardly anyone gets out of it alive.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Irony is a disciplinarian feared only by those who do not know it, but cherished by those who do
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: My mother never saw the irony in calling me a son-of-a-bitch
quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

quotes.quote: Irony is an insult conveyed in the form of a compliment
quotes.author: Edwin P. Whipple

quotes.quote: Humor brings insight and tolerance. Irony brings a deeper and less friendly understanding.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: Sometimes the appropriate response to reality is to go insane.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: The shortest distance between two points is under construction.
quotes.author: Noelie Altito

quotes.quote: Most people would rather be certain they're miserable than risk being happy.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some hire public relations officers.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: People think it must be fun to be a super genius, but they don't realize how hard it is to put up with all the idiots in the world.
quotes.author: Calvin

quotes.quote: A taste for irony has kept more hearts from breaking than a sense of humor for it takes irony to appreciate the joke which is on oneself.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.quote: Irony is the hygiene of the mind.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

quotes.quote: Irony regards every simple truth as a challenge
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Neither irony nor sarcasm is argument.
quotes.author: Rufus Choate

quotes.quote: Irony, I feel, is a very high form of morality.
quotes.author: Jean Stafford

quotes.quote: Eternity is a mere moment, just long enough for a joke.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: Small minds are concerned with the extraordinary, great minds with the ordinary.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: It is forbidden to kill; therefore all murderers are punished unless they kill in large numbers and to the sound of trumpets.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: A leader leads by example, whether he intends to or not.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Example is not the main thing in influencing others, it's the only thing
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Irony regards every simple truth as a challenge.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Pleasure in irony ... is an ego trip.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.quote: Irony is the form of paradox. Paradox is what is good and great at the same time.
quotes.author: Friedrich Von Schlegel

quotes.quote: It's a tragic irony. The sick stayed well and the healthy became blind.
quotes.author: Philip Yordan

quotes.quote: You know, there's a certain irony in the fact that our lives and perhaps the lives of everyone on Earth may depend on Captain Patterson's sex appeal.
quotes.author: Charles Beaumont

quotes.quote: Irony is jesting behind hidden gravity.
quotes.author: John Weiss

quotes.quote: A taste for irony has kept more hearts from breaking than a sense of humor for it takes irony to appreciate the joke which is on oneself.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.quote: Irony is an insult conveyed in the form of a compliment.
quotes.author: Edwin P. Whipple

quotes.quote: Sentimental irony is a dog that bays at the moon while pissing on graves.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: I am consistently inconsistent.
quotes.author: Don Williams, Jr.

quotes.quote: Clap an extinguisher upon your irony if you are unhappily blessed with a vein of it
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: It's like rain on your wedding day.' Only if you're marrying a weatherman and he set the date.
quotes.author: Ed Byrne

quotes.quote: Define irony: a bunch of idiots dancing around on a plane to a song
quotes.author: Garland Greene

quotes.quote: A man is as young as the woman he feels.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: I feel so miserable without you, it's almost like having you here.
quotes.author: Stephen Bishop

quotes.quote: Sometimes I need what only you can provide: your absence.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: It's always darkest before it turns absolutely pitch black.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: History teaches us that men and nations behave wisely once they have exhausted all other alternatives.
quotes.author: Abba Eban

quotes.quote: From even the greatest of horrors irony is seldom absent.
quotes.author: H.P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: I quote others only in order the better to express myself.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Nobody can tell what I suffer! But it is always so. Those who do not complain are never pitied.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: With every mistake, we must surely be learning.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: The irony of life is that those who wear masks often tell us more truths than those with open faces.
quotes.author: Marie Lu

quotes.quote: That will do extremely well, child. You have delighted us long enough. Let the other young ladies have time to exhibit
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: The struggle for a free intelligence has always been a struggle between the ironic and the literal mind.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: A graduation ceremony is an event where the commencement speaker tells thousands of students dressed in identical caps and gowns that "individuality" is the key to success.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: If you make people think they're thinking, they'll love you. But if you really make them think, they'll hate you.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Food is an important part of a balanced diet.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: TheÂ irrationalÂ in the human has something about it altogether repulsive and terrible, as we see in the maniac, the miser, the drunkard or the ape.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Who is moreÂ irrational, the guy who believes in a God he can't see, or a guy who's offended by a God he doesn't believe in?
quotes.author: Brad Stine

quotes.quote: Only in the irrational and unknown direction can we come to wisdom again.
quotes.author: Jack Parsons

quotes.quote: IrrationalÂ barriers and ancient prejudices fall quickly when the question of survival itself is at stake.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: BeingÂ irrationalÂ and out of control is what happens in real life. Not cautiously choreographing your anger or your emotions, losing yourself in them is what happens in real life.
quotes.author: Margot Robbie

quotes.quote: On the other hand, what is reallyÂ irrationalÂ and what truly cannot be explained is not evil but, contrarily, the good.
quotes.author: Imre Kertész

quotes.quote: Behind every rational andÂ irrationalÂ force in human society there is a social mechanism which determines where it is to appear and what forms it is to take.
quotes.author: Karl Mannheim

quotes.quote: IrrationalÂ judgements lead to new experience.
quotes.author: Sol Lewitt

quotes.quote: TheÂ irrationalÂ thoughts were the ones with the power to burn holes in your gut.
quotes.author: Keith Ablow

quotes.quote: AnÂ irrationalÂ fear should never be simply let alone, but should be gradually overcome by familiarity with its fainter forms.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: TheÂ irrationalÂ may be attractive in the abstract, but not in cab drives, dinner guests, or elderly relatives.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Nothing could be moreÂ irrationalÂ than the idea that something comes from nothing.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: IrrationalÂ expectations are at the root of most human suffering.
quotes.author: Stefan Molyneux

quotes.quote: Nothing could be moreÂ irrationalÂ than to give the people power, and to withhold from them information without which power is abused.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: IrrationalÂ beliefs are culturally accepted delusions.
quotes.author: Robert Todd Carroll

quotes.quote: IrrationalÂ passions would seem to be as much a part of human nature as is reason.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: If something isÂ irrational, that means it won't work. It's usually unrealistic.
quotes.author: Albert Ellis

quotes.quote: It is better to make an irrational noise in a bush than in a desert.
quotes.author: Duop Chak Wuol

quotes.quote: TheÂ irrationalÂ haunts the metaphysical.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: Let other people do it their way. What other people do is irrelevant.
quotes.author: Victoria Moran

quotes.quote: Emotion without action is irrelevant
quotes.author: Jody Williams

quotes.quote: Unrelated doesn't necessarily mean unrelated. Allow ideas to dwell with one another.
quotes.author: Charles Lee

quotes.quote: There is nothing insignificant in the world. It all depends on the point of view.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Ask an impertinent question and you are on the way to the pertinent answer.
quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

quotes.quote: The ultimate freedom from the nonexistent ego is to see that it is actually irrelevant.
quotes.author: Adyashanti

quotes.quote: Unless you're continually improving your skills, you're quickly becoming irrelevant.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: There is hardly any one so insignificant that he does not seem imposing to some one at some time.
quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

quotes.quote: Irrelevant religion pleads legitimacy.
quotes.author: John Reuben

quotes.quote: My country has contrived for me the most insignificant office that ever the invention of man contrived or his imagination conceived.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Facts are irrelevant. What matters is what the consumer believes.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: I love being irreverent. But I hate being irrelevant. I love being irreverent because at the end of the day your actions belie your intentions.
quotes.author: Esai Morales

quotes.quote: Reality is irrelevant; Perception is everything.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: Never use tricky or irrelevant headlinesâ€¦ People read too fast to figure out what you are trying to say.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: To be irrelevant is to categorize your live into separate pursuit.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Being made to feel like an irrelevant child was probably an asset. Benign negligence is not a bad parental attitude or at least a cross between a benevolent dictator and benign negligence you should just let kids crack on with it.
quotes.author: Clare Balding

quotes.quote: I see now that the circumstances of ones birth are irrelevent. it is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: To be irrelevant is to categorize your live into separate pursuit
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Whether you succeed or not is irrelevant, there is no such thing. Making your unknown known is the important thing.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: It is simple impertinence for any man, or any body of men, to begin, or to contemplate, reform of the whole world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Your career, interests and relationships are important, but they are only important insofar as they lead you toward a deeper understanding of yourself. Otherwise, they are irrelevant.
quotes.author: A. H. Almaas

quotes.quote: Thinking is progress. Non-thinking is stagnation of the individual, organization and the country. Thinking leads to action. Knowledge without action is useless and irrelevant. Knowledge with action, converts adversity into prosperity.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Above all, discard the irrelevant.
quotes.author: Barbara Tuchman

quotes.quote: Biology can be said to define possibilities but not determine them; it is never irrelevant but it is also not determinant.
quotes.author: Cordelia Fine

quotes.quote: Love without action is meaningless and action without love is irrelevant.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Experience has shown, and a true philosophy will always show, that a vast, perhaps the larger portion of the truth arises from the seemingly irrelevant.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Organizations exist to make people's strengths effective and their weaknesses irrelevant. And this is the work of effective leaders.
quotes.author: Frances Hesselbein

quotes.quote: Age is just a number. It's totally irrelevant unless, of course, you happen to be a bottle of wine.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: Good ideas have expiration dates. You need to act before they become dated, irrelevant or otherwise spoiled
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: When a problem threatens to engulf you, there's nothing like irrelevant detail to keep your head above water.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: One can forget the meaninglessness of his own existence by occupying himself with scientific experiments of dubious import. Countless scientists and scholars spend their lives in the search of truths that are irrelevant to them.
quotes.author: John Silber

quotes.quote: Speed is irrelevant if you are going in the wrong direction.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A theory has only the alternative of being right or wrong. A model has a third possibility: it may be right, but irrelevant.
quotes.author: Manfred Eigen

quotes.quote: Ugly. Is irrelevant. It is an immeasurable insult to a woman, and then supposedly the worst crime you can commit as a woman. But ugly, as beautiful, is an illusion.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: In science consensus is irrelevant. What is relevant is reproducible results.
quotes.author: Michael Crichton

quotes.quote: Intelligence consists in ignoring things that are irrelevant.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Concordantly, while your first question may be the most pertinent, you may or may not realize it is also the most irrelevant.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: No, I never saw an angel, but it is irrelevant whether I saw one or not. I feel their presence around me.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: A manager's task is to make the strengths of people effective and their weakness irrelevant and that applies fully as much to the manager's boss as it applies to the manager's subordinates.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The task of leadership is to create an alignment of strengths so strong that it makes the system's weaknesses irrelevant.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: It does not make sense. It cannot exist. It's impossible, and if it isn't impossible, it's irrelevant, and if it isn't either of those things, it's embarrassing.
quotes.author: Philip Pullman

quotes.quote: It's not that we ignore our weaknesses; rather, we make our weaknesses irrelevant by working effectively with others so that we compensate for our weaknesses through their strengths and they compensate for their weaknesses through our strengths.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Guilt or innocence becomes irrelevant in the criminal trials as we flounder in a morass of artificial rules poorly conceived and often impossible [to apply].
quotes.author: Warren E. Burger

quotes.quote: A human being is so irreplaceable. So valuable and so unique.
quotes.author: Goran Persson

quotes.quote: Time is more valuable than money, because time is irreplaceable.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: One shouldn't gamble with what is irreplaceable and precious.
quotes.author: Naomi Klein

quotes.quote: Time alone is irreplaceable. Waste it not.
quotes.author: Douglas Southall Freeman

quotes.quote: Family is always irreplaceable, even when they're also irreconcilable.
quotes.author: Jeaniene Frost

quotes.quote: If you don't make yourself irreplaceable, somebody will replace you. Being different is being remembered. Being the same is being forgotten.
quotes.author: Holly Smale

quotes.quote: Every instant of our lives is essentially irreplaceable: you must know this in order to concentrate on life.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: To be irreplaceable, you have to be different.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: A good mother is irreplaceable.
quotes.author: Adriana Trigiani

quotes.quote: The loss of life will be irreplaceable.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: Fathers have a unique and irreplaceable role in the lives of children.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Old friends die on you, and they're irreplaceable. You become dependent.
quotes.author: Lionel Blue

quotes.quote: The way to be irreplaceable is to become a social innovator. Start projects that motivate you to save the world and simultaneously make you money (and create mindshare) for your company. Social innovation makes magic happen.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: The lack of wealth is easily repaired but the poverty of the soul is irreplaceable.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: There are highlights when you become irreplaceable as a model, like when you become a muse to designers. They look at you differently; you're not a coat hanger for hire.
quotes.author: Iman

quotes.quote: Don't waste your time, it is too short, Valuable and irreplaceable.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: Art is an irreplaceable way of understanding and expressing the world.
quotes.author: Dana Gioia

quotes.quote: Islamic culture has given us majestic arches and soaring spires; timeless poetry and cherished music; elegant calligraphy and places of peaceful contemplation.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The desired Islamic state might be likened to an orchard planted with olive and palm trees that will take a relatively long time to produce fruit.
quotes.author: Yusuf Al-Qaradawi

quotes.quote: There is nothing more Islamic than critical thinking.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: The Islamic ethic is that if God has given you the capacity or good fortune to be a privileged individual in society, you have a moral responsibility to society.
quotes.author: Aga Khan IV

quotes.quote: Islamic tradition is full of examples of supporting the autonomy of women and the empowerment of women. Very few people know that in Islamic history there have been well over two thousand women jurists.
quotes.author: Khaled Abou El Fadl

quotes.quote: The wave of the Islamic revolution will soon reach the entire world.
quotes.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

quotes.quote: Islamic state means a state based on justice and democracy and structured upon Islamic rules and laws.
quotes.author: Ruhollah Khomeini

quotes.quote: According to Islamic principles, when a man is accused of heresy, he is given the choice between repentance and punishment.
quotes.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quotes.quote: While many Islamic countries pay lip service to the idea of freedom of religion, they don't put up with conversion from Islam to another religion.
quotes.author: Ibn Warraq

quotes.quote: The great Islamic nation cannot ... be indifferent and remain silent on the injustice done to you. The Islamic nation is required to assist you in any way it can.
quotes.author: Ali Khamenei

quotes.quote: The universality of Islam is not uniformity, it is unity with diversity.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: As with fascism, the rise of Islamic totalitarianism has partly to do with its populist appeal to the class resentments of an economically oppressed population and to anger at political subordination and humiliation.
quotes.author: Ellen Willis

quotes.quote: The religion of Islam brings out of the individual all of his dormant potential.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Islam is not a set of rules. It's a way of seeing life and the world.
quotes.author: Nouman Ali Khan

quotes.quote: In Islam, all living things have souls. We are made pure by the fire of the lord compassion.
quotes.author: John Speed

quotes.quote: The message of Islam asks you to be intellectually, spiritually, socially, and politically independent.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Islam teaches tolerance, not hatred; universal brotherhood, not enmity; peace, and not violence.
quotes.author: Pervez Musharraf

quotes.quote: Let me put it this way: There is nothing in Islam that is fundamentally against the quest for knowledge.
quotes.author: Ahmed Zewail

quotes.quote: Islam stands for the unity and brotherhood of mankind, and not for disrupting the oneness of the human family.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Of all religious systems, Islam alone declares that individual perfection is possible in our earthly existence.
quotes.author: Muhammad Asad

quotes.quote: In Islam religion and politics cannot be separated. Unlike other religions, Islam is political by its very nature.
quotes.author: Ali Sina

quotes.quote: The religion of Islam actually restores one's human feelings, human rights, human incentives, human, his talent.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: If Islam's sole interest is the welfare of mankind, then Islam is the strongest advocate of human rights anywhere on Earth.
quotes.author: Mos Def

quotes.quote: Islam is a faith that brings comfort to people. It inspires them to lead lives based on honesty, and justice, and compassion.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: The point of Islam is to promote peace.
quotes.author: Lupe Fiasco

quotes.quote: Islam has a proud tradition of tolerance.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Islam is not just a religion. Islam is everything.
quotes.author: Cat Stevens

quotes.quote: The very word Islam means peace, which is nonviolence.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Islam appeals to people because it appeals also to reason.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: In Islam there is not much room for anything else but Islam.
quotes.author: Geert Wilders

quotes.quote: Surely Islam has nothing to fear from criticism even if it be unreasonable.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Islam understands its earthly mission to extend the law of Allah over the world by force.
quotes.author: Robert Spencer

quotes.quote: Liberty in Islam is the liberty to be a Muslim, democracy likewise, individualism likewise.
quotes.author: James Buchan

quotes.quote: Traditional Islam is a mixture of all obedience to Allah, and if that requires militancy, so be it.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: In Islam, the legislative power and competence to establish laws belong exclusively to God Almighty.
quotes.author: Ruhollah Khomeini

quotes.quote: Islam will be victorious through the blood of martyrs who spread its light in every dark corner of this earth.
quotes.author: Mohammed Bouyeri

quotes.quote: Islam is not a religion of peace. Islam is a religion of submission. Islam means submit.
quotes.author: Stephen Bannon

quotes.quote: It is the nature of Islam to dominate, not to be dominated, to impose its law on all nations and to extend its power to the entire planet.
quotes.author: Hassan Al-Banna

quotes.quote: I feel we are all islands - in a common sea.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: No man is an island, entire of itself; every man is a piece of the continent.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: How I wish that somewhere there existed an island for those who are wise and of good will.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Knowledge is an island surrounded by a sea of mystery.
quotes.author: Chet Raymo

quotes.quote: Your life is an island separated from all other islands and continents. Regardless of how many boats you send to other shores or how many ships arrive upon your shores, you yourself are an island separated by its own pains, secluded in its happiness
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Little islands are all large prisons: one cannot look at the sea without wishing for the wings of a swallow.
quotes.author: Richard Burton

quotes.quote: Our knowledge is a little island in a great ocean of nonknowledge.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: Islands are reminders of arrivals and departures.
quotes.author: Gretel Ehrlich

quotes.quote: The brain is an island in an osmotically homogeneous sea.
quotes.author: Francis Daniels Moore

quotes.quote: Islands are gregarious animals, they decorate the ocean in conveys.
quotes.author: Stella Benson

quotes.quote: The wise man makes an island of himself that no flood can overwhelm.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: What is the good of being an island, if you are not a volcanic island?
quotes.author: Wyndham Lewis

quotes.quote: The larger the island of knowledge, the longer the shoreline of wonder.
quotes.author: Ralf W. Sockman

quotes.quote: Islands are metaphors of the heart, no matter what poet says otherwise.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: We cannot have islands of excellence in a sea of slovenly indifference to standards.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: Small islands of coherence in a sea of chaos can shift the whole system to a higher order.
quotes.author: Barbara Marx Hubbard

quotes.quote: Each man is an island unto himself. But though a sea of difference may divide us, an entire world of commonality lies beneath.
quotes.author: James Rozoff

quotes.quote: Islands are havens and breeding grounds for the unique and anomalous. They are natural laboratories of extravagant evolutionary experimentation.
quotes.author: David Quammen

quotes.quote: Make an island of yourself, make yourself your refuge; there is no other refuge. Make truth your island, make truth your refuge; there is no other refuge.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Man is like an island set in isolation in a fathomless sea enveloped by darkness, saying that the loneliness his self knows is so utterly absolute because even he knows not his self completely.
quotes.author: Syed Muhammad Naquib al-Attas

quotes.quote: No man or woman is an island. To exist just for yourself is meaningless. You can achieve the most satisfaction when you feel related to some greater purpose in life, something greater than yourself.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Islands are natural workshops of evolution.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Every island to a child is a treasure island.
quotes.author: P. D. James

quotes.quote: The fact is, we are not islands and we are far more connected than we know.
quotes.author: Elisha

quotes.quote: All men are islands, surrounded by the bottomless oceans of unthinking night.
quotes.author: Charles Stross

quotes.quote: We are like islands in the sea, separate on the surface but connected in the deep.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: No man is an island. You can ask people for help and they can ask for your help in return.
quotes.author: Mr Hudson

quotes.quote: Best of an island is once you get there - you can't go any farther...you've come to the end of things.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Everyone knew that all islands were worlds unto themselves, that to come to an island was to come to another world.
quotes.author: Guy Gavriel Kay

quotes.quote: Children love to be alone because alone is where they know themselves, and where they dream.
quotes.author: Roger Rosenblatt

quotes.quote: Isolation is aloneness that feels forced upon you, like a punishment. Solitude is aloneness you choose and embrace. I think great things can come out of solitude, out of going to a place where all is quiet except the beating of your heart.
quotes.author: Jeanne Marie Laskas

quotes.quote: We allow our ignorance to prevail upon us and make us think we can survive alone, alone in patches, alone in groups, alone in races, even alone in genders.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Isolation offered its own form of companionship.
quotes.author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quotes.quote: I have such a fear of finding another like myself, and such a desire to find one! I am so utterly lonely, but I also have such a fear that my isolation be broken through, and I no longer be the head and ruler of my universe.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: When so many are lonely as seem to be lonely, it would be inexcusably selfish to be lonely alone.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Isolation is a self-defeating dream.
quotes.author: Carlos Salinas de Gortari

quotes.quote: The whole value of solitude depends upon one's self; it may be a sanctuary or a prison, a haven of repose or a place of punishment, a heaven or a hell, as we ourselves make it.
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: Isolation is the sum total of wretchedness to a man.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: I would get a lot of writing done if I lived in isolation in a cave under a swamp.
quotes.author: Claire Cameron

quotes.quote: Even the technology that promises to unite us, divides us. Each of us is now electronically connected to the globe, and yet we feel utterly alone.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: You can make more friends in two months by becoming interested in other people than you can in two years by trying to get other people interested in you.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Love can isolate us from everything around us. But in its absence, we can be filled with the fear that something comparable exists.
quotes.author: Carlos Fuentes

quotes.quote: We're all islands shouting lies to each other across seas of misunderstanding.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Loneliness doesn't have much to do with where you are.
quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

quotes.quote: Solitude vivifies; isolation kills.
quotes.author: Joseph Roux

quotes.quote: But there are other words for privacy and independence. They are isolation and loneliness.
quotes.author: Megan Whalen Turner

quotes.quote: I was never less alone than when by myself.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a good or bad ad in isolation. What is good at one moment is bad at another. Research can trap you into the past.
quotes.author: William Bernbach

quotes.quote: I never found the companion that was so companionable as solitude. We are for the most part more lonely when we go abroad among men than when we stay in our chambers.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: A picture held us captive. And we could not get outside it, for it lay in our language and language seemed to repeat it to us inexorably.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: There was nothing lonelier than a man with a million friends.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: No one can live entirely on their own, nor can any country or society exist in isolation.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: Living alone, though it may not be the state you ultimately desire for yourself, affords an unparalleled opportunity to know yourself, to be yourself, and to develop yourself as a unique and interesting individual.
quotes.author: Phyllis Hobe

quotes.quote: The more powerful and original a mind, the more it will incline towards the religion of solitude.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: I am greatly pleased with the public, authentic isolation in which we two, you and I, now find ourselves. It is wholly in accord with our attitude and our principles.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Lonely people, in talking to each other can make each other lonelier.
quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

quotes.quote: I am in no way different from anyone else, that my predicament, my sense of aloneness or isolation may be precisely what unites me with everyone.
quotes.author: Franz Wright

quotes.quote: No man is an island, entire of itself.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: Loneliness is the first thing which God's eye named not good.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Solitude, isolation, are painful things and beyond human endurance.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.quote: Without great solitude no serious work is possible.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Loneliness is and always has been the central and inevitable experience of every man.
quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

quotes.quote: Solitude is a chosen separation for refining your soul. Isolation is what you crave when you neglect the first.
quotes.author: Wayne Cordeiro

quotes.quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
quotes.author: Ellen Burstyn

quotes.quote: Tears do not burn except in solitude.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: People need loving the most when they appear to deserve it the least.
quotes.author: John Harrigan

quotes.quote: It is strange how the presence of additional people can make you feel more alone.
quotes.author: James Alan Gardner

quotes.quote: Solitude is fine but you need someone to tell you that solitude is fine.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: We're all of us sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life!
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Be able to be alone. Lose not the advantage of solitude, and the society of thyself.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is richness of self.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Too much self-centered attitude, you see, brings, you see, isolation. Result: loneliness, fear, anger. The extreme self-centered attitude is the source of suffering.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: If you meet a loner, no matter what they tell you, it's not because they enjoy solitude. It's because they have tried to blend into the world before, and people continue to disappoint them.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Israel deserves America's friendship in reality - not just in rhetoric.
quotes.author: Eric Cantor

quotes.quote: The Land of Israel needs a People and the People of Israel needs a Land.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: Israel will endure and flourish. It is the child of hope and the home of the brave.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Israel is the canary in the mine. What happens to Israel will eventually happen to America itself.
quotes.author: David Horowitz

quotes.quote: Israel, the Jewish state, the only democracy in the Middle East, continues to shine as a beacon of light in the darkest region of the world.
quotes.author: Brigitte Gabriel

quotes.quote: The State of Israel will prove itself not by material wealth, not by military might or technical achievement, but by its moral character and human values.
quotes.author: David Ben-Gurion

quotes.quote: In Israel, in order to be a realist you must believe in miracles.
quotes.author: David Ben-Gurion

quotes.quote: The State of Israel was not established by anxiety but, rather, through pride.
quotes.author: Yair Lapid

quotes.quote: Israel is a fulfilled dream. Nothing that exists here existed here a hundred years ago.
quotes.author: Amos Oz

quotes.quote: Israel desperately needs peace if it is to come anywhere close to being the 'light unto nations' of Jewish dreams.
quotes.author: Edgar Bronfman

quotes.quote: Israel has created a new image of the Jew in the world - the image of a working and an intellectual people, of a people that can fight with heroism.
quotes.author: David Ben-Gurion

quotes.quote: In Israel we tend to be carried away by our emotions.
quotes.author: Ehud Olmert

quotes.quote: Israel must be like a mad dog, too dangerous to bother.
quotes.author: Moshe Dayan

quotes.quote: If Israel is forced to stand alone, Israel will stand alone.
quotes.author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quotes.quote: Israel... is one of the great outpost of democracy in the world.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Israel is moving from the realm of poetry to the realm of prose.
quotes.author: Shimon Peres

quotes.quote: Israel is thirsting for water, and Turkey is overflowing with it.
quotes.author: Stephen Kinzer

quotes.quote: The security of Israel is a moral imperative for all free peoples.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.quote: Israel itself is the strongest guarantee against another Holocaust.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Israel has incredible entrepreneurial spirit and a deep bench of technology talent.
quotes.author: Roelof Botha

quotes.quote: The harm done to Israel is damage done to the West. And delegitimizing Israel is a delegitimization of the West.
quotes.author: Jose Maria Aznar

quotes.quote: Israel is not dangerous on one hand, but on the other hand it is dangerous. Human life is just dangerous, in general.
quotes.author: Meital Dohan

quotes.quote: Israel is still the only country in the world against which there is a written document to the effect that it must disappear.
quotes.author: Menachem Begin

quotes.quote: Israel is a democratic state with an independent judiciary, a free press and a diverse population of many cultures, religions and creeds.
quotes.author: Jonathan Sacks

quotes.quote: Israel is a piece of real estate that neither Jew or Arab will let go of; neither will leave these shores. And so they will have to learn to live together.
quotes.author: Zubin Mehta

quotes.quote: Israel is one of the greatest and most modern democracies on the planet.
quotes.author: Matteo Salvini

quotes.quote: Israel has always been and must always be America's strongest ally.
quotes.author: George Pataki

quotes.quote: Israel has an important principle: It is only Israel that is responsible for our security.
quotes.author: Yitzhak Rabin

quotes.quote: Israel is a country that respects freedom - freedom of assembly, freedom of speech and freedom of worship.
quotes.author: George Pataki

quotes.quote: Today, Israel is stronger than ever. Israel has defensive tools of its own - those developed in the past and those developed today and those that will be developed tomorrow.
quotes.author: Shimon Peres

quotes.quote: Israel is not an aviary.
quotes.author: Abba Eban

quotes.quote: Israel is the only democracy in the Middle East.
quotes.author: Jack Schwartz

quotes.quote: Israel produces more conceptual products than any other country.
quotes.author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quotes.quote: Israel has its own right as a nation to defend its national security.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Israel always has to be in a position to defend itself against any adversary and against any threat of any kind.
quotes.author: Ehud Olmert

quotes.quote: Israel is an independent country with a large army, and it has the ability to do what it thinks is right.
quotes.author: Ariel Sharon

quotes.quote: Israel must be able to defend itself - by itself - against any threat.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: You just have those days. You just allow yourself to have those days. I think everybody has bad days. So because of that, when you recognize it, just allow it to be. It is what it is. I don't think you should ever stifle your frustration, ever.
quotes.author: Donald Faison

quotes.quote: What comes, when it comes, will be what it is.
quotes.author: Alberto Caeiro

quotes.quote: Face your fear Accept your war it is what it is.
quotes.author: Zakk Wylde

quotes.quote: It is what it is, and it ain't nothin' else... Everything is clearly, openly, plainly delivered.
quotes.author: Dan Flavin

quotes.quote: It is what it is. You are what you it. There are no mistakes.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: I'm just not into trying to convince people like me. I always say to myself, 'It is what it is.' I walk into a situation knowing that people are either going to love me or they're not, and that's OK. I'm just going to be me. You can't be everything to everyone.
quotes.author: NeNe Leakes

quotes.quote: Nowadays, when females get into relationships it is as if they're telling guy: Hey, I hope these next few months will be worth you breaking my heart in the end.
quotes.author: Dominic Amali

quotes.quote: The aim of all commentary on art now should be to make works of art - and, by analogy, our own experience - more, rather than less, real to us. The function of criticism should be to show how it is what it is, even that it is what it is, rather than to show what it means.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: The Madden Curse has really taken on a life of its own. People just love talking about it, and it is what it is, but I look at it as a challenge.
quotes.author: Drew Brees

quotes.quote: No matter what I do now, there are certain doors I have already closed, certain opportunities I'll never get back. There's nothing to be done, I guess. It is what it is.
quotes.author: Blake Nelson

quotes.quote: I'm not sure what the future holds but I do know that I'm going to be positive and not wake up feeling desperate. As my dad said 'Nic, it is what it is, it's not what it should have been, not what it could have been, it is what it is.'
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: I regret that I wasn't more successful with my marriages, but it is what it is.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: Life is as it is, we take it to be hard or easy. It's all about our perception, attitude and level of gratitude.
quotes.author: Geraldine Vermaak

quotes.quote: Telling it like it is means telling it like it was and how it is now that it isn't what it was to the is now people.
quotes.author: Jill Johnston

quotes.quote: Music is a beautiful thing to listen to. It is not a thing to preach to others about, it's not a cause. It is what it is-and that's a beautiful artform.
quotes.author: Synyster Gates

quotes.quote: All my friends seem to be smart arses. Don't ask me why. Like many things, it is what it is.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: Take delight in a thing, or rather in anything, not as a means to some other end, but just because it is what it is. A child in the full health of his mind will put his hand flat on the summer lawn, feel it, and give a little shiver of private glee at the elastic firmness of the globe.
quotes.author: Charles Edward Montague

quotes.quote: It is what it is, it is what you make it.
quotes.author: James Durbin

quotes.quote: The roster that we have today may change tomorrow. It is what it is for right now.
quotes.author: Nick Saban

quotes.quote: It is what it is because you let it be so.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Truth is not what you want it to be; it is what it is, and you must bend to its power or live a lie.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: The ultimate freedom depends on knowing the ultimate Truth. Truth is not what people say it is, it is what it is. And Truth, quite remarkably, sets one free, just like philosophers have said down the ages.
quotes.author: L Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: One good thing about the past is that you can't change it. So there's no reason to go back. It's there. It is what it is. The only thing you can change is right now and what's happening next.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: Beauty is not the cause of something, it is what it is.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: It is what it is. I can't change what's happened to me.
quotes.author: Giles Duley

quotes.quote: I don't mean to sound sleezy but tease me I don't want it if it's that easy.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: It's not necessarily what a family is typically supposed to look like. But it is what it is. It's about a connection and bond that everyone can identify with.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: It is what it is. Either walk on, or accept.
quotes.author: Deborah Lawrenson

quotes.quote: At my age, turning gray is kind of a blessing, where it softens all of the other horrible things it does to you, but it is what it is.
quotes.author: Tom Selleck

quotes.quote: This is a tough situation. But it is what it is, and time has an amazing way of knitting together solutions as long as everybody stays calm and resolves to be as gentle and patient as possible.
quotes.author: Amy Dickinson

quotes.quote: This is what it is to be human: to persist.
quotes.author: Spider Robonson and Jeanne Robinson

quotes.quote: Man is what he is, a wild animal with the will to survive, and so far the ability, against all competition.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Everything is what it is, and not another thing.
quotes.author: Jospeh Butler

quotes.quote: He knew what's what, and that's as high / As metaphysics wit can fly.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: The truth is that it is not the sins of the fathers that descend unto the third generation, but the sorrows of the mothers.
quotes.author: Marilyn French

quotes.quote: Man's main task in life is to give birth to himself, to become what he potentially is. The most important product of his effort is his own personality
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Most of the change we think we see in life / Is due to truths being in and out of favour.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Once the toothpaste is out of the tube, it is awfully hard to get it back in.
quotes.author: H.R. Haldeman

quotes.quote: That is what learning is. You suddenly understand something you've understood all your life but in a new way.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Those people have seen something. What it is, I do not know, and I am not curious to know.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: As it is the characteristic of great wits to say much in few words, so it is of small wits to talk much and say nothing.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Life begets life. Energy creates energy. It is by spending oneself that one becomes rich.
quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

quotes.quote: As is a tale, so is life; not how long it is, but how good it is, is what matters.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Where every man on earth to become atheist, it could not affect God in any way. He is what He is in himself without regard to any other. To believe in him adds nothing to his perfections; to doubt Him takes nothing away.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson

quotes.quote: Take care not knowingly to do or say anything which, if everyone were to know of it, you could not own, and say, 'Yes, that is what I did, or what I said.'
quotes.author: Louis IX of France

quotes.quote: The law is what it is—a majestic edifice, sheltering all of us, each stone of which rests on another.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: It is what it is. But, it will be what you make it.
quotes.author: Pat Summitt

quotes.quote: It is what it is. Isn't that how these things always go? They are what they are. We just get to cope.
quotes.author: Mira Grant

quotes.quote: It isn't what a picture is of, it is what it is about.
quotes.author: John Szarkowski

quotes.quote: The truth has no form, you know. It's not like walking around trying to actually ask for favors and to be acknowledged, it is what it is.
quotes.author: Chuck D.

quotes.quote: The image is not a medium for which we have to find the proper use. It is what it is and it is beyond all our moral considerations. It is by its essence immoral, and the world's becoming-image is an immoral process.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: I'm living with every step. I can't live with regret. The past is the past. I'm not worried about it. I can't change it. I can't fix it. It is what it is. I'm just living.
quotes.author: Ryan Sheckler

quotes.quote: Accept the universe / As the gods gave it to you. / If the gods wanted to give you something else / They'd have done it. / If there are other matters and other worlds / There are.
quotes.author: Alberto Caeiro

quotes.quote: I'm probably the least harsh on myself, and I try not to scrutinize everything about my body. As a new mom, it is what it is, and we just have to do our best.
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.quote: You either grow with this sport, or you get left behind. It's sad, but it is what it is. You gotta keep up with this sport.
quotes.author: Max Holloway

quotes.quote: The work is done; it is what it is. You do the work, and you hope people like it, and if they don't, don't read it. I don't read reviews. I don't have social media, so I'll stay away from that; it's easy.
quotes.author: Mike Colter

quotes.quote: You can't change the things you've done. It's now and the here on out you've got control of.
quotes.author: Mindy McGinnis

quotes.quote: I love flowers for being flowers, directly. / And I love trees for being trees without my thought.
quotes.author: Alberto Caeiro

quotes.quote: Water’s water and that’s why it’s beautiful.
quotes.author: Alberto Caeiro
